Description :

 Brigadoon is a newbie friendly mudding environment with lots
of new creative ideas and growth opportunity. With 23 standard
races, 16 remort races and 13 classes to choose from, you'll 
never have to do the same combination twice as you enjoy our 
level 121 remort based system, or level to your hearts 
content. There are no limits! Join clans and meet new and 
interesting people, participate in clan quests or individual 
quests being held by our experienced immortal staff. Feel free
to ask questions, leave comments, and use our note systems. 
Everyone is so helpful that it makes a great environment for 
first time mudders, who soon become old school addicts! Raise 
clan ranks, get your own clan room and organize your own 
ideas! Our staff is always curious about what our mudders have
to say. Take your daily life's frustrations out in the many 
areas and mobs that you are sure to recognize! Explore 
original areas, identify items, wands, potions and other 
spell-giving equipment. Compare races/classes to come up with 
your perfect mix and match, most races have something 
different to offer. What else can we say? Come in and try it
for yourself! Words can't describe your experiences playing 
Brigadoon.

Who is online?  http://brigadoon.etxi.net

Mud         : Cities of M'Dhoria
Code Base   : [Rom] Modified Realms of Asgard
Telnet      : mud.mdhoria.org 6996 [216.104.128.65]
WWW         : http://mud.mdhoria.org
Description :

 The Cities Of M'Dhoria is an enforced role-playing experience set in a 
fantasy, medieval-type society. Join in the story and establish yourself 
in a completely original world filled with magic, art, and destiny. One 
can join an army, be hired as a mercenary, or become a skilled artisan 
bent on spreading their craft and creativity throughout the nations while 
serving under or as part of a monarchy. Join an evil organization where a 
roguish lifestyle combines the art of trickery and stealth with greed and 
ambition in plots to rule. Spend your days as a noble knight or priest, 
spending your life spreading the message, blessings and wrath of your god. 
Conjure up magics, fight alongside your allies in battle, and create a 
place for yourself in society. In a moment, you can be swept into an 
unknown world where friends are made and enemies are destroyed in the 
blink of an eye, and where almost nothing is exactly as it seems. 

With unique magic and skill-based leveling systems, 16 classes and 19 
races to choose from, and innumerable storylines and plots, logical and 
roleplayed player-killing, and multiple continents to explore, CoM has 
something to offer for almost every type of roleplayer.

Mud         : Fallout
Code Base   : [Circlemud] heavily modified
Telnet      : shania.betterbox.net 2222 [68.90.68.66]
WWW         : None
Description :

  In the not too distant future, war will be our end.  Predicted
by the intelligent for years in advance, nuclear warfare laid
mankind to rest.  The government is in shambles, we thought
this would be our last salvation.  

Let the warheads fly... 

Now, the sickening smell of death fills the air as the ashes of
radioactivity fall to the blood-soaked ground.  We gave 
democracy a chance.  It didn't work.  Our new government shall
be violence; Kill what you want, take what you need.  From the
Fallout of our end rose a new breed of warrior: a warrior 
without mind of peace, a warrior without mind of companionship.
We the People ... what a joke.

Fallout is not your average mud.  It requires an above-average
player.  We are a step away from the normal hack-and-slash
medieval fantasy MUDs.  Guns, bombs, cybernetic implants, 
computers, challenging levels, and totally original zones are
only a few of the features Fallout has to offer.  Leveling is a
difficult process that will most likely involve grouping with 
other players when you reach high levels.  

Only the strong survive, and the weak shall perish.  

Do you have what it takes?

Telnet      : btmux.com 5555 [66.225.211.238]
WWW         : http://btmux.com
Description :

  The Periphery planet of Randis IV explodes with conflict as
rapidly growing city-states battle for dominance over one
another. Using a handful of scavenged and stolen Battlemechs,
tanks, choppers, and aerospace fighters from all over the galaxy,
the uprising political entities mercilessly fight it out with one
another.

  The players take the role of a soldier on the front lines of
one of four factions, earning their own mechs and promotions but
still upkeeping an affiliation with their city-state. This is all
done in real-time and runs using a heavily version of TinyMUX
where the players are actually able to pilot the units he or she
choses.

  We are a comparatively new game considering how many years
some of the other Battletech MUXs have been running, but we have
a well-equipped staff that is ready to help out any newcomers.

Stop on by and give us a try!

Mud         : IcewindMUD
Code Base   : [LP] MudOS
Telnet      : 81.169.178.155 2021 [81.169.178.155]
WWW         : http://www.icewindmud.org/
Description :

   This was then: There was world ruled by a generous king who was kind to all of his
people. But amidst the dark corridors of the king's castle evil lurked. The king's magician
had vicious plans to take over and rule with darkness at his side.. he opened a portal to
the underworld.  An army of dark minions swirled out thrue the portal and into the peaceful
kingdom. But the dark forces were treacherous and betrayed the magician.

   The kingdom was swiftly overthrown, many people were killed and tortured. People fled
and sought shelter, they gathered in small tribes and soon found that the only place where
they could be safe from these evil forces was underground. They started building underground
complexes, magically hiding the entrances from the dreaded army above..

   Evil ruled the surface for many, many years. Man lost count of how long they had been
underground and the surface was soon but a legend of old times.

 This is now: As time went by and evil ravaged the surface, the climate started to
change.The surface started to become a dark and desolate place, haunted by cold winds. Evil
slowly retreated and eventually light came back to the kingdom. But the climate never
changed back and the kingdom will never be the same again. With the return of light man
began to open their well-covered hatches from below and take a glimpse of the outside world.
Seeing little danger, young and brave adventurers soon started to explore the surroundings.

 You are one of those adventurers and it is your task to give Bards of the future
something to sing heroic songs about around campfires once again.

 Soon you will be able to join an entirely new guild!

Mud         : The Creator's Shadow
Code Base   : [Rom] TCS (Extremely heavily modified ROM2.3/EoD)
Telnet      : cshadow.net 4000 [209.225.157.116]
WWW         : http://www.cshadow.net/
Description :

The Creator's Shadow is based on Diku/Rom code, but has been modified well
beyond what it originally was. TCS is a Role-playing game that is based on
the 'Wheel of Time' series of books, by Robert Jordan. We offer WoT races
and classes, the channeling system has been rewritten so that spells can be
sustained, tied, and inverted.  Channeling has also been shifted from a
'mana' based system to one based on RJ's 5 spheres of the True Source.  
Blademaster has been implemented, as well as 'speardancer' for Aiel. We have
an 'overland map' of the world, designed to link areas as they were linked     
in RJ's world. No longer a 'MUD', but neither is it a 'MUSH', we feel that
gaming should be more rp based instead of the random pking you find on other
muds and have adapted the code to encourage good rp. Although pking still 
plays a part in TCS it is not a must. Classes are carefully balanced to
allow players exellent playability in all classes. Our code makes better use
of skills and emphasizes less on actuall level. The actual code is quite
stable and we have dedicated coders able to fix bugs when found. We have   
gotten quite a few compliments, and are progressing nicely. The players and
immortals are quite friendly and helpful, and I hope you'll come visit us
soon.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Spark MUD
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Major rewrite of SlothMUD code
Telnet      : sparkmud.org 6101 [65.68.139.170]
WWW         : None
Description :

  It's hard to pin down one main thing that makes Spark stand
out. I'd say our main difference is our approach. We don't just
want to be a cool MUD, we want to be a fun GAME.

  Our builders are encouraged to think beyond what one normally
sees in a MUD and let their imagination be their guide, and let
me tell you, there's some really cool stuff. Mobs are capable of
interacting with players on a level unseen before on a MUD - like
a puppy you can buy at a pet shop that you can train to do
tricks. Even rooms can interact with players - a door knocker
that requires a riddle to be answered before a player may enter
the door - and the riddle isn't the same every time.

  Our 'Let's see what this thing can really do' approach is the
difference.

and more are on their way.  Text displays continuously, no need 
to refresh.

Mud         : Cryptal Abyss
Code Base   : SMAUG
Telnet      :  
WWW         : http://www.portal.gs/CryptalAbyss/
Description :

   This is my firt attempt at going public with a mud, so I'm
not sure what to say. This mud has been around for about 2
months, as of 8/16/99 we are open for the public. Cryptal 
Abyss is based on SMAUG, so it has a few areas from Realms 
of Dispair, but most of the areas are custom. We will be 
adding new races and classes soon. Once you reach level 50,
you may be able to become an immortal. There is layerable
equipment, which means that you can wear many pieces of eq
at once, in the same location. Before connecting, you will
need to go to the webpage to get the current IP. Directions
on how to change the IP is on the webpage. You don't have to
come to this mud, but if you want to, you're welcome to it!

          ----Danielle, Founder of Cryptal Abyss

Mud         : Napping Cat's Dream
Code Base   : [MUCK] ProtoMUCK 2.0b3+SSL+YerfRPS
Telnet      : muck.animaltracks.net 8888 [209.77.107.10]
WWW         : http://tails.animaltracks.net/multiverse/
Description :

  Note, Multiverse is also known as Metamorphosis 2, and 
encapsulates both the Metamorphosis and Furry Fantasy: 
Wutai worlds into it (under a new, improved RPsystem)

Multiverse offers an *extremely* flexible theme and context 
sensitive RPsystem for a multiverse with multiple realms.  
It is also an option to build your own area where people 
can create their realm and run it basically how they like,
while being to interact with the other realms as well.

Each realm not only can add abilities, spells/runes, 
skills, techs, and etc. to their realm, but they can all 
have their own theme, tech level and magic level.

Mud         : Evarayn
Code Base   : [Custom] completely original
Telnet      : evarayn.com 23 [204.209.44.27]
WWW         : http://www.evarayn.com
Description :

 Evarayn is an original world, built on a custom codebase and 
run by a dedicated team of immortals. 

We feature:
 - Hundreds of unique and interesting skill abilities
 - Free-form skill selection, choose the sets you like or take 
   requirements for a profession
 - Required role-play, on-going story arcs
 - Six original races spread over three continents
 - Guilds offering employment for the peaceful and adventures for
   bashers
 - Player formed societies
 - Player controlled cities
 - Structured family lineage
 - Sailing the seas across a gorgeous ansi world map
 - Animal training and breeding
 - Complete player impacted economy including trade of commodities
 - An extensive combat/healing system (PK is 'role-play restricted')

 In the aftermath of the Great War, six races remain in the vast world. Coming together in 
conflict or alliance, with open hand, with clenched fist, the peoples of Evarayn strive to 
rebuild what was lost, or strike out anew.

Mud         : The Final Mud
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Heavily Modified
Telnet      : portent.genesismuds.com 1299 [216.136.9.8]
WWW         : None
Description :

  The most ancient of elves speak of a time long ago when there were no 
humans walking the lands we know of today.  Nature and magic had reached
a balance in this time of legend until the day the elves call 'Esz'tinia',
or The Great Storm.  During The Great Storm an elf mage called Alkyone 
found solace for many beneath the waves where an heretofore unknown deity 
took pity on them and gave them a new life in the deep sea.

  The Great Storm, which consisted not of rain and wind but fire and 
lightning raged over the world for many years.  The mighty dwarves from 
the hills and mountains had taken safety along with their gnome brethren
in the deepest of their mines.

  When The Great Storm subsided those long years later and the races of 
the world crawled back onto the surface they found many changes.  Men 
had begun to arrive, having fled lands now buried beneath unknown waters.  
What followed then were minor battles as man, elf, dwarf, and gnome 
redrew the boundaries of old. 

  Then came the dragons.  Tiny pockets of hell cruising through the 
skies. Mostly humans roam the surface now, brought together into small 
pockets far from any dragon's lair.  The men unite under one deity with 
warriors and templars serving as defenders of the people.  Others seek to
restore balance with the elements, others feed upon the chaos, and 
others create it as they wield magics never before seen upon the world.

and drop us a note or send us an email.

For years now, many a soul has made CyberSphere their home.

CyberSphere is set in New Carthage, a bustling metropolis.
The wastelands of the American Southwest lurk behind the
city wall, and the corporate powers that pull the citizen's
strings lurk behind the inner wall.  A wide variety of
options are available for characters.  Be a decker in the
beautifully-crafted matrix system, a mechanic keeping others
cars on the road, a bounty-hunter, a reporter, or work for
one of the soulless megacorps.  The world is constantly
changing and improving, and boasts a variety of code systems
to handle many situations.  Above all, though, is the role
playing.  A dedicated hardcore group of players have been
keeping the city alive, but they could use some new blood
to let.... I mean greet.  So join us today!

Mud         : SilberLand
Code Base   : [LP] minor patches applied to 3.2.1@141
Telnet      : mud.silberland.at 4711 [195.34.131.34]
WWW         : http://www.silberland.at/
Description :

Silberland (SL) is a german-spoken LPmud in Austria. It is
24 hours reachable. The players may become Seers ('Seher',
hi-level player) or Wizards ('Magier')  after fulfilling a
number of quests and exploring the world sufficiently.

SL features  regions of different themes, size and levels.
Seers have the opportunity  to build their own houses  and
are able to utilize magic gates  to walk shorter paths for
long distances.

Silberland is open to up to 100 players with an average of
40 to 50 during daytime. It offers extensive communication
features such as a mail system (including a gateway to the
internet), newspaper, channels, and more, newbies are most
welcome and helped around a lot by others.  You can have a
(limited) look around at our website without even required
to login!

Mud         : Armageddon MUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH]
Telnet      : redknight.crystalsands.net 6996 [63.203.148.109]
WWW         : http://armageddonmush.homelinux.net
Description :

 Yes, this is really Armageddon MUSH's Mud Connector Listing. If you've found this 
listing you're likely an old playing wondering, 'What happened?' Basically, palemoon.net 
died, and it was a couple months by the time we found a new server. Then we found out we 
couldn't get Rhost again, so we needed to manually port over the old DB. And it was in 
this stage teh MUSH languished for many a'month. Now, however, Talisein is pushing to 
finish everything up and open around August 03. We'd appreciate your help and/or support.

Now, if you're a new player just finding this listing.. Well, Armageddon MUSH has a 
really great theme, crafted in '96 by Taisch. It's the End of the World Biblical style. 
The plagues and wars have come and past, and now Angels and Demons walk the streets of 
the Last City, clamoring for the last few Unchosen souls. Its pretty entertaining, yup. 
So log on, create a character, and tell the Staffers to move their butts 'cuz you want 
to play!

Description :

   Welcome to Daedal Macabre.  We're an elegant, modified ROM2.4 that is 
generally bug free. We have 13 classes to choose from ( including rangers,
assassins, paladins, druids, necromancers, monks, and the built from near 
scratch psionicists ).  You can customize your own armor, jewelry, clothing,
or weaponry by gathering materials and taking them to the proper shop, making
almost all player equipment unique.  Features include: a creation point cap,
meaning that you can feel safe knowing that everyone else is near the same
playing field as you, mounted combat is completed, as is the account
system.  Life is short, and you may just miss your chance at discovering our
wonderful mud ;)  ...and plentiful playerbase full of exquisite people.  
If you enjoy to roleplay, kill things, talk to friends, and enjoy a fairly 
balanced game, you may just want to stop by...  You won't need your real life
anymore.

   Our latest renovations: Devas and other-planar beings of goodness for 
remorting.  The Merchant code is nearly done, giving you a class that does not
rely on killing at all to level.  Farming, Succubus, digging up treasures and 
trash, intelligent kitty kat mobs that like to ambush you.  Come on, sounds 
like fun!  Give us a good ole' college drop-out try.

Mud         : Dark and Shattered Lands (DSL)
Code Base   : [Rom] DSL 2.5, Rom2.4
Telnet      : dsl-mud.org 4000 [208.200.3.6]
WWW         : http://www.dsl-mud.org/
Description :

  DSL offers both hack and slash and role-playing features but
role-playing is required. Join one of the many clans and go to
war, or if you have a distaste for player killing, join a
Kingdom and conquer others using our Battlefield simulation
code. You may even start your own kingdom with enough funds
gathered. We offer 5 basic classes and then over 25 reclasses.
There are also a variety of remorts to choose from including all
10 species of Metallic or Chromatic Dragons, Angels, Demons, and
our custom Balanx. DSL has Gods which are role-played by a gentle
and thoughtful imm staff. Immortal abuse is not tolerated in the
least on DSL and anyone may request a review when they feel one
is needed. DSL has some very unique aspects such as our Vampire
system and Manatonics. Manatonics are born with natural powers,
you get them purely by random. Vampires are secretive and no one
knows who is one unless you are one yourself. The world is set
upon 4 continents with a vast sea in between in which you can
take a ship into combat against other ships. DSL offers a variety
of races and classes with hundreds of new skills and spells. We
also have a large player base averaging over 220 at a time. All it
takes is for the right person to be in the right place at the
right time to totally change the world. DSL has major quests
weekly and smaller ones daily. We boast a large playerbase and are
constantly improving the game.

Mud         : Dark Destiny: Denver By Night
Code Base   : [MUX] MUX 2.3.3.22 #1
Telnet      : denver.darkalliance.org 2000 [209.155.42.195]
WWW         : http://denver.darkalliance.org
Description :

     It's than a decade into the twenty-first century and the name   
'Denver, Colorado' still conjures up images of cowboys and pristine   
mountains. Called the 'Mile High City', Denver is the gateway to the  
Rocky Mountains, and is home to health food fanatics and ski bunnies. 
Despite what the brochures say, the truth is that Denver suffers from 
the same problems as other cities. Plagued by drugs, gang warfare, and
murder, Denver's darker side lies hidden beneath a carefully crafted  
image of suntanned athletes and Old West mystique. Industry is        
relegated to low income areas that are rarely frequented by tourists. 
Due to clerical errors, innocent people are killed in their own homes 
by the police officers sworn to protect them. Minorities of all       
stripes are victims of harassment brought on by racial profiling. News
reports of drive-by shootings and hate crimes are buried on page      
fifteen of the local papers, while stories about the Broncos take up  
the front page.                                                       
     Behind the carefully crafted mask and hidden below the concealed 
blemishes of the city lies something else: a hidden, secret soul.     
Local politics and industry are manipulated by blood drinkers; and the
forests are populated by monstrous half-animals. Willworkers bend     
reality, hiding their actions in parlor tricks. Physics and sorcerers 
work in secret societies, while fairies hide themselves in plain      
sight. Criminals are both predator and prey, targeted by these strange
beings, yet themselves targeting those who are innocent - and ignorant
- of the hidden city.
     Interested in a classic multi-sphere World of Darkness game?     
Looking for some fun RP in an interesting setting with good           
roleplayers and staff that cares? Want a chance to participate in     
plots and pursue personal growth? Then give Denver by Night a try.    
We're set in Denver Colorado in the year 2011. We feature the         
following spheres: Mortal Mortal+ Shifter Changeling and Mage. Our    
staff is a dedicated group of gamers who are veterans of not only     
online gaming but tabletop as well. Want to hear more? Feel free to   
log on to Denver at any time. There is almost always someone around to
help out, and if all else fails each sphere has an information room
available for unapproved players.

Description :

Dark Prophecy is a dark fantasy mud using the darkelib mudlib.

Features include:
 - 6 sphere magic system with critical hit messages, plus a very 
   exciting combat systems with critical hits and limb support.

 - Ability to make items, swords, shields, etc, to enchant them

 - Items are saved on person.

 - Castles or inn rooms, where items can be saved, just watch out for thieves.

 - Cool pet system in which they follow you around, and you can order 
   them to carry stuff or protect you, kill for you, etc.

 - Newbie friendly mud. Averages 20 ppl peak time.

Great mud with great combat, spells, and money making activites.

If you're not interested in fighting, try to be the richest player on.

Telnet      : slayn.net 4567
WWW         : http://sc.slayn.net
Description :

  Cowboy Bebop: Space Cowboy has been in existance since May, 2003
and boasts one of the most advanced and original codebases in
recent years.  The mud is based on the anime Cowboy Bebop, and
Bebop ONLY.  No Dragonball Z, pokemon, etc.  It is a project of
creating an immersive RP atmosphere combined with cutting edge
code and player interaction.

The mud showcases top notch building and coding talents, and has
been continuously worked on by a dedicated staff since its
creation.  It has instated many new systems for added realism,
including the 'living stat code,' making you have to work to
keep those stats up, redone space flight and combat, and a non-
automated combat system.

The mud has a good sized, and very dedicated playerbase, most
of which love the game to no end, as you can see from our
reviews.  This game is the perfect choice for anyone who is a
fan of Bebop, or science fiction in general.

explore the world, get into politics, get rich or become a

Mud         : Darker Realms
Code Base   : [LP] LPMud with custom modifications
Telnet      : darker-realms.nostrum.com 2000 [69.5.195.3]
WWW         : http://darker-realms.nostrum.com/
Description :

   Darker Realms opened in 1990 and is quite possibly the
oldest still-running LP style mud in the USA.  DR was the
first mud to offer quest-based advancement, and still
maintains a large number of challenging and interesting
quests.  Although a number of guilds have cropped up, DR
is still based on the traditional LP mudlib. Ergo, it lends
a classic feel to what we believe is a classic game. There
are about 600 active players, but rarely more than 25 or so
on at a time.  DR has almost never been down for more than
a weekend, and recently moved to a much faster machine, so
it probably *isn't* the slowest LP in existance anymore :)

Mud         : Darklord
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Circle 3.0 (Heavy modifications)
Telnet      : darklord.genesismuds.com 5099 [216.136.9.8]
WWW         : http://darklord.genesismuds.com
Description :

Darklord is a skillbased Circlemud (based on 3.0).  To sum
up some of the additions we've made over the years:

* Skills and spells based on usage, not practice.
* Guild ranks dependant on skill levels.
* Races
* New classes
* Hometowns (w/ ranks and voting system)
* Player controlled Clans.
* Many of new unique areas.
* Added levels (more being added)
* Alchemy 
* Fighting arenas (death w/o penalty)
* Bounty system
* No auto immortality.  Only well established players
  can be accepted as imms.
* Rewamped drinking system (alcohol can heal, build tolerance)
* Combat system based on events, to give more realism.
* Equipment is rentable (no cost).

..and many other changes.  Give us a try.

Mud         : Skies Above Mux
Code Base   : [MUX]
Telnet      : skiesabove.kyndig.com 5401 [69.93.129.50]
WWW         : http://www.skiesabove.org
Description :

Five hundred years ago an asteroid crashed into the Northern 
Hemisphere of our world and while not a pure planet killer it 
caused enough damage to threaten all. Those who weren't cause 
in the initial fires, shakes, eruptions, or floods felt a 
longer strain as the climate cooled, and the icy poles began 
to spread. Species large and small were disturbed from the 
previous balance, and inevitably conflicts began.

The Reskai, a cross of reptile and avian, was too forced to 
seek new territories as its old migration and breeding lands 
were destroyed, and so the Menace came into conflict with the 
humans and dragons. Thus, a bargain was struck between the 
telepathic dragons and the humans of this world. The humans 
would care for the children of dragon-kind, and the dragons 
would help the humans to fight the invasion of the Reskai.

Mud         : Peril's Awakening
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Wizards of the Coast Open Gaming License
Telnet      : perils-awakening.wolfpaw.net 3222 [204.209.44.3]
WWW         : http://perils-awakening.wolfpaw.net
Description :

In the beginning there was but a single entity, who called itself 
Oere, meaning 'The One'.  For time beyond eternity it existed in a 
state of introspection, pondering its existence and who it was.  
Finally the day came where it knew it could only define its 
existence by comparing it to something else.  And so it divided 
itself, almost infinitely, in one incredible flash of energy.  From
the pieces was created matter, which eventually formed planets.  It 
is the planet of Eltheria that we focus upon now.

Eltheria gave birth to a single intelligent life form.  A race 
called the Saedar.  The Saedar were masters of intellect.  A serpent-
like race with scaly, ebony skin, they had passed through many, many 
ages, from a primitive superstitious beginning, to war-like empires, 
to vast industrialized nations, until they reaced their first peak, 
upon which their destructive technology nearly abolished the 
planet.  In the wake of the first cataclysm, the Saedar cast off 
their technological background and instead focused on the spiritual 
again.  For tens of thousands of years they lived simple lives, 
until they soon became in-tune with their inner being, their own 
personal part of Oere.  It is at this point that the miracles of 
magic were discovered.  But history was doomed to repeat itself.  
Massive magical empires were created until again, their arrogance 
and pride defeated themselves, this time shocking the planet with 
waves of transformational spell-weaves.

It is here that we awake, a mere one hundred years after the second 
cataclysm.  The magical shockwaves having transformed the physical 
form of nearly all the Saedar into something new, something 
different.  Animals gained intelligence and humanoid form.  New 
kingdoms were created.  The handful of Saedar who survived were 
elevated to an almost god-like status, worshipped by the lesser 
races, and sought after by many a disciple seeking the answers of 
the past.  But a dark mystery lurks beneath the surface of the 
earth, and strife is everywhere in this post-apocalyptic world.  For 
it is the dawn of a new age... and all must awake to it!

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Solace II: A New Dawn
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Rom2.4b3, with heavy modifications
Telnet      : bondarin.com 4000 [213.248.17.253]
WWW         : http://solace.black-white.ru/
Description :

We offer:

  * A unique world. Almost all of our areas are written by our
own immortals. Log into our mud and use the 'areas' command to
see our world. The 'help eastern', 'help western' and 'help
eastkalaman' commands can also give new players an overview of
our world layout.

  * Classes with distinct skills sets to make each playing
experience different.

  * Class specializations. Fighters can choose weapons
specializations, mages can choose the magicmajors or shapeshift
forms they specialize in, rangers can select their animal
affinities, etc.

  * Limited items. Powerful and rare items are limited in
number, making them more valuable.

  * Player-killing is allowed, but with restricted ranges. You
can player kill people within 5 levels of you, starting from
level 10 and up. PKing is for all players and is an integral part
of a mud where there are limited items.

  * Clans for those who want to extend their role-playing. These
offer sanctuary, powers and companionship, but also
responsibility and increased danger to your character.

beleaguered world, and has sent out his call across the multiverse.  
Even though the call was meant for aid, the Evil Lord has managed to 
slip some of his evil minions through the gate, and so the battle 
rages on.

The forces of Chaos have found a strong foothold, and it is feared 
that once again the world stands at the Dawn of Demise.

Dawn of Demise implements many new features and ideas not seen in 
other muds.  A small list of our unique features include:

* Advancement to level 100 and dual classing.
* Pets save and level like player characters.
* A unique automated quest system that offers enhancements to your
  character and their items.
* An advanced and balanced monetary system.
* An arena that allows any players to battle without repercussions.
* Unique areas, and tons of them.  None of these cut and paste areas 
  either.  DoD has been around for over seven years and alot of 
  thought has gone into the creation and development of our areas.

  a few):
  -Cast spells effects that stay in rooms and even roam for a length 
   of time.
  -Creating and setting of traps.
  -A unique mapping system if you have the skill or spell.
  -And much more...

Mud         : Hideaway MUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH 1.7.7pl34 with minor hacks to the source.
Telnet      : hideaway.pennmush.org 4201 [208.42.140.11]
WWW         : None
Description :

                WARNING: ADULT CONTENT

     It's not known when or how the Island known as Hideaway
came into exsistance. It was simply there, exsisting in a
state outside of time itself. Every so often, in different
places in the world, the boundaries of the Island would
encroach into one of the many worlds in the multiverse and a
portal would open. Sometimes for days, sometimes for only
moments. Of course, it was inevitable that eventually people
would fall into those portals and end up upon the Island.

     At first, only a few appeared, many baffled as they
discovered only females seemed to be able to exsist on the
Island. The men who found themselves upon the island were
changed by the place's magic. Those first arrivals found the
fishing around the island to be plentiful and prosperous, and
so a small fishing village, the village of Hideaway, was born
there in the sheltered cove. Over the years, however, more and
more people began to appear, the appearance of portals in the
real world beginning to grow more frequent. The population
began to grow, forming and shaping into an open, friendly
environment for all kinds of women, with all kinds of
different interests. Now, a few hundred years after the first
few people found themselves transported to Hideaway, the
little village has grown into a bustling town, full of lively
activity and fun.

     HideawayMUSH is a place designed to be a safe, open and
friendly place for lesbian interaction. We welcome female and
male players alike, but for thematic reasons we only allow
female characters. This is ment to be a place where womyn can
go to explore various aspects of themselves and generally have
fun in a roleplaying setting.

Mud         : Dead of Night
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Derived
Telnet      : deadofnight.org 5000 [142.165.131.47]
WWW         : http://www.deadofnight.org/
Description :

   The full moon shown brightly over the Pangea,
casting deep shadows among the warehouses along
the docks.  On nights like this, the city gates are locked
tight, with extra guards posted.  Sane people are
asleep in their houses, or drinking in a busy tavern,
forgetting the terrors which are happening beyond the
safety of the city walls. Tonight the mood was much
more somber than the typical nightly ruckus which
normally filled the bars.  The full moon alone meant that
the dead would be out in full force, but the recent bloody
assaults by the hill giants in the forests to the north
would contribute many fresh members to the army of
the dead. There was some hope tonight.  A band of
Mystic Knights had recently arrived in town, fresh in
from their battles on the wild southern continent.  They
would do their best protect the few people who hadn't
made it to the city, and fragment the army enough to
prevent a full assault.  But everyone knew a few
wouldn't get a chance to see the sun rise.

Telnet      : deadofnight.com 3443 [204.71.156.4]
WWW         : http://www.deadofnight.com/
Description :

   A light fog rises from a nearby swamp, and a hazy mist falls from the 
deceivingly clear sky. A crimson moon floats alluringly over a distant 
mountain, calling you to adventures untold. Yet, one thing makes you 
nervous: it is far too quiet in the Dead of Night.

DeadOfNight is a gothic fantasy, in which characters try to conquer the 
rising shadows and chaos. With thousands of combinations of race, class, 
profession and secondary profession, each character has an incredible range 
of choices during character creation. Choose from 13 races,
(the most popular being: vampyr, demon, werewolf and drow) each with their 
own unique racial abilities, 4 classes (Rogue, Cleric, Fighter, Mage), 
Each with their own special abilities, and you can even choose to
join 2 professions.

DeadOfNight has many features to make the game more enjoyable. Color 
support, party system, player run clans, and many 
ways to interact with other players and non-player characters. 
And don't forget to 'help mudsex' and mudhead your friends, or
do the whorehouse quest!

Combine these features with DeadOfNight's extreme stability, fast internet 
connection, and popularity, and you have a truly remarkable role playing 
experience. Stop by anytime, DeadOfNight is extremely newbie friendly.

Mud         : Deeper Trouble
Code Base   : [LP] LDMud, 3.2.9-dev.452
Telnet      : deepertrouble.demon.net 4242 [194.159.164.164]
WWW         : http://www.deepertrouble.demon.net/
Description :

  For those of you who have not yet been in Deeper Trouble, let me tell you that it is
very old. It goes back to 1990 and was created by a handful computerscience students.

Artesia - as the world is named - is, and always will be, strictly fantasy-based,
and although it has its roots in the stories of J.R.R. Tolkien, many other species
that share its theme and spirit also populate it these days.

It is constantly being improved and new additions and changes come often. This is no
DIKU style MUD. It is complex by nature and thus very challenging and exciting.

One can here enjoy wandering about in a large world, either alone or in a party with
other players. Since the different areas and puzzles are very distinct, although not
by theme or connection, there is always a new challenge waiting for any adventurer
regardless of skill and experience. Players also tend to stride to become the best.

There is also a social aspect to the game. Many new friends have been made, and
also real-life gatherings are being arranged now and then so that the true people of
Artesia may exchange gossip, face to face and over a mug of dark ale. :-)

Welcome to Deeper Trouble already!                           - Zordiac@DeeperTrouble

Mud         : TriadCity
Code Base   : [Custom] server currently in beta
Telnet      :  
WWW         : http://www.smartmonsters.com
Description :

TriadCity is a large-scale multiuser role-playing game
with a literary orientation, currently in beta.

While role-playing MUDs are fairly common, this one is
different.  Where most MUDs focus on 'kill the
monster' style adventuring, TriadCity explores themes
which have been central to Western culture: good and evil,
city and country, nature and civilization, personal and
collective identities, violence and nonviolence, freedom
and slavery.

'Literary orientation' means that narrative
techniques from the novel and other traditions are
incorporated, such as voice, point of view,
characterization, plot, and so on. Various forms of
subjectivity are imposed on the characters which players
create, some relative, some radical. This means that
character histories and views of the world are potentially
unique to each individual player.

We opened to the public on 10/1/01 and are just starting
to build our player base.  We hope you'll check us out, and
will tell us what you think!

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : DelusionsMUCK
Code Base   : [MUCK] TinyMUCK (Fuzzball)
Telnet      : DelusionsMUCK.com 4999 [216.218.194.137]
WWW         : http://www.DelusionsMUCK.com
Description :

   Delusions is a social-based MUCK with an emphasis on 
enjoyment. The management is fun-loving and willing to 
answer any questions you have. There is a lot to explore 
and many things to see. Contains one of the largest 
libraries of spells for MUCKs. Database size = 13,200+ 
objects. No player-command logging!

   Among the multitude of features you will find on 
Delusions are ANSI-colors (paint the world!), Highlighting 
(have friends' messages show up in colors), FamilyMagic 
(keeps track of your family tree!), SpotMagic (helps you 
lie, sit, stand and swim in a logical way), Pathfinder 
(helping you plot the route between two locations on the 
Muck), Guide/Helpsystem (Del is *VERY* userfriendly),
Hintcookies (giving you helpful hints every time you 
connect), MrTutor (step-by-step tutorials), Linewrap 
(in-server!! no more cut-off lines), TravelMagic (catch a 
wagon and ride through the worlds), Online-Games (poker, 
hearts, labyrinths, chess, purity test, combat games, 4-in-
a-row) Welcome!!

Telnet      : pointblue.mine.nu 2735 [24.103.105.227]
WWW         : None
Description :

How many MUD's have you played that are enjoyable, but the
staff is dictatorial, egotisitcal, and the role of the mortal
characters are the peons of a domineering group of immortals?
How many MUD's have you played that are essentially ruined by
the out of control staff? 

We at SoD believe that the mortals make a game. Without
players, you have no MUD. Look at it a thousand different ways
and that etho still applies. To make a MUD truly successful
you need a satisfied playerbase, not an addicted one that
keeps coming around because they have nowhere else to go. Our
goal at SoD is to be the MUD you go to because it's not only
an amazing game, but it's the second home to players and
immortals alike. We offer a global roleplaying theme for all to 
follow if desired, but leave personal roleplaying lines open for
individuality from player to player. Classes and races are
being reworked to allow for class AND race remorts that will
provide a system in which nearly every character can be completely
unique. 

Currently we're open for BETA playertesters, so if you'd like
to be a part of the final steps in the creation process of
SoD, drop by sometime and give us a try. 

-Leanna, Orlin, and the staff of SoD.

   Smell that? Stand back and take a deep whiff. Thats the smell of an 
orc skull well-cloven by good Tar Valon steel so the brains lop out in 
two neat peices and don't leak out the ears like you get 
with a warhammer. Smell that toasty smell? That's elven 
eyeballs roastin on the fire after a hard day of fireballin innocent villagers

the campfire after a hard day's hike through the Shire.

in closer ... sharpen up yer knives and grab a barbecue                                      
stick ... there's plenty of room for more!!

   Demon's Gate is a pure fantasy role-playing environment (though role-
playing isn't required). Features include a complex combat system with new 
detailed critical hits, detailed npcs, quests, guilds and clubs. The mud is 
divided into a number of variously themed domains including those based on 
J.R.R. Tolkien, Robert Jordan, and a few all-original domains.

systems being introduced all the time. After gaining some experience 
playing DG, players are welcome to apply for wizardhood, even with no prior 
coding experience.

Description :

  LooneyMud is a myriad of things, depending on your point of view. For some people here,
it's a way of life, a place to always fall back on for friends and recreation, while to
others its a place to languish and fail, a waste of time to be avoided. It's a world
filled with pop culture, some of it faithfully transposed, and much of it faithfully
ridiculed. A virtual world filled with travellers from all ends of the online globe, all
backgrounds, races, colours, and ages. Most of all, its a good place to kill some time.
 
On LooneyMud you'll travel throughout the realms of pop culture's creations, tainted
through the efforts of our Creators to provide as much abnormality as humanly possible.
Most subjects tend to be drawn from television and the cinema, ranging through comics to
cartoons, from sitcoms to major motion pictures.
 
You take on the persona of someone immersed in this alternate reality, your skills and
outlooks shaped by your choice of membership to one of our many guilds. You then guide
this character through 300 levels (which is much less than it seems), to eventually rise
either to hero, an immortal-like level, or perhaps even make the jump to Apprentice
Creator, beginning a whole new way to take your character further.
 
 
LooneyMud, its cooler than Canada, and you don't need to pass through customs and declare
your cigarettes.

  Dark Forest is a fairly new SMAUG based mud that is aiming to attract
YOU. We offer player owned/run orders for envisionistic peacefuls, and
player owned/run clans for domineering deadlies. We discourage over-use
of immortal intervention to encourage Roll Playing, and free their
availability for questions or problems. A large deity database provides
a great (fantasy)theological platform for even more rollplaying. Clan
points provide clans with a way to quantify their status in the world,
and can be used to buy more room, or even power. We have included many
subtle features to make your playing experience better, but not
drasticaly different from standard smaug. We are sill looking for
builders, but would like to see some form of dedication before you are
provided with an immortal account. We have a wide collection of stock
areas which we plan to keep, and have started adding new areas. We are
open to suggestions, as well as open to both new players--to smaug or to
mudding--and!  experienced players--to one or both--to help teach the

WWW         : http://brutusmud.net/
Description :

   BrutusMUD offers 4 basic classes from the beginning, 
however at level 30 you specialize into one of 3 advanced 
classes (3 for each basic class), and after reaching level 
60 you can advance to legendary levels which offers new 
skills and spells and generally greatly enhances your 
character. To reach 5th legendary level, you have to come
through special challenge, which will test your knowledge of
your character, so only the best players can ever reach 5th
legendary level. Of course you have more attempts available,
but not unlimited amount :) Successfully completing the
challenge opens whole new range of possibilities to advance
your character far beyond limits of lower legends. But only
few reached this status, and they are honored as gods among
other mortals. In near future there will be completely new
remort engine which will offer totally new possibilities.

Mud         : Desolation
Code Base   : [LP] Lima Mudlib, version 1.0a8 (LPMud)
Telnet      : desolation.org 7878 [63.249.8.14]
WWW         : http://www.desolation.org/
Description :

Desolation is not an emulation, but a continuation of 
Wasteland. An LPMud, picking up where WL left off. You can 
join one of the many guilds in development, including the 
Desert Rangers, the Badland Originals, and the 
Association of Irradiated Mercenaries. Wield a wide range 
of weapons, be it a crowbar, or an assault rifle, whatever 
suits your style.

Explore a world full of wreckage, carnage, and radiation. 
Visiting such places as Quartz, a lovely town under the mob 
rule of Ugly John and his gang of thugs. Lovely Las Vegas, 
a town of evil, corruption, casinos, and prostitution. 
Junktown, a small tribal village, built from a land fill.

Desolation - More reactor leaks than any other mud!

Mud         : Desolation of the Dragon II
Code Base   : [Smaug] SMAUG/Dale Hybrid
Telnet      : dotd.com 4000 [69.50.193.254]
WWW         : http://www.dotd.com/
Description :

  Are you looking for adventure? Seeking something fresh and new? Ever wish
you could wield a Demon Slaying sword? Wear a ring to protect you from fire?
Buy a baby dragon, watch it grow as you grow, strengthen as you strengthen.
Ride it around the world. Learn a lore, which teaches you the weakness of
certain types of  creatures. You may join an evil race, and live within the
evil city of Malaria, or join a good race, and live within the walls of
Silverstone, the city for the good, or if neutrality is your way, become one
of the neutrals, staying out of the race wars, that occasionally insue. Join
a clan, follow a god, or if you wish, stay as an athiest.

DOTD is undergoing constant changes, daily. From the minor bug fixes, to
major changes to the way things work. Some aren't quite visible to general
players, others are very visible. We consider player ideas, and listen as
much as possible to player input. DOTD is a Smaug/Dale hybrid, we contain
well over 130 areas. We have 19 races, with 14 classes for you to choose
from, one, which is just for women, the Amazon. You can also join one of the
alignment bound classes, but be wary, though these classes are powerful, if
you stray too far from the alignment, your guild will no longer accept you.
We are currently updating a lot of our areas with our unique MIML (MUD
Internal Markup Language) code. When you are drunk and in some areas, you
see other messages than you would while sober.  We have many quests, which
test your mind as well as your strength, not the normal find the quest-item
type.  So if you're looking for a challenge, wanting something different,
sharpen your blade, and your wits, and come play Desolation of the Dragon
II, it's sure to be worth your while.

Mud         : Avatar West
Code Base   : [Merc] Using the AVATAR MUD Codebase
Telnet      : avatarwest.outland.org 3000 [209.248.96.174]
WWW         : http://www.outland.org/
Description :

  Avatar West is a mud using the same areas and code as 
AVATAR but with a different level structure.  What we've
done is create a remort or 'Incarnation' process that will
cycle you through the 50 base levels of the traditional 
AVATAR.  Every time you cycle through, you are reincarnated
as a new race-class combination which is picked randomly.

We have all of AVATAR's experimental and grandfathered
classes as well as all of the NPC races (making the total
40!) for this.  You could end up reincarnated as a Golem
Sorcerer or a Goblin Monk.  With 9 classes and 40 races,
there is plenty of variation.

Enjoy and you are welcome to play!  Avatar West plans on
being around for a long time and has the same technical and
developmental staff as the traditional AVATAR.

Mud         : 5 Kingdoms of Mercator
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Very Heavily Modified (6 years beta testing)
Telnet      : xerxes.mudhaven.com 2411 [65.171.8.239]
WWW         : http://mercator.mudhaven.com
Description :

After six years of beta and alpha testing, '5 Kingdoms of Mercator' 
is now ready to be enjoyed by all.

Choose your kingdom from Mercator, Portloe, Castelgard, Verfleet or 
Mithramir.  Each kingdom has unique dangers and rewards, and will 
shape your future within the lands.

Choose from fourteen races and seven classes each with three 
sub-classes combining to give 294 unique character creation paths.  
Learn from a pool of thousands of skills and spells.  Explore the 
kingdoms using ships, horseback, dragons and magic.  Find hidden 
treasures and adventure amongst the tens of thousands of different 
terrains completely unique to the realms of Mercator.  Form clans or 
join existing ones to build up your power and allies.  Master skills 
and learn extremely rare and unique magic from spellbooks found 
within the kingdoms.  Do battle against your enemies and friends 
alike in the automated player battle arena with league tables and 
battle history.  Control, maintain and save your personal steed to 
help you adventure into distant lands.  Embark on new challenges and 
quests as the realm automatically refreshes itself every day.

5 Kingdoms is suitable for complete beginners and experienced 
mudders alike.  A friendly atmosphere alive with action and 
adventure provides an exciting and engaging environment for all.

Mud         : Realms of Corl
Code Base   : [MUSH] [MUSH]
Telnet      : chaos.caile.org 4201 [207.245.68.51]
WWW         : None
Description :

Corl is an original fantasy-medieval themed mush. It has a 
limited combat system that supports roleplay and an 'after-
life' that allows players a chance to continue interacting 
after death. It is political in nature with established 
factions all battling for power. There are positions open for 
nobles as well as for commoners.
  
There are several areas open for exploration but the majority 
of the rp at this time is focused in the capital city.
 
The magic system is currently being coded.
 
Unlike most muds, your skills are not limited by your trade and 
you can learn anything you wish.. provided you can find someone 
to teach you.
 
Players are allowed to create or buy their own equipment with 
base damage. Specialty eq must be approved by an admin and 
justified.
 
The history files have been installed recently, giving the story
of the world in which we are playing and several plots have been
established based on this history.

Mud         : Earth 2438
Code Base   : [SWR] FotE - Major Modifications
Telnet      : df.moocowpenguin.com 9700 [70.104.128.249]
WWW         : http://fote.gageendal.com
Description :

The year is 2438, exactly four hundred years after the discovery of
ancient technology on the planet Mars on the second manned shuttle to
the red planet. Mankind, in our arrogance, took the technology and
turned it into the fuel of our weapons of destruction against each-
other. Theories that World War IV would be fought with sticks and
stones were greatly over-enthusiastic. WW III lasted nearly twelve
years and lost nearly 200 million souls from across the globe. 

By the year 2099, the first fully functional spaceport was created on
our moon. Luna Base, as it was once called, served as an inter-
national space port for all of the Earth. It was also the cause of
the first interstellar war, and World War Four. This war was fought
almost entirely in space, though many ground troops died, mostly the
fight was against technology's power in space. Trillions of  dollars
were lost durring the war and none of the sides ended up the winner.
The end of that war was literaly the lack of firepower in the year
2138. The final seasefire was declared on May 3rd, 2140 at the White
House when all of the main leaders of each of the countries, along
with all of their cabinet seats signed a document that allowed for
nearly full use of the Spaceport by all countries. 

A Subclause of the treaty is that all countries would meet at the
Capitol  Building in Washington D.C. every two years. Since the
signing of that treaty, not a single member has ever missed a meeting.

New colonies begun to form on the other satelites in the system. The
Under-Ice colony of Europa, Io's subterranian colony on it's orbit
around Jupiter. There are even rumors of unclaimed colonies that have
begun to be sighted on the Asteroid Belts.

into a 'vampire' subrace with new abilities.  With our
friendly Kings and Queens around to help, combined with the

quests implimented; Diogen is most assuredly a unique and

Description :

  Discworld is a flat world ten thousand miles across that
rests on the backs of four elephants who stand on the shell
of Great A'Tuin, the sky turtle, as he, or, as it might be,
she, swims through space. From Ankh-Morpork, jewel (okay, so
it's a carbuncle) of cities, venture hubwards across the
brassica'ed Sto Plains to the Ramtops, cross the Circle Sea
to the dark and mysterious continent of Klatch.

Discworld combines the humour and richness of Terry's books
with a high-quality mud that appeals to both fans and those
who have never read his work. As a very kind reviewer said:
'With fish, wombles, intelligent shades of blue, straw
dummies, shiny plaques, mended drums, Shifty Jim,
Ankh-Morpork pence all on a very chilly spindlewinter's
afternoon, Discworld had me laughing at every second turn,
and left me wanting to read more.

'The feeling I got from the mud was one of fun, quirkiness,
and constant surprises. I spent a whole lot more time on
there than I expected, but it was time well spent!'

Mud         : TimeTraveller
Code Base   : [Circlemud] modified heavily
Telnet      : www.uasoft.com 3000 [216.136.9.8]
WWW         : http://www.uasoft.com/
Description :

The greatest MUD to ever exist is back and kicking! Going strong 
for five years, Time Traveller may have had a short break but we're
still the same great MUD and as an added bonus, we have the same 
great staff! For those of you who haven't had the pleasure Time
Traveller is, essentially, three different MUDs rolled up into one. 
We're an large MUD with a past zone, present zone and future zone 
for your exploration.

In addition to the fantabulous staff and large zone to explore, we
have different perks unique to our MUD. Our profession system allows
for unique abilities for each time period, and our social class
system is partnered with an intricate quest/puzzle system for 
advancement. If you hate walking around, we've just implemented 
vehicle travel. Or you can just use the wonderous  Laboratory to 
travel through time! Once you've perused our fine land and are 
looking for something more to do, we have regular activities like 
paintball tournaments, trivia nights, town festivals, and more!

On the more technical side of things, we like to make our players 
feel like they're an integral part of our world. Therefore, we have 
a system in place that allows you to own your own city. You control
 every element - design and economy. The economy is integrated with 
the entire world, allowing you to do such things as trade
commodities between towns to turn a buck. And we have merchants 
available for those of you rich folk who want to spend your hard-
earned buck on custom items.

Time Traveller has something for everybody, so come on by and see 
for yourself?

Description :

  Divine Blood is set in a medieval fantasy atmosphere. We offer 4
base classes, 4 remort classes, and 8 races. Players are allowed to customize
each character to be unique from any other player. PlayerKilling is optional
with a well balanced and sophisticated PK system. Players may join or create new
clans, while having the option of purchasing clan enhancements such as more
rooms, guards, shopkeepers, and more. The mortal levels range from 1-91, and
remort system is functional. Immortal run quests and a Autoquests are also
available, along with equipment bought with quest points. The
Autoquest code has been specially modified for a PK/NON-PK mud environment.
We have something for everyone. Anyone can easily learn to play Divine Blood
whether you are a newbie to muds or a veteran of another code base.
The only requirement is for players to follow the rules, use common sense,
RP a little, and, most importantly, enjoy the game.

     * special non-pk/pk equipment
     * modified autoquest code for more balance

     * modified clan system
     * room/obj progs
     * randomized stats on equipment per reset

Telnet      : furscape.servegame.com 2001 [63.78.117.186]
WWW         : http://www.furscape.com
Description :

  Furscape is a multilateral world that plays 200 years from now, an original,
Furry-themed science fiction universe where so-called 'Recoms', beings bred
by combining human and animal DNA, are the predominant species. Mankind has
perished in an apocalyptic war 150 years ago, and the furries (recoms)
escaped the slaughtering by fleeing to a colony on the moon, which has since
then become their home. The discovery of hyperspace jumpgates and electron
confinement fusion has led to massive space exploration, and furs now live
on various worlds and space stations. Alien species have been discovered,
and a brisk exchange of trade commodities has begun. Factions have formed,
ranging from free trader associations to bounty hunter and pirate alliances,
military organizations, and mysterious intelligence agencies.

-- Some technical info:
Many of our worlds allow for free, large scale roaming, making use of the
well-known Terraform system. Worlds are original, with their cores hand-built
by dedicated realm managers, many of them large enough to be considered a
small MUCK of their own.

Mud         : Dominia MUD
Code Base   : Circle 3.0 Beta Patch Level 11
Telnet      : mud.labyrinth.net.au 3333 [203.9.148.7]
WWW         : http://www.labyrinth.net.au/~cjp/
Description :

   Dominia Mud is based on the popular card game 'Magic: The Gathering' by 
Wizards of the Coast. Your adventure begins in the fabled City of Brass,
where members of all races and classes mingle without restriction. As a
beginning character, you are given the choice of playing one of twelve
classes, and one of eight races, all of which have their own advantages 
and disadvantages.

Chaos Mages are masters of destructive and combat magic, Saboteurs can
build bombs capable of destroying entire rooms, Necromancers swell their
armies of followers with the bodies of their enemies, Hunters shoot their
prey from many rooms away with deady accuracy, and the remaining eight
classes have similarly clearly defined areas of expertise.

Above level 11 players may multiclass freely, at a cost in 'credits' much
greater than the single credit required to level in the primary class.

Our community of players consists of a mix of magic addicts from around
the world and non-magic players who found themselves strangely unable to
stop playing.

  Ghost Hokkaido is an alternate reality version of Edo/Meiji
Eras in Japan, where not only humans roam the islands.
Hengeyokai, or animal shapeshifters, had once warred with humans
over land, but a Treaty was signed and the hengeyokai have slowly
been accepted into human society. But rest is not easy; ghosts
are always about.

  We have many unique programs and much in the way of eye-candy;
ASCII images and ANSI color included. We have ryokan (hotel
rooms) that you can stay in or you can build your own areas. The
staff is friendly. Our only requirement is that you do not lounge
about in the Out-of-Character areas all of the time - we want to
see role-play!

 The Dragon's Den is one of the world's oldest continuously 
operating muds.  Built from scratch since 1991, it features 
completely original areas, unique quests, and our own 
Dragon mudlib.  The Den combines an excellent fighting 
experience that makes use of diverse magic with a casual, 
friendly atmosphere.

A structured nobility system lets players build their own 
castles and wage war against each other, allowing for 
intrigue and scheming.

Our entertaining and challenging quests are richly detailed 
and require a combination of swordsmanship and careful 
thought. New players have many quests designed just for 
their lower level status.

your character. You'll even find the Gods that run the Den 
are often on the game and interact with the mortals 
regularly.

to time and time again. Countless hours of entertainment and
enjoyment await you on...

Mud         : Dragon's Fang

Telnet      : dragonsfang.org 4000 [216.127.80.116]
WWW         : http://www.dragonsfang.org/
Description :

 Dragon's Fang is a roleplaying mud centered around Robert
Jordan's 'Wheel of Time' series. We strive to keep as close
to the books as possible with an all original world with themed
cities directly out of the books. Each city is closely made
to directly compare the way Robert Jordan intended. Roleplaying
abounds with many specific commands directly linked to increase
the enjoyment and realism to make the gaming experience more
interactive. We heavily encourage players to diversify their
roles within Dragon's Fang by playing any numerous amounts of
genres within the world. From Aes Sedai and their Warders
to Seanchan with their Ogier Deathwatch Guards. We allow all
of those wishing to be the few and the far between to mark their
niche with their own existance.

Our playerbase is quite diverse having people from as far as
Australia and as close as Canada. Recently, a server change caused
our primary location in Sweden to move to the United States.

So what say you? Will you carve your way through thick and thin?
Change the world for the better? Log in and find out!

Mud         : Alturia
Code Base   : [Rot] RoT2.0b5 w/olc, stances, multi class, four tiers, more
Telnet      : alturia.mudmagic.com 4000
WWW         : http://alturia.mudmagic.com
Description :

 
 I started playing rp muds back in 1980 with Dungeons and Dragons,
 always fascinated with the gaming culture I learned all I could
 about it, studying the old DMG I learned how to be a gamesmaster
 and developed my own gameworld. And then about 1994 I discovered
 the internet and the first thing I discovered about it was that
 you could play rp games on it, and so I did, the first mud I played
 was called Nemesis it was a lpc and it was a great mud, but it went
 away.. all the while I was exploring other styles of muds including
 Mercs and The End of the Line,
 And then about 1996 I started playing Rot in the form of Eternal
 Insomnia I was always got pk'd but it was fun, anyway that mud
 developed some internal problems and soon it was gone.. Well then
 along came lionheart.net, before EI went away I got interested in
 developing my own mud so I downloaded the code and began working on
 it, a friend of mine gave me an account at lionheart. net and I had
 a shell to work with, so after EI died I started Alturia.. That was
 just the beginning, Alturia has went through three codebases, it
 started as Rot1 .4, then Russ Walsh came by for a visit and offered
 me RoT1.5b6 then due to some bad management I lost that codebase,
 so I went back to 1.4 and started over, a little while later Russ
 came back and offered me 2.0 to co-develop, He said he was very busy
 and didn't have time, 2.0 needed a few things to get it basically
 running but run it would and soon after I got it running I opened it,
 hehheh, a bit to soon I think, then all the things that needed work
 showed up, (that was a lesson) well I've been steadily working on it,
 but took a few years off after my second free server built a firewall
 and I couldnt get in, (I've since learned not to depend on free
 servers) I'm really not an internet guru so at the time I didn't
 know how to get in so I just kinda lost interest and figured that at
 the right time I would come back and finish what I started..
 Alturia is the original of the RoT2 .0 class, co-developed with
 Russ Walsh and maintained by the DAC code team, Alturia is a
 solid mud with an exceptional group of coders.
 Alturia has
 - Stances
 - A very smart AI system
 - Mobiles that can advance
 - A new pk feature that requires new pkers to qualify themselves and
   gives them a chance to try it out before its permanent,
 - A pk gear system that enables pkers to aquire special equipment,
 - AutoQuest
 - Global Socials
 - Global Emote
 - Autostance
 - Dodge and Parry revamped,
 - Arena code
 - Four tiers
 - Dual class at third tier
 - A special way to advance to the next tier,
   you keep your original and create a new character at the next tier
 - Special types of attacks and more.
 Darkblade
 

Visit Alturia at
 alturia.mudmagic.com port 4000
 web page
 alturia.mudmagic.com

proprie aree possono indire quest od organizzare eventi con

pg Mercanti, varie classi di Paladini con decine di nuove
abilita', 22 culti rpg interamente gestiti dai pg stessi,

Mud         : DragonHeart MUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH
Telnet      : redknight.crystalsands.net 4201 [63.203.148.109]
WWW         : http://www.crystalsands.net/DragonHeart/
Description :

  It has been several years since the death of Lancelot and the
disappearance of the Merlin.  Since then, Camelot's stance on the
isle of Britian has weakened substantially.  Her armies, even
with the leadership of the Round Table, have been unable to stop
a particlar tribe, lead by a man called Richard the Bloody, from
pushing South from Scotland.  With each passing day, the tribe's
power and influence grows.  It's been nearly six months since
Camelot sent an army to investigate an insertgance into their
lands.  The army returned home with a quarter their numbers, and
what was left could barely be called an army.  For six months,
the new border villages and towns have reported no movement along
Richard's lines.
 
  It's been three days since the normally daily heralds have been
seen from the town of New Haven.  In response, a small party was
dispatched from York.  They too have not returned.  Nearly half a
year has been spent in waiting for this moment - Richard the
Bloody is on the move again.The city of York stands in the direct
path between Camelot and Richard's army.
 
  Will you help defend Camelot, or will you join the ranks of
perhaps the most ruthless barbarian of known history and help
overthrow King Arthur?  Welcome to DragonHeart MUSH, a roleplay
game where you can play a character in the Dark Ages of Medvial
England.  You help write the story.  Will you be nobility,
peasantry, a guard, a soldier, a merchant, or a maiden in
distress?  The choice is your's.  Create your character, and
interact with people from around the world.

Mud         : DragonMud
Code Base   : TinyMud
Telnet      : dragonmud.org 4201 [206.170.114.15]
WWW         : http://www.dragonmud.org/
Description :

   DragonMud is the oldest TinyMud style MU* in existence,
(predating Islandia by a few months) and has been continuously online
since Thanksgiving of 1989. At the heart of DragonMud is an early
1800's walled city known as TinyLondon.  Perpetually pre-industrial
and heavily sprinkled with magic, TinyLondon is a city of cobblestones,
carriages, gaslamps, stone bridges and ancient towers. The colorful
populace is made up of pirates, infiltrators, thieves, vampires,
wizards, questors, merchants, poets, gypsies, ambassadors from other
realms, Grand Dames and new immigrants.  DragonMud is not a
hack-n-slash, rape-kill-n-plunder environment. A certain level of
manners and civility is expected of all citizens. The creation and
maintenance of DragonMud is focused on a commitment to user's
privacy and autonomy. Patience, tolerance, fairness, understanding,
wit, charm, style, curiosity and creativity are values most prized
 by the citizens of DragonMud.

Mud         : Core 2651
Code Base   : [Custom] MudOS: Colonylib
Telnet      : www.coremud.org 4000 [209.240.96.103]
WWW         : http://www.coremud.org/
Description :

'Core' is a planet at the fringe of the populated galaxy, 650 years into
the future. 'The Company' has established a mining colony here, and your
role as player is a mining colony worker.
*Player-run merchant shops: work in a store, set prices, comissions, add
 goods, etc. Expect to be employed in a shop after only a few days playing
 time!
*Free housing: get your own house. In most muds, this would cost millions
 of gold... on Core, you get a house FREE, when you reach _third_ level!
*Extensive mining system: on Core, there are no legions of monsters that
 are magically carrying coins. Our economy makes a lot more sense; you
 earn wages from mining.
*Customize equipment: the aforementioned shops can make custom items.
 Want some affordable clothes exactly to your liking? Just as the 
 shopkeeper to sew some up!
*Care to gamble? Head over to the Recreation dome and try your luck on
 slots, blackjack, poker, or Core's very own game 'CoreQuad'. We even
 have a stock market!
*Consistant environment: ever play a futuristic mud that just happens
 to have spells and goblins? Not so on Core! Everything is in theme,
 and EVERYTHING in this sci-fi mud is completely original.
*Events: who knows what disaster might happen? There could be anything
 from a meteor shower to a pirate invasion! Every day is an adventure.

So, if you need a break from those same old muds, please give us a try!
We promise you will not be disapointed.

Godwars MUD functions has been changed. The current classes

completely redesigned and recoded so that players can experience
something different from all the ordinary MUDs.  The MUD also
features an extraordinary environmental system which encompasses
such things as: weather, building, mining, lumberjacking,
forging, carving, and sewing. The MUD's world is presently
small, but entirely original. We are looking for players who are
willing to stay and test, even though the pbase is small and
there are still bugs to work out of the system. All bugs found
will be fixed promptly and all ideas or suggestions will be
considered. The MUD will always be in development; because, we
will never run out of interesting new ideas to implement. We are
striving to create an absolutely immersive game environment
where players can have fun without being subjected to harassment
from other players or the adminstrative staff; therefore, we ask
that players show a certain level of maturity. If this sounds
like something you would be interested in, then we cordially
invite you to help in the continuing development of our project.

The 7th Plane Adminstrative Staff

*****
1 September 2002 Version 4 of the Domain has been released!

After a hiatus, as past players were starting to lose hope, a 
saviour was found and the Domain has risen from the ashes.  The
immortals took this opportunity to make some changes and 
officially release Version 4.

The Dragons Domain is a heavily customised, both in areas and
source code, Envy MUD.  Over the past 8 years the Domain has 
evolved from a simple Envy MUD to a unique and well-loved 
fantasy game.  We have a number of builders who only build for 
the Domain and two dedicated implementors currently active.

Some of our unique features include: a deity system which allows
players to choose a patron deity; an interactive tournament
system, including custom-written bots; a pre-requisite skill
system that encourages characters to learn a wide range of 
skills; and a sub-class system once players achieve level 30.

We welcome new and old players to try their hand at mastering 
the Domain!

                -----------------------------------------------

areas and dungeons, make friends and rivals, and fight in clan
battles. .Hack//MUD is largely PK based, and offers incentives
and rewards for PK'ing. The mud itself aims to be original and
to bring new ideas, styles of play and options to the player. 
In general, players are allowed to play as they wish.

In a world where darkness is your enemy. You can't hide, and there is no

prostitutes, and mindless violence. Drug lords roam the land trying to 
get you addicted to the virus of the mind, to suck you in to the ever 
dyeing abyss. Prostitutes scour the earth selling themselves for any 
scrap they can get while new technology develops from simple guns to 
complex starships, though they are crashing faster then ever. Blood lies 
in ever street corner and the Mercenaries are nothing but ruthless. 
Civilians are the targets to recruit of these blood thirsty barbarians. 
For those who are likely to be taken in only to have little safety. It 
isn't much better then standing on a chair with a noose on your neck 
waiting for someone to kick it, maybe even hoping for it. From planet to 
planet, group to group, seeking power, safety, a means for living. 

We have our own reasons for doing what we do, killing destroying plaguing, 
but more often than not it comes down to survival. Survival of the fittest 
many have said well. The fight for supreme rule continues. Trying is 
useless. You will die. Can you trust your neighbor, family,...or even 
yourself?! Here is the test, are you ready?!

Mud         : DUMII
Code Base   : [DUM] DUMII
Telnet      : dum.acc.umu.se 2001 [130.239.18.149]
WWW         : http://dum.acc.umu.se/
Description :

  In DUMII you start your life as a young adventurer, and then set
out to explore the world to gain power as well as treasures,
finding adventures and friends along the way. Unlike most other
muds, you don't gain any experience for killing things, but there
are still plenty of foes to fight. When the gods notice your
progress, you are challenged with a quest to solve on your way
to eternal fame and immortality.

DUMII has a high quality standard with both its world and its
features. Some of the features are:

* Classless & raceless system (be any class/race you want).
* Four different alignments, with different quests to solve.
* Player-run guilds.
* No rent for your saved equipment.
* Very friendly parser. Either of 'get the egg from the basket.'
  or the abbreviated 'g e b' is valid.
* Very newbie friendly, with well-written help pages and friendly
  players to help you. No detailed character creation.
* An extensive list of original actions/socials is available to
  all players, with free-text emote commands available to
  responsible role-players as well.
* Built-in macros/aliases, automapping and word wrapping.
  You can set your page width and page height, and the server
  will adapt to it.
* There are no fixed colours anywhere; all colours can be changed
  to your own preferences.
* Many games are available like Fourday's Bindings or Kalah.
* You can buy your unique, personal home and it can be located
  almost anywhere in the world.

Mud         : Dune III
Code Base   : [MUSH] Pennmush
Telnet      : dune3.mushpark.com 3333 [207.8.143.27]
WWW         : http://www.dune3.net/
Description :

 Dune III MUSH is set roughly 100 years prior to the opening of Dune, with House
Corrino being firmly in control of the Imperium. Houses Atreides and
Harkonnen are not nearly so pivotal to the plot as they are in the novel,
though they do have a presence in the game. The Fremen, an unknown entity at
this point in the timeline, have no real contact with the Known Universe.
The Bene Gesserit Sisterhood remains quietly but firmly intertwined in the
affairs of the Imperium, the true depth of their subtle influences sensed by
none beyond their order. Kaitain, the Imperial Seat, is the center of
role-play, although RP on the hereditary and contractual fiefs of the Houses
Major is supported and encouraged.

 Politics and intrigue are the hands which weave intricate storylines and
plots amongst the players. To ensure the focus remains on the RP, DuneIII
does not employ the use of a combat system, and economy is only minimally
coded to support the CHOAM contract system. You will find no hack and slash
gaming on DuneIII; the outcome of physical clashes will be determined based
on consent between the players involved. The tenet of IC (In Character)
Actions leading to IC Consequences (ICA=ICC) is a concept of importance to
all.

this ancient alternate reality lies a vast medieval realm know as Doraak,
filled with adventure, danger and wonders beyond imagination. Almost every
type of terrain conceivable can be found within Doraak's ever expanding
boundaries..from the icy arctic wastelands to the mine-filled Tahrenian
mountain ranges of the dwarves. There are the sprawling grasslands of the
west and the great barren deserts of the far south. There are numerous
islands in the northern and southern oceans and there are the measureless
swamps of the east. There are all these regions, plus hundreds more just
waiting to be explored. And throughout all of these lands lie countless
ancient forests, some of which are bright and pleasant, yet others are damp,
dark and perilous. In this realm, any path can lead to discovery,
adventure...or death!
 
These wild, rugged lands are only recently beginning to yield to the
influences of civilized society, as the many humanoid races of Doraak
struggle to establish small pockets of civilization amongst the far-reaching
and untamed wilderness. There are a number of cities and villages that can
provide safe haven to a weary adventurer. However, even these seemingly
peaceful towns can offer far more than just a good night's rest, to the
inquisitive or careless explorer.
 
In spite of humankind's best efforts, there are still dark forces at work
within Doraak, which seek to undermine all that has been accomplished. Both
the minions of evil and the misguided good lurk everywhere throughout the
realms, and beyond, building strength and patiently waiting for their time
to come again...
 
So come and test your might, your skill and your cunning against all that
The Edge of Darkness has in store...for the world of Doraak awaits its next
savior...or victim!
