Lord Vader for his coveted saber.  An expansive area dedicated to the 
education of magical beings from the levels of Harry Potter to 
University have also been built to challenge you and your group 
members.

BESIDES OUR HUMUNGOUS AREAS LIST, explore the different possibilities 
of character creation.  Multi-classing is allowed, however not always 
necessary.  New codes have been introduced to extend advantage to 
pure classes.  Dual-classes and comboskills are now underway, 
allowing players to enhance their abilities beyond two basic classes.
Whether you are self-sufficient or dependent on clannies and a tank, 
all characters serve a purpose.  

ALWAYS LOOKING OUT FOR NEWBIES, forever challenging oldbies, our 
questing system allows all levels to have a crack at the exclusive 
quest equipment stores of the immortals of HexOnyx.  From PVP to 
group-run quests to global modifications of load, regeneration, and 
damage rates, something out-of-the-ordinary is happening almost 
every day on HexOnyx.

COME CHECK OUT HEXONYX MUD, a CircleMUD since its metamorphosis 
from Five Worlds.  As a home to some of the builders of CircleMUD's 
stock areas, HexOnyx provides a solid foundation from which immortals 
(coders, builders and questors) strive to surpass its self-raised 
standards.  Come to HexOnyx -- explore where fantasy and science 
fiction has taken us from the past all the way to the far future.

including Nuka and Vitani. Along the way Mufasa and Scar will be added to the
mix.

Mud         : Hollow World
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Deeply modified
Telnet      : mud.hollow-world.net 3007 [200.243.223.131]
WWW         : http://www.hollow-world.net/
Description :

The Hollow World

The planet of the Known World is not a solid ball like our Earth is. In fact
it's hollow. A tiny sun hangs in the center of the hollow, and vast polar 
openings permit travel between the inner and outer worlds. The interior 
landscape is called the 'Hollow World', a place of acient mystery.

The polar openings leading into the Hollow World are so huge that their 
cruvature is very, very gradual. That, combined with the fact that these
regions are perpetually shrouded in fog, means that people can travelfrom the
outer world to the inner (or vice-versa) without being aware of it.

The interior sun sheds daylight at all times in the Hollow World; night never
falls, and creatures susceptible to sunlight (such as vampires)  are rare
indeed.

The interior world has long been hidden from the outer world- the few 
outer-world explores who have found it have either died there, stayed there 
willingly, or returned without publicizing their discovery. To this day, the
existence of the Hollow World is not generally known in the outer world.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Feltain
Code Base   : [Rom] Rom threaded into scratch codebase.
Telnet      : feltain.org 7777 [207.44.134.24]
WWW         : None
Description :

  Feltain is a MUD that was made with one thing in mind-- A 
rich RPG world that you can spend hours lost in. We 
strongly are based on a game that can run itself without
immortals stepping in/running things. 

Feltain 1 was a total Rom MUD. Later on it was decided that 
we would be written from the ground up from scratch. We
later decided that we liked many of the features that made
us enough like other MUD's to be playable to experienced
MUDders, which we are made for. We have since went through
versions 2, 3, and are now working on 4. Feltain was
written from nothing and has had excepts from Rom inserted
into it. It's stable and unique.

We offer more than just unique code. We have unique 
gameplay. Our entire world is a mix of computer drafting
and human influence from the builders to balance stats and 
abilities on equipment. We offer traditional areas like 
most muds, however, we also have a worldmap such as the 
ones seen on final fantasy and other RPG titles. We have a 
modest amount of levels, 41, which must be attained 3 
times. Each time you retain the skills and spells you had 
in your previous class. It makes for interesting gameplay.

Come play with us and see why you'll never need another MUD!

  HoloTrek is a Star Trek-themed role-playing game on a

the first season of DS9.  The game attempts to remain true
to the Star Trek universe; canon is highly regarded.

Players may choose to join the United Federation of
Planets, the Klingon Empire, the Rihannsu (Romulan) Empire,
the Ferengi Alliance, or the Cardassian Union.

The game is primarily role-playing, but is supported by
advanced space, combat, skills, and economic systems.  A full
commodities market economy is available for those that wish
to strike out on their own as freelance traders, merchants,
pirates, mercenaries, and spies.

HoloTrek welcomes both experienced and new roleplayers to
the game.  Good roleplay is rewarded; players who develop
good roleplaying skills will find their characters growing
in power and influence.

 It is a time of unrest for the galaxy. The Galactic Civil War
has ended, but the strain that it caused still weighs heavy. War
may be over but the fighting continues - at times just as fierce
and deadly as during the height of the Rebel insurrection.
 
The fledgling New Republic is making small steps at restoring
some order to the vast regions decimated by conflict. Bringing
together countless unique species and civilizations, under the
flag of peace and harmony rather than conquest and submission is
a task harder than anyone would have believed.
 
The Empire is a remnant of its once glorious military. Forced to
surrender great amounts of territory to better protect itself,
but they have not surrendered their dedication to the ideal
crafted out of the evils of Palpatine.
 
Independents have a greater vision of the galaxy now. Smuggling
remains a strong source of income and many believe that it will
expand even more now. Pirates operate in the relative open. With
both the New Republic and Empire strained beyond compare,
pirates are capable of picking and choosing their targets with
little fear of governmental retaliation. The Civil War may have
ended. But the galaxy has yet to see a time of peace. Conflict
is all anyone knows, and they will not see it erased so easily.
 
The possibilities are endless. This is a time for all to make a
difference from the smallest of characters, to the leaders of
vast governments. Everyone has a place - and each place is
unique in its necessity.

more coming.

Here's what we have so far:
o huge self-growing world, over a billion tiles... in any direction
o houses and clan halls are cheap (lots of room, right?)
o advanced combat system, including ranged combat
o real economy and ecology ( carvers need more wood? price goes up. - 
  wolves eat sheep, which eat grass )
o smart AI NPCs that go about their business

Coming Soon:
o build houses, shops, farms, mines, castles - and hire NPC farmers, 
  crafters, shopkeepers, guards, ...
o skill system - time+money based, not exp based
o complex and variable magic system

Many seem to like the non-combat options, such as gathering and woodcutting.
Roleplaying is encouraged and rewarded, but not enforced. No powertripping 
imms here.

There's plenty of room for everyone, so come over and join the fun!

Mud         : Iconoclast
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Circle 3.0 (Heavily Customized)
Telnet      : iconoclast.org 7777 [204.91.17.37]
WWW         : http://www.iconoclast.org/
Description :

Iconoclast MUD is now in its 6th continuous year of operation, making us one
of the longest-running Cyberpunk/Gothic-themed MUDS on the Internet. We've
long been one of the top Sci-Fi RP MUDS listed on the search engines, and a
significant portion of our players have been with us since the beginning for
that very reason.

Iconoclast is set at the dawn of the 22nd Century, and is based around the
people and events associated with the free city of New Aurora. Genetic
alteration, cybernetic enhancements, neural interfaces, excessive violence,
corporate control, rampant gang and cult activity and aworldwide Matrix are
accepted as the norm. The 6000+ room Iconoclast world itself is 100%
original, and designed to be realistic without being detrimental to play.
The focus is on quality, not quantity.

Our customized code (a Circle 3.0 derivative) encourages role-playing while
allowing a more traditional hack-and-slash style of play for those who enjoy
that. Combat works differently than on other MUDS; there are no levels or
experience points as such, but there is plenty of room for self-directed
advancement to high levels of power and influence.

 VirtualChicago was established on 15 August 1994.  Players are not
encouraged to follow a particular theme, though the administration
maintain a central 'virtual Chicago' theme in certain areas.
VirtualChicago grew from roots that emphasized education, science,
and community.  Today, VirtualChicago continues to combine these values
to make an elegant and professional environment for its citizens to
enjoy.  Although we do attempt to provide help to as many new players as
possible, our world is not about becoming the largest, the best, or the
most cutting-edge server.  Instead, we focus on the quality of the actual
user environment.  Please do not try VirtualChicago if you are looking for
some quick stimulation; those who are the most happy with VirtualChicago
are those looking for a friendly and intelligent 'home' on the
Internet.  We may be an old world, but we go through much effort to stay
modern, as proven by the Mud Connector naming us the Mud of the Month in
June 1998.

Mud         : Puzzlebox MUCK
Code Base   : [MUCK] fbmuck6
Telnet      : puzzleboxmuck.org 8890 [69.61.22.227]
WWW         : http://www.puzzleboxmuck.org
Description :

Puzzlebox is a science fiction/transhuman/"postfurry" MUCK set in a 
dreamlike city on a cryptically hyperintelligent megastructure. 
Most characters are furries with futuristic trappings, but all sorts 
of strange cosmic beasties abound. Food, shelter, and even healthcare
are available at the blink of an eye, so there's nothing left to fight
over except for ideas -- and no way to fight over them except for art 
and seduction.

Puzzlebox is different from many other MU*'s in that it takes place in
a richly developed original world, but it's still fairly freeform and
loosely regulated. While we hope you'll find our players to be fun and
friendly, we also pride ourselves on investing serious thought and, 
more importantly, emotion into our virtual lives. At its best, 
Puzzlebox is also a social experiment, a work of collaborative art, a
philosophical conundrum, a laboratory for identity play, and 
sometimes a bit of group therapy. :)

Membership is by application only -- intellectually curious,
open-minded people who play well with others, daydreamers and
romantics preferred. Please visit our webpage or email 
functionxor@gmail.com for more information.

Mud         : Shattered Sanity
Code Base   : [GodWars] Originally LoW4, Extremely Heavily Modified.
Telnet      : sanity.xtramud.net 8500 [82.113.130.216]
WWW         : None
Description :

        Shattered Sanity is a MUD where players kill 
eachother for status. Unlike most status-based muds, 
however, in Shattered Sanity, status doesn't provide huge 
benefits so that the top players are nearly elite. 
Instead, our combat system is based off of knowledge and 
skill, and our classes were mathematically balanced long 
before they were implemented into the mud. 

            We also have a unique equipment system, where 
instead of mindlessly questing for hours, (questing is 
available, for those who do like it) they mine for ore and 
gemstones, with which they create their equipment. This 
equipment can then be quested further. We also have unique 
quest zones, where players can gain amazing equipment 
amoung other things. 

            The mud was designed in a manner that allows a 
new player to come in and get up to speed fast rather than 
having to spend months to catch up to the big players.  
The newbie eq is more than adequate to get started and 
fully custom eq is not too painful to obtain.  The goal we 
have achieved is a balanced mud that anyone can relatively 
quickly get up to speed and jump into the pk mix. On the 
vast majority of muds out there these days the victor in 
pk matches is determined by 1 of  2 things, who has the 
most hours building their character or who has the class 
that is the most overpowered. We've shifted away from both 
of these things and left pk largely up to how the fight is 
conducted. The mud is unique in many other aspects.. come 
check us out for yourselves, you won't be disappointed!

                -----------------------------------------------

Description :

 Imperium is a mud offering a variety of classes and races, each with a unique
set of abilities in a huge, all-original world.   A multi-continental world
which is still expanding, even after years of growth.
 
 Imperium uses a zone docking system to allow fast travel with minimum lag.
The zones are all unique, featuring many different themes, some new, some
recognizable.  There are always places to adventure.
 
 Geared towards both roleplaying and combat, pking is allowed within certain
restrictions.  Multiple characters are allowed, up to two online at a time.
 
 Imperium's features include increased AI for mobs, multiple coin types, spell
components, a unique introduction system, a wide variety of classes and unique
spells, and huge travelling terrain with inns scattered throughout the
continents.
 
 The Imms are both helpful and professional, having had many years of both
roleplaying and MUD experience.

Mud         : Ethereal Mists
Code Base   : [GodWars] GW2k Godwars deluxe
Telnet      : 65.41.9.98 3500 [65.41.9.98]
WWW         : http://www.etherealmists.comes1st.com
Description :

Dare you enter a world where the rules of right and wrong no longer
apply? A world controlled by gods, where mortals cower in the
corners of the night trembling in fear until they are taken by the
beasts that roam this realm; taken to be taught to rise to power? Be
it of the Mystics of the Magi or the Beast of the Garou, many shall
perish before the journey's end. Can you be the one to rise to power
and command your forces against those that plague to overthrow 
you? Do you dare to challenge those that stand against 
you? Enter the mists and find out.....

At Ethereal Mists we have varied classes from the base stock to our
own creations. Each imm is assigned his or her own class to look
after although we do have knowledge to all our classes.
We provide a friendly and learning atmosphere which we feel
mudders of experience and new players will both enjoy.  
Although Roleplay is not enforced it is encouraged.

*NEW*  A new class has opened this month (May 2005)!

So come, stop by, relax, hang your hat, and enjoy your stay here,
at the Ethereal Mists.

The EM Staff

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Voregotten Realm
Code Base   : [MUCK] Fuzzball TinyMUCK 2.2fb6.04 (with patches)
Telnet      : vore.got-game.org 8888 [213.41.132.228]
WWW         : http://vore.got-game.org/VoregottenRealm/
Description :

Somewhere in Brittany (France) is a magical forest, the forest
of Broceliande, home of Merlin, the druid and enchanter. It is
well known that Merlin is used to travel through time, but what
is unknown of the crowd is that Merlin did setup a magic cave
acting like a portal leading to various worlds and epochs...
There is one thing in common to the worlds that this cave allow
to reach: in these worlds, death is usually not a permanent
status and most of the ones who perish by accident do resurrect
after a while. It's a good thing actually, because the said
worlds are small and closed, very few of their inhabitants being
able to escape them... and food is rare, leading to a merciless
competition for survival where the predators try to feed on the
preys...

Voregotten Realm is a vore-themed free-form role-playing MUCK,
but it also offers a BDSM-biased area (the Slavers' Island) and
the macrophiles and microphiles are welcome too (specific
commands are implemented for them and a specific area is being
built).
As far as vore is concerned, you are welcome to RP any kind of
vore you want: soft, mild, hard, gory, cooking, consensual or
not, sexual or not... anything !
As for the characters' races, all are welcome: humans, furries,
scalies... anything fancying you is fair game (we encourage
creativity and imagination).
The MUCK offers medieval fantasy, contemporary and futuristic /
sci-fi settings, therefore suiting anyone's needs.

Voregotten Realm provides a complete and coherent set of
commands, as well as some unique features, to be discovered on
its website... :-)

                -----------------------------------------------

practices and trains in the arena without worrying about
losing exp/equipment/etc.

friendly staff always ready to help new players, beautiful
ANSI color, neat clan system, dedicated player base, the
list goes on and on.  Stop by today and see what your missing!

most of whom would murder you given the chance.

using that power however they like.

corp's technology, you can keep coming back and
experience each and every one of them.

Description :

  Once a land ruled by dragons, giants, and powerful
immortals, one millennium later the power of magic has been
replaced by technology and a powerful corporation pulls
political strings from behind the scenes.  A terrible
industrial accident creates a time rift joining the two eras
of the world of Jhoira together.  Now the ways of magic are
returning to the land of the future and time travelers
attempt to alter the past with seemingly no affect.
However, no one knows for sure since all records of the
centuries between have disappeared.

Scourge of Time is mainly a hack and slash mud with optional
player killing and roleplaying.  There are 401 mortal
levels, separated into 4 tiers.  Once the remort area is
written, players will be able to obtain superhero and legend
levels once they have 3 remorts.  Along the way players may
enter challenges (rebirth/reawakening/renewal) where they
can gain new spells and skills for their class or (with an
etl penalty) gain groups more suited for other classes.

We have recently added a casino and a new item type, 'precious
gems', that can improve the stats on equipment.

Mud         : Mystic Forces Of Evil
Code Base   : [Envy] Re-built from the ground up.
Telnet      : mysticforces.genesismuds.com 7100 [216.136.9.5]
WWW         : http://None
Description :

 There's nothing I can truly say about this mud that will make
you realize how different it is from other muds, but let me
try. First of all, take all the things you know about average
muds and throw them out the window. Imagine you're sitting at
home on your desk chair playing your favorite console RPG.
Whether that's Dragon Warrior for the Nintendo, or Final Fantasy
for NES/SNES, this is exactly the experience I was looking to
accomplish. MF is built around an ASCII map (YES, **NO** room
descriptions to read) as well as random encounters, random drops
(Weapons/Armor/Items/Quest Cards/Lottery Tickets/Gold Bars/Random
Cards/Legendary Weapons/Runestones) and an actual STORY. You'll
WANT to play just because you'll want to know how the story ends.
You also don't learn skills/abilities/spells/limit breaks by
going up levels like your ordinary MUDs either, you'll start with
30-40, and then you'll find and buy the others. This game also
has 300 MORTAL levels, which means there is ALWAYS room for
advancement, I'm telling you, once you start playing, it's like
an addiction, it's like that very first Final Fantasy game you
ever played... you just won't want to get up from your chair.
Those of you looking for an easy mud to play need not apply.
Not because this mud isn't newbie friendly, but it's not easy
to master. If you love helping people and creating a trade
like community where everyone benefits from each other, then
again, you should give this place a try.

Mud         : Allegiances Unbroken

Telnet      : unbroken.genesismuds.com 1190 [216.136.9.8]
WWW         : http://unbroken.genesismuds.com/
Description :

 Allegiances Unbroken revolves around a kingdom vs. kingdom
driver.  There are two human kingdoms that are constantly
at odds with each other over various things, religon and
land being the main reasons for clashing.

For those who do not wish to participate in a kingdom vs.
kingdom storyline, we have four other established guilds
available with the option to create mortally ran clans.
Spells, skills and special equipment are/will be available
to the established guilds.

We offer six different races, human, fey, dwarf, drow, orc
and ogre.  There are currently eight different classes,
each having at least one unique 'specialist group'.  These
groups take you away from your run of the mill mage or
cleric (etc.), and are intended to make each character
unique upon creation.

We are based on the familiar map of ROM, but have (and in
the midst of building) several original areas.

Roleplaying is enforced and pk is allowed within a roleplay
reason.

Description :

our own mudlib. The mud features several guilds as well as some
races, most of whom are humanoid. With a multitude of quests and
exploration we can offer far more than only monster-bashing. The
latter is of course provided as well, but beware, combat is deadly
to say the very least. Player-killing is somewhat limited, but
game mechanics takes care of that. It's part of the game, nothing
that is required.

Running since spring 1992 we're one of the older muds still up. 
You are welcome to the Kingdoms, to explore and enjoy.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Vampire Wars: The Catalyst
Code Base   : [GodWars] Vampire Wars, heavily modified
Telnet      : catalyst.genesismuds.com 62666 [216.136.9.4]
WWW         : http://destiny.genesismuds.com/~ulberon/
Description :

  Welcome my Progeny, do you taste the scent of your prey on the nights^Ò
breeze?  This is because you are a reborn a Vampire, lord of the night, and
all that stands before you is your domain.
 
Our mud is based off of White Wolf's World of Darkness with a unique
perspective on the clan rivalry that makes up the Jyhad.  As a newly
embraced Childe you too will enter the Vampire wars, where every minute is
an opportunity to gain power undreamt of, and to be destroyed.
 
Vampire Wars: The catalyst brings a fresh new update to Jokers Classic
Vampire Wars mud.  With an expanded discipline and skill system, the ability
to diablerize your opponents, new uses for blood and measures of potency,
bloodbonds, and new areas with new equipment, Catalyst represents a new
order of the ages in White Wolf based muds.
 
New vampiric discipline powers include: Flick, Earthshock, Imprint, Zephyr,
Beckoning, Improved hunt, Draw the beast, Taste of death, Disease, and
Silence of Death.  More disciplines are being added constantly.
 
There is no question that with a codebase twice the size of other vampire
wars clones, Catalyst is an Archon with a fresh warrant out to destroy it's
elders while they slumber in torpor.

Mud         : DragonBall Evolution
Code Base   : [Circlemud] DBE
Telnet      : raider.mudmagic.com 1874 [69.64.36.72]
WWW         : http://www.jail-bait.net/dbe
Description :

 The evolution of the DragonBall theme has happened once 
again. We redid the MUD and gave it a totally new look. For
starters the fighting system was changed to be more 
advanced and it requires more effort to battle. New original
transformations were added in for each race. Player killing
is now a major factor while leveling up. There is a help
file for almost anything you can think of in this MUD. Our
character creation is totally new and stays true to the
DragonBall theme. Traveling to planets was updated to make 
easier and more interesting. A new original planet was added
in for kaios. Just like before each race has their own 
recall and start point on a different planet. We also made 
sure each race has their own special selection of skills to
learn. To make sure each race has an equal chance at 
leveling, we made a newbie zone for each planet. To keep the
newbies safe we made a NonPK command that is enabled for
everyone under level 50 and for when you get PKed. All of
our stats for each character works perfect now. We also 
added planet Arlia, more mini quests, realistic scouters, 
scouter net(walky talky), larger selection of racial 
equipment, new website with forums, room compass, and more
zones. We added a new afterlife that is over 500 rooms with
multiple quests and everything that could be found there in 
the show. The code was changed a bit to give it a new look.
Basically the whole layout of the MUD was changed
for the better. So if you want to see the evolution of this
MUD come and play.

Thanks
Ozma and Jugogou

Mud         : KoBra
Code Base   : LP 3.1.2 +++
Telnet      : kobra.et.tudelft.nl 23 [130.161.38.161]
WWW         : http://kobra.et.tudelft.nl/
Description :

  KoBra is a well established Star Wars based MUD that has been around since 
the beginning of 1991. We are currently running on a dedicated Pentium.

Almost 40 planets to explore, nearly 20 major quests available to solve. We 
have several StarWars races to pick from. Current races are Ewok, Gamorrean, 
Human, Ithorian, Mon Calamari, Rodian, Sullustian and Wookiee. All have their 
own special features and abilities.

You can if you like join organisations like the Alliance or Empire. Or choose to
be just a peaceful person, a sneaky Smuggler or a brutal Bounty Hunter. Minor 
guilds and organisations will follow in the near future.

We also have a unique universe system with advanced space combat abilities. You 
can buy your own ship or get one from your organisation and fight for freedom or
depression in our Star Wars galaxy. 

We do not require a port number, for those of you with restricted port access! 
We allow having several characters per person. Read 'help second' on the mud.

wizarding schools in other countries around the world. 
Eurosia is one of those school. A completely orginal
school and original history awaits our players. 


No application is required. All that is asked for is a 
detailed 3-6 paragraphed background of their character to 
be approved for roleplay.  Good RPers with a creative 
imagination wanted! TPs will be planned periodically to 
keep things interesting.

have to excuse the mess... we are still in the process of 
describing the rooms.  Thank you.

and-slash here and we will NOT accept fantasy names here.

WWW         : http://labyrinth.tamarisk.ab.ca
Description :

   Looking for a challenge?  Want options and a solid system?
A place where you don't just play house?  Somewhere you can
amass power... but roleplay along the way?

Based on Rom2.4b3, The Labyrinth features:  Diety-based
character generation; lunar phases and seasons; two levels
of remort; holy symbol or foci based spell casting; mounts
and special skills for mounted combat; traps and skills (or
spells) to find and disarm them; mob/room/object programs;
non-supervised and supervised quests; tracking and tailing;
gaze attacks; insanities caused by demonic exposure; OLC;
owned objects; unique world layout; clans and private
residences; fighting style based combat system; music based
bard magic; player run territories and justice system(s);
anatomically correct player statues; support for the sounds
(using the mud sound protocol); and much more...

Mud         : The Sea of Storms
Code Base   : [Smaug] Very heavily modified
Telnet      : tsos.rarcoa.com 7070 [207.251.190.156]
WWW         : http://tsos.rarcoa.com
Description :

  The Sea of Storms is a Wheel of Time MUD based on heavily 
modified SMAUG and primarily focused on role play.  The code is 
designed to emulate the world created by Robert Jordan in exquisite
detail and provide the basis for an in depth role playing environment.

We also provide a superb enviornment for those who do not wish to RP 
all the time.  We are one of the few true 'RP Encouraged' MUDs, with 
many built-in incentives for Role Playing, though we do not force 
players to be constantly RPing.

We are also one of the only leveless WoT MUDs out there.  
Advancement is based upon use and observation of skills, weaves, 
flows, and weapon forms.  You'll find no need to kill and kill and 
kill to gain levels here.

Features include an unique channeling system, taint for male 
channelers, addiction for both male and female channelers, strength 
and skill differentiation between male and female channelers, a form 
system for four different weapons with 200+ forms, 90+ weaves and 
50+ skills.  We also have multi-guilding, color customization, and 
weapon and armor forging. Other features are a dreamworld, wolfkin, 
angreal, and ter'angreal.

Books known as RIFTs.  Set in a post apocalyptic version of 
earth in which much of the worlds humanity has been lost.  
A long time has passed since the coming of the rifts and 
while much of the past is gone there have been groups 
forming around what is left of the worlds of all sorts of 
beings.  Some human, some not.

in Kingsdale which is set in north america.  As time moves 
on, and players come in, we hope to allow other cities to 
be opened.  As of current we have cities for Kingsdale, 
Stormspire, Whykin, Chi-Town, New Horizon (Custom City), 
and even plans for Wormwood and Phaseworld to be built.

been improved, as well as the questing ability of

Mud         : Galactic Trader
Code Base   : [Unknown] GalTrader 4.55, revision 4.3
Telnet      : gt.gamingmuseum.com 23
WWW         : http://www.galtrader.com
Description :

  Galactic Trader is a multiplayer space
trading game loosely based on the PC
game 'Elite'. It's reminiscent of old
BBS door games, but is coded for OpenVMS
based Alpha and VAX systems. In the 
original, players would make money buying
and selling goods (some illegal) and evading
cops and hostile aliens in the hopes of 
racking up enough credits to buy
a better vessel or weapons. Successful 
players achieve fame on the high score list. 
In Gamingmuseum.com's enhanced version, 
players can now join the Imperial
Navy or Galactic Police, or even become a 
member of the hostile Thargoid race. There
are many new ships and new equipment, such
as tractor beams and fusion torpedoes.
Players can build their own bases and outposts.
Capital ships can carry fighter squadrons, and
mount multiple laser cannons.

Support is available in the Galtrader group 
on Yahoo! Groups.

explored boundaries are pushed back and new lands and
peoples discovered, with much more to be found. As time
passes secrets are uncovered, dangers surmounted and kudos
gained by the brave.

The use of quests is extensive with levelling quests and
title quests available and more being designed at all times.

create and maintain their own groups with options for
alliances should they be necessary. Another approved form

to add that personalised touch to a pkill.

to be so to meet the demands of the database and players.

Mud         : Asgardian Nightmare
Code Base   : [Rot] Major Modifications
Telnet      : asgardian.no-ip.org 4000 [24.110.7.86]
WWW         : http://www.asgardmud.com
Description :

Asgardian Nightmare has a long and successful history.  
Peaking at a playerbase of as many as 30 players on at a time,
we have recently dropped to more like six or seven players on 
at a time.  This was due to a long period of downtime, but we
are currently looking for more players.  We offer a great pk
environment as well as an equally great nonpk environment.  
We are looking to rebuild our playerbase, so newbies are
always welcome.  One of the most outstanding parts of our mud
is random item generation.  It works like the items in Diablo
2, where an item is assigned prefixes and suffixes that give
it extra stat bonuses or drawbacks.  With a huge number of
prefixes and suffixes, as well as condition tags, there are
literally millions of possibilites for random items.  
Builders are constantly working on new areas, so the mud is
constantly evolving.  We offer three tiers of classes, with
21 third tier classes to choose from, and the option to let
your race evolve into one of many new races as you gain
experience.  Please give our mud a try, you may just like it.

Description :

[This game requires a client program, easily acquired from
under the homepage link.]

 Spellbound is a free online multiplayer roguelike game. To win the game,
you must build up a character and live and grow in the Forgotten Realms's
City of Splendors, Waterdeep. You must be powerful enough to defeat Bane the
Black Lord's last avatar, as he has fortified himself 5000 feet under the
city, in the infamous Underdark, and is mustering an army of power unseen
before. As you work towards this near-impossible goal, you will chart
unexplored reaches of the Underdark, do battle with legendary creatures, and
find lost artifacts. And of course throughout your journeys you will
encounter many other adventurers -- whether they be friend or foe is up to
you to decide!

 ..based on Angband by Ben Harrison and MAngband by Keldon Jones. If you
loved Nethack, Angband, Rogue, Omega or other ASCII-based games of the past,
you will love this one.

Mud         : Godwars: Saint from Shadows
Code Base   : [GodWars] Revised
Telnet      : shadow.wolfpaw.net 6100 [204.209.44.7]
WWW         : http://communities.msn.com/SaintsFromShadows
Description :

 Godwars: Saints from Shadows is a slower pace godwars 
mud.  Players do not max thier characters in a few hours, 
it takes time.  We have 7 uniquely coded classes. Some of
them look and sound familier to older godwars classes but 
they have been redone and redesigned.  Darkelf is a 
redesigned Drow class.  But now it follows more closly to
the D&D Drows.  We have an original dragon and Hell Hound 
classes. We do have the Highlander and Mage classes, but
they have been redone with new powers.  Monk and ninja
have also been recoded.  We also offer the stock LoW4
Werewolf code.  It will be recoded into a Shaman class 
later.  Recently a remort system has been added that 
allows players who work hard to become multi-classed.
We have a unique forge code here that allows players to 
find ores to forged into new equipment instead of just
finding slabs to slap onto existing equipment.  The fight 
code on the mud has also been recoded to let the balancing 
of classes be easier to do.  The classes are not completly 
balanced but they are close.  The immortals are almost 
always on to help newbies with questions.  And we always
welcome ideas to help improve the mud.

Hope you stop by.
- Requiem.

Mud         : The Last Outpost
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Diku
Telnet      : last-outpost.com 4000 [207.28.94.9]
WWW         : http://www.last-outpost.com
Description :

   The theme is a medieval wilderness fantasy.  Three
generations ago the Empire was overrun.  The Last Outpost,
a small coastal trading town located deep in the wild was
spared most of the fighting.  Life in the Outpost is hard.
The residents are a tough bunch, well suited to reclaiming
Outpost lands.

Clans are available to players, with leadership determined
by vote.  Newbies are protected from pkilling, but after
level 7, all players are vulnerable.

Good luck and happy hunting!

Mud         : Nemesis, The Original
Code Base   : [LP] heavily modified
Telnet      : mud.nemesis.de 2000 [195.143.213.125]
WWW         : http://www.nemesis.de/
Description :

'Nemesis, The Original' is a Fantasy Mud from Munich, Germany which exists since 1991.
The original Gods (Snake and Wizards have returned and restored one of the largest and 
cleanest LPmuds around.
Game Theme:Fantasy (hack&slay and riddles).
Areas:Medieval, Under(world), Fantasy (movies), Orient, Desert, City, Ice (Nordic/ Vikings),
Country, Forest, Ancient, Planes (elements).
Separated (eg. by a time gate) future areas are planned (Real domain).
The world is a globe with various islands, connected by ship lines with a timetable.
Very newbie friendly, easily understood system.
Fairly ;-) safe area on the island of Nemesia/ Nemesia Village,several other newbie areas.
Size:Numerous islands, over 10,000 rooms (we have given up counting :-)
Noisiness: low (due to shout cost)

Other Features:
- widely extended soul with over 100 feelings and adverbs (=emoting anywhere)
- 15 quests and various tasks/ miniquests
- rewritten combat system, with multiple attackers and experience sharing
- weather descs, weather effects, day/night cycle, Nemesis time (8x faster than in real life)
- 13 ships that transport the player from island to island
- no deadly traps and fair warning of difficulties
- active guilds: Adventurers, Cleric

Plans: In our devmud we are developing races, further guilds (mages, martial arts,bards, 
Demon masters), weapon types, currencies, extended stats, skills and languages.
Prepare to play :-)

come check out the last sunrise. We offer an extended leveling code that

Warriors can turn into a channeler and a channeler into a warrior.
Trollocs have the option to turn into a myddraal. And Ogiers into TreeSingers.

Mud         : Frontiers MUCK
Code Base   : [MUCK] fb6.00b4
Telnet      : muck.tanabi.org 8000 [208.42.21.230]
WWW         : None
Description :

 Frontiers MUCK is a Furry-space game unlike all others.  It's
very origional, with well over 10,000 lines of MUF coding
done by it's founder.

Frontiers features a universe that automatically expands
as it's explored, a combat system based on RL weaponry,
detailed starships, a working economy, realism-based
technology, purchasable starships (no building required!),
and a skill system with many profession options.

It's a small MUCK; it used to be mildly popular, but there
were too many people relying on the admin to provide
entertainment so they left.  The MUCK needs people who want
to build and run roleplays, and programmers to help with the
abitious MUF programming projects on the MUCK.  Others are
welcome, too, but cannot rely on the admin for their sole
entertainment :-)

Come check it out -- busiest times are in the evenings,
eastern US time.

Mud         : NYCX
Code Base   : [MUSH]
Telnet      : unwonderland.net 6767 [63.145.53.115]
WWW         : HTTP://www.undwonderland.net
Description :

  NYCX is an X-men mush where you'll see many familiar characters
from the comics, cartoons and movies, but with a twist. This is a 
'what if?' that focuses on reality and the darkness of the human 
nature. How the environment is shaped depends on you, the players,
and your characters. The world you know ICly will be shaped completely
by your actions.  Any fate is possible and we want to see all the
corners explored.It is only recently that there was a sudden explosion
of numbers of homo superior. With this sudden increase in numbers
mankind has become aware that they are not alone. A new race has
emerged among them. Some people fear mutants, some people are
indifferent and others are fascinated by them. Public opinion is divided
from human extremists who still believe in lynch mobs to the groupies
who are obssessed with mutants and their powers.Essentially, while 
we have taken themes and characters from Marvel comic books and
a familiarsetting in the shape of New York City, this is where the similarity 
ends. Currently we now have a Brotherhood of Mutants and Xavier is
slowly brining new mutants to his side. The other established organization
is the Division 6, a police force that focuses on criminal investigations
that deals with mutants. On the force are both humans and mutants, 
some corrupt and some with a good heart, although all unknowingly
aiding a government project that deals with mutant experimentation
called  Weapon Plus. New York city has become the focus for some
of the most obvious mutant activity with changes happening everyday.
It's a strange new world where anything could happen.

Description :

 Aurealan Realms is a two-continent, 13-class,
16-race MUD based in the world of Aurealis, an
all-original place that has been created over the
last decade from the minds of some truly gifted and
scary people.
 
 We have player-owned houses and shoppes, the ability
to customize the appearance of equipment, clans,
faiths, a 105-level range and the ability to remort
into other classes beyond your first.
 
 For for those interested in PVP, we have assassins
for those who want to live it 24/7, and the Arena
for those who'd rather just try it out once in a
while.
 
 We like RP, but it's not a requirement. We do reward
good RP if we see it, and the world is written
'seriously' so that if you want to RP, you will be
able to feel 'right' in the world of Aurealis.
 
 Our staff is dedicated to giving the players a fun
place to play, with  as little interference as
possible. AR welcomes players from all over the
world to come and join in a fun, expansive MUD that
can easily become your new home online.
 
We look forward to meeting you!

was threatened. War broke out with an unbeatable foe. A foe created by the
enemy of the true children of our good Father. Flight was our only option.
And here we have made our new home. There is hope here, children. The Order
of Eternity holds the balance of justice and maintains the order of the
Races on what could have been a hostile new world filled with chaos. We have
remembered the knowledge lost to us in the Landing. The High Consul promises
us many great things. We prosper and thrive.

Yet, do not smile so soon, children. The slaves, who have been part of our
traditions from the beginning of our creation, threaten to subdue our way of
life. The Second Betrayers are trying to rise up and crush the hearts and
spirits of the true children of our good Father. They are heretics and
anarchists! And all because of the foolish words of a mad heretical elf,
they believe it is their time to bring the omens to fruition. So, tell me,
children, whose side will you stand on when you take your place in the
world? The side of goodness and order, or with those Betrayers of Alordast?

Omens promises to be a rich, original world where the Races (elves, dwarves,
humans, and nubis) try to live together, magic is real, and technology is
advanced. God-given Power, secret rebellion, noble riches, or modest
obscurity could be yours.

*Still heavily under construction, we are in great need of coders above all
and invite those with experience and a passion for roleplaying to join
our team. Browse the webpage, and whether a coder or builder, your interest
is appreciated.

Mud         : Legend of the Nobles
Code Base   : [Rom] mostly original with ROM 2.4 structure
Telnet      : lotn.wolfpaw.net 5400 [204.209.44.23]
WWW         : http://www.legendofthenobles.com/
Description :

  (The following is a review by one of the players, which does a
better job of describing us than any of our own words can}

  'Legend of the Nobles, or LotN, is the mud I call home. With 
dedicated administration and an incredible coder, LotN runs quite 
smoothly...

  As well as original races, there are many interesting classes to 
choose from. Be the mighty fighter, or the sly rogue. Be the Paladin, 
and fight for your religion. Be a Conjurer, and dabble in demon 
summoning and work with the undead. Be a bard, and play your melodies 
to influence and inspire others. Be a shape-shifting druid, attuned 
to nature. Be a mage with the power to enchant armor and weapons. Or 
be a priest, where you don't fight and you gain experience through 
healing others and drawing powerful glyphs.

  This mud has a pleasant balance between roleplaying and player   
killing ... With the guild, religion, and noble systems, there is 
plenty of opportunity for intrigue.

  One of the most notable changes this version is the inclusion of 
permdeath ... will ensure a more realistic atmosphere. Those who do 
not play permdeath cannot achieve the highest ranks.

 I recommend anyone who reads to this to join us. All of our long-
time players are always willing to help a new face in any way we can. 
And right now, with the new version, everyone will start off on even 
footing, level-wise. So please, come join us.'

Online since May 1996. Current version: 5

Mud         : LegendMUD
Code Base   : [Custom] Architecturally derived from Diku
Telnet      : mud.legendmud.org 9999 [67.37.172.234]
WWW         : http://www.legendmud.org/
Description :

  If you've ever wanted to travel in time--this is your chance!

Now in it's 11th year, LegendMUD is a classless mud offering 
unique professions such as doctors(with medications, anesthesia 
and field surgery), herbalists and a spell system boasting over 
150 spellsin specialties such as divination, conjuration, and 
illusion. Features like missile weapons (both guns and bows), 
vehicles (planes, trains,and cars), and exploration XP make the 
world an interesting one to visit. 

Touches like optional player descriptions, the Out of Character 
Lounge,and the advanced moods system for realistic speech make 
it a great roleplaying environment--and of course there are the 
dozens and dozens of quests ranging from the minor to the epic. 
There are no rent fees, but there are themed free-forming clans, 
a complex weapons proficiencies system for variable speed combat,
Immortal-run games within the game such as recall tag and trivia 
and flag hunts, and of course furniture to sit on, in, or around. 
All this plus stable code, the Legendary Times newsletter, the 
Legend Discussion Forum, and a mature, friendly playerbase. All 
of our areas are original and carefully researched, from Ancient 
Egypt and Celtic Ireland to Viking Scandinavia and the Crusades
to Victorian London and Gold Rush San Francisco.


'If you are only visiting one mud, make it Legend.'-the Electronic 
Newsstand Mud of the Month, October 1995 - Mud Connector * Pueblo 
Recommended World Top 10 website for Interactive Fiction - XYZZYNews 
* EyeOnTheWeb Selected Site Recommended by C|NET * 'Hot, hip, 
cutting-edge' - Yahoo's Wild Web Rides

Mud         : NomenMUCK

Telnet      : nomen.dyndns.org 4201
WWW         : http://nomen.dyndns.org
Description :

  An original themed MUCK, Nomen encompasses a very in-depth
story. Set in a high fantasy realm, it focuses on a long war
that has been fought between two majour countries - Nerravyn
and Serensith, divided by races and cultures, and even
climates. Wild Magic divides the lands, making travel almost
impossible unless the river Anynduil is utilized - and that
has a thriving black-market trade on it. Political intrigue,
high adventure, mystery, drama, horror...everything is
available here. 

We have a great RP Staff to take care of TPs and oversee
fairness issues. A caring wizard staff will take care of your
needs, and is more than willing to listen to any suggestions
or concerns a player may have. And seeing as Nomen is new, we
are looking for more staffers to fill up the RP Staff and the
Help Staff.

Although the theme is very important, the roleplay is
completely consentual and freeform. Extensive lore is
available about the lands, along with the common races there -
and although it is important, they are not rules that you must
strictly follow.

Mud         : Lensmoor
Code Base   : [Rom] Many Changes
Telnet      : lensmoor.org 3500 [160.79.196.117]
WWW         : http://lensmoor.org/
Description :

    Lensmoor is a cross between a roleplaying mud, 
and a hack&slash mud. Players are encouraged to roleplay, 
and are often drawn into roleplaying situations, and 
efforts are made to reward good roleplaying, without the 
overbearing nature of many strict roleplaying muds. 

    Players are able to become part of the world, operating 
their own stores, crafting their own goods, and governing 
towns and clans. At the same time, traditional mud
diversions such as questing and leveling are supported for 
the times when other players involved in your plots aren't 
online. The mud averages over 50 players online at a time, 
with over 100 at peak times, so there are always people to 
interact with.

    Technically, Lensmoor is a superior game. It is 
typically up for months between crashes, worthy player 
suggestions are implemented within days of suggestion, new 
areas are constantly created, and our website is one of the 
most integrated mud website around, allowing full access to 
whois (finger), notes, maps, helps, and more.

AVE!

Are you used to playing LP-Mud? Fine, go on playing it - in
Latin, the mother of most European (and also American)
languages!

Buy a dictionnary and a short grammar and get used to the
fundamentals of literature and arts etc.

Are you used to reading and understanding or even speaking Latin?
Go ahead and learn what LP-Mud might be!

You will meet a lot of people in numerous countries. Make
friends with them.

get united! - Complete our MUD with new objects and rooms,
let us know when you have found mistakes you want to be

Mud         : Aftermath: The Sci-Fi Experience
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH 1.7.7p20
Telnet      : aftermath.wolfpaw.net 4401 [204.209.44.22]
WWW         : None
Description :

  Founded in September, 2003, by two longtime roleplayers from
a similar game, Aftermath is based around the theory that
canon can and at times should be thrown out the window.
Here, the worlds detailed in Star Trek and Star Wars, which
are all too often compared rather than examined, are placed
side by side and allowed to interact. Additionally, a system
has been set up by which factions and characters from
entirely different universes- even original ones- can be
added to the system. By allowing these worlds to coexist, we
create a brand new environment for roleplayers of any skill
level to enjoy.

Aftermath staff would like to point out that non-original
aspects of the game are still the property of their original
creators, no matter how skewed their surroundings might be.

Mud         : LochNess
Code Base   : LP
Telnet      : lochness.imp.ch 2222 [157.161.139.30]
WWW         : None
Description :

   Lochness is one of the older muds, but what it lacks in modernization, 
it makes up for in atmosphere!  Both players and wizards are generally
friendly and helpful, especially to newbies.  Geographically, the mud is
divided into a multitude of domains, each with a different theme and a
different team of wizards working on areas.  There are six distinctive 
guilds to choose from, and plenty of quests to challenge players.  It is 
not, and has never been, Lochness' policy to instawiz players, but once a
player reaches a certain level, he is presented with the option of either 
wizzing, or playing the higher levels.  Obscenity on public communication
channels is frowned upon, although players may say what they like to each
other in private :)  As for the number of people who play Lochness, it is 
certainly a small mud in that regard, but we look at it as having a 'small
town' ambience in which everybody knows everybody else.

Mud         : Annwn
Code Base   : [LP] MudOS v22.1b23-DW
Telnet      : www.annwn.org 4242 [80.60.108.166]
WWW         : http://www.annwn.org/
Description :

 Annwn is a Celtic Mythology themed MUD, loosely based on the
stories of the Mabinogi, Arthurian legend, and historical facts from
pre- and post-Roman Britain.
 
Annwn is set in a world and time roughly equivalent to Celtic
Britain of 400AD, but with elements of pre 50AD.
 
The world of Annwn has four known realms: Fair Arberth is a
civilized High Kingdom made up of the four independent kingdoms
of Dyfed, Rhos, Melewyn and Bruga.
 
The Highlands are a wild land of mountains and forests where
giants still rule the land. Savage Jorthu is a realm of barbarian
invaders. Hibernia is a peaceful, cultured land of learning. There
are rumours of a fifth realm - the mythical realm of Annwn itself,
home of the Tuatha Lords.
 
Annwn has six races available for player selection:
Human, Formorian, Tuatha, Grishnak, Corrak and Giant.
 
The basic Guilds of Annwn are the Artisans, the Bards, the
Dewiniaid, the Druids, the Rogues and the Warriors. Each guild has
it's own unique way of offering sub-guilds to the players. Multi-guilding
will be allowed at a later stage.
 
Annwn is run by a small but very dedicated team of very friendly and
creative people. Our world is 100% original and the mudlib is
customised to suit.

We are currently open in a Beta test phase for players, so a lot of
features may not be working correctly. We are always on the look out for
people that would like to code in a Celtic themed MUD (LPC experience
not necessary).

Description :

 DragonRealms is an ever-expanding, massively-multiplayer
text-based roleplaying environment with an average of over
a thousand players online during (USA) prime time hours.
Tens of thousands of 'rooms' spread out within the four
known provinces and over twenty major cities.  Players can
choose from eleven races which include the fantasy-genre
standards likes Elves, Dwarves, and Halflings, as well as
several unique choices which include the feline Prydaen,
the reptilian S'Kra Mur, or the werewolf-like Rakash.

There are ten professions to choose from in this totally
skill-based advancement system which include Empaths who
transfer wounds from their patients' bodies to their own
and shun combat at all costs, Traders who traverse the
continents delivering goods and commodities, Moon Mages
who get their teleporting and conjuring power from the
world's three moons, and Warrior Mages who wield a
powerful combination of elemental magic and weapons.

DragonRealms is in a constant state of growth and
development and is supported by a devoted staff of over
100 GameMasters with years of experience.

The first 30 days is free, so you've got nothing to lose.

you friend...' Emerging from the trees ahead, a mighty Frost Giant bearing

have found ye...' Do you dare challenge the gods?

is possible to travel from the distant past, a time of wizardry

a place of opportunity where with a bit of luck, and a good measure
of skill it is possible to forge a massive empire which spans the
whole of Magrathea's existence.

series. It offers a wide range of clans and areas. Magrathea has areas
ranging from those based on Babylon 5 and Dr. Who to a modern 
shopping mall and science museum to classic stock areas with Tolkien
and medieval themes. There are many unique races including Drow,
Sprite, Numenor, Vogon, and Klingon, as well as ten races of dragon.

but restricted by clan and level. Although there are many additions
and changes to Rom 2.4b, it is easy to play especially for those 
familiar with ROM, but offers many new features.

Mud         : Peregrine Keep

Telnet      : www.peregrine-keep.net 8000 [216.235.252.225]
WWW         : http://www.peregrine-keep.net
Description :

  Peregrine Keep is a Pueblo enhanced TinyMUSH currently under development, 
now available for Guests and Crew.

Our focus is on role playing in a low-fantasy medieval island setting, with 
aging characters (5 years per month of real time), and detailed story 
development.  

Features of this MUSH include graphical room maps, a self-serve costume 
machine capable of generating trillions of unique items, a Shakespearian 
flavor, free emotes and persistent poses.

A system of Falconry training, competition, and combat is under development.
An in-MUSH set of mini Games are in the works including a graphical version 
of GO.  Text-only clients are supported.  Large scale community Construction 
projects are planned, beginning with a Cathedral.

Peregrine Keep is a volunteer run community, operating under a set of 
Bylaws.  Crew and Cast IDs are available by application only.  Visitors are 
welcome.  Please drop by our webpage to track our status, post to our 
Forums, connect to the MUSH as a Guest, or email pkadmin@peregrine-keep.net

Mud         : Aftershock
Code Base   : [Ack!mud] Heavily Modified
Telnet      : aftershock.wolfpaw.net 3500 [204.209.44.4]
WWW         : Http://aftershock.wolfpaw.net
Description :

 Aftershock is a modified ACK!Mud based on the 4.2 ACK Release.
 
 We are a mature MUD, which has been around since the mid 1990s
and are always looking for new players to come and experience
the magic. A friendly IMM staff and a helpful player base makes
for an enriching and entertaining experience.
 
 Aftershock presents the standard ACK!Mud multi-class system
through the adept levels. We have expanded on this system by
creating detailed and unique Realm Lord levels and the ultimate
in Legend levels with unique and new skills to be discovered.
 
 With 94 areas to explore, new discoveries are at your fingertips
daily. Develop your own unique equipment by utilizing quest points
earned throughout daily game play. For those of you wishing that
extra bit of excitement.
 
 Aftershock does allow player killing for those players who choose
this route. PK is restricted, however, and does not ruin the
experience of those who wish a more peaceful MUD existance. We
also have added an Arena where players can have fun PKing and
practice PK skills without disrupting others who wish to continue
advancing their characters. At the moment, we are currently allowing
Multi-Play as well. It is Limited, so be sure to check on the rules
before assuming anything.
 
 Please stop by aftershock.wolfpaw.net 3500, talk with our players,
and start a new character to share the experience. We hope to see
you there!

Mud         : Masquerade
Code Base   : [MUX] TinyMUX
Telnet      : masquerade.org 9999 [216.136.9.5]
WWW         : http://www.masquerade.org
Description :

 Yes, we are *that* Masquerade. The first WoD MU*, started back in 1992. If we're new to
you, please read on! If we're not, you'll find a lot has changed, for the better! Come check
out our new grid, rewritten, recoded, redone!

 Masquerade takes place in the city of Albuquerque, New Mexico. Surrounded by the towering
Sandia mountain range to the east, the Manzano mountains to the southeast, and a high
volcanic mesa to the west, Albuquerque sits astride the nurturing Rio Grande River. Dizzying
views unfold over sweeping vistas across a truly magical landscape, filled with a myriad
natural wonders. If New Mexico is truly the 'Land of Enchantment,' then Albuquerque must be
its gateway.

 Although many things seem to be the same on the surface, our virtual Albuquerque is a far
cry from the reality of this happy Southwestern town. The town has been transformed from its
real world countenance into a mass of decay, danger and death. This is a world where evil
and danger abound, where tension is stronger, cops more corrupt, the criminal element even
more firmly in control. And that's even before the Supernaturals start pulling strings... If
you're not afraid of the Dark, come check us out!

Mud         : Atlantis MUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH version 1.7.4 patchlevel 20
Telnet      : atlantis.hawkgames.com 4201 [4.14.71.136]
WWW         : http://www.hawkgames.com/atlantis/
Description :

  Atlantis MUSH is based around an ongoing war between the 
Capitalist Alliance and the Totalitarian Regime. The year
is 2114 and the surface world has been destroyed and is
uninhabitable. The two factions live together in Atlantis.
Atlantis was a deep sea research facility created by the
Neutral Alliance and protected by the Mercenary Guild. An
uneasy peace resides in Atlantis, but the waters around are
full of open conflict.

  Atlantis uses an adaptation of Simple Role-Playing Game. This
allows for character specialization without the complexity of
having to choose 1.4 million skills. Atlantis is so easy to play,
girls who have never played a MUSH before play there. In addition
to submarines, hovertanks, and such, players can also wield
magic. Primarily, magic is used to heal, throw opponents away
from combat, and turn invisible to sneak around.

Medievia V is now open!

(see http://www.medievia.com/ships.html), MobFactions,
DungeonMaster, and live maps (complete with our own custom font that
uses shapes, not letters; see
http://www.medievia.com/fonts/font.html).

We have it all! Dragon flight. Clans that actually create their own
towns. Wilderness. Bloodlines. MobFactions that make the game more
like a real-time strategy game. The DungeonMaster took 3 years to
program and tracks parties' happiness, pride, sadness, and fear,
making good or bad MobFactions around them--basically DMing the
world.

We always have hundreds of people playing, 24/7. We started in 1992
and never stopped adding and tweaking. Now, in 2005, Medievia V is
here!

In Medievia you will find raging wilderness fires, giant monsters
the size of cities, deep storm systems, awesome weather, all kinds
of PK, over five hundred zones, many god-run quests, AutoQuests,
dragonlairs, dragonhunters, serpenthunters, Master Heroes, multi-
level requirements, trading with covered wagons, wagon trains,
mules, and ships, and politics, with a new governor elected every
month to help run the game. We have all the normal things like 
flying, mounts, formations, hero battles, custom prompts, and more.

We are about to open clan businesses, where clans hire workers to
work real active zones, like mines and farms, in our wilderness. We
will soon open Abodes where the deepest bloodlines get everything
from huts to large castles, complete with MobFactions and roads.

The Medievia wilderness and ocean are alive and dripping with
adventure!

Do You Dare Enter?

Mud         : Dark-Legacy (Dark Legacy)
Code Base   : [Smaug] Jade (Based on Smaug v1.4)
Telnet      : dark-legacy.com 9898 [63.77.145.125]
WWW         : http://www.dark-legacy.com/
Description :

  Dark Legacy is a mud with a Smaug feel, specialised in player customisation without 
administrator intervention. The game administrators limit themselves to implementing 
and problem solving, taking a much less dominant position in player affairs other than 
the Occasional quest.
 
- Combat; Extended combat system, Range & Opponent size based.
- Multicasting; Play up to three character classes.
- Epic Levels; Ascend as a god. Infinite levelling.
- Glory; Buy character or your item enhancements
- Magic; combine runes to tailor and name your own spells, scrolls and potions.
- Pets; Hatch, name, train and level your pets, ranging from Hamsters to Dragons.
- Socket Weapons; Socket spell runes for special powers.
- Factions; Found a guild and build your own guild house.
- Castles; Buy a plot of land and add rooms, serfs, traps and furniture.
- Shops; Make a profit from surplus equipment.
- Storage; Buy Houses and Banks for equipment storage.
- Crafts; mine, blacksmith, tailor, carpent and invent.
- Salvage; Gather and craft resources. Pink dragon scale armour? Its possible!
- Re-forge; Want a Mithrill cuirass? Re-forge your iron one!
- Books; Write books and see them appear all over the game.
- Vampirism; Contract Vampirism, gain access to vampire skills and spells.
- Site; Java + Windows client available, also has a Forum + Manual.

Mud         : END-OF-LINE
Code Base   : [LP] Amylaar
Telnet      : linkwarriors.wilkerstaff.com 4000 [208.233.223.2]
WWW         : None
Description :

  END-OF-LINE is based on the film TRON. But it begins where the film
ends. The Blue programs have just managed to break the MCP's strangle hold,
but there are still pockets of Red programs resisting. The MUD is
based on the war between these two sides. You can choose which side to
join, and what role to play in each army.-----There are two main roles: 
generals and troops. The generals manage troops and resources, transport 
them between areas, and decide which areas should be attacked. The 
troops fight individual battles. There are NPC generals and troops on both 
sides, as well as interactive generals and troops.  These players can join 
and leave at their leisure.-----The distinguishing thing about the MUD is
that it involves 3 levels of play, which interact: (LEVEL 1) is involves playing a
general managing resources in a war. This is very strategic and is like Chess
but more closesly like X-battle. (LEVEL 2) involves commanding troops in a
battle. This is like a game of Command and Conquer, you can see a map
with the troops and position them. (LEVEL 3) involves close range fighting.
This is the level which players familiar to Player Killing will recognise.
It is likeplaying a shoot-em up like DOOM.

Mud         : Transformers: Decepticon Dominion
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH 1.7.4
Telnet      : bb13.betterbox.net 1999 [209.83.132.90]
WWW         : http://www.plumed-serpent.com/tfdd.html
Description :

  Decepticon Dominion plays out a sweeping tale of Transformer history,
starting from familiar ground on mid-1980's Earth and continuing beyond all
usual limits, with much room along the way for innovation and exploration.
This universe is firmly grounded in the pre-Movie cartoons, and
characterizations are true to those given on the show.  Excellent characters
from other eras and universes are also present, to give the best possible
mix of the greatest of the Decepticons. Can a single-faction MUSH capture
the drama and conflict inherent to Transformers? Definitely. Decepticon
interactions among themselves are every bit as fascinating, perhaps more so,
than the usual Decepticon/Autobot conflict - because there's forever a fine
balance between the sense of team loyalty and the continued drive to better
oneself. A one faction Mush eliminates the need to maintain an artificially
static environment between two sides, where neither can truly advance, let
alone triumph. Here, this question will be explored - what *would* the
Decepticons do after vanquishing their long-time enemies? The universe
itself lies open.

We're a role-playing based MUSH with some combat RP. We focus on character
interaction and living not only the life of a character but an entire team.
We have regular planned events every Saturday at 5pm EST and RP during the
week is encouraged. We have a lot of great Decepticon characters open for
applications and we accept orignal apps as well. News files and character
profiles can be found at http://www.plumed-serpent.com/tfdd.html

Mud         : Miami by Night
Code Base   : TinyMUSH 2.2.3 (custom mods)
Telnet      : 67.40.220.113 8250
WWW         : http://miamibynight.mymush.com
Description :

   Miami by Night, up since January of 1997, is a World of Darkness(tm)
MUSH set in Miami, Florida, in the first decade of the 21st Century. We
support the following second edition systems: Vampire: The Masquerade(tm),
Mage: The Ascension(tm), and Werewolf: The Apocalypse(tm). 

   Our Staff prides itself on its fairness, and players can be assured
that the rules are enforced equally. Each player is just as important as
every other player and staff will not step in to retcon or rewrite scenes to
benefit any particular player's 'story' over another's. If you like a game
where scenes are not prescripted and you will not be prevented from action
as long as you have IC justification, then Miami may be the place for you.

   There are no quotas for Supers (vampires, shifters, mages, etc.) on
Miami by Night in order to give players the chance to play the type of
character they want, although each player is restricted to one Super. Mortal
character creation uses Mortal Peer stats, meaning a starting stats mortal
has the same starting attributes and abilities as a neonate vampire.
Transfer characters from other MUSHes in the same general timeline are
accepted, provided we can verify stats. More information on character
creation and transfer can be found on our web site or by logging into
Miami by Night.

Here at Seasons of Almadyn strive to be as detailed as possible,
offering quests in every area, and a full scale world map
check it out if you feel you are up for the challenge.
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
The land of Thaelurium, many ages ago, was ruled by the mighty 
Uriem. They battled eachother for sole domination of the land 
and created the mortal races to aid them in this cause. In the
end, the battle was lost for all and all Uriem where imprisoned 
deep in bowels of the land. However their magical war left the
time discontinued in the land, and seasons have frozen in 
different areas. Only in the center of the land, where the city
of Almadyn is located, have the seasons continued steadily. 
This is the setting around which this mud is based. We have
different parts of the world with varying themes. In general
we strive to be a newbie friendly mud while we make sure there
are a multitude of challenges left for the seasoned adventurer.
Seasons of Almadyn is *not* currently open for play, but Beta
testing will begin within the next 12 months (approximately). 
We strive to create the most balanced gameplay ever devised in
a text-based game. We also offer a high-quality playing 
environment and lush history for the player that seeks to 
roleplay or really get into the inner workings of the storyline.

Mud         : Continents Mud
Code Base   : [Envy] 2.0, Rom 2.4b, plus 9 years of our own coding
Telnet      : continentsmud.com 5050 [63.117.93.2]
WWW         : http://www.continentsmud.com/
Description :

Continents is an adventure type mud in a Medieval/Fantasy theme. We 
have HnS, but there are many things that require interacting with 
other players too. If you need to eat, either make your own food (if 
you know how) or find someone to buy it from. Would you like a pet? 
Find a friendly neighborhood ranger type to tame a wild beast for 
you. There is no xp for killing, xp is only awarded for doing. Smack 
a mob, get some xp; cook a bowl of soup, get some xp; forge a sword, 
get some xp. 

Most of our areas are exclusive to Continents. There are some stock 
areas but none of the stock areas are original. Stock areas have been 
resequenced, restructured, and reconnected to fit in properly with 
the surrounding landscape and Continents theme.

there. Said to be human, he is a sorcerer so old his name has

distant plane, he gathers to him an army of the Sworn.

dwellings. Secretive cults plot the revival and the 
destruction of the dead god. Others struggle merely to 
survive. The underside is a place of graves, monsters, and 
the undead. The interior has rotted away into the seeds
of a new material plane, where nature takes its course.

Ark of Fools MUX is a tabletop-style game, with players
meeting at regular times. We use the D&D 3E game system 
(playing it by the book except for the setting).

you are interested and can make those times, please come and

Description :

Mirkwood stared in 1995 and is still going strong. Famous for its social
atmosphere, its inspired areas, and its professional coding, Mirkwood
is a dynamic and active MUD undergoing almost daily code modifications.
Recently, the coders implemented an original remorting system and added
six new classes. But the largest recent change was a complete remapping of
the world that involved splitting the land into two continents and creating
an extensive road system. Mirkwood's original and extremely powerful object,
room, and mob scripts aid builders in creating immersive areas, many of which
are based on the writings of Tolkien. However, Mirkwood's player and immortals
are far too eclectic to stick to one theme. The battle-scarred moon Daktor,
the red-neck Trailer Park, the magic-loathing city of Pelios, the vast and
deadly Ocean, and scores of other areas all await the stalwart adventurer.
Mirkwood's custom-designed area builder (Mac/Win) supports the continuous
development of new areas. If you love the community of your fellows, join
one of Mirkwood's eight tribes, which have huge castles and keeps; their
own channels; custom time and weather messages; internal security; shops
for armor, weapons, food, and tokens; recall rooms; healers, trainers, and
guild masters; and access to a tribal arena.

                -----------------------------------------------

Telnet      : hrmud.com 4000 [12.150.81.216]

Mud         : Land of the Lost Unicorn
Code Base   : [Rom] 2.3 Heavily Modified
Telnet      : lostunicorn.org 1701 [216.42.73.41]
WWW         : http://lostunicorn.org/
Description :

   Land of the Lost Unicorn places a priority on friendliness and enjoyment
of a mudding atmosphere by combining the benefits of roleplaying and combat.
The immortals of this realm try their best to be responsive to the players
by listening to complaints and ideas. Most ideas or proposed changes get
implemented if they are found beneficial to the entire mud. The players are
cordial and happy, and often communicate extensively on our many channels.

   LUN, as it is called for short, offers 12 races and 12 classes and a
variety of features too numerous to name. If there is a feature you want that
we don't have, please feel free to let us know! We have left the original
customization in, though most prefer to use the base skills and spells each
class has in. We also offer an alternative mud school for players who are
familiar with the rom code, as well as offer the stock mud school for new
mudders to learn from. We are in the process of adding new original areas
to eliminate the stock to give known mudders new lands to explore.

   One thing that we do pride ourselves on is our complete and up-to-date help
files. This makes us a good choice for new mudders and those who are sick of
having to ask about everything. There is also a question/answer channel on the
mud for questions that you can't answer through help files.

   LUN has a religion system of nine separate religions, each is led by a
fellow player, and follows a mythical god and ethos.

Mud         : Hexahedron
Code Base   : [Rom] With Many Enhancements
Telnet      : hexahedron.genesismuds.com 1414 [216.136.9.8]
WWW         : http://hexahedron.genesismuds.com
Description :

  Hexahedron is a large and mostly original world. It supports
ANSI color. We have no set theme. It does boast a high fantasy,
sword and sorcery setting, filled with Elves, Giants, Dragons and
the occasional Cyborg, plus much more. We support a 3 remort,
which includes special races and classes set aside for the final
remort. The arena/quest system has several facets, gives players
much to do and accomplish while venturing the by ways of
Hexaherdon.

  Many Quest masters are scattered about the world. There are quests/trivia
games sponsored by the helpful immortal staff. In the Mob Arena
players can enter the arena , try their skill against randomly
generated mobiles, and gain re- ward for their expertise. The
Grand Arena allows Hero level players to enter into a tournament
style combat. The standard Arena has been expanded and filled
with items that could be of use. We support 3 modes, Team, Clan,
and Single combat. Immortals can use areas of the world for the staging of
war, giving non-playerkillers the experience of a player killer
without actually being a player killer and with out fear of loss
in experience or equipment.

  Randomly generated equipment like those found in Diablo/D II, Nethac
and Angband. A fully functioning clan system that allows for players to create
and maintain/expand their own. A starvation system that makes the need for food
and drink a must. Quest point system includes Trash Points, Mystery Tickets,
and ImmQuest points. Come Play and ENJOY!

A Moment in Tyme (MiT) is one of the oldest Wheel of Time 
based Muds on the Internet.  Since 1994, our coders and 
builders have been working hard to bring in unique new 
features and our own original areas.  MiT is currently on 
our second major revision of the codebase, and our areas 
are all completely original.  At A Moment in Tyme, we have 
a dedicated playerbase and an excellent, committed staff of 
Immortals.  We have unique systems in place to rank 
players' mastery in swordplay and channeling (Wheel of 
Time's magic system).

the Wheel of Time series), MiT focuses extensively on Roleplay.

*Finding the Bowl of Winds.

Mud         : Metro: Toronto by Night
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH version 1.7.4 patchlevel 10
Telnet      : metro.spork.com 4201 [209.25.0.211]
WWW         : http://www.geocities.com/deweyq/
Description :

  Deep within the black obelisks thrusting upwards into the bitterly cold night
a small fire burns in a rusted out garbage can, casting dim halos of orange
light on the damp asphalt. Hands raised over the meager heat, a multitude of
wretched forms shiver as tattered wet clothes cling to their bodies, leeching
the strength from even the hardiest. Nearby, in a small park a tiny child looks
out into the shadows, her vision blurred by tears, desperately searching for
her mother. A flicker of movement catches her attention and she looks up to see
the bushes at the edge of the clearing part. Her scream echoes through the open
window of a luxurious basement apartment. There is no one to answer her cries
for help. A crumpled body leans heavily against the desk, an expanding pool of
blood staining the immaculate Armani suit and the letter clutched in a hand
white as ash.
 
Note: Applications required for non-Mortal characters.

Come to Metro, where the story -- as dark as it may be -- is the most
important part of the online experience.

Description :

We've had several exciting new developments on the Cleft of
Dimensions! First off, we've got a whole new set of classes for
you to play around with. The new roster is Knight, Warrior, Thief,
Wizard, Priest, Geomancer, and Summoner. Each class plays differently,
so there should be a fun class for everybody. And maybe even more
exciting than that - the Cleft of Dimensions supports sound now!
Go to our website and download the GMud sound trigger pack, and
you can listen to the Cleft of Dimensions while you play! Exciting?
Of course it is!

The Cleft of Dimensions has existed as the ever-present space between
worlds. In Final Fantasy 5, Gilgamesh was banished to the cleft by
Exdeath, and in Final Fantasy 8, Odin's sword Ragnarok slipped into
his hands.  Using the Ragnarok, Gilgamesh cut through the fabric of
the Cleft of Dimensions and was able to travel freely through it.
His actions tore the fabric of space-time, causing cosmic disturbances.
Portions of various dimensions fall through and into the cleft in
chaotic fashion.  The worlds of Final Fantasy, Seiken Densetsu, Mario
RPG, Infocom, and many other RPGs combine in the Cleft of Dimensions,
a world populated by creatures from video games and anime.  With a
wide background, there is something for every wannabe adventurer in
the Cleft of Dimensions!
