Mud         : Mozart MUD
Code Base   : [Silly] +14 years of development
Telnet      : mozartmud.com 4500 [69.220.173.202]
WWW         : http://www.mozartmud.com
Description :

 Mozart is one of the oldest, most developed muds on the net. Our
world has over 28,000 rooms in 200 zones among three major areas.
The Surface is the largest and most newbie-friendly. Beneath, the
svirfneblin city Galtherdelve and the drow city of Aluhryn in the
Underdark are more dangerous, and player-killing is legal.

 Mozart is rent-free. While in other muds it may cost you gold to
keep your items, here we make our players want to play instead of
punishing them for being away. Further, we use a percentage-based
loading system instead of object limits, so it's impossible for a
small number of players to hoard all the best equipment.

 All the major features of mud clients, including aliases, speed-
walking, and command history, are provided by the game itself, so
all our players - even those on telnet - are on an equal footing.

 Mortals may advance to level 99 in 14 different classes and more
than 400 different skills, spells, and specializations (which are
similar to D20-system feats). After 99th, there are eleven avatar
levels each with a skill, spell, or power specific to each class.

 Mozart's code is very stable and very highly featured. We rarely
go less than two weeks between reboots. Crashes are rare, and new
code is well-tested before it gets anywhere near our players.

 Immortals have access to full OLC including every feature we can
think of, all the way up to LP-mud style scripting. If you have a
new idea, we'll work to make it possible.

 We welcome all comers, new and old. See you online!

WWW         : http://www.mud2.com/
Description :

   This is the latest incarnation of Richard Bartle's MUD2. MUD2 is
the direct descendant of the _original_ MUD, as developed by Richard
Bartle and others at Essex University, England, in 1978.

The stated goal for this site is to provide a stable, long-standing
home for MUD2 players around the world. The game is available for a
low monthly subscription fee which helps cover the costs and the
effort associated with software development and system maintenance.

MUD2.COM is operated by Viktor T. Toth, aka Viktor the arch-wizard,
who was also an arch-wizard on the Kesmai and NVN incarnations of
the game. Players of CompuServe's British Legends (BL) know him as
MrSpock the wizard.

Mud         : New Boston 2025
Code Base   : [MUX]
Telnet      : newboston.mushpark.com 2025 [216.235.252.225]
WWW         : http://www.newboston.mushpark.com/
Description :

  A terrible plague killed about 97% of the world’s population
in 2009. Now, almost 20 years later, Boston Massachusetts has
become a major metropolis populated by survivors. The control of
the government and their propaganda are impossible to escape.
Travel to and from the other few populated areas of the United
States is dangerous and deadly.


  The Reformed Republic now mainly consists of three rebuilt
cities; New Boston, New Providence and New Hartford. Within the
game setting, most people crowd in the center city, New Boston,
and enjoy the comforts of technology and the protection of the
military. The less fortunate must scrape a living in the
outskirts, living without electrical power or the benefits of law
enforcement. The contrast is sharp, but nothing is ever in black
and white.

Mud         : MUME - Multi Users In Middle Earth
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Dikumud I derived
Telnet      : mume.org 23 [129.241.210.221]
WWW         : http://mume.org
Description :

MUME is a free multi user role-playing game based upon 
J.R.R. Tolkien's 'Middle Earth' that has been continuously 
running since fall '91.
 
The action takes place in the late Third Age, before 'The 
Hobbit' and after the loss of the One Ring by Sauron. The 
key of Erebor was just found by Gandalf and all the epic 
tales narrated in 'The Lord of the Rings' may take place.
 
MUME covers 21'000+ original rooms from the mighty Dwarven
Halls beyond the Gulf of Lhûn in the West to the fringes of
Mirkwood in the East, and from the ruins of Fornost in the
North to the fortress of Isengard in the South. In this
meticulously crafted world where fantasy tales come to life
players may join the War between the forces of the Dark Lord
and the armies of the West.
 
MUME VIII is written in C and in mudlle (a functional 
language that was developed in order to allow on-line 
extensions to the game).

Mud         : Realms of Chaos
Code Base   : [LP] ChaosLib 1.0/Nightmare 3.2
Telnet      : realmsofchaos.com 3456 [209.223.145.189]
WWW         : http://www.realmsofchaos.com
Description :

  Realms of Chaos, also known as RoC, is an extremely
challenging, thoroughly engrossing reality. From the
moment you set foot in the Realms, you will be enchanted
by the vivid, full ansi color descriptions, and the 
highly intricate, refreshingly logical and internally 
consistent structure to an extent which you have 
undoubtedly never before experienced.

Realms of Chaos runs on its own machine and connection,
and is incredibly well-balanced and fair.  Anti-cheating
rules are actually enforced.  You can therefore be proud
of your achievements on RoC, as people do not gain levels
by exploiting bugs or imbalances.

RoC is a challenging mud.  Those looking for a place they
can become powerful overnight will be disappointed. 
However, it is the perfect mud for someone looking to 
earn their levels, and to be able to take pride in making 
it to High Mortal, because it is not something just anyone 
can do.

When you check out RoC for yourself, you will see a well 
developed fantasy world that has room for humor and 
parody.  It is not just a mud; to those who know it, it is 
another dimension.

Mud         : Mutatis Mutandis MUX
Code Base   : [MUX] TinyMUX 1.4
Telnet      : mux.mutatismutandis.org 4520 [199.181.141.12]
WWW         : http://www.mutatismutandis.org
Description :

 Mutatis Mutandis MUX is an online roleplaying game based in
the Marvel Comics universe focusing on the characters and
themes in the family of X-Men comic books. Game continuity 
began with the ending of the Muir Island Saga and 'Too Many
Mutants' genesis of the blue and gold X-Men teams and the 
re-formation of X-Factor. Feature characters are given 
leeway on how they are worked into the existing story. We 
allow original non-feature characters of your own design. 
While the game is primarily a superheroes themed, it is just
as common for people from other worlds, universes, of other
races and times to show up. Characters are limited only by
game balance and your imagination.

The MUX itself has extensively soft-coded features to 
assist with gameplay and an expansive IC world in which to 
roleplay. For much much more information about the MUX, 
visit us online or on the web.

Mud         : Myrradel
Code Base   : [Envy] Heavily, heavily, heavily modified UltraEnvy mud.
Telnet      : myrradel.com 4000 [216.218.224.14]
WWW         : http://myrradel.ocliw.com/myrradel/
Description :

Based on a highly modified UltraEnvy codebase.  Includes an
INTENSE combat system, 15 unique and varied classes, a 
subclass system to further individualize your character, 
and many, many races with strengths, weaknesses and racial 
bonuses.  There are 60 character levels and Player rolled 
statistics, an active, all-playerkiller/playertheft system, 
and there is an advanced clan/guild system run completely 
by players.  Clan interaction is a major focus in the 
player environment.  There is a clanrights system, allowing 
you to give each member specific rights and duties, and 
ClanAreas allow clans to claim various areas on the mud, 
and to receive bounty from their claims.

There are interactive quests and quest equipment, 
'intelligent' mobs that adapt to player actions, and 
hundreds of unique skills and spells.
Most importantly, Gods don't interfere in play, mortals are 
left alone with their affairs.
Extremely fast system (multiple T1 connections to the 
Internet), full online building/editing capabilities, full 
alias/macro system for keyboard shortcuts, and customizable 
prompts and colors.

Mud         : Mystic
Code Base   : [LP] Heavily Modified
Telnet      : mysticmud.com 23 [198.22.109.62]
WWW         : http://www.mysticmud.com
Description :

One of the oldest MUDs around - founded 1991 - Mystic prides itself on being extremely newbie-friendly.

Our players and immortals are great people, and the community is one of the best things about Mystic.
Many, but not all, of our realms are fantasy-themed.

Players can found their own clans, and are also involved as class guildmasters. Each class has a unique set of skills or spells, and we periodically add more. There are huge areas to explore, and you'll never lack for challenges.

We allow registered player killing only. If you like it, have at it! If you don't, you're entirely safe. Not a PK fan, but want to beat on your buddies anyway? There's an arena where you can do battle at no loss of XP. We have MUD-wide team wars as well, where everyone fights and no one loses anything.

Come join an extremely newbie-friendly MUD and find adventure, friendship and mystery. Check us out today!

by four French Canadians, it has a unique flavor but is an American
mud.  We have been known to many as one of the best Merc type muds
around.  Special guides and areas are available for new players and
fair play is enforced.  Over 22000 rooms and 240 areas, with a richly
entailed world including clans and sophisticated thief poison systems
means never being bored.  We are base of 100 levels with special areas
and perks for those who reach the top and are awarded HERO status.

advancement to imm level. Quests and sieges are routinely run and
the primary goal is to make playing here a challenging and fun
experience.  Many players have been here for years testifying to
the quality of our mud.

 Gate Crashers setting is sci-fi, with travel throughout
the Solar System made possible by the Gate Consortium. 

Gate Crashers is a game with a well-developed theme that
allows characters from multiple settings.  Characters can
be derived from sci-fi, fantasy, anime, comic books, and
other sources.  Chargen is through a concept application
process and a free form trait system.  No numbers, no
dice, just descriptions that the players can decide on and
use.

player interaction, and conflicts between the people of
the Solar System, the governments and factions, and the
'gate crashers' that have arrived over the years from

Mud         : HavenMUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH, Coded to be user friendly.
Telnet      : havenmush.ath.cx 3939 [62.253.133.120]
WWW         : http://havenmush.ath.cx/
Description :

          Forum: http://forum.havenmush.ath.cx/

 Imagine, if you will, a land of ancient heroes and gods, a
land where adventure is never far off, a land where you will meet
the exotic, the brave and the wise. Then you have found Haven,
the realm of the Celtic gods and land where all your dreams and
nightmares can come true.

  Central to Haven is Avalon, where the gods reside and the
living walk with the dead. It is a place where people from many
realms meet where new adventures can be sought, for in its center
resides the Henge.

  The Henge, made up of many stone blocks and covered with
ancient Ogham writings, has stood for all time. Between each
block a portal resides and by simply stepping through you can
find yourself in one of many wonderful realms. Lands of
adventure, intrigue, learning, sex, bondage, riches and much more
await. Why not come and visit Haven and discover what secrets it
holds as well as what secrets lie within yourself?

  Haven is an adult MUSH based loosely on Celtic myth and
legend. Its central area Avalon is a place from where you can
meet other people and indulge in roleplay or casual conversation.
But from the Henge you can go to many different realms and
experience a wide wealth of roleplay and adventure. It is both a
place for normal roleplay and sexual roleplay, so it is strictly
for those over 18 years old as it is very common to come across
sex, bondage, slavery and many other adult actitivities. It also
welcomes all orientations, whether
straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender or anything else.

  Come visit us and enjoy the many places you can go and people
you can talk to or roleplay with.

Mud         : Panic Mud
Code Base   : [Envy] heavily modified
Telnet      : panic.et.tudelft.nl 4000 [130.161.36.86]
WWW         : http://panic.et.tudelft.nl/~mud/
Description :

  PaNiC has 100 mortal levels. At levels 75 and 100 a player
can choose to restart as a different base class (at level
25 or 40), or can choose to specialize in any of his/her
previous classes for another 25 levels.

Some statistics:
42 Channels, 160 Classes, 46 Planes (Including Layers,
Realms and Demi-planes), 337 races (Including 28 Dragons,
36 Fiends, 21 Elementals, 24 Giants), 602 Skills (Including
107 Languages, 47 Weaponproficincies, 9 Songs, 20
Breathweapons, 256 Spells).

PK in PaNiC is restricted to registered players. Winning a
pk battle will increase your PK-Status. When the status
difference is too high, the higher status player cannot
attack the lower one.

PaNiC uses a prototype flag system so mortals can build
areas online.

Since some networks restrict access to port 4000, PaNiC
also listens for connections on port 8080.

Mud         : New Moon
Code Base   : [LP] LPMud
Telnet      : eclipse.cs.pdx.edu 7680 [131.252.208.48]
WWW         : http://eclipse.cs.pdx.edu/
Description :

   New Moon is a world where epic tales of medieval fantasy are made.
Everything you ever wanted from a MUD is here - rich location descriptions,
interesting characters to meet, terrifying monsters to battle with, intriguing
magic and mind-bending quests! New Moon's creative team have painstakingly
created a realistic and engrossing medieval-fantasy environment for you to
explore. Emphasis is on making a believable world with plenty of character
development and interaction. New Moon features an original and innovative
skills and training system, fabulous magic and spells and a myriad of
special abilities including herbalism, boating, mining and metalcrafting.

   We are a sociable, newbie-friendly MUD and you will find the players
and staff welcoming and helpful. Roleplaying is highly encouraged. It can be a
complex game, but it isn't daunting and we make it as easy as possible to get
into your stride. Players can choose from 10 races and 11 guilds to join: 3
magical, 3 priestly, fighters, rangers, Chaos Knights, merchants and thieves.
The game world is vast but not made that way by filling the world with spartan
locations - there is attention to detail at every turn. It encompasses several
cities (from western medieval to oriental in flavour), a myriad of towns and
villages and many varied and intriguing wilderness locations. New Moon prides
itself in its extensive range of quests and there are now well over 150 in
the game, ranging from the newbie-friendly to the fiendishly mind-bending!

chatting in German is possible.

   Nightfall is based on a fantasy setting, with a dream world for all
sorts of queer ideas. Currently there are about 70 quests,
13 races and 9 classes. Nightfall was founded in December 1990
and now consists of about 100 MBytes of mudlib source code.

Mud         : Nightmare LPMud
Code Base   : [LP] Nightmare Mudlib
Telnet      : nightmare.imaginary.us 1701 [209.98.204.6]
WWW         : http://nightmare.imaginary.us
Description :

   Nightmare is a virtual fantasy society.  The goal of the game 
is what you make it. If you like hack-n-slash, then you can
play as a mighty fighter, or if its harmony you seek, a 
cleric is your calling. Nightmare has 8 classes to chose from: 
bard, cleric, fighter, fisher, kataan, mage, monk, and rogue.  
Your advancement on Nightmare is determined not by how many 
monsters you kill, but instead how you perform as a member of 
your chosen class.  The option to multi-class is available for those 
who desire multiple skills.

Of course, you must always watch out for death.  Unlike other muds, 
however, death on Nightmare takes you to the Underworld, the domain 
of the undead.  You may seek out resurrection and return to the realm 
of the living, or instead risk permanent death and play the game as a 
member of the undead. 

Other features include: 19 player races, languages, optional quests, an 
expansive help system, limb-oriented combat. Finally, Nightmare runs 
on a machine bought with player dollars so Nightmare will always have 
a site.

enjoy the thrill of a more lively opponent. That said,
there are also NPC's that are almost alive, to where some
players mistake them for other players.

copy it in whole or part, sometimes using less than
honest means to do so. But there can be no true copy,
don't accept an imitation when only the original will

Mud         : NoMUD
Code Base   : [Circlemud] CircleMUD, version 3.00, 6 years of modifications
Telnet      : nomud.dune.net 4097 [63.117.93.2]
WWW         : http://nomud.dune.net
Description :

  NoMUD is a Circle MUD 3.0.  It's a user-friendly,
restricted pkill, no psteal mud.  It features: 1) a helpful
staff 2) bunches of cool players (if you like to chat)
3) 100 mortal levels, and 4) the remort command.  Remort allows
the player to remort himself without the aid of an Immortal. 
What is remort, you ask? Once you reach level 100 you can
become level 1 again, with EITHER a class OR a race change,
and 3 points to use to increase your stats. NoMUD has tons
of different zones for anyone, ranging from the level 1
newbie, to the 20th time remort, and both will find their
respective zones a challenge!

We continue to work on a new version which will include 
a more race-based system with class-style learning of spells 
and skills. We expect to launch this one in the upcoming months 
and keep all muds running.  So, drop by and check us out.

Mud         : Basternae: Phoenix Rising
Code Base   : [Envy] Heavily Custom Magma
Telnet      : 131.128.194.236 6666
WWW         : http://www.basternae-mud.com
Description :

The lands of Basternae are ravaged by three warring factions (1) the
surface dwellers, (2) the denizens of the Underdark, (3) and the 
Enslavers, comprised of the powerful Illithids.  Basternae has many 
well honed features including:
 
 - 75000 rooms (25000 Areas, 43000 Surface Map, 7000 Underdark Maps).
 - 25 player selectable races.
 - 21 player classes.
 - Over 600 spells.
 - Almost 250 skills.
 - Player owned warships.
 - Player owned houses.
 - Player clans /w clan constructed clan halls.
 - We would like to see more roleplay, come form your own role 
   playing clan.
 
The story of the world of Basternae is a simple one, but that makes 
it noless tragic.  The world is shattered, effectively split in two 
between the surface world and that of the Underdark, a massive 
collections of caves and tunnels that runs underground.  On the 
surface, the Overlend races make their homes, while the Horde races 
either choose or are forced to live in the dangerous Underdark.  For 
all of recorded history, the Overlend and Horde races have been at 
war.  Armies march forward to combat, one side wins and slays the 
other, then is destroyed itself by another army.  It is a vicious 
cycle of warfare and neither side seems inclined to put a stop to it. 
The Overlend races talk of peace, but it's a peace that would cost 
the lives of all unclean or unpure races of the dark.  The Horde races
know only war, trained from birth to live in hostile environments.  
Horrible creatures make their homes in the Underdark, more than 
willing to kill any victims for food or sport, but it's just as likely
a young Horde member will find himself dead from the blade of one of 
his kin.
 
It's the world of Basternae, where reflexes and fighting skills are 
constantly honed to perfection, where adventure waits around every 
corner, and death can lurk behind even the most friendly of faces.  
It's a world of combat and destruction, where fame and fortune go to 
the aggressive and the meek get stomped into the ground.
 
Whether banding together with members of your faction to repel an 
invasion, or raiding rival hometowns, to simply grouping with 
guildmembers to conquer planar zones or mud-wide quests, Basternae 
offers multiple challenges.  Many players are often found sailing 
vast oceans in warships.

 
So roll your character and join the side of your choosing, maybe YOU 
can turn the tides of war!!

Mud         : Lost Dragon Chronicles
Code Base   : [Unknown]
Telnet      : mudhost.com 4019
WWW         : http://
Description :

  Dragonlance, Forgotten realms based mud with unique classes,
skills, leveling, questing,heart thumping war and fusion systems.

  Classes are fully flexible(you can customize your skills
completely through
learning books, and can forget books if you wish to learn 
something else.)That is why we are special.
  You dont choose your class in the beginning and follow
throughout,without chance for change.

  The leveling system extends to 50, but upon reaching level 50,
you gain the ability to fuse(with another player) and restart at
level 5. This will increase your generation and give you another
level of expertise in all of your practiced skills.During fusion
any of the other players limbs and/or genes can be transferred to
you and vice versa, but be careful, genes can also be lost.

With the exception of standard weapon attacks, combat and 
spell casting time is not randomised, you employ full control
of when you cast the next spell or strike the next hit through
our unique action point system.

Play in your world, this world, in our future, which we ourselves have
destroyed. And whatever is left of it... is up for the taking.

millions, not thousands. The new version has oceans, an overlapping
world with no borders, and of course, more rooms.
* Build your own military base with dozens of building types and
different technology trees. Gather weapons, vehicles, bombs and armor
and use it to destroy other people or capture their technologies. The
new version features ships and boats, a new vehicle code and buying
code in general.
* Spend your spare time upgrading your stuff, the new version
features twice the building levels and complete building
customization.
* A money-based economy - buy your guns and vehicles, work for cash,
invest in banks or steal from others.
* Still has great usage of MCCP, MXP and MSP. Hear that gun firing,
or the dreaded sound of an empty clip... Right-click on map items to
see a description and command shortcuts, or download the image pack.

ASSAULT: 3.0, unlike the previous version, focuses more on the
defensive aspect of the game rather than easy kills. Breaching a
base will require more tactics and skill, and nothing is ever the
same.

You just have to stop by.

just after the events of Batman: Fugitive, Bruce Wayne has been cleared of 
murder charges and has returned to his normal life by day and by night. We 
are a consentual Roleplay enviroment focusing on the day to day life of the 
residents of Gotham City and Bludhaven. The game is low technology and 
power levels and players both FC and OC are kept to a level playing field.

leave hooks for inclusion in TPs and everyday RP.

If interested in FCs there are over 100 FCs available to choose from 
including Batman, Nightwing, Robin, Batgirl, Azrael, Birds of Prey and 
other DC titles. Original Characters are welcome and encouraged.

RP are only limited by your own imagination, your character's setup and the 
guidelines of consentual RP.

   Overdrive is a vast realm of high-medieval fantasy, filled
with mythical creatures of all shapes and sizes; enchanted
weapons; puzzling, sometimes maddening quests and a
population of over 1300 active players. 

Since its humble beginnings in 1991, OD has evolved into a
complex and coherent world, where muscle and magic, brawn
and brains merge, striving for experience, growth and fun.

players has given us a keenly trained and highly dedicated 
player population, and it is not uncommon for players to 
launch successive careers in several classes.

formation and just plain silliness (OD pioneered year-round
snowball fights and the infamous mage 'singalong' spell)
are hallmarks of gaming on Overdrive.

Mud         : Dark Between The Stars
Code Base   : [MUSH] TinyMUSH 3.0
Telnet      : dark.mushpark.com 4999 [216.235.252.225]
WWW         : None
Description :

  It is the year 4999, and humanity struggles to recover from a New Dark Age.
Society is gripped by fear, uncertainty and superstitious as even the most
learned quake in fear the approaching end times. The very suns themselves
are fading in the sky as each year the tapestry of stars grows dimmer.

Yet among all this there is cause for hope. After a thousand years of war 
and interregnum there is an Emperor, and on the day of his coronations 
soothsayers across the known worlds say a new star was born. He has sent 
out his knights to quest after the cause of the stars' fading, to seek out 
new worlds and uncover old mysteries. At long last, humanity has heroes 
once again.

The universe of Fading Suns is a bold science fiction drama of hope,
despair and redemption, and Dark Between The Stars MUSH plays out this
interstellar passion play against the backdrop of a desperate frontier
world torn by constant catacylsm. Nobles, Priests and guilders plot, plan
and adventure for wealth, glory and honor as they explore the mysteries of
a changed planet.

Featuring three distinct spheres of RP - intrigue, questing and street
survival - DBTS realizes the award-winning Fading Suns RPG in a setting its
designers created for just the sorts of stories we want to tell. With 
exhaustive setting files and a helpful staff, even novices to the theme can
get up to speed and RPing without any hitches.

Mud         : Paradox
Code Base   : [Merc] Heavily Modified
Telnet      : mud.pacific.net.au 9000 [61.8.3.31]
WWW         : None
Description :

 PARADOX MUD has been actively developed since early 1996 with an
extremely large and well balanced selection of skills, spells,
races and classes now well established.
 
The input/output system for the game has been designed using
best usability practices. We have attempted to incorporate a
reasonable information load with a minimum of spam to accomodate
users with special accessability needs.
 
Within the game we support Clans with their own powers, channels
and clanhalls and a peer support Guildmaster system to suggest
changes and refinements to the class system. Random restores and
damage doubling 'boosts' sweep through the world generating
orgies of violence and mayhem and adding the spice of
uncertainty to the gameplay.
 
You can customise your character before stepping into the world,
taking those skills that will best enable you to progress to the
rank of 'Hero', when new and potent powers become available to
you. Beyond the rank of Hero you can become a 'Lord', able to
swap your vital energies back and forth to achieve your own
unique balance of power.
 
When you finally reach your greatest potential as a Lord you can
undergo apotheosis and manifest as a 'Celestial': Demon, Titan
or Angel, making your choice of which new class powers to add to
your already formidable set abilities.

Description :

A new MUD based on the Wheel of Time, The Karaethon Cycle offers
players the opportunity to play crucial roles on the Wheel of Time
and the events leading up to the Last Battle. 
The MUD is still in the development phase, and is currently hiring
both builders and coders. The goal is to have a 100% original world
with a nearly entirely-rewritten codebase. 
It will eventually offer over 50 classes and 50 races from which to
choose from, a the opportunity for multi-classing and remorting, and
an infinite leveling system, as well as an entirely reworked Magic
code in which players will weave various threads of the different
elements together to cast spells. 
Guilds will be run by players and drive RP, and one can expect to
see Clan Warfare arise in the near future.

The MUD is currently open for player-testing, and those that take
part will be amply rewarded when the MUD goes officially public
(rewards which may include levels, equipment, and an automatic
remort). 
If you want a chance to jump into this craze early, and earn
yourself some great rewards in the process, drop on by and you can
help us with player-testing, building, or even coding.

Stop on by, and if you have any questions, feel free to e-mail any
of the Immortals.

-Alaric, the Creator.

they too developed their own resourceful culture, eager

Description :

  JipangMUCK is intended to be a setting for historical Asian
themed fantasy role playing; samurai and ninja, miko and
geisha, honor and vengeance. These, with traces of arcane
magic behind the stranger things going on, are all a part of
what makes its setting. Jipang itself is a small fictional
continent, set in 1864 and located somewhere in the pacific 
ocean around about where Japan is in our world today. Unlike 
Japan during this time period, however, the people of Jipang
are a more open minded lot when it comes to outside people an
cultures, having found much to gain from them in recent
times. There's more info on theme and history on the homepage,
as well as information about the anime/manga series and video
games the muck draws inspiration from.

Mud         : Hercules MUD
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Heavily modified running on FreeBSD
Telnet      : hercmud.net 3000 [68.109.98.253]
WWW         : http://hercmud.net:8080
Description :

Hercules MUD was first created on and named after a 
SUN 3/60 named hercules at the campus of UC Irvine 
on July of 1992. The project was started using original
dikumud code. The mud moved around a bit to include 
a long stint on mudservices (until their odd demise). 
HercMUD is now located in the basement of one of its imps.
Hercules MUD is on code base V (5) now. We have 
gone through several code changes but still maintain 
our original goals to provide a unique, family-oriented, 
friendly, and safe place to relax and enjoy some company, 
whether playing or just hanging out. 

Hercules MUD is a skill and level based MUD. 
It is newbie-friendly with level-based equipment, 
some stock but many unique areas, to include a 
complete Newbie area for beginners. 

Hercules MUD is a heavily modified Circle code 
base which has OLC, DG Scripts, an online mud 
balancing feature that can adjust the mud without 
rebooting, an event system for skills, spells, and fighting, 
an auto-questing feature, a ferry system to get from 
continent to continent and many more unique challenges 
for the player.

Mud         : Powermud
Code Base   : [LP] LPMUD 2.4.5 Heavily Modified
Telnet      : powermud.com 2000 [64.245.50.133]
WWW         : http://www.powermud.com
Description :

   The unique world of PowerMud has been around since May of 1997.  While
PowerMud was in 'Beta' stage for a while, it is currently in 'Open' stage.
The world is over 4000 rooms and is full of exotic and unique settings,
monsters, and items.

   There are Ten different races to choose from, as well as over Twenty
Guilds that you character can join.  The types of Guilds range from
Thieves, Mages, Clerics, Fighters, to other 'non-stock' guilds such as
Assassins, Monks, Merchants, Cultists, and Illusionists.  Having multiple
characters is allowed as well, so you can find a character that suits
you best.

   PowerMud uses a customized Skill system, where experience is gained for
a certain skill by actually performing that skill!  For instance, if your
character can 'hide' in the shadows, practicing doing so will raise your
skill level.  No more dividing up your experience points between non-
related skills!  As for the different skill types, there is a high number
of them, ranging from the normal combat skills (slash, blunt, pierce) to
specialized skills such as 'Advanced Melee', 'Sailing', 'Mercantile',
'Fishing', and 'Mental Attack'.

   The Developers and Players on PowerMud are friendly and easy to get
along with, and the Admins are almost always online to answer any questions
that you may have.  If you log in and experience the unique atmosphere
that is PowerMud, you will surely enjoy it.

Mud         : Promised Land
Code Base   : [Aber] Abermud PL-Dirt (based on C-Dirt 2.3)
Telnet      : bb13.betterbox.net 6715 [209.83.132.90]
WWW         : http://promisedland.betterbox.net/
Description :

         ***NEW:  We now have MUD Sound Protocol Support!***

 Ah the promised land, that fabled destination of the people of Israel led by 
the legendary Moses.  Though the real Moses never got to enter the promised 
land, there is another promised land set in a very different reality of 
fantasy and medievalism...and Moses is a longtime resident.  Beware though, 
the land holds a number of dangers and demons threatening to plunge the 
world into a wilderness of sin.  You have been called forth to become a hero 
and root out the evil forces that pollute the promised land.  Trainers are 
waiting to teach you the arts of fighting and the secrets of magic, deities 
are willing to bless you with gifts that only an immortal can give.  There 
are sixty quests to conquer, three levels of difficulty, and the option of 
levelless mode. You can hack off the limbs of your opponents...or if you 
aren't careful, they can cut yours off too!  And the monsters don't kill 
people in single blows, but a well armed and armored player can take on just 
about any monster in the game at any level. For new players...unlike other 
muds, we don't require you to specify everything about your character up 
front.  You can customize your character at your own leisure during the game 
and not at the login screen.  The tour zone will teach you all the basics 
and the features, and equip you for the early going.  Stuff can be found on 
the ground all over, where you don't have to fight for it--but not always.

Code Base   : [Rom] Heavily Modified

WWW         : http://endlessnight.org
Description :

 Endless Night is a Forgotten Realms based mud set in the
Underdark all areas and game play will take place in this
setting. Choose a race from a quick and cunning Drow to the
large and powerful Quaggoth. Find races here that most 
other Forgotten Realms mud can’t offer you.

Specialization for classes is in! Hate losing your corpse
when you die in a crash?? Not on our mud you won't. Want to
purchase a house to live in? Want to break into someone
else's house you rogue, you? You can do all of that on
Endless Night!

Extensive Mob, Object and Room progs interwoven throughout
most areas make for an out of this realm experience for
everyone, experienced or newbie!
Like Forgotten Realms, the Underdark, friendly people and a
place just to have fun? Come see us you won’t be
disappointed!

Endless Staff

Mud         : Prophecy
Code Base   : [Rom] Modified ROM 2.4
Telnet      : mud.prophecy.lu 4000 [213.166.63.243]
WWW         : http://www.mud.lu/
Description :

 Prophecy has been around since 1995 and is still growing. It is
based on the Belgariad and Mallorean series by David and Leigh
Eddings and runs with a heavily modified ROM 2.4 code with a
lot of unique features such as our clan system and mob-run
Quests.

We are constantly adding new areas based on the Belgariad with
the help of our productive builder staff giving you the feeling
that you are actually walking around in the world the Eddings'
created. New areas are constantly being worked on and we are
always hiring new and capable builders.

Prophecy offers a playerclan system which means that players
are able to band with friends and create their own armies, guilds
or whatever they can think of. The three main clans allow those
who join to fight for the Western of Eastern armies for supremacy
or for the infamous Bearcult to try and revive Aloria.

We also offer three different types of Quest systems. Autoquests,
mob-run quests and immortal-run quests. They are quite different
and provide the players with all sorts of entertainment. Ever
fancied playing a game of soccer in the capital of Sendaria? Join
us and you can!

Interested? Come join us as a foul and evil Murgo, or a sneaky
Drasnian spy and explore the world of the Belgariad.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Age of Destiny: La Resureccion
Code Base   : [Circlemud] EmpireMUD AD
Telnet      : aod.empiremud.com 2200 [67.14.171.37]
WWW         : http://empiremud.com/
Description :

Age of Destiny: La Resurreccion is an EmpireMUD run by the people who
wrote the EmpireMUD code and ran Age of Destiny and Age of Destiny 2:
Dark Destiny.  While the EmpireMUD code was never completed, many of the
planned features were implemented before the project was shut down.  This
new AoD retains all of the features of the last in-progress version of Empire
*except* Werewolves, which were neither finished, nor balanced.

The game's skill system and Vampire code are designed to resemble White
Wolf's Vampire: the Dark Ages.  Much of the Vampire code is completed,
though some disciplines are not finished.

There have been many third-party attempts to run an EmpireMUD, often
sub nominee 'AoD3' or 'AoD4', but these often fail from lack of a good
server or dedicated administration.  Age of Destiny: La Resurreccion is run
to avoid these problems, on a server that won't vanish and with a dedication
to continued service.  Play to your heart's content.

Telnet      : firstage.net 23 [209.271.251.96]
WWW         : http://www.firstage.net/
Description :

  Avalon: The First Age is a return to a time when Avalon was
savage and untamed and civilisation was just beginning to
emerge from the depths of the dark ages. There are three major
cityports - Mercinae: City of Justice and Honour and home to
the Mage, Knights, Mystics, Bards and Alchemists guilds
Thakria: The City of Miracles, home to the power-seekers and
evil guild of Sorcerers, Seers, Loremasters and Thieves.
Parrius: City of the Free, once a pirate stronghold, Parrius is
now home to the Minstrels, Warriors, Enchanters and Artisans.
Others guilds exist that are more independent; The Rangers of
the Greenwood, the peace-loving Animists and the secretive
Brigands. This land is a rich tapestry of adventure and role play
with the ultimate aim of ordination for the select few who can
stand the course. This is not a game for the faint of heart, but for
those who would stand up and be counted as legends and
leaders in their own lifetime. This is a land of unrestricted
combat incorporating the now famous Avalon combat system
in full; oft copied but never bettered.

three.

Harry Potter: Order of the Phoenix, a newbie-friendly 
consent-based MUSH, is set during Harry's 7th and final 
year at Hogwarts.  Having recently learned exactly what 
the Order of the Phoenix is, and the precious thing they 
are guarding from Voldemort, Harry must prepare for what 
will be the fight of his life, facing increasingly 
insurmountable odds.

Snape has been given the Defense Against the Dark Arts 
job, and Voldemort's victory is nearly complete.  Only 
Hogwarts remains steadfast, but are the students safe even 
there?

number of feature characters, or you can play a character 
you've made up yourself.  Our news and website and even 
our castle have recently undergone overhauls.  Plenty of 
logs of past RP are also available.

Mud         : DBZ Prime
Code Base   : [GodWars] Prime 3.0
Telnet      : fire.muddrake.com 6968 [24.106.156.211]
WWW         : http://
Description :

PrimeMUD while being a Godwars mud at heart has evolved
into a different type of enviornment. While the Mud is 
still very much based on the pk aspect of MUDs it now
offers more intelligant and challenging opponents 
on the npc side of things. All players on Prime are 
basically the same class, A Ki fighter. What makes 
everyone unique is their choice of racial backround
and how they choose to develop their skill set over 
time. We currently offer Humans, Saiyans, Half-Saiyans,
Nameks, Demons, and Androids as starting races and have
an expanded selection for later in the game. Even though
we're a godwars mud, characters advance through a 
level-like system which we call Ranks. Instead of training
your hp,mana, and move like a normal godwars mud these
simply go up as you play. You are given control over 
where you can spend your bonus points however. We also
removed all the stock skills and abilities. As most 
players know, they were useless in godwars anyways.

To wrap things up if you want a Unqiue Godwars mud that is
unlike any other, check out Prime. We are truely Unqiue, 
and worth your time.

-Tetsuru Uzuki. Coder of PrimeMUD

struggle between good and evil. Good and evil each has
its own homelands, located on opposite sides of the map.
Players are encouraged to get some levels and go out to
seek the enemy and try to kill them.

 - barbarian, thief, assassin, sorcerer, battlemage, druid, vampire, 
   paladin, astra, dark knight, healer classes
 - very easy leveling for the first 35 levels
 - up to 90 mortal levels
 - our own code base (99 percent modified SMAUG, much
   resemblance with the Emlen code now)
 - 140+ spells and 50+ skills
 - 24 different races
 - An Annual Playerwipe (Cycles) to give new(er) players a chance to
   start even with the rest and for experienced players to try
   something different.

   worthwile

The Mud is fully operational again since January 9th 2005. Come and
explore the world in which YOU decide who deserves vengeance.

choose from. We also have the Materia System, in which you can
purchase or find Materia, and insert them into Special Equipment
which have Materia Slots. We offer PK-Quests as well as normal

We hope to see you soon on Anime Nation X.

Mud         : RavenMUD
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Circle 3.0bpl11
Telnet      : bb8.betterbox.net 6666 [209.83.132.86]
WWW         : http://ravenmud.betterbox.net/
Description :

   RavenMUD was originally started by a handful of people from Da Shadow's
Domain and ShadowMUD. After many modifications from its original code Raven
now has many unique features including; improved A.I. Mobs (NPCs), multi
functional magic items, numerous operational cities, and an online creation
system, just to list a few.  Player grouping and role playing are quite
popular with 10 classes and 10 races to choose from.  Exploring Raven's vast
and ever expanding areas will not be a hassle, with saved aliases and
abbreviated commands to ease the amount of typing. Clans and custom clan
housing that offers to many options to list add greatly to an already rich 
role playing environment. Planned and impromptu quests are frequently run with
various themes and objectives that range from capture the flag, city
defense, seek and destroy, rescue missions, treasure hunts and many many
more. A talented Imm staff continuously produces original areas and improves
game play in many facets. An entire city devoted to players new to MUDs or
that wish to learn more about Raven is available to start in with helpful
and informative mobs and help files to get your journey underway. Raven is
very stable and has been around for quite sometime and will continue to
exist indefinitely. Whether new to the game or a veteran this is everything
you are looking for in a MUD.

Mud         : The Legends of Krynn
Code Base   : [Rom] LoK1.1
Telnet      : legendsofkrynn.wolfpaw.net 6100 [216.18.90.20]
WWW         : http://legendsofkrynn.wolfpaw.net/
Description :

  The Legends of Krynn has a lot to offer, with all original
areas, and a very unique code system. The areas
are built with extreme accuracy, as close to the books as
possible. The Legends of Krynn offers a wide variety of races
as well as classes, clans, skills, spells and various other
options. Roleplay is encouraged and enforced. The date in
which The Legends of Krynn takes place, is shortly after
the War of the Lance (30 years after). Many unique systems
not found anywhere else, such as our very unique Grouping
system and our Clan system, reside here. Solamnic Knights
govern the
world as 'police', as they do in the books. There is NO
Auto-Flagging for (Thief, Killer, Treason, Assault,
Outlaw). Flagging of another player for a crime is
controlled by members of the Solamnic Knights. Come check
it out, but be warned, this MUD, while very newbie
friendly, is still probably more for advanced MUDers, or
people who have never played a MUD before and were never
corrupted by all the Power MUDs out there. This is NOT a
POWER MUD. No powerleveling here. Intelligence is requierd.

Mud         : Realm of Magic
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Heavily Modified (Powerful scripting language, C++)
Telnet      : rom.mud.de 4000 [134.102.218.66]
WWW         : http://rom.mud.de/
Description :

  Enter the Realm of Magic and discover the Magic and
Mysteries that it holds for you.

Slay monsters, cast spells, mix alchemy potions or just
rely on your wits and skills. Go on over 50 scripted
quests, accept randomly generated assignments and take part
in one of the many online quests directed by immortals and
mortals alike. Grouping with players and getting to know
them better, you will likely want to join one of the famous
orders, clubs of people sharing common goals and interests,
or use a private channel - just for you and your friends.
After a long journey on the mortal road, you may join the
immortal ranks after getting a first taste as mortal
builder, questmaster or advisor, giving input on design
and rule questions on a regular basis.
We encourage Roleplay with allowing you to write a
description to look at along with descriptions for details
like beard or tattoos. You can tailor your own clothes and
you can have named pets that will follow you into an inn as
well, which will store your equipment for free, without
removing your equipment from their positions like in many
other muds.

Even when leaving the game, you can stay connected,
choosing to forward mud internal mails as emails,
subscribing to email versions of boards or listing yourself
on the homepage with icq or aim ids for example.

Finding out secrets yourself, you might be able to join one
of few hidden societies, which require a certain roleplay.
Features java applet on homepage and in-game features like
speedwalk or multiple commands to make playing from anywhere
as easy as possible.

 There are two major themes that make BayMOO unique among
the all-text virtual realities on the NET:
       1) The Humanities of the San Francisco Bay Area and
       2) The Meanings of Water.

These are available to all who want to explore their uses,
and the janitors of BayMOO urge you to use them. But those
who feel called to other frontiers are also welcome to help
build BayMOO.

small island continent of Gwaer from the rest of the world is 
somewhat of a mystery. Some say it was a natural catastrophe, some 
argue that the gods were angered at the arrogance of man, still 
others believe that abuse of magic was the cause. The latter was the 
most popularly held believe, and until a few years ago the practice 
of magic was shunned.

Realm of the Magi is a text-based, real-time dark & magical fantasy 
themed role play game, that features fully interactive creatures and 
non-player characters, a driven skill and spellcasting dice-based 
combat system, an assortment of player-driven classes, the ability to 
experience 'dragon flight', a unique quest & puzzle reputation 
system, hundreds of 'soul' feelings and over 5,000+ realms to explore!

Mud         : 7 Degrees of Freedom
Code Base   : [Aber] Modified
Telnet      : 7dof.org.uk 6715 [217.10.143.92]
WWW         : http://www.7dof.org.uk/
Description :

7 Degrees of Freedom worked for over a year before opening
to the public. This was so that we could write some
original game concepts and quests to guard against 'Just
Another iDiRT Syndrome'

Our quest and zone writers have added new quests and zones
that give our world a unique face and map.

The game dynamically resets objects and mobiles in a way
invisible to players. Once you have reach the level of
Wizard you can become mortal again (i.e. defrob/remort) and
run more quests to try and reach the level of MasterWizard.
As with most Abers, Roleplay is not encouraged and the main
emphasis on the MUD is on everyone having a good time.
The 7DOF ethos is that players should be permitted to enjoy
their MUDing experience, hence we do not have niggling
rules against quest recompletion, etc. 

We also pride ourselves on not having tell-logging or
snooping. Privacy is respected.

  ease a new player into playing, so they don't feel lost

* PK during TCs (total carnage) held frequently for fun and sport
* Free rent!

Mud         : Realmsmud
Code Base   : [LP] LDMud 3.2.9-Dev.489
Telnet      : realmsmud.org 1501 [208.20.1.213]
WWW         : None
Description :

     One of the oldest LPmuds, founded June 1991, Realmsmud is a large
LP based MUD with 30+ players on at peak times.  Well over 150 wizards
have contributed to the more than sixty different areas that are open
for exploration by players.
 
     There are several unique aspects of Realmsmud, including the multi-
character system, a volunteer militia, an extensive player run nobles
system where players may band together to create and defend their house
against seiges from rival houses, and finally a trade skills system.
Trades include Alchemy, Blacksmithing, Cartography, Fletching, Jewelcraft,
Leathercraft, and Tailoring.  Players have the option of creating their
own fortress with rooms and monsters. 
 
     So, feel free to drop in on us.  New players will enter the game
at Central Park (CP) after going through the brief character creation
process.  To help new players get acclimated to Realmsmud, they are
given a chat line to ask questions on.  Volunteer players above level
15, called newbie helpers, are online to answer any questions that a
player might have about the mud.

Mud         : Red Dragon
Code Base   : [LP] LIMA mudlib/mudos v22.2b9
Telnet      : reddragon.org 3000 [66.87.48.44]
WWW         : None
Description :

Red Dragon is a LIMA based mud that has been running since July 1996 and is
very stable. It features 5 primary (alpha) guilds and approximately 100
additional guilds for betas and beyond with more than 20 races to choose from,
making the possibilities nearly endless.

There is an event daemon that runs a different event approximately every 4
hours. These events range can be special heals, objects, invasions and other
things to enliven the game.

RD has a rich newbie-friendly environment that includes more than 15 different
areas, events specifically driven for newbies as well as several other bonus
features.

For the higher level player RD offers endless advancement and expansion of the
player. There are 5 distinct guilds to choose from and once you've completed
your alpha guild and/or reached level 70 you are allowed to join a secondary
alpha. If a secondary alpha guild is not to your tastes, then you are also
allowed to split one body into 2 or more. Thus giving you the flexibility of
multiple characters without having to change names and divide your time between
them. If you can't afford to split your body but wish to try out the other
guilds available, there is a reasonably inexpensive reincarnation available.

Red Dragon offers a large enough player base so there are always many people
online and yet it still feels like a community. You are not one of the
thousands of other players. The wizards/admin take your thoughts and
suggestions seriously and definitely seek new ways to expand and to incorporate
them.

Mud         : Utopia: Type Final
Code Base   : [GodWars] Extremely Modified
Telnet      : utf.wolfpaw.net 3222 [204.209.44.23]
WWW         : None
Description :

For those who love the journey as much as the battle... the realm of 
Utopia awaits you.

- 8 distinctive classes to choose from; each having 2 tiers of 
specialization to choose from having a total of about 32 different 
possibilities. Unlike other muds, the skills these powerful beings 
are capable of will rock your world. Classes ranged from stealthy 
snipers to powerful swordmasters to deadly shinobis (from Naruto!).

- Innovative Combat system: Each attack has an attack type, 
elemental type, variant type (slash, soul), and focus type (direct, 
low) which target specific regions of the body. Also, a powerful 
counter system is incorporate where skilled players can use the 
opponent's mistakes against them.

- High customization system: Not only can each character choose to 
work on a variety of stats (ranging from Str, to Vit, to Min etc), 
they also get unique equipment from killing foes in battles that 
enhances their abilities further while providing a slew of equip 
skills to choose from.

- A variety of minigames to choose from; Scavenger Hunt, Dungeon of 
Death, King of Fighters Tournament, Free for all, Team Battles and 
soon to be added War Games all add up to the fun.

Utopia: Type Final also offers a whole slew of unique classes that 
you probably haven't seen from anywhere else, a combat system to 
fight for and a counter system to die for... So come and check us 
out, the learning is tough... but when you get through it, you can 
NEVER get enough!

   Ravenwood is a medieval role-playing muck with a pg-13 rating on
it but is open to adult theme areas that must be flagged as such.  The
wizzes are very friendly and helpful to newbies. Role-playing is a must.
Furrys as well as human types are welcome. We have a room for OOC chat. The
muck is centered in and around, a small medieval town called Ravenwood. The
muck is community oriented with shops and other occupations that form a
well-balanced community.  Players are encouraged to build their own houses
and shops.  There is guilds and things of that sort for players that like
that kind of thing.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : RetroMUD
Code Base   : RetroMUD (4.0)
Telnet      : retromud.org 3000 [207.170.15.220]
WWW         : http://retromud.org
Description :

   RetroMUD consists of no less than six worlds, each with
its own unique theme.  Battle djinn in the air world of
Raji, fight fishfolk in the water world of Wysoom, bag
yourself a Tyrannosaurus in the steaming jungles of Sosel,
wander the massive underground complex in the dead world of
Crypt, go wild in the crazy and violent place known as
Perdow...or just go dragon hunting in medieval fashion on
Welstar. Our guilds are heavily researched and we use
real life inspirations for their backgrounds.  The Templar
guild is really based on the Templars (from the titles, to
the starting equipment). Psionicists are based on the
actual principles of Chakras.  Druids are true to their
Celtic roots rather than a bunch of eco-terrorists!
 
   Not enough?  We've got over 60 races, over 20 classes,
hundreds of unique skills and spells, quests tailored to
guilds, explosive events, castles -- you name it, we've got
it.  And if we don't have it, we're working on it. It's six
MUDs in one.  Come by and check us out. You'll be glad you
did!

Mud         : Time of Troubles
Code Base   : [Rom] Rom/Sunder/Rot derivative
Telnet      : Lacus.myftp.org 3334
WWW         : http://www.timeoftroubles.com
Description :

 The idea for Time of Troubles began 5 years ago on paper, slowly
it advanced to a simple RoT code base where we learned the basics
of mud administration.  From here we branched out to other code
bases. At one point, I quit this project and saved it for later 
times.
 
The disk was found close to a year ago, and I loaded up a near
stock version of Sundermud2.1 (rom 2.3 derived) and began to
plug in all the ideas and code from our old beast. Slowly over 
time Troubles has developed into a beauty of a place with a 
countless amount of interesting features.  Troubles is a pk 
optional mud with a strong emphasis on class distinction. Each 
class is very unique and still being fine tuned at this moment. 
 
Troubles is an extremely indepth game with much potential and 
fun times to be had. Our Immortal staff is extremely willing to 
listen to all input, and have been doing this for many, many 
years. We have customized countless amounts of the code, but we 
will not attempt to list them here like so many other muds. We 
feel you must see Troubles to actually appreciate the indepth 
game-engine.

So please, if you would love to help run a wonderful mud full 
of potential, stop by and leave a note for Myrkul or E-mail. 
To see changes on the mud, connect and read all the Announce 
notes, then browse through "help changes."

We look forward to seeing you on Time of Troubles.

Time of Troubles is also currently hiring area builders.

Description :

  Imagine using a continually updated text-based system in 
which one, by typing out descriptions of oneself and one's 
activities, and in turn reading the descriptions of others 
and their activities, simulates the experience of being in 
strange an unearthly places doing all sorts of imaginative 
and even not physically possible activities.

Now consider Spindizzy, a product of modern design and 
the latest in scientific engineering.  Our electronic 
brain, called a 'computer,' makes it possible for people 
from all over the world to participate without learning 
the tedious punch-card skills and assembler instructions 
that older, less sophisticated systems demand.

an entirely new MUDLib called RoleMUD, which offers a wide
range of features like weather, environmental stats,
colourfulness, day/night change, extralogins, interactive
plans a.m.m...

  The Beutelland features fantasy themes of basically Tolkinian
flavour, but doesn't take anything too seriously.
Ardent fs/sf readers and/or computer game players
will surely encounter many allusions to classic genre
representatives.

  The World (mythically created by the holy Beuteltier (zool.
marsupial, opossum) contains differing climate/culture zones
like plains, mountains, sea, viking island, jungle.
Players can choose a hometown/region of their liking.

  Eligible races up to now include Dwarfs, Humans, Hobbits and
Elves, NPCs will show up in whatever form our coders imagination
can spawn. (Items too).

  Guilds and Trades are under construction, but we offer >20
Quests of mounting difficulty and lots of interesting details
to research, treasures to find, monsters to kill and of course
many interesting people to meet.

Austriacisms, you will always be welcome in Beutelland.

the Klingon Empire, are completely NPC. We are completely
independent, because of this you can only join certain
small organizations. These organizations are based around
peacekeeping, pirating, being mercenaries. You can also be
independent, and be whatever you want. Your options are
almost limitless, you can run a bar, own planets, mine, be
a salvage unit. Come and see us, we are very friendly and
happy to help anyone.

Description :

 The RPG Nexus is a new revision of The Squaresoft Mud, which never really
got it's full chance. (By this, I mean it got deleted). However, the active
staff have started the project over, with expanded horizons. We now
encompass all RPG's as 'acceptable' (meaning that while it's impossible to
incorporate all RPG's into one MUD, admin/staff are allowed to code
anything from any RPG that they desire). We are currently looking for the
following positions:

  Builders: Build areas, and anything else simple. (Wizards only)
  Mappers: Create one of our unique detailed maps for an area already in the mud,
           or not. (Wizards and Players)
  Descers: Describe rooms that lazy wizards decided not to. (Wizards and Players)
  Playtesters: Check areas for bugs, give ideas, help with balance (Players only)

Playtesters who help test things, and do not whine about their suggestions
not being implemented will recieve special bonuses when the MUD becomes
fully operational. Note that we are NOT looking for full-time players at
this time. If you only want to play, but not help out, do not come yet. The
mud listing will be updated, as soon as the mud is truly open. Thank you.

Areas planned: Dragon warrior games, King's field games, Many more Final Fantasies, etc.

Mud         : Rock: Crashed Plane
Code Base   : [Custom]
Telnet      : dillfrog.com 4000
WWW         : http://www.dillfrog.com/games/r2/
Description :

 Running on an entirely unique code base, Rock 2 offers a welcomed diversion
to the host of Circle and Diku MUDs out there.

The game is based in a world where planar travel is possible, creating a 
vast network of environments to play in. Five advanced races war against 
each other, striving to gain control of mighty monoliths of power, which 
promise planar supremacy to those mighty enough to claim them all.

Unlike most MUDs, Rock aims to balance the playing field by using a 
real-time turn-based system. Players are given a certain amount of turns to 
use each day, allowing those with less free time to compete with the 
temporally-inclined. Players use their turns to gather equipment, improve 
their abilities and learn new skills.

Each race works as a team in an attempt to gain control of the monoliths, 
and ultimately win the game. Once all monoliths have been captured and 
secured by one race, the game ends with the winners receiving in-game 
benefits. A new game begins shortly after, providing players with a new 
chance to rule supreme.

WWW         : None
Description :

   Rogue is an old school player killer mud which has been referred to as 
Genocide's little sister.  It should be said that Rogue is most similar to 
the Genocide of 8-10 yrs ago. Rogue has been up and running since June of 
1992.  Killing is done during wars lasting 10-20minutes.  There are a
variety of classes and over 35 areas in addition to the standard backbone.  
Equipment is reset every war and stats are maintained for the entire time a
character is active.  Players are able to advance in Level.  We are looking
for players, coders and builders to revitalize this old favorite.

willing to help out. Saga welcomes players of all ages and
abilities, with advanced players being given the chance to
play rare species and Feature Characters.

  Players are offered a choice of three different worlds to
explore:

  ALKHABA - In the distant past, tropical jungles covered much
of the planet's surface. Ancient civilisations built shrines and
temples to Pokemon, worshipping them as Gods to be feared and
respected. Ancient Pokemon species that would eventually become
extinct still thrived in this dark landscape.
  PRESENT DAY - Pokemon training has become a way of life for
many people. Trainers travel from town to town capturing new
Pokemon to use in battle and compete in tournaments for the much
sought-after position of Pokemon Master.
  KOKUMIN - Many years from now, genetic engineering will enable
humans to create entirely new species of Pokemon. Advanced cities
cover the land, with wild Pokemon restricted to massive man-made
Biospheres.

  On this unique Pokemon MUCK, you have the opportunity to create
your own completely original Pokemon species for Alkhaba and Kokumin.
Alternatively, you can choose to play a human character: a trainer,
a breeder, or even a member of the evil Team Rocket! And, of course,
there are 386 official Pokemon species to choose from, everything
from a humble Pidgey to the mighty Lugia. The choice is yours.

world for themselves. To get away from the furry only worlds.

the same things you do.

Mud         : FilthyMUD
Code Base   : [Rom] Rom2.4b6/custom
Telnet      : filthymud.org 1337 [63.150.214.21]
WWW         : http://www.filthymud.org
Description :

 FilthyMUD has been in a period of testing and debugging for quite awhile
now, and we are now, as of September 1st, 2004, Open For Play!

FilthyMUD has had quite a bit of development, both in areas and code,
and is now very stable with a lot of original ideas implimented.  Please
visit our website to see some of these changes.

Some of the biggest changes, and the ones our playtesters love the most,
are things like our 'Per-hit-XP' system, which gives experience per hit
instead of per kill.

Our 'Endless' system, which is a two-step process, the first allowing a
max level player to continue advancing their stats (hp/mana/move) and
gain training sessions, the second is the forge item code, which allows
normal equipment to become much more powerful.
Another major change is of course remorts, but these are handled a
little differently than most muds, in that certain classes can become
certain subclasses, which are much better than the normal classes
allowed to a new character.

Again, please visit our website, which has much more information about
our MUD on it.
http://www.filthymud.org

                -----------------------------------------------

literally take over the world. Enjoy spending quality time with a joint and a 
cheap prostitute. Drive around town in a Ferrari, or cruise the lake on a sleek 
waverunner.

you are is up to you - would you rather be a muscle-bound brute, a skilled

Mud         : Paradigm MUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH 1.8.0 pl 0 w. tSpace
Telnet      : paradigm.mushpark.com 2197 [67.130.96.226]
WWW         : http://None
Description :

This game is loosely based on a commercial RPG called Lightspeed
(http://www.lightspeed-rpg.com). Perhaps the best way to describe the
setting is the Federation from Star Trek versus the Empire from Star
Wars with a lot of other stuff thrown in. It's not a crossover MUSH,
so don't expect the factions to be identical to their Star Trek/Star
Wars counterparts. They are, however, similar enough that most new
players should be "instantly familiar" with the basics of the
setting.

Like most other sci-fi MU*s, PD offers a blend of RP and simulation.
We are using an original, made-from-scratch space flight and combat
engine called tSpace that is fully integrated with the skills system.
There is also a fully coded personal combat system and a
trading/economy system. Much of the code is still under development
however, so not everything is working at the moment.

The game is still under development and isn't open for RP, but the
curious are encouraged to log on and have a look around.

Description :

DARBONNE, THE FLOATING CITY

There was a time, long before the beginning of history,
when there were both good and evil forces in the Land of
Mordor.  The battles between them raged constantly with
first one side and then the other claiming victory.  It was
during the third age, at a time when the dragons and
balrogs had joined forces against the elves, dwarves and
humans in a grand assualt against them that a triad of
powerful wizards and a white mage saved the city of
Darbonne by casting a self-perpetuating spell on it.  The
spell lifted the city into the air, higher than any dragon
could fly.  Unfortunately, one of Darbonne's great
libraries was torn asunder and parchments which were stored
there, upon which were recorded offensive spells from the
realms of Earth, Wind, Fire and Water, were lost from that
library.  Mighty adventurers still seek the fragments of
those mystical parchments in many dangerous and mysterious
places.

Would you like to join them?
Styx, from the city of Oceancrest, will be your DM.

Mud         : ShadowGate
Code Base   : [LP] ShadowGate 1.5
Telnet      : firedragon.com 6969 [209.161.2.50]
WWW         : http://www.firedragon.com/shadowgate/
Description :

   ShadowGate is a huge MUD that sticks closely to the AD&D
manuals. We strive to form a community of adventurers with all
aspects of interactions, both positive and negative. Look forward
to prejudice and tolerance, conflict and cooperation, hate and
love. 

   Our systems of multi-classing, races, weapon and non-weapon
proficiencies, languages, spells, deities, and required
introductions all make you feel as if the world of ShadowGate is
an evolving environment.  Indeed characters can eventually gain
influence and control over parts of the world as "High Mortals",
continuing to shape and grow the game further.

   We insist that you roleplay.  Roleplaying is a process, not
an end goal.  Each individual thread of your character's
experiences, misadventures, friends and enemies becomes the
tapestry of his or her life, and the whole winds up becoming 
more than it's parts. We strictly enforce this as best as we are
capable. We encourage RP through a system of Avatars, which are
our DM's. They are not creators or builders. They are people who
drive interactive quests through various abilities and
interactively controlled NPCs.  Avatars and creators are all
selected from the players who have played and gained our trust,
to ensure consistancy with the game's evolution forward.

   The ultimate, and perhaps idealistic, goal is to make the
ShadowGate world reflect not only the tabletop world of adventure
and RP, but also those idle times of characters - the times in the
city, spending your gold, reflecting on your adventures. We
encourage any player who wishes to become part of the community
to join us, enjoy what we have, and help us make it better and
move toward our goal.

  Visionmud starts out in a semi-modern setting, complete with
boardable vessels and a subway system.  Recently we added a
straight to the point training guide that should get any
novice up and runing quickly, while experienced mud-players will
find they can achieve success with little or no explanation.
There are several large continents to travel and explore,
separated by vast oceans. These realms are intertwined with
varying degrees of complexities which utilized different types of
terrain and themes which are appropriate to their time and
atmosphere. You will find Visionmud rich with culture, treasure,
nobility, as well as fraught with multitudes of challenges.

Of special note: I have noticed many new players to muds,
never really spend enough time to get aquainted to a new
mud. Visionmud has been designed with that in mind, and
trys hard to prevent the player from loosing interest, thusly
not dashing their hopes of reaping fame and fortune.

Mud         : Shadows of the Mind
Code Base   : [Envy] Core server-Envy, but heavily modified since 1995
Telnet      : mud.shadowsofthemind.com 4000 [209.203.236.166]
WWW         : http://www.shadowsofthemind.com/
Description :

 Shadows of the Mind has been around for over 5 yrs. We have very
dedicated players and a long history, but we recently re-opened.
SOTM2 has some very cool features: unique character creation
where you choose not only your primary class, but 2nd, 3rd, 4th,
and 5th classes also! Your choice of race leads to a choice of
10 different subraces, plus each player can choose a specialty
which will define a set of skills/spells that you will excel at.
Upon reaching level 50 you choose from 4 Legendary Classes, with
completely unique sets of skills for each.  We have our own
Windows-based Area Editor available for free use, players build
new areas constantly. Our mobs load objects from a huge database
equipment; mobs load with different sets of equipment each time.
This is a challenging mud with a unique pkill system (you can
choose a path of Holy, Unholy or Amoral, or no path if you don't
like pkilling), and truly awesome rewards for upper levels. When
joining in quests, the player can earn reward points, which can
be used to increase max stats, hp, etc.  Combat on our mud is
deadly, where bleeding and exhaustion can take you down even if
you have the hp.  We also offer a Onedeath challenge, where your
character is deleted when you die (there is a Onedeath Hall of
Fame also to record those valiant players).  We have long time
players from all around the world  (australia, netherlands,
mexico, and more).  We have a completely original 300+ room main
city, and over 75% of our areas are player-designed!  Plus we
have tons of truly amazing stuff in the works, come visit us!

Telnet      : insymnia.com 6600 [216.136.9.5]
WWW         : http://www.insymnia.com
Description :

   The MUD is in its 2nd year of heavy code modifications
and area creation. We have only 2 simple rules to follow,
and a huge number of skills/spells, as the primary theme of
the MUD is simple: Make the players as powerful as they can
possibly be, while increasing the difficulty of the game to
adapt to your increase in power, which quickly eliminates
boredom.

   The game, which is fantasy-based, is pure PK, and all of
our players are always more than willing to help out new
ones.  This includes Immortals, who are prohibited from
being lofty, invisible creatures whose sole purpose is to
harass players and prevent them from having fun.  Players
can remort once into another class, with both classes
consisting of 100 levels, and once into the powerful Hero
class.  You can watch players battle it out in an arena, as
though you were walking along right beside them.  Battles
will be legendary in their magnitude, consisting of entire
towns (and players if they wish to join) destroying each
other, some for the pursuit of power and wealth, some just
to watch the other side perish.  Enter our world.

Mud         : Rebirth Mush

Telnet      : rebirth.iamyourgod.org 8888 [165.247.188.31]
WWW         : None
Description :

  The year is 2043 AD on Earth and in the future things were
seemingly bleak. Not to long ago in 2028 World War Three broke
out and threw the governments of the world into chaos. After six
long years the world united as one and what was once pain and
suffering rapidly became entertainment. Without national barriers
and even no language barriers entertainment became a large focus
while other research went bankrupt due to lack of funding. Come
the year 2040 Internet gaming was the top grossing form of
entertainment and any company that hoped to earned money was in
on the business. One research company known as Faust & Solomon
Enterprises decided to corner the market with a new development.
They created a new gaming system and game. They packaged it as
one with one name Hirladan. That was the name of this believed
virtual world, though in truth it was part of a research test.
Using mental images and skills a person knew to create a sprite
to exist in another world. While these sprites that uses
amplified and modified skills such as a creative writer being a
good spell caster, they also knew they could test resurrection
and even duplication because ‘NPCs’ must be killed. A wizard to
the north found these seemingly undying sprites, while struck
down they rose again so to further his plots to take the
struggling world he must stop the influx of immortals. A spell
was developed and for two years people have been disappearing in
the real world and hybrids of the character they were and who the
look like have been showing up in game un able to log out as the
spell merges body and mind into Hirladan.

  It is possible for very unique creation as one can range from
players to natives and even the trapped playes if one chosese to
do so. So please stop in and give it a look see.

Mud         : Soucon MUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] TinyMUSH version 2.2.5 #2
Telnet      : soucon.silvertree.org 4201 [64.139.44.194]
WWW         : http://soucon.silvertree.org
Description :

 Soucon MUSH is a themed roleplaying MUSH based on the series of books the
'Dragonriders of Pern' by Anne McCaffrey, and runs with full permission from
the author. We attempt to recreate, with as much authenticity as possible, the
atmosphere and society described in the books. Set in the Southern Continent
of Pern we are set in the 10th Pass, one pass after the events in
Dragonflight, The White Dragon etc. We do not recognize the events outlined in
'All the Weyrs of Pern', and therefore Thread still falls, though technology
remainsl very limited.
 
SouCon MUSH is PernMUSH's sister game, and an ideal place to send a PC
relative of a character you have here: we're running on the exact same
timeline! Smaller than PernMUSH, SouCon offers a more intimate atmosphere for
RP.
 
Currently, we have 2 Weyrs (mountainous Honshu and jungle-covered Southern), 2
Holds, and many Crafts, offering characters many ways in which to get
involved.  We have 4 Hatchings a year, and Impress up to 10 players at each
Hatching on average.
 
We consider ourselves one of the friendliest MUSHes out there, and offer help
to new players of all levels of experience. Please join us at:
soucon.silvertree.org: 4201 (63.199.182.123: 4201), and feel free to contact
any of the Wizards or Guides (+rwho wiz and +rwho gui) for help!

Mud         : Shattered Realms
Code Base   : [LP] HIGHLY modified LP MUD running MudOS
Telnet      : morth.org 4001 [130.236.227.234]
WWW         : http://shatteredrealms.sf.net
Description :

   Welcome to the Shattered Realms. Our world began in
June of 1999, and has been under constant construction
for the last few months. We are now open for beta
testing, and encourage constructive criticism. We are
a fully interactional LP MUD, with nine different races
and eighteen classes. From the high heights of the
Northlands, to the deep mysteries of the UnderDark,
our world is rich in every detail. Roleplaying is
encouraged, and rewarded within our xp system. As a
large part of Roleplaying involves taking risks (what
warrior would be afraid of battle if he knew he would
not die) we also permit playerkilling. I have found that
the real danger provided by this makes the gaming
experience much richer. Newbies, fear not, for we have a
newbie-friendly interface and protection for one full day
of game time. Come visit the Shattered Realms. 

We also have positions available for coders at all
experience levels. From builder, programmer and writer
all the way up to admin levels currently available.
We prefer LP MUD experience and a strong desire to build
your dreams for  others to enjoy them. 

The Shattered Realms - a place unlike any other.
