Mud         : Dragons of the Mists
Code Base   : [MUSH] TinyMUSH version 3.1
Telnet      : dotm.us 8900 [69.57.136.37]
WWW         : http://www.dotm.us
Description :

  Deep in space, there is a lush, verdant world filled with as many dangers 
as beauties. The planet Darkon is a world in which elves and humans are 
just becoming aware of each other, in which Mages flirt with elemental 
magic, in which clashing cultures are constantly struggling to gain a sense 
of harmony with one another. Above all else though, its people, no matter 
how rich or poor, fear one thing: A deadly menace that threatens to wipe 
out all who stand in its path. However, to come to Darkon's aid in these 
fearful times are the Dragons and Griffins of the Eyries. When the world is 
threatened, it is they who rise into the air with their riders on their 
backs to combat this deadly foe. Indeed, there are many wonders on Darkon, 
if one is brave enough to step outside.

Recently, the Topaz bond of the Trassa at Twilight Dawn Eyrie has risen in 
flight, and she has been claimed once again by D'arvan's Garnet Savayen, 
ensuring his rider's position as Tarvo. Now, the queen grows heavy with 
eggs, and will very soon leave a clutch on Twilight Dawn's sands! With this 
in mind, the Eyrie scrambles to make ready for the Candidates, and the new 
additions to the griffin ranks, that will soon grace the Eyrie.

So, this leaves a few questions for you. For starters, what kind of a 
person will you be? A haughty noble perhaps? Or maybe you'll have been born 
an outcast in one of the nomadic gypsy clans. Maybe you'll have been born 
in one of the Eyries, and wait hopefully for one of the griffins to sniff 
you out for candidacy. Does leadership suit you? If it does, maybe you're 
the leader of one of the many Guilds. Anything is possible on Darkon. 
Currently, it is looking for all types of players, including good riders 
for Louna's clutch! There might even be a Topaz on the sands this time, but 
apparently Louna's not telling.

So there you have it. Right now, there's tons of opportunities to play any 
kind of character you want! There is even a new area about to open, in 
which you can play one of the mysterious Elves of Galendell.

Want to explore Dragons of the Mists MUSH? Hop on over to dotm.us: 8900

Mud         : Starship Traders
Code Base   : [Custom] Original server is available for others to run
Telnet      : starshiptraders.com 23 [199.44.248.254]
WWW         : http://starshiptraders.com/
Description :

  Starship Traders is a multiuser strategy game playable either using
a telnet client or a web browser.  It is extremely structured with formal 
rankings of players available at all times.  Games run for a specific 
period and players who complete a game ranked in the top 10% are 
promoted to a higher-level game, populated by others who also did 
well in a previous game.  Unfortunately, everyone at SST has to suffer 
the indignities of playing at least one newbie game before being 
eligible for a promotion. 

Players can create formal alliances to which other players can apply.  
A separate ranking shows the relative cumulative strength of each 
team, though no promotions are based on team results.  

There is a strong military and economic structure to the game, but 
clever politicians  will often prevail over even the best military and 
economic strategists.

If you like a well defined game environment, give SST a look.  It was 
coded completely from scratch in C over a period of 4.5 years.  it's 
design is older still  and has been evolving for 14 years.  It is unlike 
(very unlike!) anything else on the 'net. You'll probably either love it 
or hate it.

Telnet      : frontiersmud.org 5555 [160.79.195.24]
WWW         : http://www.frontiersmud.org
Description :

Frontiers 2 is a vast, all-original medieval fantasy
adventuring realm offering a large selection of
races, guilds, and player-run cities and houses.
Politics and role-playing are encouraged; pk is
optional and restricted to meet the needs of both pk
lovers and haters alike. There are many quests to
be done, some of which remain unsolved. We have
over 44 areas, 12 races each with their own unique
language, 8 guilds, multiclassing, and we are always
working on something new.

We have a small but dedicated staff of wizards and
admins who believe in the mud and are tenacious in
their efforts to continue build and enhance for the
sake of the players.

Mud         : House Of Ghouls
Code Base   : [Smaug] Pretty Darn Modified
Telnet      : hog.wolfpaw.net 6000 [204.209.44.13]
WWW         : http://hog.wolfpaw.net
Description :

 House of Ghouls is a fun, fantasy-style MUD.  Many of the features
come from the ideas of the players...not all of the ideas get used,
but we are open to hearing your suggestions.  We like to think we are
fairly reasonable, and quite friendly MUD.  It may have a strange
name, but don't let that stop you from at least giving us a try!

Why should you try House of Ghouls over other MUD's?  Here's why!

- Heavily modified Smaug codebase.
- All new experience system.
- All new combat system.
- Be a ghoul, minotaur, goblin or one of the many other races!
- True dual-class character option.
- Tiered classes for the single class adventurers.  Show the Realm
you are the master of your class by becoming a Champion, 
Bishop, Rogue, or Archmagi!
- Automated Questing, with special equipment as rewards!
- Random item creation...find something new each time!  'Randoms' are
usually better than 'stock' items, so everyone isn't wearing the same
set of equipment.  Even find random artifacts, extremely powerful
pieces of equipment.
- Reworked classes...new skills, new spells, and at new levels!
- Completely original areas (except for the mudschool).
- Player-Killing accepted...and an exciting penalty for illegal
player kills (;  
- Friendly players and immortals.  Players have the option of
becoming Demi-Gods after reaching Avatarhood, and other players can
worship them.
- From the mind of Drazuk, veteran of such MUDs as Realm of Shadows 
and The Final Challenge (look them both up, great MUDs!)

and...

- The only MUD I've ever seen where you can go surfing for the
perfect wave!  (It's fun, trust me)

Come give HoG a try! 

                -----------------------------------------------

code, C or C++, we might be looking for you!

  About Outlands: Our staff currently consists of people who
have been mudding/building for many years. It is a medieval

approximately 34 zones in progress, with many of them already
open and playable. We are still in beta stages but plan to open
fully and operational within the next few weeks to a month, but
we need more coders and builders!

Aenarion@email.com if interested in a coder position. Please be
sure to include any experience or training that you may have and
how long you have played/worked on a mud before. If you would
like to look at what has been done so far, please feel free to
log on at outlandsmud.com 4100. Read help building_app on
Outlands to apply for builder.

Description :

  Two Moons Mush is the longest-running mush based on the Elfquest comics by
Richard and Wendy Pini.
 
The timeline of the mush deviated from that of the comic during the events
of Kings of the Broken Wheel (the fall of Blue Mountain, which did not occur
on the mush).
 
Events in the mush occur approximately 100 years after KoBW. Two Moons Mush
prides itself on being newbie-friendly and easily accessible. Available
races at start are human, elf
and troll, preservers through application only. Book chars are available.

from that date.

Description :

This new Weyrmount is the virtual home of members of the Ultima Dragons-
Internet Chapter. It is modeled after the ideal world of a host of
turmoil-sick dragons -- intelligent dragons, with the knowledge and power
to build beautiful cities in the mountains and wonderous tools and works
of art.  Most Dragons hold close kinship with the mystical land of
Britannia (the land in the majority of Origin's Ultima series) but, as the
concept is of dragons who have fled terrible catastrophy on Britannia
through a magical portal, this new land is -not- Britannia. Perhaps it is
one of the other lost continents of that world; perhaps it is an entirely
new world altogether. There are still two moons in the sky (Trammel and
Felucca, by observation) and much of the wildlife is the same, but there
the similarities end. The Dragons are all pioneers here, out to explore
and tame this fabulous new world, and make it their new home.

completion.  Come by and visit the Mud and our website to
keep up with the new developments.  Even under normal

for years to come.  We have a little over 8000 rooms right now
with over 7000 new rooms in the works.  Each room is done
individually by the Immortal staff; none of it is computer

WWW         : http://www.akashat.com
Description :

               *  WARNING: MUD CONTAINS ADULT CONTENT  *
Between the Euphrates and the Tigris river, in this portion of the world known
as the craddle of humanity, there is a legend rumored at night when children
are asleep. It tells the tale of the ever elusive City of Akashat, nestled in
its lost Vale between high mountains. The city moves, floating from one end of
the desert to the other, never twice at the same place. Dreams are the only way
to access the city and one can find onself trapped forever. Soon, those trapped
organized a system of government, three classes, the Masters, who ruled, the
Citizen, who usually run businesses, and the slaves, used and abused, cared and
pampered by the other two classes. One trapped dreamer, who had the most
powerful dreams, found out how to send other dreamers back, to invade people in
the outside world's dreams and harvest whatever they could find in these, be it
riches, goods or souls. The Grand Vizir now rules over Akashat, aided by a
Conclave of Princes, and opposed by a dark dreamer: The Crimson Cardinal.
Come dream with us in the elusive city, where all dreams are welcome.

WWW         : http://dreamverse.montpeculier.com
Description :

Dreamverse is an LPMud that has been around for nearly a decade.
The mudlib is based on the Nightmare IV library but has undergone
extensive modification over the years.

Dreamverse moved to a new server on 15 March 2005 and is now
administered by Hilapdatus.  Hilapdatus was around when Dreamverse
first came into existence.  After a hiatus lasting several years he
has returned to Dreamverse with renewed energy and a strong desire
and willingness to revitalize and reenergize the Dreamverse
community which he cares so much about.

The world of Dreamverse has incredible potential.  If you wish to
poke around and play, are interested in building, or possibly even
helping hack the mudlib and driver, please log into the mud, say
hello, ask some questions, and shoot out a few emails.

The world of Dreamverse consists of a large wilderness system that is 
used to link areas together and provide a sense of depth and distance.
All outdoor rooms have an aerial counterpart and water-based rooms
have surface as well as underwater components.

tells of thirteen rings enchanted with the powers of lost immortals 
and the heroes that wore them. A great sword with incomprehensible 
power to slay gods as if they were a lowly peasant, and the 
forgotten warlord for whom the sword served

 Twilights Dawning is a SMAUG based mud with a several major 
adjustments.  For example, we have new weapon profenciences, multi-
classing, prestige classes (similar to remort or tier system), 
automated quests, and housing code (You can buy and stock your own 
house). These modifications just scratch the surface.  We also have 
a lot of minor fixes and changes that just change the feel of the 
mud. Our areas are all original, and so is our story line.  We also 
have added new races and classes in adition to the regular smaug 
based ones.  This comes out to a total of 8 prestige classes... 13 
normal classes... and 21 races and 5 templates that can be added 
after creation. We also have detailed character development, and 
heavilly encourage role-playing. Twilights Dawning is newbie 
friendly and our immortals will help with any reasonable requests.

Sweden...but with players from around the world! 
Founded in 1994, SPR grew rapidly from its humble 
beginnings of few dedicated players and staff to its' 
current position among the top three, non-themed furry-
based MUCKS.    SPR boasts a many things not found on other 
furry MUCKS, such as

1) No server lag!  Our hardware is kept up to date with the 
   size of our database and number of connections. 
2) No building quotas.  Players may build as little or as 
   much as they like! 
3) Friendly players and large helpstaff! 
4) While no overall theme is enforced, creation of themed 
   areas by players is allowed. 
5) All players can experience learning MUF, the programming 
   language of MUCKS, as M1 programmer status is available 
   to those that ask.

WWW         : http://moosaico.com/
Description :

  The theme of MOOsaico is one cultural connectivity. MOOsaico,
like the world, is woven together out of the individual fabrics
of a variety of local cultures.

  Although real world cultures vary from one to another, they are
forced by circumstance to co-exist in the tiny confines of the
globe, and whatever they collectively form comes to define the
world as we know it. So, too, with MOOsaico.

  What is important in MOOsaico is not what you build, but that
you take a sense of pride in it and that you work to integrate it
well with its local surroundings in order to create a MOO world
that all can explore and learn from.

Mud         : StargateMOO
Code Base   : [MOO] LambdaMOO 1.8.1 (slightly modified)
Telnet      : rwoar.com 7777 [68.46.75.91]
WWW         : None
Description :

After decades of war, the citizens of Earth have finally 
emerged victorious against the Gou'ld. The war, despite 
massive amounts of bloodshed and overall violence, had 
one beneficial side effect. The general population of
 Earth have become aware of the existance of extraterrestrial 
life and of the stargate itself, confirming the beliefs of 
many while at the same time arousing certain suspicions. 
Conspiracies and hoaxes have ensued in smaller cities and 
groups. The overall reaction, however, is a positive one.

This revelation sparked the curiousity of many. Through 
deep-space analysis of data gathered on an offworld outpost, 
specialists on Earth have discovered another gate system. 
Further study revealed that the system resides in a galaxy 
so far away that the people of Earth would have no way to 
generate the power necessary to travel there by any terrestrial 
means. Not even the stargate could muster enough energy to 
make the massive jump.

The power source needed to reach the other galaxy required 
vast amounts of resources to construct, and the resources 
available were limited. It was therefore determined that 
the best course of action would be to send a colony to one 
of the planets in this gate system, so that they could study 
it without the un-necessary exhaustion of valuable resources. 
Several teams were assembled and supplied, and a colonization 
plan drafted. The teams were sent through the gate [at strategic
intervals RAH], and one by one the power sources ceased to 
function. The colonists were alone on an alien planet...

Telnet      : ginkosoft.com 6543 [68.14.6.115]
WWW         : None
Description :

 Caffeine is a fairly new MUCK. We are looking for more players to roleplay in the 
fantasy world we have set up. However, we are also somewhat social, so do not require 
roleplay from our players.

The setting is fantasy. Although the world is still under construction it is more than 
large enough to allow for roleplay. It is divided into areas, each with it's own map and 
news.

We hope you enjoy your stay on Caffeine and get a character, that's right, we want you!

Mud         : The Shadow Wars
Code Base   : [Rom] Heavily modified Rom 2.4
Telnet      : shadowwars.org 4000 [66.225.81.177]
WWW         : None
Description :

 Loosely based on Robert Jordan's Wheel of Time series, this mud is a mix of Roleplay,
Mobkill, and Playerkilling.  We have recently opened up our doors for the beginning of our
first Turn.  Our time setting is a few years before the Aiel/Cairhienin war.  Our guilds are
just getting going, and we have many leadership positions open.
 
 The world of Tel'aran'rhiod has recently been opened up, our talents and channeling code
are closely based on those found in the books.  Wolfkin are available, as is blademaster.
 
There is an unofficial webpage built by one of our players at theshadowwars.tripod.com.

Mud         : A Memoir Of Betrayal
Code Base   : [MUSH] 3.0
Telnet      : betrayal.mushpark.com 2004 [207.8.143.27]
WWW         : None
Description :

 There exists in the Pacific Ocean many myths regarding the
Hawaiian Islands. Some tell the tales of Hawaii's creation as
a result of ancient eruptions of underwater volcanoes. Less
imaginative people try to claim the Islands are nothing more
than small pieces of land that broke off when North America
broke away from Asia. We prefer the old Hawaiian belief that
the islands are nothing less than the fires of Pele herself. The
world is not yet finished. Even now she is being tempered in
elemental flame.
 
A Memoir of Betrayal is a new World of Darkness MUSH set
in Oahu, Hawaii. It is a place of stark contradictions. A modern
city set on the edge of near a tropical paradise. There is beauty
and there is death. Our geographic location provides ample
reason for the Kindred to be in residence. A natural disaster
releases the darkness of the streets to make them perfect for
stalking unknowing among the countless thousands. Mysterious
magical beings favor Oahu because of both its surrounding
lands and the remoteness from the larger over populated lands.
These and more move hidden among the cities of Oahu. And let
us not forget the greatest beast of all... mankind on the whole.
 
We at A Memoir of Betrayal are looking for mature Roleplayers,
who understand the epic journey of the hero. We want those that
understand the true horror of existing as an undead. Come and
begin your journey of personal horror. Come join us in a World
of Darkness.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Patternfall MUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] TinyMUSH 2.2.5 #1
Telnet      : patternfall.xidus.net 7391 [64.124.186.158]
WWW         : None
Description :

  Set only a few years following the Patternfall War,
Patternfall MUSH is designed as a game of politics, plots, and
intrigue. Amber and Chaos are both on the road to recovery
following the war's end, and that road is filled with dips and
bumps of all sorts. 

  In recent years (or turnings, in Chaos), Swayvill has reached
his end as ruler of the Courts of Chaos. Since then, there has
been even less stability in the realm than usual. Likewise,
Random has abdicated his rule in Amber, leaving the realm of
Order seeking even footing as a number of regents take the reigns
and are replaced. Corwin has departed again, as have a good
many of the Amberite elders, seeking their own goals in
undisclosed locations by and large. The children of the Elders
move more visibly throughout both realms, taking the more active
roles left vacant by their parents.

  In all, the realms remain much as they always have, though
interaction between them has grown much improved from where it
began.
 
  [[Patternfall MUSH is a game based on Roger Zelazny's series
of Amber novels, focusing most heavily on the first five and (at
times) utterly ignoring the latter. Features (i.e. characters
seen in the novels) are available for play via application to the
wizard staff, and kidbit characters can be acquired with the
permission of the desired parent (or the wizards). For more
information on MUSH policies and character availablilities,
please look through our news files on the game.]]

Mud         : Shadowrun: Seattle
Code Base   : [MUSH]
Telnet      : shadowrun.dnaco.net 4201 [209.251.21.151]
WWW         : http://shadowrun.dnaco.net
Description :

   Magic meets machine in 2062, a futuristic world where Orks,
Elves, and Troll walk among us - casting off their Human guises.
Insidous corporations have replacedthe corrupt governments in the
balance of power, and the heroes are the nameless souls who are only known
by the title 'Shadowrunner'.  Be a deadly Street Samauri, a net-running
Decker, a mysterious hermetic mage, or a wisened shaman.  You also have
the option to play any of the other major players in the Shadowrun universe,
such as Mafia, Yakuza, Rocker, Reporter, Ganger, Street Doc, and many other
possibilities.

Shadowrun Seattle has a sophisticated 'Matrix' system allowing Deckers to
explore a seemingly endless array of information hoarding systems.  We also
have an advanced Magic System allowing mages and shamans the ability to
explore the higher mysteries of Astral Space and beyond.

Our MUX has been successfully providing a rich online Shadowrun atmosphere
since 1995. We boast a player roster of hundreds, and are looking for expert
roleplayers to join our game.  We have been written up as being 'quite
possibly the best roleplaying experience on the internet.'

Come see what all of the hype is about!

Mud         : Heroes' Dreams MUX
Code Base   : [MUX] Ver. 2.1.18.60
Telnet      : raddrpg.com 4600 [216.194.67.100]
WWW         : http://www.raddrpg.com/hd/
Description :

     Welcome to Heroes' Dreams!  HD is a Multi-User eXperience
(MUX) dedicated to super hero genre role-playing, with a unique
continuity that marries the DC and Marvel worlds together from
each universe's very inception.  There is no 'magic portal' or
'temporal anomaly' here that just flings everyone into one place
at random, nor is this a primarily DC or Marvel MUX which simply
allows characters from the 'other set' to be apped as AFCs or 
secondary characters.  

     Our vision is a MUX where the two are truly melded in 
symbiosis.  Over the years, many super hero MU*s have come
and gone.  Most of them  have focused on one particular comic
universe, while others have taken a more 'free and easy' 
approach, letting in almost anything.  Not all have  been to 
these extremes, indeed many shades of gray have existed 
between the two.  However, Heroes' Dreams MUX takes a 
somewhat unique approach.  We have begun with a sort of 
'Year One' continuity that specifically melds DC and Marvel 
together in a way particular to our choosing.

     The specifics of our theme can be found on our web page. 
Characters from other comic universes may be written in on a 
case by case  basis, but the basic idea here is to make the 
MUX really feel like DC and  Marvel had grown up together, 
not to just cram the two into the same space.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Rafermand
Code Base   : [Smaug] Our own Codebase FeaR 2.1(Looks nothing like Smaug)
Telnet      : mud.rafermand.net 3002 [209.61.158.123]
WWW         : http://www.rafermand.net
Description :

Note:  Please check out Rafermand: Tides of Change, it is
the primary Rafermand mud at this time, there will be more
people online.  

Are you looking for something new and different?   Rafermand 
offers one of the most unique experiences in mudding out 
there.  Rafermand has been around for 6 years and still 
owned/programmed by the original founder.  You will easily 
find a unique game features player owned kingdoms, level and 
classless systems, a quest system that generates random 
areas, mobiles, and treasures.  In addition to this we offer 
a unique battle system offering over 300 skills/spells to 
make it even more interesting.  Instead of offering 50 races, 
we only have 6 races with each race having their own strength 
and weaknesses making the game a lot more balanced than just 
throwing out every race known to man.

Besides all of this, we have developed a very robust 
wilderness system that allows you to modify just about 
everything on it if you are involved in a kingdom.  We offer 
MXP for those running zmud/mushclient and it is used to help 
the learning curve of our numerious commands and hopefully 
offer some graphical support in the future.  

Now is a good time to come join the fun.  There will be new
additions soon that will help out the new adventurer, new
skills and spells to take combat and progress in different
directions, and a new bazaar like trade system where you 
can purchase other people's wares.  Come check us out and 
see why we have players that have been playing 3-6 years.

Mud         : Fort Bloodshed
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH
Telnet      : bloodshed.org 4201 [216.99.217.21]
WWW         : http://www.bloodshed.org/
Description :

It was a hardy breed that settled the Wild West, a variety of
folks from all walks of life: homesteaders, merchants, cattle
barons, gunslingers -- from the humble to the adventurous.
In a thousand small towns they were scattered, across a land
both harsh and giving, etching out what living they could in
whatever manner they were suited to. Lago township wasn't any
different, really. Perhaps a little wilder, more a place for
the brave of heart, but not much different...

This MUSH is a re-enactment of the Wild West as portrayed in
classic Western movies and popular fiction. The setting fits
into the historical context of the Wild West, but allowances
are made for the heroic role-play and the ability of
characters to create their own legends. It does not strictly
adhere to historical accuracies, except in the broadest sense
(i.e. Don't think about taking over the U.S or starting your
own Civil War).

For character ideas, and to get a better idea of the kind of
feel we're looking to create in the game, we recommend the
following movies: Quick and the Dead, For a Few Dollars More,
High Plains Drifter, Tombstone, Pale Rider, Magnificent Seven,
Wild Bunch, Rio Lobo, Big Jake, The Shootist, The Cheyenne
Social Club, Silverado, Paint Your Wagon and The Oxbow Incident.
Also, check out the Deadlands RP game and the Jonah Hex Series,
since anything is possible on Ft. Bloodshed...

have seen before players keep there current skill then

Mud         : Dawn of Betrayal
Code Base   : [GodWars] Lords of War 4.0
Telnet      : betrayal.godwars.net 1025
WWW         : http://
Description :

Welcome.

We are a new LoW4.0 based MUD with some areas of interest
to offer you.

Though the MUD is primarily PK, there are many other ways
to find enjoyment.

Such as player based arenas, and mob based arenas
(the tower, an area to compete for prizes by mob killing).

With alternative quest systems (2 other than cards).

We hope you will not turn away at the first hint of questing,
which we all know can be a drag.

We have cut down on classes to try maintain balance,
but also offer hybrids.

* Demon    (Hybrid(s) - Nephandi, Heretic)
* Mage     (Hybrid(s) - Lich, Skindancer, Nephandi
* Werewolf (Hybrid(s) - Skindancer, Abomination
* Vampire  (Hybrid(s) - Lich, Abomination
* Monk     (Hybrid(s) - Heretic

* Lich        (Vampire/Mage)
* Skindancer  (Werewolf/Mage)
* Nephandi    (Demon/Mage)
* Heretic     (Demon/Monk)
* Abomination (Vampire/Werewolf)

We also feature a dynamic clan system.
Ever got tired of a hoarding leader?
One that never fights for his/her clan's cause?

Ever dreamed of decapitating them and resuming reign?
We hope you will, and take great pleasure in doing so.

Though open for play, some final glitches etc are being ironed out.

We hope you will come check us out, and bear with us.

Mud         : Mosswood Forest
Code Base   : [MUSH] TinyMUSH 3.0
Telnet      : isamu.papervoices.com 6250 [24.222.146.15]
WWW         : http://www.mosswoodforest.com
Description :

  Mosswood Forest MUSH! - Newly opened and being fitted up
currently with appropriate rooms and code. Looking for people
interested in being future players, those who wish to lend a
helping hand, or players of the former Mosswood Forest MUCK.

  The world was created, fresh and new and empty, a playground
for the gods. The gods created a portion of this paradise world
to be different from any that had come before, giving it a cool
climate, harsh mountainous terrain, deep softwood forests, and
huge plains of ice. With time, mortals set to live in this world
came to call this area the Mosswoods, and many strange and
wondrous creatures were created to live within it borders. It was
a sort of utopia where all were accepted, no one race having
dominance above the rest. The gods, however, found themsevles
divided over the ruling of the land, rarely agreeing with the
other, and thus fighting broke out between them, dividing the
gods into two seperate Pantheons.

  Though there had been others areas of the world more beautiful
and more powerful, none were as wondrous as the Mosswoods or its
caretaker, Palda, the goddess of beauty. Truly original things
were rare in the long lives of the gods and all grew to secretly
covet the Mosswoods and their caretaker despite their particular
affiliation with one pantheon or the other. In time, a great war
broke out over this stiatuion, and, thus, the arrangement was
shattered, the land broken, the peace and utopia of the Mosswoods
scattered to the four winds. Lesser beings of the Mosswoods fled
before the combat of the gods, seeking to survive however they
could.

Mud         : Cleft of Dimension
Code Base   : [Rom] 2.4 beta (Heavily Modified)
Telnet      : cleftofdimension.com 9000 [64.215.178.124]
WWW         : http://www.cleftofdimension.com
Description :

  Cleft is a mud that is great if you love to rp. Things from all
places and times come together to form one very strange world. In
cleft, you are the person they write stories about. You are the
Villain or the Hero that shapes the destiny of the world around you.
We have everything from rune mages to mech pilots. Join the eternal
struggle for Balance between Chaos and Order, or just nail people to
burning crosses... There is room for any type of storyline you wish
to write.

We have several basic classes: Ninja, Fighter, Knight, Mage (with
perhaps more on the way), as well as prestige classes like: Dancer,
Dragoon, Monk, Samurai, Summoner that you can apply for if your rp
warrants it. We pride ourselves on the uniqueness of things we have
come up with. If your race that you want to rp is not one of the
races we have availible for creation, ask an immortal to change your
ICrace and we can let you show up on the wholist as anything up to 9
characters in length. We also have customizable equipment slots and
strings, letting you choose what you call the places you wear your
equipment or even what order they are in if you wish. Our areas are
all original (though you may recognize some of them from Final
Fantasy or such). We have a world map that connects one area to
another instead of your normal 'nnnneeeesssswwww' direction to
another area its more like, 'Well you go kinda north east from
Figaro, I'm sure you wont miss it.' We try and use progs to keep our
city mobs up to date on gossip and world events, as well as filled
with in area quests for you to solve for better equipment and items.

Mud         : Frandum
Code Base   : [DUM] Fairly rewritten/extended DUMII
Telnet      : frandum.enst.fr 2001 [137.194.168.89]
WWW         : http://www.enst.fr/~frandum/
Description :

What you need to do:
- quest!
- explore, discover the world history (learn)
- use and combine items to solve puzzles (think)
- talk to mobiles and (only) sometimes fight them (interact)
- roleplay, talk with our friendly Wizards and admins (live)

What will help you do it:
- almost unique code-base (only 2 other MUDs share it)
- very friendly parser supporting an extensive command list
- extensive spell list (and much more than just: hurt, hurt more, hurt deadly)
- original skill system (yes, there is more to skills than percentages and fighting)
- PK limited to Wizards or a parallel world (the Tournament of Death)

What will make you do it:
- killing is (at last!) not needed to gain experience: only questing is rewarding
- coherent and original fantasy world, consistent background, encompassing world history
- a cosmic balance between the three gods can both change and be changed by every player
- guilds scattered throughout the world: quest to gain power and influence (Wizards can also choose a class)
- a unique language system, based on your race (hey, what did this elf just say?)

Mud         : Wallowing
Code Base   : [LP] LDMud 3.2.8-dev.190
Telnet      : wallowing.whatever.net.au 2000 [216.103.105.70]
WWW         : http://wallowing.whatever.net.au/
Description :

Wallowing MUD is quite an old MUD that never really had a lot of players.
It's still there for two reasons:
 
1) So the owner (Stormdragon) can write LPC as a hobby.
2) So old players/wizards can drop by and say hello.
 
The mudlib is sort of based on LPC 2.4.5 with a rather lot of
modifications.  (Want to drop by and say hello to Leo?  He's still there)
 
There are some fairly interesting things in the mudlib, for
example, programmable npcs(stack based programming language, oddly
enough ;]) and map based virtual areas.  There has been a
lot of work done on wizard commands to make them both intelligent and
powerful.
 
So, if you're interested in writing interesting objects/commands, drop by
and say hello.  Hell, if you're interested in playing - you can do that
too. (Hopefully - it's been a while since actual playing was tested)

Mud         : Bourbon and Blood: New Orleans by Night
Code Base   : [Custom] [Custom] TwilightMu* 0.2B
Telnet      : bourbonandblood.com 2300 [204.209.44.23]
WWW         : http://bourbon.wolfpaw.net/index.php
Description :

Are you afraid of the Dark?

Bourbon and Blood brings you deep into the occult underbelly of present night New Orleans. Undead 
stalk the streets, preying off tourists and natives alike, and holy warriors fight a losing battle 
against the encroaching darkness. Here in the City that Care Forgot, the only thing hotter than the 
nights are the countless intrigues plotted in the steamy darkness.

You should be...  

   Bourbon and Blood is an online World of Darkness chronicle set in modern night New Orleans. The 
game is handled via an online Mu* which can be connected to via telnet. We currently support several 
systems, including Vampire: The Masquerade, Werewolf: The Apocalypse, Ghoul: Fatal Addiction, as well 
as our own Infernalist system. Vampire hunters in our chronicle go by the rules set forth in Dark Ages: 
Inquisitor. We allow normal hunters by special request only. We feel that the Inquisitor system better 
mirrors the real New Orleans environment.

   Any questions or comments can be posted up on the forums via the website. We're always looking 
for new players, and we're happy to help with any questions or problems you may have.

Mud         : Methods of Destruction
Code Base   : [Emlenmud] Version 2.37
Telnet      : mod.modmud.com 7500 [66.36.232.97]
WWW         : http://www.modmud.com/
Description :

 Methods of Destruction [MoD] is a serious PK mud, giving players the
choice either to play good or evil aligned characters. Good
homelands are located on the west side, while the Evil homelands
are east. MoD includes a large unique world with 90 mortal
levels, an active immortal staff, and a newbie friendly
atmosphere. Its Gem based magic system provides a challenging
level of complexity for spell casting. The world is constantly
changing, so there will always be something new to find.
Based on a medieval theme, with 12 different races to select from,
MoD is based on the popular Emlen codebase and is one of only
a handful of surviving muds using this base code.

Mud         : Dragonball Saga
Code Base   : [Smaug] Very heavily modified
Telnet      : dbsaga.arthmoor.com 9000 [66.116.74.117]
WWW         : http://www.dbsaga.com
Description :

  Dragonball Saga MUD is dedicated to providing its players with
a fun environment to fulfill their dreams of becoming part of the
Dragonball universe. Begin by picking one of seven races easily
recognizable from the Dragonball shows : Humans (Yamcha,
Krillin), Saiyans (Goku, Vegeta), Halfbreeds (Gohan, Trunks),
Nameks (Piccolo, Lord Slug), Icers (Frieza, Cooler), Androids
(Android 16, 17, 18, etc.), and Bio-Androids (Cell). As you
fight, you increase your powerlevel (PL), and become a more
fearsome fighter. At certain levels, you will gain special
attacks like the Kamehameha wave, Special Beam Cannon, and Death
Ball! You can train in higher gravity levels to increase your
stats, or spar another player to gain far more PL than you would
randomly fighting the creatures you encounter.

  The MUD is filled with areas and characters from Dragonball.
Roshi's Island, Namek, and the Big Gete Star are all here! A new
Afterlife feature has recently been added, as well. Adventure
throughout the Otherworld, visit King Kai, and fight against the
inhabitants of HFIL. There is NO LIMIT to your powerlevel, so the
game is never really over. Player killing is available, along
with a bouny hunting system. There's even a Fusion system being
developed for addition soon...

  So, visit the Dragonball Saga. A large staff of helpful
immortals, players that love the show, interesting areas, and
character choices that will keep you playing well past the first
Super Saiyan level...

Description :

* Fantasy Moon *                              
   The defeat of Chaos was no doubt Sailor Moon's finest moment of glory.
 All of the Starseeds have now been implanted in new people, and the 
Soldiers are reawakening. Some places in Tokyo still echo the Silence
from before the time of Galaxia, and speak to those few who are
sensitive enough to hear it. They warn of a dimensional rift ... 

   We are not strictly Canon here at Fantasy Moon. Our Soldiers will
awaken with no prior memories, although there are clues and
possibilities to remember pieces of the past. The head wizard of
Fantasy Moon wants the basic personalities of the Senshi to be
somewhat canon - IE: Mercury is shy (straight), Venus is cheerful
(straight), Mars is dedicated (probably bi), Moon is naive but full
of love and goodness (not necessarily clumsy, but that would be fun
too.) - She belongs with Endymion, Chibi Moon is 'the spore,' -
possibly bisexual, possibly in love with Saturn, Jupiter is strong
but feminine (sexuality up to the player), Saturn is weak bodied
and powerful (probably homosexual, definitely in love with Chibi
Moon), Uranus and Neptune are lesbian lovers who belong together,
Uranus is duty bound and a fighter, Neptune is more lighthearted but
aloof and standoffish, and Pluto is mostly an unknown. The starlights
are cross-dressers, not sex-changers. Beyond this, we are likely to
be non-canon - even wildly so.

   Come and join us at: fantasymoon.spodzone.com, port 7734.

Mud         : BlazingDarkness
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Scratch Codebase in the Works
Telnet      : mud.blazingdarkness.net 4000 [209.126.160.58]
WWW         : http://www.blazingdarkness.net/
Description :

   The one main thing that we've been striving for on our MUD is a good
amount of realism. We felt that many other MUDs out there were wildly
unrealistic and mechanical in the way the game flows. Hack and slash games
can be fun, but that isn't what we want. Our plan is to make
BlazingDarkness as player driven as possible, and without the random
occurances you see on some games that just don't make any sense. What
you'll find here is a combination of classic old style mudding combined
with with ability to actually interract with other players in a roleplaying
environment. A large amount of the game is hunting in our vast world and
killing your enemies with your normal automated commands and the usage of
spells and skills. That is what makes a MUD a game at all. The new parts of
the game we've added to BlazingDarkness are there to keep you interested,
restore the fun, and you'll want to come back for more. Now involve
yourself with land ownership, a noble hierarchy, clans, the ability to make
things and sell them in your shop, weapon and armor smithing, religion,
advanced spells, and much more. You don't have to just be a mage, cleric,
thief, or warrior. With BlazingDarkness you may find yourself following
several destinies all at once.

Telnet      : simud.org 4242 [128.196.90.90]
WWW         : http://www.simud.org/
Description :

 Walraven is the mud that goes along with the from-scratch SIMud mudlib project. 
We're gearing up for beta, and we're looking for playtesters and a few more 
coders to help.

Some of our neater features:
* Mapped world, down to being able to walk around inside rooms
* Plants that grow and sprout fruit
* Realistic clothing: wear padding over your shirt, under your chainmail
* Automatic grammar parsing: no more writing three messages for one string
* Integrated website with forums (bugs/ideas get autoposted)
* Built-in full screen text editor; web based file editing
* Channels for debugging and error messages for team programming
* Friendly, intelligent, experienced, non-domineering wizards

We're currently working on:
* Mining and other natural resources to fuel:
* Broad, realistic crafting skills to create:
* A dynamic player economy with hireable NPCs in:
* Buildings, cities and empires built, run and destroyed by players.

So if you're looking to do cool things you didn't think you could do on muds, we're 
looking for you. Find out more about us at http://www.simud.org

quickness of thought, communicativeness and cunning, perseverance
and passion. We believe Nanvaent is enjoyed best through deep
involvement with others, making friends - and sometimes enemies,
debating and joking, forging alliances and competing with your
fellow travelers in our world. At its most exciting, Nanvaent is
a scene of touching friendships and bitter conflicts - a place of
extremes, of both honour and villainy, and not a sugary, bland
environment of easy progress, pointless experience gathering, or
tedious, impersonal killing.

our money nor our time.

help out with any questions.

Mud         : Arkadia
Code Base   : [LP] CDlib
Telnet      : arkadia.rpg.pl 23 [212.76.32.53]
WWW         : http://www.arkadia.prv.pl/
Description :

   Arkadia is a Hard Fantasy, roleplaying, Polish-language LPMud. Thanks to
the generosity of Genesis, it runs on CD gamedriver and mudlib, changed and
further developed by us. The main changes have been made to fit the Polish
declension, to hide out-of-character information from the players, and to
make some things more realistic. Thanks to this, Arkadia has a rich, highly
detailed and realistic world, making a perfect roleplaying environment.

   Currently, we have domains based upon Andrzej Sapkowski's Wiedzmin saga
and Warhammers's Old World. Players have six classical fantasy races to
choose from, and some rich-background race and occupational guilds and
clubs to join. All elements of the world are subject to strict coding
standards, which assures them to be detailed and unique, and to follow
their domain's theme.

   All of the above wouldn't weigh a lot without the excellent players we
have. They create most of the magnificent atmosphere and make the world
vivid. If you feel you would like to be part of Arkadia, learn some Polish
and join us! ;)

Mud         : Star Wars K'tor Nebula
Code Base   : [MUSH]
Telnet      : ktor-nebula.game-server.cc 1138 [65.26.236.31]
WWW         : http://www.geocities.com/xi2112/xi2112_files/slide0001.htm
Description :

The setting of Star Wars K'tor Nebula is during the Rebellion era of
the Star Wars universe.  The Empire is in control of most of the
galaxy, the Republic has been dissolved, and the rebellion is
growing.  The K'tor Nebula is located on the fringes of the Outer
Rim between Ord Mantell and Yaga Minor.  The K'tor Nebula is an
important resource for the Empire, as it contains large amounts of
unprocessed ore, chemicals, and gasses.  The Empire is mainly
concerned with the Nebula, and only holds control of the two star
systems very near it in word, and the occasional visit of forces to
them alone.  The game is set up on a modified D20 system.  The game
is not consent based but players must have In Character
justification to kill another.  There are a lot of faction positions
available, sub faction autonomy is a focus and it is easy for
Independents to get ships. Force Sensitivity is randomly decided in
character generation, and for those players who do not get randomly
selected in character generation, the option becomes available to
buy force senstivity with skill points starting at 10th level. Most
races are available, character generation is set up for the core
rulebook races but requests for other races are acceptable.  Player
Run Plots are encouraged and additional experience is awarded for
conducting them, so roleplay heavy individuals will always have
fruits of their labor.  You get experience for being connected, you
get even more for being in a public roleplay room.  Players can
+Award 500 experience 7 times every two weeks, no questions asked.
And have unlimited staff reviewed experience nominations beyond
that.  There are several coded systems and an informative info,
rules, and +help file library.

instability.

will dwarf all other mud projects. It's not exactly server related,
more client end. It has something to do with creating a cross 
platform, ultra-fast 3d mud client, without adding ANY overhead
to the server, and making one universal to ALL muds, then admins 
could take it and make a release specific for their mud. I've got 
the ideas,and some of the know-how, and I've got the software to 
do it, just not the time to slap it together alone.  Connect to
Daggerfall for more!

and developement. If you'd like to get your zones or ideas
into a MUD do it here. If you want to just tear through 
some mobs and build your character, we are great for it.

zones. Our levels are from 1-125, with something to do
at all of them.

CHAOS, the MUD, a gangland city filled with plotting and
evil, killing and bribery. Gangs fight for the city, while
the corrupt mayor Backy stands between. The staff and
players are _very_ friendly. DB includes the basic MUD
attributes, plus it's modern and includes programs for
elevators, subways, mobile phones, apartments, swipe keys,
item caches, heavy safes, a helicopter, planes, and more.

     The MUCK is a Portal linking Countries, each a theme
created/built by players. These include Reciprocity, a
covert (spy) RP country with secrets to be revealed;
Recreations, a player-built country for re-enacting movies,
TV and books; the Pueblo-enhanced area with sounds and
pictures which can be added by players [get Pueblo at the
site!]; FreeForm, a player-built area which allows ANYONE
to edit ANYTHING, no matter who built what! We're waiting
for the newest Country, Sci-Fi Colonies. The MUCK also
contains new programs, including a Computer system for
personal and public-access files and mail and the chance
for any player to build major game areas and join the staff.

Telnet      : podmud.com 5429 [64.216.117.15]
WWW         : http://www.podmud.com/
Description :

  We've planned for Planes of Dominion to be a different mud. This game is 
NOT about pk. We're here for people to role play in a fantasy environment
and to live a life other than their own, not to let people vent stress or
lessen someone else's enjoyment of the game. Player killing IS allowed but
is controlled, and there for role play purposes only. As of now, we have 
40 selectable races planned (includes sub races), as well as many remort
classes to come. There are 6 planes of being, including the prime material
relm (the one used by most players), an underworld, and a heaven like dim-
ension. The other 5 will be populated with remorts who can move freely to
and from dimensions, but for normal mortals, only accessible through very
powerful summoners opening gateways. We have planned a very different way
of doing religion as well as a full zodiac. Roleplay will be personalized
not only for the popular players, but for the normal, everyday player as 
well. We're going to try our best to make everything fair, and let people 
enjoy our mud as much as possible. Area's will be controlled by the assi-
gned immortal and he/she will interact with said player in different ways
making the player's stay on their toes and ready for anything. We're 
going to try and make it as realistic as we can but not so real that it's 
no fun. We're all open to any ideas or suggestions you have. Thank you, 
and enjoy.

Mud         : EternityMUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH]
Telnet      : eternity.imperiex.net 4201 [128.61.35.118]
WWW         : http://eternitymush.cjb.net
Description :

Here is a snippit of our theme. If you'd like more info, 
please check out our website:

  The Elves were a peaceful people, living like Native-
Americans of Earth's history. They dwelled deep in the 
forests, cutting themselves off from the main populace of 
the rest of the planet. The Elves revered the land and did
not approve of stone cities, which represented the 
ultimate distancing from the Grandmother, their revered 
deity. The world around them had become corrupt and despite 
their best efforts, that corruption would have spread to 
the forests and engulfed the Elves. Therefore Grandmother 
warned them that a great asteroid would come that would 
destroy the world. She said she would open a portal to a 
new land, clean and free of sin where the Elves would make 
their new home: Eternity. And so the Elves prepared 
themselves for the journey, gathering with them supplies 
they would need to establish a new camp. Approximately 400 
people walked into the mist-portal and emerged on the other 
side, but there are some still missing. Now that the Elves 
have solidly established themselves on Eternity, other 
people have begun 'arriving' randomly (this can explain 
where your character has been)...and in good time, too, for 
a new race looms on the horizon. It is not known if they 
are friend or foe but time will tell.

Mud         : Worlds of Carnage
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Heavily Modified Code
Telnet      : wocmud.org 4000 [66.11.173.122]
WWW         : http://www.wocmud.org
Description :

The Worlds of Carnage is different from many of the other
MUDs you have played. At the outset you can choose from
many of the standard races for most muds, and you can
choose from several places to make your home. Additionally
you can choose to play with a class or without. Within the
world the skills you obtain depend on the skills you have
learnt formerly. Additionally, your primary stats have a
bearing on the quality of your skills, so any race can
learn any skill up to 99%, but depending on the relevant
primary stats the effectiveness may be more or less.

The Worlds of Carnage also runs on a micro gains and micro
ticks system. This means that whenever you kill a creature,
or perform a quest that has an experience reward, you make
rolls for various stat gains at that time and not when you
gain a level. On that note, there are levels in the game,
but your level is dependent on your experience and as such
can go up and down as your experience increases or
decreases. Micro ticks are like normal ticks except rather
than have you receive some kind of regen bonus every 60
seconds or so, the bonus you would have received is broken
into multiple slices and applied over much shorter
intervals.

For the adventurer who likes attention to detail and
variety, the Worlds of Carnage is almost entirely original
with only a couple of small stock areas kept for historical
reasons (and they are heavily modified). With 16 years of
existence much time has passed to create rich and woderful
places to adventure. Additionally, the Worlds of Carnage
recently absorbed the MUD formerly known as Cythera (which
originally split from WoC about 10 years ago). This has
created a diverse system with multiple continents for
adventure.

Finally, for those that like the wierd and wonderful, or
those who might be interested in building areas for WoC, we
have a Web-based world editor which allows changes to be
made from anywhere and reloaded into the game on the fly.
Rooms, mobiles, and objects can take advantage of the
BlobbieScript MUD scripting language to create amazing
affects and behaviours. BlobbieScript is 100% backward
compatible with the old easyacts system upon which even
mobprogs are based. The difference is that BlobbieScript is
a true scripting language and allows for on the fly
variables, running context management, over 200 built in
functions to do almost anything, and the -> operator to
access virtually every data element of rooms, mobiles, and
objects. Additionally, commands, skills, and spells in the
game can be completely written in BlobbieScript allowing
for live update within the game without the need to reboot.

So what are you waiting for, come get started and immerse
yourself in a world full of challenge and entertainment.


                -----------------------------------------------

private forums dedicated to the clan alone. Clan creators
are able to create clan parent topics as they wish.

us out, we're averaging 30-40 players on during the day.

Mud         : Medieval Theatre
Code Base   : [LP]
Telnet      : metafocus.net 4000 [12.155.142.123]
WWW         : None
Description :

 Every game has its types of players.  Some play the hero,
while others the villain.  From the fool, the thief, and
the merchant to the scientist, the mystic, and the noble,
there is always a niche someone fits into.  The MUD 
experience is a theatre of personalities playing out their egos
on the game stage.  Whether a player comes to conquer all
or to setup a tavern, we want it all to be possible at Medieval
Theatre.

 At this time, we are a development site that is about one
year old (started Jan 7 2001).  We are seeking coders
and builders to help make our world, however, because
of a recent influx of new wizards, we would like you to
write a significant letter of purpose that would clarify
your goals as a wizard and the projects you are interested
in.  Try not to be particularly fixated in this letter as
your plans must be flexible enough to fit into the type
of game world that MT is, which of course, you must look
at before making any implementation level decisions.  To
apply, send your e-mail to the listed address.  Our content is not
very extreme, but we should say that this is not a 'family mud.'
If you watch television, however, most of the content should
be suitable for you.

Description :

classes most of which are divided even further into subclasses,
dozens of quests (with more on the way!), and hundreds of skills and
spells unique to their class, subclass, or race. We've developed a
dynamic clan system and worshiping system where the players have an
amazing amount of control over their clan and are directly in touch
with their God. The Gods of Dark Mists are actively seen in the game
and their wrath, and blessings, can be felt in all aspects of a
character's life.
 
Our administrators are devoted to the game and friendly to the
playerbase, yet we are firm in maintaining the rule of law. The
playerbase themselves are creative and competitive, and quite
friendly. But be warned, the atmosphere at Dark Mists is vibrant with
roleplay and playerkilling both required to make a successful and
strong character. You will need a strong heart and quick wit to carve
out your legacy in Dark Mists. 
 
The game is always evolving, always changing. There is always
something new and exciting to learn or explore or to see. Come see
for yourself.

characters were around and actually used.

Warriors, Skeletor with the Evil Warriors, She-Ra with the Great
Rebellion, Hordak with the Evil Horde and King Hiss with the

that. Just as the original series dealt with time travel, other
worlds and alternate universes, we will explore these
possibilities too.

  This is a two-planet system Mush with room for growth; we
currently have a small player base but hope to grow in numbers.
As such planet hopping can and will occur. We emphasize on
role-playing at He-Mush, this is not a hack and slash mud even
though we do have a combat system.

imagination, this is the place for you.

Mud         : Cosrin
Code Base   : [Custom] none
Telnet      : ogcserver03.onlinegamescompany.net 31000
WWW         : http://www.LegendsofCosrin.com
Description :

Cosrin is a well established, roleplaying and adventure MUD in a fantasy setting. Friendly and easy enough to get into, but challenging, with simply huge longevity for all players. 
Now, for the stat-minded, there are some 8000+ locations, with more being coded and tweaked all the time. Over 400 quests, ranging from the elementary, to the truly mind bending. Hundreds upon hundreds of foes to battle against, and a similar number of non combatant 'innocents' to add flavour around town. Eight different races, and eight character classes provide a wide range of choices when it comes to tailoring your persona, with four large Guilds to join, and sub-guilds too at later levels.
The environment is non PvP, with a strong emphasis on roleplaying, the players ably assisted by the helpful staff to create a truly immersive gameworld. Help files are extensive, and all Guilds have their own mentor programs designed to ease newcomers into their new home. Cosrin is perfect for experienced roleplayers, who will fit right in and find the wealth of material they have to work with is only limited by their imagination. Cosrin is also *the* ideal choice for any true beginner, in both the roleplay and MUD sense - players use it's own trademark 'Wizard' front end to access it, which is fully configurable to your needs, but not so overwhelming that you are sent running for the hills by a three inch thick manual! 
Aside from the above, I can only suggest that you drop in and visit, you'll find plenty of people to help you upon your arrival, and we're always glad to see new faces across the bar!
See you there...first drink is on us...

lucky enough to be able to continue it's legacy!  ...Wow!

Mud         : The Rebirth of Arda
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Rom24b6 heavily modified
Telnet      : arda.linetap.com 1111 [216.94.220.132]
WWW         : http://www.rebirth-of-arda.com
Description :

 Rebirth of Arda is the dreams of 2 people.  We are upgrading and changing
all the time and try to offer an environment that is receptive to player
input.  We offer clans, mobs that act as players IE they will hunt you down,
flee from you, and generally be a nuisance.  We also have done away with the
standard xp by time or alignment factor.  XP is gained on mud based on how
many times you kill a specific mob and how much higher or lower that mob is
then you.  Our mobs also do not have the standard 30k etc hp.  The mobs are
much closer to normal players.  We offer a wide range of races and classes
that can be fine tuned to your desires.  We made several changes of late.  
A new clan was added and an old one was deleted.  Now you can avoid pkill 
simply by not attacking anyone.  This removed the need for a non pkilling 
clan so now all clan members are subject to the rules of pkilling.  Another 
feature that is new is the ability for players to fine tune thier weapons 
thus adding new flags to them for a cost.  New things are always in the works 
at Arda and we welcome you to come give them a try.

Description :

Our world is a realm where there is a constant struggle between the forces of 
good and the ever-growing forces of chaos.

Our world features a fully colored ansi wilderness with a small scrolling map
as you move.  It details special locations, where mobs and players are, and has 
tons of challenging areas to explore.

 +) Huge scrolling color wilderness with true sight
 +) Over 20 races to choose from (some only after solving quests)
 +) Complex statistics per characters that impact them
 +) Free baskets at the inn to store items over reboots
 +) Main, sub, and secondary guilds to join
 +) Complex combat system with skills and spells
 +) Crash recovery system
 +) Public channels (in-game IRC!) and custom channels
 +) Over 600 emotes with over 1400 feelings to express mood
 +) Unique and customizable party system for grouping
 +) Experience splitting benefits new players in parties
 +) Magical armour and weapons, inventory, and lighting system.
 +) Interactive mobs to talk to with quests to solve

ChaosLib has been under development since early 1997, along with ChaosMUD, and 
is constantly being added to - and we encourage anyone looking for fun to come 
and join us!

Mud         : Dark Horizon
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Heavily modified
Telnet      : www.darkh.com 7000 [216.136.9.8]
WWW         : http://www.darkh.com
Description :

 The Aiian people have lived upon the island Sural for hundreds of
years, content with the knowledge that their goddess-given home was 
the only dry earth on the great blue sea. Matters have changed.

A new island has been discovered, its size undetermined, its land 
thick with dark, unexplored forest. Crowded conditions in Sural make 
this new land seem like a godsend, but is it? Now, one hundred years 
after the colony's inception, residents turn a wary eye to the 
uncleared forest about their tiny town-on-a-hill. 'Exactly what is 
out there', they ask themselves. But do they really wish to know?

Dark Horizon is a role-play intensive mud with a colonial/nautical 
theme. Players initially embody new colonists, freshly come to the 
island colony, grasping a deed their new home in-town. Role-play is 
key in DH, and players who perform their parts well will find new 
and exciting roles opening to them, both with their initial 
character, and suceeding ones. Our codebase offers a variety of new 
options, including an all-new wound system, a coordinate grid, far
seeing, sense specific echoes, and advanced ship and sea code.
     Come and join us, as the story unfolds in 'Dark Horizon'.

Mud         : Star Trek: Foundations (bDv2)
Code Base   : [MUSH] Modified PennMUSH 1.8.0 /w ASpace
Telnet      : bdv.gotdns.org 1701 [24.99.15.14]
WWW         : None
Description :

Star Trek: Foundations is the first Star Trek-themed game based in
the era of the "Enterprise" TV show.  Star Trek: Foundations
(previously known as bDv) has been in production since 2001 and first
opened for players in 2002.  In the fall of 2004, it was announced
that the game was being redesigned from the ground up in terms of
code - a project which would streamline the game and ensure that all
aspects worked together.  ST:Foundations (bDv2) opened in March of
2005, and the playerbase was transferred over.  The game takes place
a few years after the show.  However, after 2154, we follow an
original timeline.

The year is 2163, and the galaxy is in turmoil. Many talks have been
initiated by various empires to discuss the need for an alliance of
major powers. The Terran Confederation is trying to prove itself to
larger, more-established empires like the proud Andorian Imperium or
the stoic Vulcan Federation. The warrior Klingon Empire shows little
mercy to those foolish enough to stand in the way of the Empire's
goals, and the secretive Romulans watch all from the safety of
cloaked vessels. Other, independent worlds are in the middle of it
all, some trying to make a profit while others side with larger
empires or conduct illegal business.

Will you play a part in forming an alliance of governments? Will you
command a raiding party of pirates? Will you lay siege to a weaker
empire, or will you foster the bonds of peace? All of these options
are available to you here.

Description :

 Dedicated to newbies and experienced players alike, NetherLand
features a huge, mostly original world of fantasy, providing
nearly limitless possibilities for exploration. For the 
pkillers, you can take part in a clan war, getting war points 
for your clan. For the explorer, you can hop on a horse (or, 
why not, a dragon) and use the automated quest system to get 
quest points that will be used to improve or modify your gear, 
while discovering new areas. For the newbies, you can be sure 
to receive help from your fellow players (we like the 'homely' 
atmosphere of a relatively small player base). If you ever get 
bored, you can participate in one of the regularly run games 
(capture the flag, treasure hunt, base domination to name a 
few). Or you could accumulate gold and buy your own castle! 
But the levelling possibilities are nearly limitless, with 
remorts (allowing multi-classing) and more than 300 races to 
choose from when you reincarnate.

New features are being implemented on a daily basis by the 
active immortal team. Check out our webpage, or just log on 
and check us out :)

Mud         : Ages of Glory
Code Base   : [Custom]
Telnet      :  
WWW         : http://ages.aelia-studios.org
Description :

  Chronicles of Aelia: Ages of Glory is a brand-new free
browser-based strategy/roleplaying game.  Coded entirely
with PHP, Ages of Glory requires nothing more than a recent
version of IE or MoZilla to play.  It has been extensively
beta-tested over a period of about a year to ensure stability
and balance.

Ages of Glory is a strong step ahead of most other free
browser-based games.  It features a graphical map and icons
rather than the pure text found in most free games.  A unique
combination of strategic and roleplaying elements, Ages of Glory
allows you to control individual characters thrust into the
middle of a world at war.  Train your skills, gather equipment
and ancient artifacts, amass a treasury, learn spells, and
enhance your power.  Build cities, recruit and train armies, and
lay enemy settlements to waste.

Inspired by Civilization, Master of Magic, Romance of the
Three Kingdoms, and popular browser games, Ages of Glory offers
an experience unlike any other, and at no cost.  So what are
you waiting for?

Mud         : Dawn of the Immortals
Code Base   : [LP] Custom MUDlib
Telnet      : immortal.org 2000 [immortal.org]
WWW         : http://www.dotiweb.org/
Description :

   Dawn of the Immortals is a fun place with a theme that
varies from Fantasy to Science Fiction. We're currently
rebuilding to an extent due to the theft of our machine but
are happily inviting players.

   Players can play any race they like though we do not have
an actual race system. We felt that allowing players to
customize themselves through stats was less restrictive than
a set of races that predefine attributes such as strength
and intelligence. Players can write descriptions and adjust
their stats to be any race they choose.

   We've got an increasing number of guilds available for
players to choose from and a wide variety of realms for
people to tempt fate in.

   Player killing is available between people who choose to
become members of the secretive Blood Cult but people who
don't feel like player killing will not have to worry.

up the orb which then became the six elemtents, fire, water,

through time, going to every different point in time, races

The realms of King Arthur have changed. Centuries have passed and

of King Larardo Pendragon, an evil faction known as The Farlands

The Elven Counsel has convened and Dhanloria is thrust into what is
sure to be another realm war.

Trust no one. Hide your wife and children. The deities of this world
will enjoy what is about to fall.

The Knights of the Round Table have been disbanded. All that separates
you from victory is the skills you have learned, and the amount of
trust you place in each of your clansmen.

The battle cry has been sounded, do you heed or flee?


You will NOT be disappointed!

Mud         : Mithreal MOO
Code Base   : [MOO]
Telnet      : rupert.twyst.org 5400 [64.192.106.229]
WWW         : None
Description :

  Mithreal is a Middle Earth/Medieval oriented MOO based on a
unique theme that is still in the development process. Its
core lies in a race called the Serydians, the first and
only race created directly by the gods. Their power is
ancient and strong, working with the very essence of the
Universe. This essence, called Lifeforce, is divided into
five parts: Fire Energy, Water Energy, Earth Energy, Air
Energy, and Electrical Energy. Serydians delve in the arts
of working with these energies. Ages ago, a group of
Serydians broke away and claimed themselves to be the gods.
A war broke out that left much of the universe in ruin.
Peace was once again restored and the consorters were
banished from the Serydian lands to other worlds. One of
them was Earth, where Mithreal takes focus. Those who were
banished also lost their memories, and thus developed
different cultures and race mutations over time. Many of
these races are what are commonly thought of in Middle
Earth: elves, humans, dwarves and their like. Others are
unique to Mithreal.

This is just a condensed form of the theme. A better, more
complete version will be available as soon as it is done
being written.

Code Base   : [LP] Nightmare (modified)
Telnet      : slackbox.pghslacker.net 2345 [66.93.60.3]
WWW         : None
Description :

 The 1st Dawn of Reason is an extremely challenging, thoroughly 
engrossing reality. From the moment you log in, you will be 
enchanted by the vivid, full ansi color descriptions, and the 
highly intricate, refreshingly logical and internally consistent 
structure to an extent which you have undoubtedly never 
before experienced.

DoR runs on its own machine and connection, and is exceptionally 
well-balanced and fair.  Anti-cheating rules are actually enforced.  
You can be proud of your achievements on DoR, as people do not gain 
levels by exploiting bugs or imbalances.

DoR is a challenging mud.  Those looking for a place they can
become powerful overnight will be disappointed.  However, it is
the perfect mud for someone looking to earn their levels, and
to be able to take pride in making it to High Mortal, because it
is not something just anyone can do.

When you check out DoR for yourself, you will see a well developed 
fantasy world that has room for humor and parody.  It is not just 
a mud; to those who know it, it is another dimension.

individuals.

oppressed farmers, and the new kingdom stands on the cusp of 
rising into a booming trade empire.

However, the throne of this great land of promise is occupied 
by a king  of failing health, while an appointed Regent maintains
order in place of the fading king. No successor to the throne has 
been chosen yet, and many members of the nobility seek to attract 
the king's favor. Across seas to the east, the kingdom of Cathien 
keeps watch over the large island with its fragile regency, the 
glint of potential opportunity in its eyes.

Connect to Astalyn and enjoy RP in a fantasy-medieval setting. You
can choose the path of the humble commoner, or seek to shape the 
fate of the kingdom.

to our available upper class positions, we're looking for people 
to bring life to Astalyn. Come RP in a malleable environment where
the future is far from set in stone, and you and your character 
may have a hand in many developments! With a small grid and 
active staff, Astalyn offers many RP opportunities. Log in now
and take a look! Feel free to page Griffin, Dragon, or Phoenix

Forgotten Evil is a friendly mud with nice blend of 
roleplay and hack'n'slash. A player may get experience 
through killing mobs, questing or roleplaying. FE's main 
goal is to provide a fun world to 'live' in. 

Forgotten Evil has many features including, an introduction
system, morgue, seperate OOC rooms, advanced language systems,
pets and mounts, a working casino, bury and dig up items, 
ability to subdue an opponent as an alternative to killing. 

When a player reaches hero status, they are given the 
ability to remort as in many muds. They are also allowed
to restring their own items, and use the 'switch' command,
to possess mobs for RP purposes.

Players should stay in character, they don't need to 
spew out thee and though's, just keep ooc and ic seperated.

Forgotten Evil is currently looking for Builders and 
another coder. If you would like to see your work on 
a mud, feel free to stop by!

 X-Men: Evolution is, essentially, the X-Men as teenagers with a few
exceptions.  Storm, Wolverine, Magneto, Professor Xavier, and a few
others are the only true exceptions to the 'teenager' part of the
equation.  The Xavier Institute is located in the small town of

limitless.  The various parts of the theme are the same as other
X-men storylines, Xavier leading the X-Men and ultimately Magneto
leading the Brotherhood.

players are needed for many feature characters.  Despite the
relative early start of the theme in the series there are feature
characters available that were not introduced till the second or

Description :

  AVP: Legend is growing more complete by the day. The Marine race
is mostly functional, and so is the Alien. Predator development is
also way on its way.

AVP: Legend will provide a PK mud with several new twists to MUD 
combat, including free-roaming combat, hostages, highly interactive
enviroments, cover objects, and many other features. Expect a good 
team-oriented fight system with the three extremely developed races.

The Alien is an excellent unit for the hack-and-slashers and 
'key spammers', it has the fastest attack speed in the game, but is 
also the easiest to kill in ranged combat, because it doesn't have 
one of its own. 

The Marine is a potent weapon of destruction, wielding a massive 
arsonal of weapons, ranging from automatic pistols, to assault rifles,
to rocket launchers. Perfect for the equipment and tech-minded players, 
as it relies heavily on staying stocked up on weapons and choosing the
right ones.

The Predator is a mix of both speed and damage, mixing stealth with 
weapons. Great for very strategy-minded players, the Predator is the
hardest race of all to master.

Check back later for more information, or visit the homepage. 
Feel free to contact me at Cyber Aeon 8 on AIM.

monsters that follow and obey you. Or play an Alchemist and 
have to search the MUD for spell components.

balanced (and we find it makes the game much more interesting!)

At level 20 players become a Legend, and gain access to 
more items. They get more skills, and an Estate to defend.

Zebedee is a popular traditional LPMUD that has been running
for 10 years, but with an international user base. Our loyal 
players will testify to its quality :)

Description :

Questo MUD italiano e' caratterizzato da un'atmosfera fantasy dalle 
contaminazioni tolkeniane, in cui i giocatori potranno scegliere 
tra 9 razze iniziali e 15 classi per muoversi in un ampio mondo e 
combattere le loro guerre, partecipare a quest e riunirsi in clan, 
per decidere il destino del regno.

La struttura del MUD e' molto influenzata dal regolamento di AD&D, in 
particolare per la gestione degli immortali che, in seguito al 
cammino intrapreso in vita mortale, potranno giocare ulteriori 36 
livelli con una concezione di gioco ben piu' elevata dell'hack&slash, 
basata esclusivamente sullo sviluppo della propria religione. Se non 
bastasse, Silmaril conta su una comunita' di giocatori poco ampia ma 
molto compatta, che ha sempre dimostrato di saper accogliere neofiti 
per guidarli alla conoscenza di questo stupendo mondo. 

---

In this Italian MUD, players can choose between 9 starting races and 
15 professions in a Tolkien-influenced fantasy world, where they can 
explore a wide world and fight their wars, joining quests and founding 
clans and guilds to decide the realm's fate.

The AD&D rules exert great influence on the Mud's structure, 
especially about Immortals who, after a chosen way in their mortal 
lives, could play 36 further levels, developing their personal 
religions and disregarding the hack&slash way of life.
Besides, Silmaril is constituted by a not large group of very united 
players, who always have received newbies, leading them to the 
discovery of this wonderful world.

controlled clans, race wars, vehicle combat, ranged combat, and many special

Galactic Rim.

victory of the universe? Come find out!

Mud         : Forgotten Dreams - Prelude to Light
Code Base   : [GodWars] Based on FE 2.0 and BotI Codebases, heavily modifi
Telnet      : www.fdmud.com 8585 [204.8.219.131]
WWW         : http://www.fdmud.com/
Description :

Forgotten Dreams: Prelude to light is descended from the old mud
Forgotten Dreams III which was popular and sadly closed. FDIII was in
turn a descendant of the old Battle of the Immortals code. BotI is
now being reborn. New Immortals have taken up management and coding
and are striving to create a fun and popular mud. We are a PK
oriented mud based in medieval times. FD loosely follows the RP of
Whitewolf's popular World of Darkness game, and uses a class system
much like that on old Godwars muds, but with several years of modified
code. Classes include many of the golden oldies as well as several 
unique classes like Mimics and Druids. Recently the unique Angel class
was completed as well as the Hunter class.  The old class Warmage has
also been revamped and reimplemented and open to all. We also have a
fun automated quest system which runs various global questes every 
hour. The quest system scatters quest tokens, collectible items (like 
cards which can be redeemed for equipment), exp tokens, mobs, all 
sorts of fun stuff. We also hold quests by immortals when there are 
many people online, and often give away prizes :)  We are currently 
working on a much more in-depth clan system, with clan powers and
struggles, encouraging the RP aspect of the mud. The playerbase is
currently growing, and it is very dedicated. The imms are friendly,
understanding, and the mud in general is very newbie friendly. If you
want to have some fun drop by and play a little, you might just like
it and choose to stay :) An offline area editor is currently under
construction by Ailen.  The builder is is nearing completion and is
designed to specifically work with our code and we look forward to the
many unique areas that will be built. Olc is also in the works for
people interested in building online. 

*Note for those new to the mud, although the exp may be small, the 
amount needed to gain skills is also small*

Description :

 Welcome to a world of imagination and roleplay.  Kingdoms of the Lost (KotL)
is a roleplay encouraged MUD, featuring over 100 completely original areas.
The vast landscape brings to you the continent of Olerax, and the divided
kingdoms of the land.  Barbarian, undead, sky people, woodsman and more
make up the colorful kingdoms, and any one may be selected upon creation.

KotL provides a location where fun is the essential element.  While the
theme is a mature one, we provide a welcome environment to players of all
ages.  Swords and sorcery fare is the backdrop of the game.  Our
immortals are dedicated to bringing new improvements to the game.

Features found are: Multiple auto-quest locations.  Easy and detailed
character creation.  Tier system that develops classes over 200 levels.
An evolution system to strengthen your race.  Stats grow through use, not
from a trainer.  Mana pools that vary by class.  Custom weapons and
armor.  Player kill is an option, but not required.  Roleplaying
experience earned by interacting with other players.  20 different
religions.  Gems and moxes that can be socketed into equipment.
Runic equipment that gains levels with you.  Details: Scars, clothing
to cover them and physical characteristics that others can actually see.
