Mud         : Martian Dreams MUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH
Telnet      : mush.martiandreams.com 7206 [205.201.58.95]
WWW         : http://www.martiandreams.com/mush/
Description :

  Martian Dreams MUSH is a player-friendly, heavy-roleplay
MUSH based on an original sci-fi theme. The focus is on the
lives and struggles of citizens of the newly-established 
Martian Republic. 

After decades of oppression and exploitation, the Mars 
colony has finally achieved independence from Earth. But 
with this new-found freedom comes a host of new problems. 
The Martian economy is in shambles, factions vie for the 
right to shape the future of the fledgling Martian 
Republic, and Earth has traded a war of bullets and bombs 
for one of economics and bureaucracy. 

On the rim of Mars' vast Grand Canyon, the inhabitants of 
the Martian city Waycross face a host of dangers. Yet this 
does not deter them from their quest to rise from the ashes 
and form a new nation. A nation built on the dreams of 
pioneers, and the blood of patriots.

Mud         : Scattergood School for the Magical Arts
Code Base   : [MOO] [MOO]
Telnet      : www.sgmoo.com 1111 [12.235.106.227]
WWW         : http://www.sgmoo.com
Description :

Scattergood MOO is a Harry Potter based roleplaying game in
which players take on roles as students in a school
stationed in Colorado, USA. It is a completely original
idea, an 'Americanized' school without the Houses that
Hogwarts sponsors. Instead students are placed under one
of the five Advisors we have (sort of counselors).

While it's set in the 1990's (book time), history has been
modified so Voldemort has and will never come to power.
Besides the main school we have extra areas, like Schiller
Academy, which is a school where the Dark Arts are taught
freely to students in addition to their other studies. 

Scattergood is a newbie friendly MOO, but we require
players to adjust quickly to the use of decent English
skills. There aren't any quests or coded spells, it's all
roleplayed to allow the complete freedom of choice to our
players. The game's lots of fun and we're always looking
new ideas and thoughts, so the more creative and inventive
you are, the farther and faster you're going to advance to
options of picking special characters.

Mud         : Legend of Dracon II
Code Base   : [Rom] LOD version 3.1
Telnet      : dracon.betterbox.net 8200 [209.83.132.68]
WWW         : http://dracon.betterbox.net
Description :

  Legend of Dracon II is the culmination of over five years
worth of work.  It is a product of the collective effort of
many dedicated GameMaster, builders, and playtesters.

Instead of calling ourselves a MUD, we at Legend of Dracon
II refer to ourselves as an IRPA, an Interactive RolePlaying
Adventure.  Our emphasis at Legend of Dracon II is RolePlaying.

Legend of Dracon II offers some very unique code.  We have
reworked the magic system to include the ability for mage-
types to increase the power of their spells by investing
extra trains into them.  Our clerical classes have also
been reworked to include different spell groups based upon
the god worshipped by the cleric.

Perhaps the highlight of Legend of Dracon II is the
diversity and uniqueness of each character class.  To this
end, we have almost 450 skills and spells that help
define each class as a unique entity, not simply a
combination of a few other standard classes.

Visit our web page at http://dracon.betterbox.net for more
information or log on and check us out at dracon.betterbox.net 8200!

Gaily bedight, A gallant knight, In sunshine and in shadow,
Had journeyed long, Singing a song, In search of Eldorado.

But he grew old-  This knight so bold- And o'er his heart a shadow
Fell as he found  No spot of ground  That looked like Eldorado.

And, as his strength  Failed him at length, He met a pilgrim shadow-
'Shadow,' said he,  'Where can it be-  This land of Eldorado?'

'Over the Mountains  Of the Moon,  Down the Valley of the Shadow,
Ride, boldly ride,' The shade replied-  'If you seek for Eldorado!'

                 by Edgar Allan Poe

eyes and brutal features, your hair pulled strait back in a
single queue which is worn long and decorated and is a mark of pride 
in your culture. You body is covered with scars from Kanjiko, a form 
of scarring used to decorate your body.

Description :

     This Tolkien-based mud has been around for as long
as Mordor has existed.  In fact, some of the original
coders of Mordor still develop for Isengard.  With a
wonderful and extensive monster, item, and character
database, this mud is famous among Mordor fans and non-
Mordor fans alike for its diversity and it's mix of
exciting combat and depth of its monster and item database.

     The combat system is loosely based on D&D and AD&D,
and people familiar with the combat system of these famous
games will no doubt enjoy the experience of playing on
Isengard.  There are constant improvements and new areas
being added.

     With the addition of clans, guilds, and player shops,
this mud has quite a bit of depth while maintaining the
simplicity that it has always been known for.

Description :

  Mutant High is set in a Semi-Scifi world of the X-Men. It set 10
years post Mutant Registration Act, 5 years post mandatory re-
location of all mutants to 'protected communities'. Players are
allowed 2 Mutant Character but any number of normals. No 'Feature
Characters', this MUSH exists in the same world as the Mutants,
the mutants of the comics and movies existing, however the loc-
ation of this 'community' is in middle of nowhere Arizona with no
contact or connection to Xavier's school for the gifted.

 The Mutant Powers and Attributes are not Stats based but are
approved on a 'balanced character' philosophy. For every plus that
makes you stronger, richer or more powerful than the average
player, you need an equal negative that is your character's weak-
ness. The weakness doesn't have to be publicly known but we don't
allow indestructible characters or invulnerable demi-gods.

 Friendly playing atmosphere, Most Staff positions are available,
Wizards are Hex and Akasha, OOC Staff: Wiley, Jaque and Alistair,
everyone else it is all based on RP ;) Honor system with chall-
enges, an emphasis on RP not stats!

 We are looking for Students, Teachers, Mutants, Normals, Store
Owners, Gang Leaders and pretty much anything else.
Please come and check us out!

Mud         : Zombie the Awakening
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Heavily Modified Circle
Telnet      : zombiemud.net 2150 [199.34.35.8]
WWW         : http://zombiemud.net/
Description :

  Zombie the Awakening has been up since 1995, and still
undergoes constant improvement.  Character Creation allows 
for players to create unique characters, and it's possible 
to Reincarnate and redesign the character if the player 
desires (though it comes with a price).  The world is quite 
large and is constantly expanding, as a team of builders 
toil endlessly (really!  endlessly! we're serious!) to 
ensure that new and interesting things are always ready to 
be discovered.  Several immortals are available for helping 
new players with any questions or problems they might have, 
so even those new to MUDs in general should have minimal 
difficulty in getting started.  One of the key features of 
ZombieMUD is that upon dying, a player does not have to go 
back and hunt down their corpse to get their hard-earned 
equipment back.  Instead, they turn into zombies, who must 
locate the nearest temple to be returned to life.  To 
summarize, ZombieMUD is a unique and fascinating experience 
that's likely to leave you deprived of sleep and too busy 
playing to care, so why not try it out now?

WWW         : http://www.villagerivals.com
Description :

 Village Rivals has been up for about five years.  We
have gone through a couple of bad hosts, which led
to the MUD being down for some time through that
period.  After we have been back up for
approximately six months on our latest server, we
have regained a large number of our former players
and almost all of our active coding staff.  This is
because the people, atmosphere, rooms, guilds, and
other aspects of the MUD are friendly and 'homey'.

 We have five guilds currently in play, with a couple
more in the making.  The currently open guilds
include:
 * Adventurers (we have a real Adventurers' guild)
 * Clerics (with twelve deities to choose from &
   200+ spells and powers)
 * Rogues (with four orders to choose from & many
   skills)
 * Vampires (with five clans to choose from & many
   powers)
 * Barbarians (with 25 skills and more to raise)

 We are also re-implementing our Village Rival
system, which is a simulated player killing system,
that allows players of one Village's citizenship
fight those of others.  Dying in these wars does not
have any effect on the player's normal character!

Drop by and try the MUD, you're sure to enjoy it.

as simple as 'rescue the lost kitten' to as complex as
exploring an Egyptian tomb full of traps and powerful undead.

can view as you explore each room.  Our Guild system provides
a blend of race and class abilities, while our Clans give
more roleplaying opportunities.  We're constantly updating
the mudlib and driver code to add functionality and reduce
lag.  We're a light-hearted group who don't take ourselves too 
seriously and just strive to relax, make friends, and 
maybe slay an orc or two. :) Come on in and take a 
look around!

Mud         : Anarres II
Code Base   : [Custom] MudOS A2-0.99.x series experimental LP driver
Telnet      : mudlib.anarres.org 5000 [195.82.114.164]
WWW         : http://www.anarres.org/projects/mud/
Description :

 Anarres II is an LPMud written from scratch with the objective of creating
a powerful and versatile LPC library. The library environment for
creators is modelled on the Unix operating system with clones of many
important Unix daemons and commands. Features include an extensible
capability based security system and extensible in-shell scripting. Anarres
II uses an internal messaging system to allow internal and external AIs
to interact with the world on the same basis as human players.

In mid 2001, the emphasis of Anarres II turned to building area code to
demonstrate the library, but development of the driver and the library
are actively ongoing as ever.

We encourage technically minded visitors to drop in and have a look
around, the codebase is visible from when you log in. The regular users
have backgrounds in a wide variety of both technical (and nontechnical)
disciplines and welcome discussion.

                -----------------------------------------------

Description :

  It may happen any time, anywhere, in a passing moment: a 
half-heard whisper reaches your ears, a voice both familiar 
and strange, calling your name. You turn to look - and no-
one is there.  The mists are close to you, friend, and they 
hover around each of us.

Those who step in never return to tell what they see on the 
other side. Perhaps there is nothing but death waiting for 
those who follow the path.  Perhaps, however, they find
their way at last through the mists, into Arcana, the land 
within the mists, a world that exists only on the 
sufferance of the Higher Power that supports it and the 
Three that oversee it.  

Arcana as a roleplay world owes its conception and 
allegiance to the myriad fantasy authors its creators have 
read - most chiefly among them C.S. Lewis, but also 
including the Master himself (J.R.R. Tolkein), Robert 
Jordan, Marion Zimmer Bradley, and many others...Please 
treat it with respect.

Telnet      : admiral.umsl.edu 7777 [134.124.15.13]
WWW         : http://admiral.umsl.edu:7779
Description :

 The MOOFrançais is a social french environment giving the
players an opportunity to get free second-language french
classes.  Weither you are a french-speaker that wants to
chat with other people from around the world (mostly from
Quebec and France) or an enthousiastic french learner, we
invite you to visit the MOO and help us build the virtual
Paris!

The MOOFrançais is around since '94, and has recently been
completely re-done to support french accents via telnet
connections.  It also has a web interface based on 'enCore'
that provides actual pictures of players, objects &
locations, plus an infinite possibility of multimedia
contents.  It provides as well a friendly tool for users to
upload their own media.

So come on in!  Et si vous parlez déjà français, venez vous
amusez dans le premier MOO entièrement traduit et
francophone!

Description :

 The Edge of Creation is a Smaug based MUD with a unique
history and a large number of original areas, including
the main city of the land and the newbie academy and
training guilds. We have an extensive range of races and
classes of all alignments, with guilds for each class and
orders for players to join. There are 100 player levels,
and we offer a choice between single classing and
specialized subclasses at level 20 or multiclassing with
up to three classes. We are very newbie friendly, but
offer much for experienced players, as well. The Immortal
Staff is friendly and are always open to questions and
suggestions.  Roleplaying is encouraged and rewarded.

The Edge is a very newbie friendly place, but we also
offer much for experienced players. Questmasters to send
players on specialized quests across the lands, and with
over 700+ skills and spells no two characters are alike.

The IMMS are friendly and are always open to questions and
suggestions.

Log on and check us out!

We would love to have you visit us and hope you can find a
MUD home with us.

Mud         : New Worlds
Code Base   : [Custom] LP Mud
Telnet      : www.newworlds-rpg.com 4002 [207.235.90.9]
WWW         : http://www.newworlds-rpg.com
Description :

 New Worlds is a full featured Roleplaying Game. Offering several unique
and powerful guilds, races, politics, religion, justice, economy, and a
storyline that is mostly player controlled.

 The administration does not control Gods or Kings or other power NPCS in
order to control players. We let the players do the dictating on where the
plotlines evolve so long as it follows the genre and the structure of the
main storyline.

 The key to our game is that we not only stress roleplaying, we demand it!
While you can fight and adventure and battle in New Worlds, the first
element of the game is Roleplaying.

 This game is also sponsored. There is no cost associated for players. No
advertising, no emails, no donations, no nothing associated with costs. The
game is Free in the purest sense of the word.

 The bottom line with this mud is simple: Play it for a week, and show your
style of roleplay, and we guarantee you will find a home here. The proof of
our excellent roleplayer base is that we have about a 40/60 ratio of women
and men players.

 Check it out, you won't be disappointed (unless you can't roleplay).

 ****
 We encourage you to visit the website to see the features of this game.

 While our player base is just beginning to grow, realize that we just
opened in June of 2004, and if you want to be part of the growing storyline,
we would advise you to check out the game soon.

Description :

DoomMUD has returned once again.  We are very excited
about the many changes we have brought to the game.
We have retained the old multiclassing system however we
have added a few twists, including a detailed remort system
with over 10 remort only classes to choose from.  Aswell
we have designed a unique trade system, choose to become
an armorsmith, a weaponsmith or even an alchemist.  Use
your knowledge to raid keeps, gaining the ability to take
control of a keep for your clan.  We have implemented a
huge clan system which includes many titled ranks for
members, huge clan compounds, clan treasuries and many
other unique features.  The newest change that we are very
excited about is our own unique mobile trigger system which
has been implemented alongside an 'active quest' system.
Take part in huge quest arcs that make it seem as though
the creatures are interacting with you just as much as you
are with them.  

Whether you are an old veteran or a new player to DoomMUD,
come out and have a good time, we are always looking for
new faces.

Description :

(The Eternal Forest is a derivative of The Forest's Edge
 base)

The world of the Eternal Forest stems from the depths of
fantasy, a world in which conjurers and con artists mingle
with warmongers and holymen.  It is a realm where clans
battle for superiority...as do individuals who care nothing
for the unity the organizations provide.

It is a world of high fantasy, imagery with which everyone
is familiar, though the texture of the world is different.
New cities, forests, swamps...areas of all kinds wait to be
explored by the brave and to claim the lives of the
cowardly.

Come and explore this brave, new world...join those who
have already survived the seasons of The Eternal Forest.

Special Features Include:

Many additional areas have been added to this code base. 
Settable aliases. 
Automated auction. 
All items/pets save and there is no rent. 
Introduction/Befriend Commands with no limits. 
Mail System. 
Reagent based magic system with spells that can be leeched. 
Shops can customize items given the correct ingredients. 
Hierarchy based skill system where skills improve with use. 
Multiple items treated correctly, i.e. 2*loaf = two loaves of bread. 
Races which make a difference - trolls can eat corpses, etc. 
Banks which can store gold as well as equipment. 
Socials that vary from race to race

  Denver is now THE most popular Shadowrun MUSH on the Internet.
A quick thanks to all the players who are making this possible is
in order.

  Shadowrun - Denver is oriented towards players who have had
some experience in RPing in Shadowrun, whether online or in TT
play. It has a very friendly, open atmosphere between players and
staff, and is intended for people to have fun, not model a
'realistic' Shadowrun world. To apply, connect to the MUSH, read
the application policy, and follow the instructions there.

  Our chargen has often been said to have the best code of any
of the Shadowrun MUSHs. You can create anything from a gun-toting
Street Samurai to a Rogue Doctor plying the shadows to help who
he can and make a profit. We are currently using SR3, Magic in
the Shadows, the Cannon Companion, Man and Machine, the Matrix,
some portions of Rigger 3, and State of the Art. All character
types are welcome, with no slot restrictions.

  For more information, why not visit our Web site? The document
system has been fully integrated into our home page - you can
view the +news and +help online without even logging in! You can
also use the Java based MUSH client on our page to log in to the
MUSH from any computer connected to the 'net.

Mud         : Star Dart Alpha
Code Base   : [Unknown] Derived from the Star Dart codebase by Fred Haslam
Telnet      :  
WWW         : http://stardart.funkychickendesign.com/
Description :

  Star Dart alpha is an engrossing Java-based combat mud,
where your only quest is to surpass the other players and
achieve galactic domination.

Star Dart alpha became stable in January 2002, and new
features are still being added on a daily basis. We
encourage players to interact with the development team
in-game and in our forums, and this interaction is
frequently the basis of upgrades to the game.

Unique to Star Dart alpha is the concept of a periodic
reset of the universe; depending on the arena, the universe
may revert to it's unaltered original form at some interval
between a few hours and a week, depending on how the admins
have set up the arena. This way players can chose their
their level of committment to the game (since playing Star
Dart alpha is generally an intense experience).

time interacting together. You begin by generating your own character,
with strengths and weaknesses which are individual to you. You choose your
class, and your race. Next you are put into a medieval world, where there

thief, hiding and stealing gold off players and monsters. It is your choice,
so choose wisely!

download it, and play together. It can be a little confusing at first, but
there is an ingame help section (activated by typing 'help' at any time).

Mud         : Coastal Legends
Code Base   : [LPMud] MudOS driver
Telnet      : 69.148.195.153 4500
WWW         : http://www.coremud.org/legends/
Description :

Coastal Legends is custom-written MUD, designed according to the new D'n'D
(3rd Edition) rules.  If you're into Dungeons and Dragons, we invite you
to visit!

Our combat engine has been coded completely from scratch, and features a 
unique grid-like system that makes range and line-of-sight possible.  This
makes combat a more tactical experience than pure hack 'n slash.

Additional MUD features:
o DM-led campaigns for adventuring parties.
o Roleplaying strongly encouraged: up to 15-20% of your experience may come
  from roleplaying awards.
o Designed for D'n'D players, by D'n'D players; not an AOL kiddie chatroom.
o Intelligent NPCs give pursuit when attacked, and automatically reselect
  their targets when 'tanking' is detected.
o Huge 'Outside' map: Over 210,000 virtual rooms to date.
o Baldur's Gate style 'Journal' keeps track of important events and notes.
o Totally custom: mudlib and world written from scratch, nearly 1 year in
  development.
o Our own MUD client: http://www.coremud.org/legends/wincore.html

As of this writing, Coastal Legends is a few months away from officially
opening, but players are welcome to login and help us playtest.  Please see
our website for more information.

Description :

We, the staff of Babylon 5:Rising Star, welcome you to the game.
 
Our vision is to provide you, the player, with a role play environment set
within the context of the Babylon 5 universe, in which to play, make friends
and, above all else, have fun. To this extent, the staff will provide you
with the area, and the tools, to make this place as close to the vision of
the show, while not burdening you with complex code.
 
We do not intend on recreating the show verbatim on this game. Instead, what
we will provide the backdrop, and you, the player, will decide the course of
role play. The players that make up this game will be the ones to write its
stories, to determine its fate. Nothing, from the moment we set the game in
motion, will be a predetermined fact.

in education regarding Safe, Sane, and Consensual BDSM, and
personal research in that area is encouraged. Based in a
world of enchantment, magic, and fantasy, we welcome all
forms, furry, humanoid, or otherwise, we are roughly 50%
furry and 50% otherwise. All users must be over the age of
18 and @pcreates are based either on an email sent to
request@lejardin.org with a character name and a valid
email address or by contacting a Wizard online. No requests
from freemail addresses will be accepted.

While the theme is based on BDSM, that is, Bondage and
Discipline, Dominance and submission, and Sadism and
Masochism, roleplay of all sorts is encouraged and areas to
evoke roleplay will develop and grow as the world does.
We have no quota system for building and plenty of room for
expansion and new ideas, all new public areas must pass an
inspection by the building staff.

Currently we are open to new players, builders, and coders
to fill our world with excitement, roleplay, and adventure.

The Twisted Kingdom is the hinterlands between reality and madness. A place
where gods and monsters stalk the mist, where dreams and nightmares define
reality. For most, it is the greyness of shock at tragic news. For others,
the thin line of lucidity as they plunge into the abyss. Some, though, some
lucky few manage to land there, balanced precariously on the razor edge of
sanity. The rest?  Well, they're born there.
 
Ashes to ashes, and dust to dust, or mist, as the case might be. Most
denizens of the mists, are made of the mist. Expelled fully formed from
it's depths to live their alloted time seperate. In some cases whole, in
others .. not. Some of these fantastic creatures banded together, forming
packs, then tribes, and in time grew to cities and kindgoms, carefully
tending the land their dreams made, defending themselves from the
nightmares, organizing religions, making machines, and learning to live
beside that which gave them life, and that which will someday, take it
away.
 
They grew old, their children and grand children matured, and eventually,
returned to the mists from which they were born. And that is where you find
yourself, thrown into the lucid illusion, or born there, or merely passing
through on your decent into madness. There are gods you may pray to, if you
think it'll help. It probably won't. The gods are sometimes more trouble
than they're worth, but they certainly make life interesting.

Mud         : Star Wars Roleplaying Forum
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH
Telnet      : rpforum.org 9999 [68.90.68.66]
WWW         : http://rpforum.org
Description :

  The Star Wars Roleplaying Forum is an interactive, online forum 
for storytelling set in the Star Wars universe. It is the marriage of two
ideas: 

- The Forum Project for Interactive Fiction, a set of principles and ideas
behind community-based fiction developed over the last several years, and 

- Our interpretation of the Star Wars Universe. Ours is significantly darker
than 'canon' Star Wars, since we do not pander to children and are not
interested in selling merchandise. We try to forget, for example, that Ewoks
or Gungans exist. This is a universe in which people struggle to survive and
fight for their freedom, and they bleed when injured. It's 'Star Wars Noir.'


The Star Wars Roleplaying Forum is the first MUSH to drop the idea of the
virtual universe in favor of the community forum approach. More details on
our philosophy can be found here: http://rpforum.org/revolution.html. 

Our goal is to provide the community with the tools it needs to create
stories, player-run and player-driven plots, and conflict resolution systems
that enhance and encourage roleplaying instead of arcade-style combat. To
that end, we have designed and built several systems to support our ideas: 

- An entirely new, turn-based space system adapted from the d20 revised
space system and built from scratch 

- A Guest GM system that grants regular players temporary GM authority over
players who accept it 

- A scene manager that takes care of the math behind initiative calculation
and handles pose order, but doesn't make you use coded '+attacks' or
anything of the sort 

- An NPC library for GMs to create and maintain hundreds of unique
characters as well as basic templates and give them the props they need.

Code Base   : [Aber] Dyrt
Telnet      : dragon.mudzone.com 7000 [217.12.146.73]
WWW         : None
Description :

  Founded 5 July 1991 in Aachen, Germany, Dragon has been online consistently
for over 12 years, longer than any other AberMUD. In that time, Dragon has
evolved, yet remains true to a tradition of friendship and fun, welcoming
players new and old. Many MUD Gods ran on Dragon in their newbie days and
joined our venerable wizlist. We'd love to see your name there, too.

Dragon uses a modified Dyrt 1.0 codebase and retains most classic AberMUD
features as well as offering many unique zones and mobiles. 27 quests are
available, some of them exclusive to Dragon, with various new quests in the
works. Dragon is an old-style mud with periodic Resets, so players are wise
to remember where their favourite equipment can be found and make maps so
they don't get lost. Combat is simple, but will become more challenging as
we add skills and spells. Playerkilling is not allowed except in the arena
and PK tournaments.

We invite you to enter the Dragon. Adventure, explore and enjoy!

be considered.

are damaged, a space anomaly has taken away one of Tatooine's last
redeeming features: You could always leave it.

lightspeed can't be made. Every day, new arrivals crowd this 
lifeless planet, and with an ever-dwindling stock of supplies, 
tensions are rising. Smuggling operations have been shut down by 
it, and the crime syndicates aren't happy. Suddenly, moisture 
farming looks like a viable career. Even the Empire is trapped in 
the system, and there's little chance of any reinforcements coming
to such a remote planet.

Even so, word of the Empire's defeat at the Battle of Yavin has 
made it to the planet, amid rumours the rebellion could be here. 
As people sell their most prized possessions for their next meal, 
rival gangs clash, and tensions mount. In this one system, 
victory could cause a morale rise that would affect the civil war
throughout the galaxy...

Mud         : Geas
Code Base   : [LP] DGD
Telnet      : geas.franken.de 3333 [194.94.249.6]
WWW         : http://www.geas.de
Description :

    If you are tired of each 'new' MUD being the same as all the others, 
Geas is the mud for you. Geas is unique, not a standard mudlib. There are 
NO stock areas, no levels, no classes. There are no 'global shouts.'

    Geas features a 100% original world with a rich, detailed background. 
Races are truly different, in stats and appearances, in their history, 
traditions, and the reactions of other people. Geas boasts a fully formed 
pantheon of gods, each with their own aspects, powers, and relationships. 

    In many MUDs, advancement is limited solely to monster killing. Not so
in Geas, which features a realistic learning-by-doing skill system. Players
improve the stats and skills they use - no fighting trolls to improve int.
A player can focus on the fighting skills of a warrior, the sneakiness of 
a thief, or the craftsmanship of a master smith. Four kinds of guilds are 
available: professional, layman, race, and craft, and a player may join one
of each type - or choose to go it alone.

    When it comes to fighting, Geas offers a realistic combat system, 
involving much more than just sitting back and watching hits scroll by. 
Players take an active part in fighting through a variety of specials. 
Armours are layered and crafted to protect specific body parts, while
weapons have different capabilities, depending on weapon and armour type.
Oftentimes in combat, strategy is the difference between life and death.

    The world of Geas has been more than three years in the making before
being offered to the general public, and it is anything but static. It is
growing and changing through a staff of active and knowledgable wizards,
with help and ideas gladly accepted from players as well. To learn more,
come in and try it out for yourself. A whole world is waiting for you.

powers and may be challenged by any hero who wants to try his (or her) hand.

from each are exclusive to the other and are used to purchase different
items.

will you be standing on your feet or lying in a shallow grave? Above all,
can you rise above the bloodshed to become the best of the best, the
greatest of the great? Or will you fall to your weakness, never to find
glory?

dragons that form a veritable army to safeguard 
their race against the Haaraki, a race of sentient 
reptilian aliens bent on destruction and colonization. 
Me'stad is full of new and interesting things, from 
the five pets available to players to the extensive 
Alliance groups to the well-known Griffin Eyries and 
Dragon Dens. Feel free to come visit, guest connections 
are available. Character generation is relatively easy, 
requiring only a description and brief history.

Mud         : Revelation
Code Base   : [Custom] Server uses a custom protocol, NOT telnet.
Telnet      :  
WWW         : http://www.veraxin.net/revelation
Description :

 Revelation is a non-standard MUD, because it can not be played
via telnet. Instead, there is a small game client that players
can download from the game's website. The client offers a slew
of features over the simple text-only nature of telnet.
There is an entire interface for the game, including a world
map! If curious as to what the client looks like, there is a
screenshot of the main screen at:
http://www.veraxin.net/revelation/client.jpg.
Please note, the client is currently only for Windows.However,
there is a Macintosh version in development.
 
As far the game goes, well, check out the website.
Revelation is a new game, and it is updated daily; we have a
small team of dedicated developers, (which is also growing) who
are commited to making this a great game. We're still early in
development, but most definitly will warmly welcome anyone who
stops by! Come try the game out. You may find it to be a
refreshing change from playing standard MUDS over telnet.

Mud         : Cuendillar MUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] TinyMUSH version 3.0 patchlevel 3 #3
Telnet      : cuendillar.org 7200 [206.80.111.128]
WWW         : http://www.cuendillar.org/
Description :

A wind rises in the Mountains of Mist, sweeping down through the streets
of Caemlyn, circling around the straightlaced avenues of Cairhien, swirling
about the mountains a wary man calls The Dragonwall. It was not the 
beginning. There are no beginnings nor endings in the Wheel of Time. But 
it was _a_ beginning.

Storms invade the countryside, striking all at once. Rains of fire strike 
the lands, burning and killing dozens, if not hundreds caught in the path. 
The Aes Sedai are scrambling, some whispering that the Last Battle is nigh, 
for a major sign of the Prophecies of the Dragon have come about, and surely
that means he is reborn. Nations are unsettled, leadership is unsteady. 
Turmoil strikes the lands.

Cuendillar is set in a mirror world, as established by Jordan in his works,
where the events of the novels have not come to pass in exactly the same
manner. The world sets forth towards its own destination, striking its own
path along the way. Characters from the novels will not be present, but 
the game offers many of the same character types one would find in the
books. 

Cuendillar is operated with the permission of Robert Jordan. All players
are required to read: NEWS PERMISSION when they log into the game.

Code Base   : [Custom]
Telnet      : ke9.com 23 [208.45.16.120]
WWW         : None
Description :

 INFERNO. Right now... the clash of swords rings around a warrior, in a
battle of life and death. Right now... a mage summons arcane energies to
battle fierce creatures. Right now... a monk battles without armor or
weapon for his cause, light, twilight or dark. Right now... the sound of a
hammer on anvil rings out from the smithy, where a smith works to forge
powerful weapons and armor. Right now... a weaver works with a loom and
spinning wheel, fashioning fine clothes for her customers. Right now...
the heat from the jeweler's forge lights the face of an artisan, crafting
intricate jewelry from precious metals. Right now... the thud of a
pick-axe digging into a wall resounds through tunnels deep in the earth,
as a miner carves through rock and stone, seeking magical metals and
precious gems. Right now... a thief pads across the rooftops of the City
of Twilight, looking for his next mark. Right now... there's a whole world
of adventure out there, waiting for you, where people from all across
the world gather to do things most people only dream of. It's out there... 
Right now... waiting for you. Inferno

Mud         : The Towers of Jadri
Code Base   : [Rom] Almost completely recoded
Telnet      : 67.183.158.242 4000 [67.183.158.242]
WWW         : http://67.183.158.242
Description :

The Towers of Jadri is a completely original roleplaying oriented MUD
without the restraints of classes and levels. A unique system of magic
and magic-like talents provide large possibilities for characters
while even those without magical abilities may rise to fame and glory.
With thirteen guilds, the possibility of joining or creating a noble
house, and bonds of friendship, it is easy to find a group to play
with.

The world is full of history and places to visit, with fifteen current
cities and 11 nationalities to choose from. Character creation is
simple, and we are newbie accessible with a channel that can be used
for help even in creation (When connected, type "New [message]" to
communicate with other players). Both players and staff are
knowledgeable and willing to help new players settle into the world.

 The world is easily huge by just counting confines of city limits,
but a giant world map complete with more than five types of effective
terrains and intercity carriages between some cities make the world
simply staggering in size.

Mud         : Isle of Shadows

Telnet      : 24.56.74.34 4510
WWW         : http://isleofshadows.net
Description :

 Isle of Shadows is an adult-oriented, BDSM themed mush. 
The setting is based on islands with different features and
themes. There is built-in code for listing kinks, and a
customised description tool written specifically for us.

Shadows has been up and running since 1997, and has recently
changed staff, and code base. We are now running on MUX with
staff that have all been on Shadows since 1997.

Registration is open, but for your new character to play, you
must consent to the terms of service (which basically says
that you will see adult content, and accept that), and submit
your full name and date of birth. Any players that we learn
are not over 18 years old will be banned and deleted.

RP is allowed, but there is no set RP structure in place. Most
people treat this as a social place where they can feel free
to talk about their sexuality, even if it is far from the
mainstream, and connect with others that are like-minded.

 Chaotica has developed over the last five years into the most unique and
innovative game available. We have created an atmosphere that is so
immersive that you will find yourself interacting not only with other
players but with the mobiles as well. In your journeys through Chaotica,
every path will be filled with new and exciting adventures. Multiplaying
allows you to experience the delights of the game through any character
you wish to become, from the herculean warrior to the subtle and potent
mage. Journey each character separately and explore their individual
talents or band them together to form a force to be reckoned with - the
choice is yours! Some of the features which make Chaotica so special are:

* Three planes of mortal existence - acolyte, hero and champion.
* Fully personalisable player houses.
* Player-run clans, guilds and orders with player-buildable halls.
* Life-changing deity worship system.
* Gambling areas for you to lose your hard-earned gold.
* Ranged weapons allowing you to fire on opponents from a distance.
* Questing options.
* Arena contests.
* Remort-only races, classes and deities.

Chaotica opened in Easter 2001, allowing everyone to become part of this
truly amazing creation. The hard-working and dedicated staff of Chaotica
will prove that this will become the 'blockbuster of the fantasy world'.
** Dreams are what makes wishes come true...  in Chaotica! **

Description :

  Welcome to Medieval Times, where magic users and melee types come together
to defeat powerful dragons, grand wizards, and the evilest demons known to the
land. Medieval Times has pure and hybrid classes and races, we have a physical
and elemental damage system, trade type skills, auctioning system, ANSI color,
over 60 unique zones, millions of NPCs, level based armor and weapons, along
with class and race restrictions and bonuses. We have a remort system where as 
a level 50 mortal, you may choose to remort, starting back at level 1 but you
now can achieve level 100 (Hero), gain your skills back at a sooner level, aquire
new skills, and special rage attacks and defenses at 50+. We here at MT love
ANSI graphics and provide a unique coloring display designed to enhance your
playing experience. You can also do much more than hack and slash, we incorporte
mob classification and random items are dropped that can be used in certain trade
skilsl and quests. Come conquer our realm!

Mud         : Vampire's Lair
Code Base   : [GodWars] [Modified DarkCity]
Telnet      : slayer.kyndig.com 3500 [216.40.244.64]
WWW         : None
Description :

  Come mortal, don't be frightened, venture forth and accept
your new fate. Roam the lands of night, enter the plains of the
screaming; don't be afraid, embrace your new Destiny. You have
been chosen, offered the rare chance to glimpse the feuds between
the clans. You have been chosen to walk with the kindred, but are
you brave enough to enter the lair? Are you brave enough to live
in eternal night, to sacrifice daylight to forever become one of
Caine's childer?

  Vampire's Lair is a heavily modified Godwars based on the
World of Darkness. Classes available include vampires, ghouls,
the garou, and mortals. As we are set in the dark ages, there are
certain changes, such as Cappadocians instead of Giovanni, etc.
Our goal is to be the closest we can to the official books. If
you see a way we can improve and become closer without completely
screwing up gameplay, let us know.

  Two cavets before you enter the Lair. First, this is a
roleplaying mud. While we do have an arena where you can
challenge any player on whom you can see, if you prefer not to
roleplay when you're PKing and learning and so on, I suggest you
look at our sister mud, Dark City, at darkcity.godwars.net, port
3000. The second cavet is closely related. Classing certain
powerful vampiric clans and garou tribes involve an interview
with immortals who are knowledgable about them. If your heart's
desire is to embrace ultimate good/evil... just make sure you
know them, as the official books say, and you should EASILY be
able to pass our interviews. If the extent of your knowledge is
what you know from playing other muds, there are other
clans/tribes available that don't require the interviews.

Mud         : Dark Castle
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Heavily Modified and ReCoded Diku
Telnet      : dcastle.org 6666 [69.193.253.162]
WWW         : http://www.dcastle.info
Description :

  Dark Castle is an exciting and long standing MUD open
to players of all ages. DC boasts an active and free
thinking Immortal staff who rarely censor language,
violence, or actions.

With over 100 all-original areas Dark Castle MUD is a
challenge to both new and experienced mudders alike.

Some of Dark Castle's more notable features include:
-A detailed and highly developed player-run clan system.
 (Choose from both roleplaying and non-roleplaying clans!)
-A 'Meta-Physician' where stats are purchased...at a price.
-A vast array of items, mobs, zones, and storylines.
-A good but not excessive variety of races and classes.
 (Some classes include: Monk, Bard, Druid, & Anti-Paladin)
-Both Immortal and Game generated Quests.
-Some of the most detailed mob AI available.

Players new to mudding should certainly feel free to seek
an Immortal for advice as not all of Dark Castle's denizens
work for the 'good-guys'.

The game itself has been completely revamped within the
last year and is fully operational on fresh playerfiles
as of June 1, 2004. With improved coding and balance, and
an exciting new quest system, Dark Castle is back and
better than ever!

Mud         : The Dragonball
Code Base   : [Smaug] Heavily Modified
Telnet      : thedragonball.wolfpaw.net 1202
WWW         : http://members.cox.net/thedragonball/
Description :

 The Dragonball is very small with only a small starting area
for players to interact though we continue to grow everyday.

Unlike most dragonball themed muds, here you do not gain
powerlevel just by hitting an opponent, instead your
powerlevel increases along side your skills and experience.

We have all of the standard races installed and are 
currently working on majins and kais. We currently offer 
spaceships, both as preset transports and also personal 
ships that players may purchase to travel around the galaxy.

Here skills do not increase through use like the typical
smaug mud, instead you must study a skill to increase its
level. Also, as your skills level increases, it has a chance
to evolve into a more powerful skill.

There are many more features but to find those out you must
find out for yourself.

Mud         : SoulMUD: Age of Dogma
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Beyond Heavily Modified
Telnet      : soulmud.org 4242 [66.93.54.70]
WWW         : http://www.soulmud.org
Description :

Hello there wanderer and adventurer of worlds.  

If your here, then your likely looking for a new mud to play on. 
Well look no further, you may have found what your seeking, and an
unexpected find it is at that.  

SoulMUD offers ample character advancement.
-4 Character Difficulties (Life Based Permadeath or No-Permadeath)
-6 Mortal Classes
-20 Avatar classes
-Single, Dual, Triple and Quad Classing. 
-12000+ rooms (140+ operational zones).
-800+ skill based abilities.
-Mobile growth over time.  
-Ingame Event System.
-Vaults for all characters.
-Deep ansi color system.
-Alternative 16 sign zodiac
-No rent :)

Commands such as scan, astralbody, memorize are the tip of the
iceberg.  Resurrect to return to your temple and retain your 
equipment without the hassle of returning to your corpse, or 
spirit talk to communicate while dead.  A fully customizable 
color configuration is available, as well as a variety of prompts.
The entire guild system revolves around characters levels, equip-
ment levels, and a complete skill-autogain system in all of the
abilities.  There are even skills such as forge, brew, inscribe 
and jewelcraft to create your own (though often higher level) 
items.   Guildmasters are known to imbue character objects while
leveling.  

An in-game event system, which is based upon time and cosmic forces
will run events upon a cosmic schedule, to offer quests and a change
of pace once every few hours.  Quests and Karma, wheee!   

Long term character play offering up to 320 character levels, and
feasably no 2 characters can ever end alike.  Due to difference in
character stats and equipment over time.  The web page does hold a
rough database of all abilities in game to help understand the 
system.  The web page also contains an equipment database, listing
all objects which load in game.

The world is not easy by any means, but what, if ever, is worth
while is ever easy.  It is not a simple mud, it is not an easy mud,
how ever it is a very Gud Mud.  

Those that do play enjoy it tremendously.

Mordenaire played his final card to escape from eternal imprisonment. 
A millenium was plenty of time to prepare for his final gambit,
'Undeath'.
  After successfully escaping his captivity, he thought, "Perhaps to 
make the transformation complete, a new name was in order. After all, 
Mordenaire was dead, and he had been reborn into something new. Time 
to write a new book in history, something that will never be 
forgotten. A legacy. That was it, 'Aabsolom's Legacy'."

                       **Quicklist of Features**
 *Aabsolom's Legacy, is a fantasy mud, human, orc and undead aligned 
races/hometowns.  As the 3 factions war, PK greatly incouraged as 
there are racial raids, and awesome clan code. 
 *RP is encouraged, and special rp flags, (vampires and 
angels) can be earned through RP, as well as other immortal rewards. 
 *Quest areas with mini tasks for the chance to learn new skills or 
spells, and gain special equipment.
 *Very active immortals regularly run, games and quests for rewards. 
 *Addictive gambling system for those that like to risk gold or qp 
for reward in between levelling or questing.
 *Tier system where players can choose to become a more powerful 
version of their class, or branch to learn the skills of a new class.
 *Scattered tokens and Random equipment give the players incentives
for exploring the planes
 *Over 300 unique spells/skills
 *New room types, eq/weapon flags, exits, and item types.
 *Quest Item upgrade system, to customize and improve your eq.

and the rebellion has become The New Republic. The Empire
is on the rise again, and organised crime is growing.
 
On LoTS, you become part of this world, choosing from our
many races and classes and skills to build your character.
We have many new and unique features, such as a detailed
cargo system, 35 races, 8 classes, new skill additions,
upgrades of old skills, an arena, ship simulators,
com-frequecies, introduction system, and countless other
code additions. Though LotS is open to the public we're
still an evolving SWR. Player ideas are welcome and
encouraged, and much of the time used.
 
On LoTS, while PK is legal under certain conditions, such as
in clans, it must be kept in character, and newbie killing
is illegal. Most who clan choose to join one of the two
major governments (The Empire or The New Republic), however,
there are smaller factions as well.
 
Our players and imm-staff are friendly and helpful. We are a
role-playing enforced mud, and require both a biography and
description for characters above level 6, as well as a name
appropriate for their race.
 
We're currently hiring Builders and RolePlay Enforcement
Immortals, log on and speak with an Immortal if your interested.

alot more skills, i have plenty already coded that just
need to be added in for the players. We have enough areas for
players to play, so we hope to see you there very soon.
                       -Shinshi(Owner)

WWW         : http://cog.wolfpaw.net/
Description :

 If you are unsure of what you are looking for in a MUD then look closely 
at Cities of Glory and what we have to offer you.
Cities of Glory is a MUD that is hosted on a privately owned server.  We 
have been around for a very very long time, our first version came 
available to the public in 1993.  Origionally Circlemud patch 8, our code 
base is highly customized and very solid.

 We offer our players a unique world of over 25,000 customized rooms with 
HUGE mobile and object diversity.  Our 13 well developed races and 12 
balanced subclasses provide enough variation to make your gaming 
environment complete.

 We have a complete selection of over 400 spells and skills for your 
characters to develop.  Many of our spells and skills are based on a 
evolution / training scale allowing you to build your characters ability 
through level based training, and many of your skills are customized to 
your character.

 Our equipment is 100% modifiable, allowing you go build the eq that you 
want to wear, with features and statistics that you want to wield.

 We offer dozens of on-line quests and have hunderds of unique features 
that simply makes us one of the best gaming environments around.  (log in 
and type >help features)

Mud         : Elysium LPmud
Code Base   : [LP] Custom 2.4.5 based lib on Amylaar 3.2.1
Telnet      : elysium.edenproject.org 3500 [204.251.239.20]
WWW         : None
Description :

Elysium was founded on October 19th, 2002 by a group of
administrators from another MUD who wished to create a
place that was fun for both players and creators, without
the usual bickering and politics that run rampant in many
older, more established MUD's.  The founding members were
Renoir, Xelfer and Maledicta.  Several other creators soon
joined, and by the time Elysium was ready for the public
Blackthorne, Hobbes and Hare had all joined and made major
contributions.  Other wizards would soon follow, and we
hope that over time Elysium continues to grow and change
always following the vision of a politics free, purely fun
development and playing environment.

   Join us in the Elysium revolution!

Important Note: Elysium is open for players, however it is
under ongoing development.  That means that while the mud
itself is remarkably stable, there are some bugs still to
be sorted out.  We are growing fast and welcome new
players!

Mud         : Aeon MUD
Code Base   : [Circlemud] v3.0 - modified significantly
Telnet      : aeonmud.tdf.ca 8000 [207.107.54.228]
WWW         : http://www.aeon.tdf.ca
Description :

 After five years in development, Aeonmud became an official project at the
end of 2001. Our staff have years of mudding and building experience and We
believe we are attuned to how mudders think.

 Aeon is still growing and expanding. It is a realm of many islands created
by the shattering of a magical sphere of the world and it will eventually
have an extensive ocean system to navigate. 

 We understand that many mudders still enjoy a bit of hack & slash, so we
cater to this by offering a wide variety of melee combat skills and spells.
However, we believe that the usual class constraints are fast becoming
outdated so we have introduced a profession inclination approach whereby
you can choose to have accelerated learning in your favourite collection of
skills (akin to the typical class approach).  The difference is that you
are free to learn any skill you choose, so warriors can learn magic,
clerics pickpocketing and mages combat skills!

 Trainers will soon be situated around the world.  You visit a trainer to
advance your theoretical knowledge of a given skill.  You gain practical
understanding of what you learn through doing, in this way we hope to make
the skill learning process rather more interactive and meaningful.

 Our areas are all original, with liberal use of detailed extra 
descriptions and many hidden surprises, including many automated quests.

what a great being one can be.

Mud         : Awake 2062
Code Base   : [Unknown] AwakeMud v0.84, modified
Telnet      : awake2062.net 4000 [142.163.152.31]
WWW         : http://www.awake2062.net
Description :

  Awake 2062 is a Shadowrun-based MUD. It was originally 
based on Circle code, but has evolved extensively. Currently, 
we're moving towards full SR 3rd edition compliance. 
Awake 2062 supports all the major SR character types: 
deckers, riggers, shamen, mages, street samurai and 
physical adepts. We have a wide variety of both coded 
and roleplay-only abilities and skills as well. 
The MUD world is dynamic, detailed and constantly growing. 
There are a lot of areas to explore and roleplay in -
including the Sea-Tac area, Portland and parts of the
NAN. New places, etc. are perpetually being added. 

Awake 2062 is an RP-encouraged MUD, and gives its
players many ways to customize their characters and
their items - whether via detailed description commands
or the restring command. Though there are many autoquests
available, we encourage and reward good roleplay - whether
with karma, money or even special items/abilities. Both
players and immortal quest staffers run all kinds of rp
events, ranging from simple fights or short encounters 
to huge, world-changing epic runs.

Awake 2062 is a beta MUD, and much needs to be done to
fill it out and bring it into full 3rd edition compliance. 
But it's a great place in a constant state of development,
one which tries hard to stay true to SR 3rd-ed. in look,
feel, game mechanics and spirit.

Mud         : The Eye of Heaven
Code Base   : [MUX] MUX 2.3
Telnet      : eyeofheaven.net 2626 [64.46.100.26]
WWW         : None
Description :

    The Eye of Heaven is in shadow. Deep within the tunnels of
an interdimensional cyst, the ancient city of the Mote teems 
with the refugees and misfortunates from countless worlds. 
They have been trapped by the portals that lead down into the 
darkness, and their lives are commonly brief and cruelly 
ended.

     But not all are meant for victimhood at the hands of 
slavers or savage tribesmen. Some have a spark of promise 
beyond common measure, and the boldness and strength of will 
to make a better life in the darkness of the Mote. Some are 
trapped castaways or refugees from other worlds. Others are 
natives of the Mote with an uncommon drive.

     Players take the roles of these exceptional figures, each 
seeking to make what life they would in the shadows of the 
tunnels. Whether seeking wealth and glory in the ruins and 
hidden lairs that surround the Mote, simply trying to survive 
their neighbors, or even venturing to find a way to escape the 
House of the Eye, their lives promise to be interesting- if 
perhaps short.

     Interested players can even arrange to run their own 
campaigns set in the worlds that lead to the Mote. A vast 
selection of classes and races are permitted for play, and 
within the scope of your own campaign you're welcome to set 
your own game rules. The game uses the Open Gaming License 
provided by Wizards of the Coast, and we gladly invite others 
to come join the fun.

Mud         : Islands of Myth
Code Base   : [LP] Started from lima 1.0b3
Telnet      : islandsofmyth.org 3000 [217.116.224.121]
WWW         : http://islandsofmyth.org/
Description :

http://islandsofmyth.org/3k/cgi/who.c

Islands of Myth is a LIMA based mud that has been running
since July 1996 and is very stable and averaging 50 players
with a peak of 80-100. It features 5 primary
(alpha) guilds and approximately 100 additional guilds for 
betas and beyond with more than 20 races to choose from,
making the possibilities nearly endless.

Islands of Myth has a rich newbie-friendly environment that
includes more than 15 different areas, events specifically
driven for newbies as well as several other bonus
features.

For the higher level player Islands of Myth offers endless
advancement and expansion of the player. Level 71 players
may join a second alpha guild. If a secondary
alpha guild is not to your tastes, then you are also
allowed to split one body into 2 or more. Thus giving you
the flexibility of multiple characters without having to
change names and divide your time between them.

king. Thirsting for vengeance over lands reclaimed from them by Grand Druid
Round and settled by the wood-elves and folk of the Ygwynean Forest, they
harry the borders, growing bolder with each passing day.

The Knights of the Crimson Rose, its traditional defenders. But evil lurks
within, sowing seeds of death and corruption and rotting the heart of the
rose, until its thorns drip with deadly poison.

a time where they may be settled either at the hands of the brave, or seized
by the quick and ruthless. A growing evil encroaches upon the land, guided
by a sinister hand...  Who will defy it?  Who will embrace it?

world do exist.  The story below ground deals with a race of small peoples

small, docile creatures of which you may have heard) and their struggle
against an oppressive race of snake-men known as Syphians, who also
live underground.  At this point in Gnomish history, contact with humanity
is limited, with only a few humans knowing of the Gnomish world, but with
most Gnomes knowing of the human world, but hiding because of their past
together (ancient humans initially drove them underground).  As a human
entering the Gnomish world, you will discover the Gnomes way of life, and
perhaps help them win an epic struggle against the Syphians, their greatest
foe.  Player building and coding is highly encouraged.  There is no quota
and no building limits.  Friendly people.  The core's the limit

Description :

  Mayhem is staffed by a small group of friendly immortals, not quite newbie
friendly, but we accept all players of experience, and will help where we
can. The mud is PK(player killing) based, so there isn’t much role playing,
but if players feel to do so, are more than welcome to try their hand at it,
you might just find immortals playing along.

  Here at Mayhem we have two tiers, each with 101 levels, hero being the
Highest you can go, and free killing within 10 levels, after level 20. We have
Installed a new player protection, which limits any player not in a clan, and
Under five hours, to not be attacked, or attack outside the arena.

  We have 20 classes to select from, 10 for first tier, and 10 more for second.
These are ranged from Mage to Assassin, Shaman to Thief. As well as with many
classes we also have a wide range of races, all of which are selectable for
both tiers, containing more than 20 total races, Mayhem has an Evolution system
set up for races, As you level you have the chance you become a better race if
the set requirements are met, and your chance roll passes.

  We also have a quest system, and a double quest point toggle, along with double
experience, so when doing a quest from the Quest Master, You can get double the
prize if it is turned on. One of the cool features is the Multi-Tiered quest item
system, We have different grades of Quest Items, From Normal to Elite, along with
Weapons, and Scrolls that you can buy and study for a permanent spell you can use
later on.

  Clans are already in game, and a few have already began to start, and are going quite
strong. Other clans have the chance to enter the other halls via clan hall entrances 
guarded by many Mobiles, that have to be slain before receiving the keys you need to gain entrance.

Within the clan hall you will be able to buy their Equipment, Potions, Weapons, and other
things that clan may have bought. 

Join us if you have the courage to survive the onslaught of ruthless Player Killers that
inhabit our realm. You could be the newest champion or the newest corpse by the roadside.

Mud         : Firan
Code Base   : [MUX] TinyMUX 1.6 with many mods
Telnet      : firan.legendary.org 5000 [207.239.159.232]
WWW         : http://www.legendary.org/firan/
Description :

   Play a part in the epic struggle of the Firan people against invading
armies, meddling Gods, and the internal enemies that Fate has pit against
them. Set in the capital city of Anarinuell, characters are a product of a
rich heritage in which a divine wager and an historic marriage plunged the
world into a war that has consumed three generations -- creating heroes,
villains, and victims.  Characters also share in common a large and
powerful city of residence; a charismatic leader; and a common enemy.  But
Anarinuell is not a city about sameness, and roleplay focuses upon
dramatic interactions among characters from different clans and different
social strata with widely divergent religious and political views.

   Firan's coded systems are designed to exploit these differences --
allowing social, economic, and physical combat. Enhance your reputation in
the community by earning social points.  Use those social points to spy,
to call upon favors, to supress witnesses against you or to sabotage
another person's reputation. Use your economic skills to negotiate better
prices, or to deplete the city's supply of a given resource -- driving up
the market, or instigating riots and strikes! In physical combat you can
pummel a foe with your fists, or run him through with your sword.  You can
even bring your assailant to justice with the legal system.  Come be a
part of the myth-making on Firan!

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : The Gathering...
Code Base   : [Dawn] Modified
Telnet      : thegathering.lanice.org 9010 [66.188.205.202]
WWW         : http://gathering.lanice.org/
Description :

 The Gathering is an Adult-Friendly Medieval Fantasy MUD, were
anything and everything can happen. The mud is set in a medieval and
early dark age's time frame and players are to stay in that theme
while making their characters. Role Play is greatly enforced and
player killing is allowed if it fits within the rules and has strong
role play behind it. Please be sure to read over the rules before
playing, its a short list and mostly common since.

Times are rough in Tirradyn, the god wars are over or are they?
Mortals live their lives in fear of the 'dark races' but are they all
truly evil? Kedanna as returned to her realm, was it to aid the
mortal races or help the dark ones? Reports of strange tentacle
monsters run though the cities but they can't be true, can they?
Vast lands await those brave enough to go find them, and those strong
enough to make it out alive to tell the tail.

What is to become of the land known as Tirradyn? When the gods and
goddess gather, who truly wins? Will mortals always have sex in the
public eye? When will the dark races be stopped? Will they be
stopped? Will the fallen gods ever rule again? All those and more
depend on you and what you do. Are you up for the task, or will you
walk away from the passing sands of time? Will you be the hero of
songs, or the pouch line of jokes? Enter the Gathering and find out!

                              ***OOC***
Its rare that it happens, but sometimes our IP address will change.
Please use the hostname 'econtra.no-ip.info' or check back here for 
IP changes if the mud is down for more then a few hours. Thank you.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Some Nameless Mud
Code Base   : [Rom] 2.4b6
Telnet      : mud.houseofszat.com 3500 [204.182.112.72]
WWW         : http://www.houseofszat.com
Description :

-18 Races with Innate Abilities
-6 Playable Classes with more to come
-Runic System which bases PVP as well as special abilities
-In-Game Questing similar to MMORPG EverQuest
-Class Promotions (Warrior -> Knight)
-2nd Promotions (Knight + Sorceror = Mystic Knight)
-Intricate spell metamorphosis system. 
-Unique Game-Wide Battleground System
-Unique Spell Resist System
-Common/Uncommon/Rare/Ultra rare items (loot tables)
-Clan system replaced with religion system
-HIDE/SNEAK/INVISIBILITY Code completely re-written
-Simulated 'lag' (WAIT_TIME) completely removed.
-Spells utilize casting times
-Class restrictions on equipment (no wizards in platemail!)
-Tradeskill system in the works!
-MANY, MANY, MANY MORE THINGS AND EVEN MORE TO COME!

stages. Recently breaking into beta, we have been
progressing in huge strides towards a fully developed and
unique MUD.

Lost Legends was a huge MUD, still young but massive in following.
With many areas currently being worked on, plus the added
areas and staff of Elanathia, Legends of Elanathia will become the best
of both worlds - Impressive potential for development, vividly
detailed areas and a deep immersive background story for each
area.

We believe that a friendly community is an essential 
point to having a successful MUD.

We now have over 20 active creators currently working
on over four large scale areas to add to our already
impressive assortment of areas. Rich vivid descriptions
and a very solid-themed base will make this an experience
you'll not soon forget.

Mud         : Erotic Labs
Code Base   : [MUCK] ProtoMUCK
Telnet      : sc.scworlds.net 6969 [64.165.209.255]
WWW         : http://None
Description :

                 WARNING: Adult Content
                ========================

      A relatively small, sedate building set away off to 
the side of the country road and bordered on one side by a
lake, and on the other by an old growth forest. Pastoral. 
Picturesque. Quaint, even.
 
      Without any real signposts or labels, the labs housed
within are incredibly inconspicuous. Though inside, any 
number of experiments - illogical, unethical, and perverse 
to the eyes of nature - can be found walking around as if 
every day and commonplace. Through these labs, every little 
experiment that no one else wants to come within shouting 
distance of, whether for abundance of scruples or fear for 
more 'physical' concerns.
 
      Yes, the Erotic Labs, home to the kinkiest research 
never before stumbled upon. Any number of roles are 
available for the medical lab staff, or for one of the 
experiments, or even for the in-house security or 
receptionists. Many options for adult roleplay abound, and 
all are welcome.
 
       Come join at: mucks.homeip.net:6969
      Pfizer doesn't have a -thing- on us.

Mud         : Distopia - the Lost Age
Code Base   : [Dawn] Modified Dawn 1.69
Telnet      : distopia.genesismuds.com 1691 [216.136.9.5]
WWW         : http://distopia.sushibox.net
Description :

  Distopia - the Lost Age is a fantasy epic mud that is
currently under construction.  We are now hiring builders
and coders, and are aiming at an entirely original world,
with no stock at all.

Some of the unique features of our mud are:

A fantastic MXP system
Automapper including support for maps of different scales
Clans with ranks 
Personal and Clan banking 
Intergrated name generator into creation 
Letter writing 
Lockers and mail boxes 
Corpses autosave 
Option to have short descriptions in place of player names 
Ability for players to introduce themselves (names appear)
Advanced language systems with over unique 10 languages 
Global socials 
Ability to subdue as an alternative to killing 
XP is also awarded for roleplaying 
Ability to bury and dig up items 
Ability to ride and tame pets 
Speedwalk and players leaving tracks/trails 
Alias with parameter subsitution 
Dueling system for pkill combat
Intelligent object manipulation
Player homes
And much more...

Mud         : Regenbogen
Code Base   : [LP] LD 3.3,  basing on Morgengrauen's lib, BSX-extensions
Telnet      : rb.mud.de 23 [141.76.1.100]
WWW         : http://rb.mud.de
Description :

Regenbogen is a graphical offshot (using BSX) of Morgengrauen. It 
consists of four worlds connected by rainbow portals:
 - Genesis (classic fantasy)
 - Wunderland (mix of fantasy & tales)
 - Olympia (roman-like theme)
 - Dresden (reflecting the department of CS at the TU Dresden)

Players can advance by solving quests, defeating NPCs, research and
advancing their guild skills. Right now, there are 12 quests, numerous
mini-quests, 5 races and 2 guilds.

Some coders are working on integration of the MUD ReGenesis
(1st BSX-MUD).

Mud         : MaddockMUX
Code Base   : [MUX] [MUX]
Telnet      : maddock.noderunner.net 4205 [69.56.178.186]
WWW         : http://maddock.onlineroleplay.com
Description :

Come roleplay in the Old West!    

Maddock is a small town in the territory of Montana, in the
American West in the year 1880. Maddock has a wide variety of
residents and visitors -- travelers headed farther west, cowboys,
ranchers, miners, businessmen, gamblers, farmers, and even the
occasional outlaw. The town supports commerce for the numerous
ranches and farms in the area, as well as the gold, silver, and
ore mines located across the river to the west.

 Maddock boasts an active group of long-time players who are
always interested in drawing in new people. The game is a
consensual-based roleplay system where staff and senior players
are available to help. New players can develop an original
character that suits what they would like to play and they will
be offered assistance to weave them into the ongoing story and
roleplay of this not-so-simple little town.

Mud         : Hellmouth: New Chronicles
Code Base   : [MUSH] TinyMUSH 3.0 patch 4
Telnet      : zetamush.genesismuds.com 4900 [216.136.9.8]
WWW         : http://zetamush.genesismuds.com/Hellmouth
Description :

Hellmouth: The New Chronicles
The peaceful quiet town of Pine Hills, Massachusetts. Far enough from
the noise and confusion of such cities as Boston, and Worcester.
Close enough to the Berkshire Mountains, and the border to New York
State. The winter's are beautiful, with snow covering the pines.
Spring bringing in fresh air and the re-awakening of nature. Summer,
with it's warm, humid days and moderate nights, allowing many of it's
inhabitants to enjoy it. And Fall, possibly the most picturesque
season of all. Autumn brings the turning of the leaves, and the whole
town's canvas is colored in subtle browns, oranges, yellows, and
reds. Children's thoughts turn to the return of school, while adults
prepare for the rapidly approaching holidays.

Or so the surface appears. Deep, underneath the surface, a convergence
of energies swirls, ebbing and flowing, yearning ever-constantly to be
opened. A Hellmouth. A gateway to another dimension where demons,
vampires, and other nefarious supernatural beings reside. They once
walked the Earth, but soon were replaced by man. They resent this, and
vow to once again receive purchase to that which was originally
theirs, and once more, bring Hell upon the Earth.

- OOC -
Finally the day has come, the opening of Hellmouth: New Chronicles!
After much revamping, recoding, and reworking the game is better than
ever, and the staff are opening the gates of CG for new characters of
all kinds. Got an idea, we WANT to hear it, and even more
importantly, we WANT to approve it! We'll work with anyone or any idea
as best we possibly can. Just log on and head in CG, and if you have
any questions, don't be afraid to ask.

Mud         : Chronicles of the Blade
Code Base   : [Rom] 7 Years of Modifications
Telnet      : cotb.ath.cx 1908 [216.126.120.240]
WWW         : http://None
Description :

 Nine months ago to the day, our mayor suddenly ceased to exist.
It is not a pleasant tale, but I will tell you anyway. He was
in the city of New Thalos, which was large and prosperous,
with its city guard, numerous guilds, and plentiful shops, when
the Darkness struck the city with a startling quickness. It
overran the city walls first, devouring everything in its
path. Next, it creeped slowly to the heart of New Thalos.
While it couldn't have taken more than 5 minutes, it seemed
like an eternity to me. Our mayor was there, perhaps on some
form of political business, and he vanished when the city was
reduced to nothingness. From that time on, our city has been
ruled by the Elders. They were either granted or born with
superb magical powers, granting them the ability to defend
Kieron with their lives, if it came to it. Each of the Elders
holds a respectable amount of social status, as well as a
good deal of influence over those residing in Kieron. Treat
them well.

Mud         : Chronicles: Sunrise over Sallares
Code Base   : [Circlemud] pl12, Heavily Modified
Telnet      : augustus.scs.uiuc.edu 5000 [130.126.231.252]
WWW         : http://augustus.scs.uiuc.edu/~mud/
Description :

  Formerly called QuarantineMud, Chronicles is set in a mostly
unique mixed fantasy world. Players wrestle with powerful
monsters in efforts to gain vast treasures, search for rare
artifacts hidden throughout the world, and rise in level.

  Creating a character in this world involves a sequence where
the player is asked to assign 7 dice rolls to six player
statistics and then use 'stat points' to increase some of the
stats as desired. Stats can also easily be upgraded later using
points accumulated by questing, hunting artifacts, and levelling.

  Damage capacity, magic, and movement, are determined by a set
formula, so having or not having a certain stat at level up does
not permanently impact the player.

  Player killing is limited to 'outlaw players', and pk corpse
looting is limited to two items. Additionally. Town receptionists
sell corpse retrievals at a price based on number of deaths,
and death traps do not destroy equipment but send players to a
maze called 'Hell'.

  Alternative advancement (altadv) allows high-level characters
to continue to gain experience and divert it away from levelling
and towards obtaining points for use in purchasing more powerful 
skills for their character.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Land of Chaos
Code Base   : [GodWars] Heavily Modified
Telnet      : bb14.betterbox.net 9500
WWW         : None
Description :

Land of Chaos is a newbie friendly mud that has been 
up for years and through many, many changes.  It is 
completely original with the exception of the midgaard 
stock of course.  There are a variety of different 
types of classes to pick from with detailed abilities 
and skills.  This mud does not have upgrades, but offers
the possibility to have a larger mightrate due to this.  
This mud used to be one of the top muds out there, until 
it unfortunately went down due to old immortals leaving 
and new coming in.  It is back up and re-established 
with the need of a large pbase, as it once had.

Mud         : Megaman X MUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH version 1.7.7 patchlevel 27 [01/25/2004]
Telnet      : hyperwarp.net 2117 [69.57.137.123]
WWW         : http://www.megaman-x.tk/
Description :

  The year is 2117, three and a half years after the beginning
of what would be known as the Maverick Wars. Three Riots, led by
the ex-Maverick Hunter commander, Sigma, have devastated many
parts of the world. Six months ago, Sigma's trickery caused the
decimation of the Repliforce, a worldwide peacekeeping
organization. Now, in 2117, the Mavericks have conquered the
continent of Africa, and are using it to push into the rest of
Eurasia. The Maverick Hunters, led by the fledgling commander
Signas and sanctioned by the world's government, the United Earth
Federation, is working with Nathan Kitford, UEF Chairman, to
combat the Maverick threat before it encroaches further than it
has been.

  Megaman X MUSH takes the basic wartime premise of the Megaman
X video game genre and flavors it with character information,
sources, and background from the Rockman X manga. Rockman X video
game sourcebooks, and Megamissions card series. The MUSH
encompasses all of these elements into a cohesive, immersive
anime-stylized theme of the war beginning to cover the world.

  Many characters are available for application from a variety
of sources: Game-Based Characters (GBCs), such as X, Zero and
Alia; Manga-Based Characters (MBCs), characters featured heavily
in the Rockman X manga, such as iX and Merti; and Card-Based
Characters (CBCs), characters featured in the MEgamissions card
series, such as Luxione or Curtiss. All of the GBC Mavericks have
been, as a note, revived and given their Limited or Hyperlimited
forms; additionally, characters not shown as Limited or
Hyperlimited, such as Vile and Byte, have also been revived and
upgraded. We also offer Admin-Created Characters (ACCs), made to
fill niches in the MUSH, such as Nathan Kitford, Jeanne Francaix,
or Wakano Yuuki.

with competing factions striving for trade, interaction, exploration, and wealth.
 
Characters on SCM can be nearly anything they want, thanks to the unique RPG system

Guide, SCM is a full-featured Roleplaying muck, which can satisfy the needs of almost 
any player!

Over a dozen organizations, hundreds of starships and stations, and many unique places to 
roleplay in, SCM provides a wealth of Roleplaying opportunities!

Mud         : Legacy of Evolution
Code Base   : [MOO]
Telnet      : legacyofevolution.com 2009 [166.70.166.210]
WWW         : http://www.legacyofevolution.com
Description :

 Our world is an everchanging place where evolution is the key to
survival. As it changes and grows, its life forms must adapt.
Humans have branched off into multiple species that to some are
completely /new/ and no longer considered Human.
The world is largely unaware of these *other* humans who hide
themselves out of fear of persecution and prejudice.

Xavier's School for The Gifted is known as a very selective school
for those who show special 'talents', but that's its public face.

Things dwell in secret that the world is unaware of- demons
and vampires skulk in shadow, walking in the darkness of night,
Trained magic users also walk the streets among those who
would  have them lynched if they knew their secret.
With demons, mutants, vampires and mages sharing the Earth with
humans...who really is the dominant species?

At Legacy of Evolution, players can select different kinds of
characters:
Feature Characters from the X-Men: Evolution series or Original
Characters that can include vampires, demons and mages
(Who have an Xavier-ish school in their own realm),even humans.
We encourage exploration and interaction.

Teams include the X-Men (only open to FCs at the moment),and the
New Mutants, Acolytes, Brotherhood and Morlocks (open to OCs)
or create your own team of heroes or vagrants!
