Mud         : CastleMOO
Code Base   : [MOO]
Telnet      : ahynes1.homeip.net 5018 [24.44.126.122]
WWW         : http://www.angelfire.com/pa4/insidemyhead/
Description :

  CastleMOO is a new RP/Social MOO that was built in hopes of making a
fantastic environment for people to move around in. In entering the game you
start in the OOC room, where you will describe yourself in Medieval
clothing. There is a great tutorial that will help you describe yourself and
your clothing. Once you are described, you can apply for a job (or ask one
of the wizards) and they will check your descriptions and change your colors
(colors will represent your class). From there you can enter the world of
CastleMOO and begin to rp. Our class system is royalty (King & Queen,
Princes & Princess, and dukes, barons etc..), clergy, merchants,
serfs/peasants/lowlifes and then all other jobs that don't fit in to those
categories. However, if rp isn't your thing, you are not pressured to do so.
You can also socialize with other people on the MOO who choose not to rp too.

Telnet      : devnull.dtcc.edu 4201 [138.123.76.212]
WWW         : http://ds9mush.org
Description :

 A New Journey is an online multiplayer text-based game based in the Star Trek 
universe, post-Cardassian war era. 

It focuses on role-playing and story-based adventures that puts you in the 
captain's chair. From selecting to be a part of a security team on an away mission.
As well as being at the helm of a cargo vessel. 
One can choose to make trade runs to finance your empire. 
If you wish to see who is online, please go to: http://ds9mush.org. Our website 
was designed to provide as much information to the player as possible. 
Our staff are always available to assist with questions. 

We are attempting to make this MUSH one of the best text RP MUSH's where Star Trek 
fans can enjoy. 

Though we may not be fully IC at this time we do offer Tiny Plots. 
So, we invite you to login, and explore the OOC area. 
Read the news files, ask questions and become one of the players. 
IF you still are not certain, speak to other players that are online.

Mud         : DragonBall Infinity
Code Base   : [Smaug] Heavily Modified
Telnet      : i.am.an.ircgod.org 4000 [24.215.47.58]
WWW         : http://dbiforums.cjb.net
Description :

 A lot of you may or may not know that the DBSaga codebase was
leaked. I happened to get a copy and decided to start a
better, more friendly MUD with some friends of mine. Before I
go into detail about what I have planned, I just would like to
personally thank Warren (Saga's Goku) for all his hard work
he's done for Saga, as well as the other coders.

DragonBall Infinity is a MUD based on the DragonBall/DragonBall 
Z/DragonBall GT anime and manga 
universe. Created originally by Akira Toriyama as a manga, 
it's spread into a TV series and movies. DBI is based on his 
work and gives a long list of things you can do.

With a list of races to choose from, we have everyone's
favourite the Saiyan, as well as Halfbreed, Bio-Android,
Human, Icer, Namek, Android, and Ghetti, more are in the works
for completion. A vast list of skills allows for every player 
to experience the power of firing the Kamehameha wave, or even
the planet destroying Death Ball attack.

Roleplaying is strongly encouraged with rewards as high as 
powerlevel increases and even getting the very rare items in 
the game. This hopefully will draw some of the BEST DBZ RPers 
to DBI and hopefully bring us to the top of DBZ RP. 

So come visit anytime, we're VERY newbie friendly and our 
Immortal staff is very helpful and can always use an increase.
Hope to see you there! :D

Mud         : Star Trek: Redemption
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH v1.7.5 p9
Telnet      : ussredemption.org 8000 [24.216.27.136]
WWW         : http://ussredemption.org/
Description :

 The year is 2380.  Five years since the end of the Dominion War,
which devastated a large portion of Starfleet's Fleet, and
barely almost a year since the Romulans opened  negotiations.
But there are still challenges to be faced, and as much as it
looks like things are finally changing for the better there is
always that chance that something unexpected may happen. Knowing
this chance existed, in 2376 the Federation Council, based on
the presentation of Starfleet Command, authorized the
'Redemption Project'.  Sovereign-E-class starships were designed
to be heavier variants of the Sovereign-class starships.  To
start, Starfleet Corps of Engineers took the design of the
Sovereign and expanded on it.  Twelve new decks were added to
the design specs.  A new warp drive was commissioned to be built
by venerable earth-based General Electric.  In addition, a whole
new platform of equipment was to be designed for ship, with the
hopes that she would become the most sophisticated ship of her
kind.
 
 Right now, the ship remains drydocked, awaiting the rest of her
crew assignments, but one thing is certain.  This new ship will
be put to the test over time, and she's sure to prove her worth
to Starfleet.

Mud         : The Cold Flame of Dimensia
Code Base   : [Circlemud] (highly?) Modified
Telnet      : mud.boruki.com 6666 [194.159.181.54]
WWW         : http://dimensia.proboards32.com
Description :

  The Cold Flame of Dimensia is set after the Last War, when war
has become a rarity, and skirmishes barely more common. But the
world is changing, fears of greater evils rising spread across
the planes of Ishaetal, sending scholars to their libraries to
examine the histories most have tried to forget. The high
council's begged their warlocks and runelords to put a Rune of
Creation deep into the surface of the earth, to call forth worthy
heroes to fight their cause.

  You, yes you, are one called forth by the power of the Rune,
come, and offer your help to fight for the people of Dimensia.

--

  Dimensia is a highly modified CircleMUD, that hopes to
offer a great variety in play to encourage much more varied
character expansion. We are quite newly opened as of December 2004,
so do not expect a huge playerbase right now, please play the game
for its worth, not for the number of other people already there.  So
come now, and live our world, then make it yours!

-Boruki Y'sandir

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Star Wars: Imperial Conquest
Code Base   : [SWR] GR 2.3 codebase ( Highly Modified SWR 1.0)
Telnet      : swic.us 1600 [217.160.243.190]
WWW         : http://www.swic.us
Description :

 It has been twenty-three years since the Rebel Alliance, with
the help of many heroic men and women, were able to destroy the
first Deathstar at the Battle of Yavin. Since then, the galaxy
has seen much. The Republic has been reborn from the old Rebel
Alliance and now operates from the grand cityscape of Coruscant.
Luke Skywalker has begun a new Jedi Order and established the
Jedi Academy in an ancient Sith temple on Yavin IV. There have
been several incarnations of the old Galactic Empire, one of
which destroyed several planets including Byss, although, most of
the Imperial Remnant has been dead for a decade now. Peace has
been experienced in increasingly larger portions lately, which
for a generation of war-hardened people is an ill omen. It is
also a time of rebirth for the Force, pumping out more than
the normal amount of Force-sensitive beings, as it is recovering
from the Great Jedi Purge lead by the Galactic Empire and
Darth Vader half a century earlier. In time it will balance
again, as it was in the era of the Old Republic. The Republic
continues to restore its old territories and forge new alliances
while the Jedi continue to search out and train the
Force-sensitive children, creating an all-new Jedi Order unlike
anything seen before. In Imperial space, however, a new threat is
spawning. Several of the leading Imperials are planning their
plot to return the Empire to power under a new Emperor. A Dark
Jedi named Brakiss has constructed a Shadow Academy, under
Imperial instruction, in order to turn Jedis from the Light and
train them for the Dark Side. Will the new enemies prove too
strong for the Republic? Is there a more terrible force lurking
in the background? Only time will tell..

Description :

  The world called Earth is a very different place, now.
Thousands of years after atomic, genetic, and genocidal 
warfare tore the planet asunder, society has finally 
started the rebuilding process. Nothing, though, is as it 
once was. Strange mutant creatures, force-evolved from 
radioactive waste and the minds of geneticists, roam the 
land and fight for their very lives. Now more then ever, 
it's survival of the fittest.

It is a time of chaos, strife, and warfare as like-minded 
groups form 'clans' to wage their dominance over others, 
each claiming a section of the Earth to call their own. 
Similar genetic species begin breeding, and over the 
millennia, true races came into being quite unlike humans
had ever been. Villages and cities begin to spring up, the 
more aggressive surviving by conquering and pillaging the 
others.

The world is in anarchy and chaos, a time when a single 
shift of power could upset the delicate balance, cause 
another of the Shadow years. Old rules and icons are no 
more, old barriers broken, old values forgotten.

Now is the time of Iconoclasm.

accepting First, Third, Fifth and Seventh Year students as

Mud         : The Builder's Academy
Code Base   : [Circlemud] The Latest with OasisOLC and DG Scripts
Telnet      : builderacademy.net 9091 [213.173.228.249]
WWW         : http://builderacademy.net/
Description :

   The most challenging aspect of running a mud is finding good builders. You
will hear this from the admin of every MUD that has ever been. In the past it 
has always been up to each individual MUD to find and usually train their own 
builders. This works, but I think the CircleMUD community can come up with 
something better. That is why I created The Builder's Academy.

   We have been open to anyone interested in learning or teaching how to build
using Oasis OLC with dg scripts since 2000. The current developer of DG scripts,
Welcor, uses The Builder's Academy (TBA) as the development port for DG scripts. 
Now TBA has expanded to also be used to develop stock zones for CircleMUD.

   TBA has trained over 1000 builders and has an extensive tutorial and help
file system. No pressure, no deadline, just come learn, teach, or help develop 
CircleMUD. Give back to the community we have all taken so much from. TBA is a 
CircleMUD resource. Take advantage of it so we can improve all of CircleMUD. 
TBA can also be used by other MUDs as a builder's port. Just send us your 
newbie builders. We will teach them and then you can have them back with the 
zones they built.

   We are always open to anyone willing to learn, teach, or help develop stock
CircleMUD,Oasis OLC, and DG scripts.

Description :

==================== Mega Man Mush =========================

        The theme has brought together the timelines of 
most of the Megaman games and melded it into one complete 
story. Four major factions fight for the fate of the world: 

Repliforce (Led by General, a group of reploids who serves 
the official defense force of the world), The Maverick 
Hunters (Led by Dr. Light and Rock (Megaman, X), an elite 
gathering of reploids that work outside of government 
regulations), The Mavericks (Led by Sigma, a group of 
reploids infected by the Maverick Virus, causing them to 
have an uncontrollable hate for mankind), and the Robot 
Masters (Led by Dr. Wily and Bass (Forte), a group of 
androids built by Dr. Wily, who is bent on world 
domination.). Along with these four factions, the fifth 
faction, the Civilians, consists of humans, androids, and 
reploids, with functions ranging from regular citizen, to 
Secretary-General of the UN, to a member of the Yakuza, to 
an elite Strider. 

We are always accepting applications and 
the entire staff will be happy to help you in any way 
possible. 

                     http://www.megamanmush.com                           
                   megamanmush.com port 1997

Mud         : AmalgaMUX
Code Base   : [MUX] Server has been slightly modified
Telnet      : amalga.servegame.com 5132 [68.166.112.172]
WWW         : http://None
Description :

 AmalgaMUX is a place based on freedom of thought.
The freedom to act, think, roleplay, and just be as your heart suits you.
It is also based upon the freedom from being trounced upon by others.

Our roleplay system is based upon Cooperation between players, no matter what
sort of interaction takes place among characters. We do not have any combat
systems. All violent roleplay is handled on the basis of agreement between
the participant Players. Agreement is emphasised here, as disagreement causes
a whole lot of upset for everyone involved. We beleive it is nicer if everyone
involved, no matter how bloody the fray, are really working together on the
outside.

Our game is one that is open to peoples of all varieties
We make no record of the demographicality of our users in ANY WAY. We beleive
that it is the responsibility of the person to judge what is appropriate for
their situation, and we will have no part in 'Governing' people's behaviour.
It is up to the individual to choose what he/she/ono participates in. We make
no recording of what people do in private, that is not our business.

In short, we turn no-one away that does not turn others away.
If ever you have been turned away before, and you want to in friendship return,
you are most welcome here.

Our playing grid is admittedly lacking, but a construction
concept exists, although it needs more time from those involved
in its inception.

Mud         : Marches of Antan
Code Base   : [LP] MudOS with custom mudlib
Telnet      : 68.8.87.195 3000 [68.8.87.195]
WWW         : http://68.8.87.195:8080/antan/
Description :

 The Marches of Antan, first established in 1990, continues 
to offer one the most intelligent, challenging, and 
enjoyable MUDs with a long and rich history. Loosely based 
on the literary works of James Branch Cabell, Antan allows 
players a variety of choices and lifestyles.  

One can join the Merchant's Guild and open their own pub or
shop.  Those who seek nobility can aspire to the Peerage
and a title and House.  Others might wish to join the
Architect's Guild and sell their designs to other players.
Others might remain a member of the Free Company of 
Adventurers or go freelance.  Anyone with the gold and 
inclination can purchase a home.  There is a role 
satisfying and suitable for every player's desire.

With custom skills, abilities, combat and magic systems, 
Antan has both a familiar feel and unique attraction. 
Skills, spells, and all levels of training are available to 
everyone, regardless of race or guild affiliation. 

Equipment can be kept by going to sleep instead of quitting.
Though Glaum, the Sylan-without-bones, might steal your
body if you opt to sleep outside of a dorm, apartment, or 
bedchamber.

With exceptional quests and a small, yet fun and loyal, 
playerbase, Marches of Antan is worth exploring.

Mud         : Promage
Code Base   : [Custom] Visual Basic 6
Telnet      : promage.hopto.org 4000 [213.224.18.151]
WWW         : http://www.promage.be
Description :

Promage is a mud coded from scratch in Visual Basic.
We have rooms, monsters, objects, grouping, skills, damage and
healing spells, ansi color, auto-mapping, shops, mailing, storage,
banking, automated questing, training, 5 races and 7 classes.
In contrary to most muds, monsters and objects don't have fixed
stats, but the level determines the stats. This allows unique
abilities like leveling up objects and monsters.

Objects level up by simply wearing them and killing monsters equal
in power, making them stronger in defense, attack and/or damage.
They can load on monsters, in rooms and chests and can tweak or
have many different attributes. Tweaking means the object is either
slightly better of worse than normal, an iron sword +7 means
is 7% better. Attributes load at random, for example a chance to
pierce armor.

The mud is in testing phase because more coding is required to be
an complete mud, but everything will be treated as in a real
production, meaning no player deletion when we go fully operational.
Furthermore, dedicated testers will be compensated for their troubles.

Mud         : Sunrise MUCK
Code Base   : [MUCK] [MUCK]
Telnet      : dovienya.net 1994 [65.26.142.237]
WWW         : http://www.geocities.com/sunrisemuck/
Description :

 Want a MUCK where people actually get out, get IC, and RP on a regular basis
Want a MUCK with wizzes who're friendly, helpful, -and- connect regularly
so that you don't have to wait ages for a reply to a mail or for a request
to be processed? Then Sunrise is the place for you!

Sunrise was built to be a place that'd put a stop to the complaints like
'there are never any wizzes on' and 'It takes -ages- for my request to be
processed.' Its wizards and staffers are friendly and helpful, and, of
course, on often. Built -- literally, as the lands are all those of the
various prides and clans and packs of the MUCK-- by the players, Sunrise
has no canon characters-- that is, no living characters from TLK or TLK 2.
Instead, the MUCK centers on the lives of the aforementioned prides and
packs so that no-one's left trying to figure out how to fit into some
formulated plan everyone's seen played out a billion times. While the
wizzes are always ready to take suggestions for a MUCK-wide TP, such things
are left, largely, to the players to cook up.

In theme, Sunrise is an African-based non-human MUCK. All animals: birds,
mammals, reptiles, even bugs-- provided they're from Africa, naturally--
are welcome. Play an arrogant raven, a picky vulture, an owl, or a
loud-mouth parrot. Or, on the mammal front, there's the ever-popular lion:
the prides are always welcoming new members, and Sunrise has all kinds:
good, evil, and in-between! Then there's those hyenas, wild dogs, and
leopards. -- And that's not even getting into the primates, the prosimians
such as the galago, or the herbivores like the dik-dik, sable antelope, and
kudu. Certainly, there's a plethora of species to choose from, and plenty
of people who'll help you out if you're having a hard time choosing, as
well as requests for characters on the messageboards. So come to Sunrise
MUCK! You won't regret it.

Mud         : Mythara: Remnants of a Shattered World
Code Base   : [MUX] MUX 2.0.33.324 #2 [2002-APR-14]
Telnet      : radd.spodzone.com 2002
WWW         : http://radd.spodzone.com/mythara
Description :

     It is a land of promise... a land of intrigue, guile,
alliances and deceit. It is a land where wars are waged, diplomacy
sought. It is a land of fantasy, of magic and myth.

     It is called Mythara... but it once was called Earth. Mankind
ruined it, abandoned it, and after killing himself off, left it to
heal itself. Mankind has been neither seen nor heard in more
millennia than even the eldest of races can recall.

     Many would argue that this is a good thing.

-----

     Welcome to Mythara: Remnants of a Shattered World! We are a
semi-high fantasy MUX with a unique twist: the races you've come to
know and love in fantasy fiction are shockingly different, our own
legends mere shades of their reality. God-like beings walk the
planet, and interact on a personal basis with its inhabitants.
Mythological beasts roam the countryside unhindered... and the
ancient technologies of the destroyer race, mankind, are not only
forgotten, but also long gone to dust.

     Aside from the occasional political dispute, this world is
practically idyllic. Then mankind had to show up again, and mess
with everything. That was two years ago, with men and women from
our own time, preserved through time by a magic they had no
conception of, finding themselves in a world unlike their own. And,
unlike the stories from their past, this time they had no fallen
technology to reply upon.

     So, be a human, and help the struggling race climb from the
ashes... or, if it suits your tastes more, play as one of eleven
other player races in this dice-less, freeform role-play
environment. The story is yours to write.

     Our game is currently open for playtest and chargen. Don't
mind the dust, we're still moving in!

Mud         : Homeland
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Heavily Modified V3.00 beta patchlevel 14
Telnet      : mud.homelandmud.org 9999 [65.160.105.31]
WWW         : http://www.homelandmud.org
Description :

 Homeland is an expansive online world based upon the 
Forgotten Realms by TSR. We have over 20,000 rooms 
spanning more than 150 zones with thousands of NPCs to
both interact with and slaughter.  We have 22 player races
and over 300 NPC races, along with over 30 classes and kits
to choose from, enabling a wide variety of possibilities.

Our codebase is robust and full-featured including 
automated questing, fully automatic guilds and guild-halls,
a feel similar to that of Toril or Sojourn, spell
interactions, and various other improvements that have
culminated in a nearly total re-write of the original code-
base.  We also have what we feel is a unique system of 
damage calculation that allows for resistances, 
immunities, vulnerabilities, and reversing of different 
types of damages based upon different attack and spell 
types and races.

We have a friendly staff of administrators that also work
on our code and continue to improve Homeland's vast world, 
not to mention a dedicated Quest Sphere responsible for 
overseeing interactive quests.

levels. There is an Roleplay list where you can even buy stuff

staff is very well organized, very professional, but also not too
uptight. If you want a PG mud where cursing and obscenities are

Mud         : Divided Sky
Code Base   : [LP] Skylib 1.6
Telnet      : divided-sky.com 7300 [203.122.198.95]
WWW         : http://www.divided-sky.com
Description :

 The wizards confronted Torban about his actions, but he
would not listen to their pleas. Torban soon disappeared
from view all together, to wait upon a time when he would
release the bonds he had placed on the mana sites.

That was more than 500 years ago. Since that time, the
races that had fled underground returned to the surface to
find a world changed beyond all recognition. And recently
people have discovered new ways to gain mana, and to work
their way around the blocks between worlds with word
controlled portals. A new age of magic is here.

The population of Delsance returned to the surface to find
their land all but destroyed by the furious wars. What had
once been a magnificent land, had been reduced to little
more than a desert. The only inhabitants of this area were
the nomadic Delsan, the only race that did not seek shelter
underground, with their caravans moving about scavenging
the desert slowly of its remaining resources. It is in this
desert that the great wizard Torban is rumoured to live, in
the last of the ancient mana towers, which is protected by
an oasis to confuse the wily explorers.

The people dispersed, to seek new homes. Most moved to an
area known as the Salyes Plains in the centre of the
continent, whilst others returned to the underground,
satisfied with their new home. These new kingdoms have
flourished in the five centuries since the mana was
blocked, and the way is open for bold young adventurers to
seek fame and glory on the new frontier...

WWW         : http://www.threshold-rpg.com/
Description :

  On Threshold, Role Playing is not just a feature- it is a requirement! This
completely original world evolves based on the actions of the player base.
The detailed religions, governments, economies, guilds, clans, and legal
system are all player run. There are scores of intricate plot lines constantly
evolving that make the game into a living, breathing world.

Threshold is one of the most successful role playing required online games. If
you have not experienced it, you are missing out on a wonderful opportunity to
express your creativity and your imagination in a mature, safe environment. 

* 11 GUILDS, 10 RACES, 16 RELIGIONS, Over 500 spells and special skills.
* PLAYER RUN Religions, Government, Guilds, Clans, Legal System, and Economy.
* HUMONGOUS WORLD to explore with exciting (yet optional) quests. All areas
  are totally unique to Threshold and will stretch your imagination.
* COMBAT system that requires tactics, planning, and a cool head.
* MINI-GAMES: Tons of non-combat mini games where players can compete with each
  other (dueling, Quail Hunt, chess, fishing, Trial Arcanus, and many more).
* STABILITY: Top notch internet connection (T-1 from UUnet) and extremely
  stable and powerful servers.

Description :

traditional Pokemon theme, with more emphasis on the games 
rather than the anime. Even though we do have anime FCs 
available. We've been around for about 5 years now, having 
branched off from the late PokeMUCK. Our wizards and staff

is small, but tight knit, and RP quality is high. We have
an elaborate world cut into three main sections; Kanto,
Johto and Hoenn with the Orre region intermixed with Hoenn.
We have all the latest species available, and many MANY 
FCs (Pokemon and Human alike) available for application.
Pokemon Neo is a Trainer's paradise, as we allow an 
unlimited number of Pokemon zombies, and the staff even 
hide them throughout the grid for people to find and RP 
with. Pokemon eggs can also be obtained from Pokemon 
breeders, and pokemon can be bred at those same facilities. 
Vendors are also available for the selling of TMs, Stones, 
and hold items. 
While we don't consider ourselves elitest, but there is 
an application process, to help weed out some of the 
not-so-good RPers. However, we are newbie friendly, and the 
staff will openly give suggestions and help to anyone who 
doesn't get their application approved the first time. 
To keep fairness on the MUCK, we do have suggestions for 
leveling and battling. As we find it chaotic and twinkish 
to have people level at their descretion, and have pokemon 
in the upper levels after only having them for a couple 
months. We don't have a 'true' battle system, but more of
a rudimentary one. We use dice and coin flip programs, 
and have a guide to the suggested level growth. We even 
have a Pokedex program that can tell you all a trainer 
needs to know about every pokemon species.

The theme would also be considered mostly PG-13, maybe R
at some points due to violence and some language. However,
there is generally no sexual activity.

So come check us out! You likely won't be disappointed.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : LA: A House Divided
Code Base   : [MUSH] TinyMUSH 3.1
Telnet      : lamush.wolfpaw.net 9021 [204.209.44.7]
WWW         : http://lamush.wolfpaw.net/
Description :

  'Pick your enemies carefully or you'll never make it in Los
Angeles.'
         - Rona Barrett

  A House Divided is a MUSH based on Vampire: The Masquerade.
The setting is modern Los Angeles, a sprawling metropolis with
over 15 million mortals and scores of undead who hunt them. Upon
this canvass, our goal is to create the finest, most engaging and
politically complex Vampire MUSH in the world.

  'How are you different from the other White Wolf MUSHes on the
net?'
*   We focus *only* on the setting of Vampire: the 
    Masquerade; we don't even bother trying to fold in
    the other World of Darkness games.
*   We have a streamlined role-play system designed to
    take advantage of the MUSH environment. Everything
    you need to play is available online.
*   We have an extensive stat-locked lore system that
    provides ample surprises and mysteries for the most
    jaded of players.
*   We support cooperative RP - a philosophy that draws
    on the maturity of the players to provide realistic
    and player-driven role-play.
*   Any player can play _one_ neonate level vampire;
    it's a Vampire MUSH. Ghouls and mortals are more freely
    available. Older vampires are application-only.
*   Our focus is Camarilla society, with its politics and
    intrigue. While mortal society is present as a 
    backdrop, our MUSH revolves around vampires.

Mud         : Ancient Chaos
Code Base   : [Smaug] SmaugFUSS 1.4a (modified)
Telnet      : leilia.genesismuds.com 1040 [216.136.9.8]
WWW         : http://AncientChaos.homestead.com
Description :

"The best way to predict the future is to invent it."

Ancient Chaos has sprung from minds and souls of many VERY
experienced and long time players of MUDs, particularly SMAUG muds. 

These people have joined to create an incredible world of conflict,
puzzling quests and groups of people that love to play in a fantasy
text-based world. 

We are new-player friendly as well as savvy in the wants and desires
of extremely experienced players. Our Immortals are approachable and
available to help you with your concerns and problems.

We have already created MANY new areas (and our staff is constantly
working at constructing new ones).  There are also many new features
in Ancient Chaos including a fully integrated marriage code system
that allows you to MUD marry and have a special command
called "Soulmate" to immediately transfer you to your mate wherever
they may be (except for a few limited places). 

Our Deity system is fully reworked and uses an extremely complicated
variable system which gives our many Deities unique and diverse
attributes.

We are currently still in the design stages, but open to the public,
so come and join a new MUD where your views, opinions and time can
actually make a difference to shape the path of our MUD.

We are currently TEMPORARILY offering a free advance to Avatar and a
full set of Avatar grade equipment and 20,000,000 gold coins to your
first character to be created on Ancient Chaos once it has achieved
level 20.

We allow infinite character creations and currently allow up to 8
peaceful characters per player (ip) to play simultaneously so that
you may help one character with others. Deadly (PKill or PVP) players
are limited to ONE DEADLY character per ip logged at any one time.

**************************************************
We are currently looking for builders who have vision and GOOD
knowledge of the spelling and grammar of the English language.
(Sowwy ... We dunt wunna rewright all your aryas no madder how
awesum yur dreems.)

Successful applicants will be able to create areas (using the SMAUG
codebase (and our custom builders' commands and variables as they
come along)) that will conform to the current balance and
mob/equipment limits which exist on the MUD at present. He or she
will be able to create areas within a bracketed level range and not
ONLY be interested in building Multi-Avatar level areas.

Applicants will be asked to level to level 20 in order to get to
become familiar with our MUD and its staff and players somewhat as
well as have time to check news, notes and help files. It does not
take a lot of work to accomplish this.

We are currently coding new custom building commands with extended
variables to make your every construction dream a consuming reality
for our players.

**************************************************

Feel free to contact us at any time with inquiries either through our
website or email address.

has led to its selection as Mud Connector's Mud of the Month for December,
1998.
 
   Clandestine offers 50 races and 30 classes to suit just about everyone's

each have their own religion spells. Player-killing (PK) is allowed, and
even encouraged, with level and religious rank based limits.

multiclassing, an online casino with working card games, relic weapons that
increase power as you use them, and much more!  Our website includes an
up-to-date map of the world and you can browse races, classes, and spell
group information to make your character creation easier.

      IndiaMUCK, as its name states, takes place in the

both friend and foe along the way. Claim your own territory 
and raise a family, or join up with another group of 
animals. Take part in the main TinyPlot of the MUCK, or 
start your own storyline to play out with friends.

and we have a fair set of rules to make sure everyone can

the MUCK. Also, we have a no harassment and no twinking

everyone has a fun stay here at India MUCK, where we hope

Mud         : Forgotten Kingdoms
Code Base   : [Smaug] Heavily modified to C++
Telnet      : game.forgottenkingdoms.com 4000
WWW         : http://www.forgottenkingdoms.com/
Description :

 Forgotten Kingdoms Mud is a roleplay mud based in the Forgotten Realms 
world created by Ed Greenwood.  The game has 143 areas and growing,
with very active coders and a team of active builders.  There are
over 22,000 rooms to explore, and numerous quests to complete.

Your character chooses one of four classes on creation, warrior,
wizard, rogue and priest.  Your character can then specialise by
joining a guild, or following one of the 30 plus coded gods.

Your character has a choice of hometowns available to him/her, from
Waterdeep, to Zhentil Keep, to Menzobarrenzan to Mithril Hall.  
Options are determined by race, class and alignment.

Your character does not have to kill to level, but they can also
learn a trade, from mining and creating armour and weapons, to
lapidary and fletching.

Come join our great team of roleplayers and play in the world
of Forgotten Kingdoms.

are extremelly detailed and may be looked at and manipulated

Code Base   : [Circlemud] [Circlemud]
Telnet      : eplains.viperlair.net 4000 [209.145.160.65]
WWW         : http://eplains.servehttp.com
Description :

   In the dead of the night, a dark shadow heads over the bridge
stopping at the centre, crouched, waiting. A blaze of hellfire
clears away on the opposite side, a demon stepping forth. In a
flash two sets of fangs blur into existence, an engagement,
vicious claws appear and a daggers clashes.

   A glimmer of light in the darkness creeps over the nearby
hill, and a creature of holiness comes into view, her eyes
shining, she blasts the combatants with divine fury. The demon,
enraged by the intrusion, returns a rain of fire, while the
vampire raises its shroud, and vanishes into nothing, promising
vengeance. 

  As deep rumbling sounds, the ground splits open, a huge
humanoid bursts free and demands silence for his slumber in the
earth. With a wave of his gigantic arms, it harnesses the powers
of the elements, bringing them down on the weakened creatures.
Retreating, bringing their quarrel elsewhere, and ending the
battle. Laying his massive form upon the ground the titan closes
his eyes for much wanted rest.

   A small shuffling in nearby bushes beside the stream produces
an Elven Ranger, a Dwarven Warlock, a Human Shaman, and a
Draconian Knight. Their eyes wide with awe at what they had
witnessed, carefully passing the massive form of the titan they
cross the bridge to the city of McGinteys Cove where they were
headed.

Description :

 The city of 'Straford' in 'the-night.com' is a hotbed of crime, mystery,
paranormal activity, and (best of all) role-playing.

Established in 1999, 'TNC' (formerly 'Stormy Nights') has a new owner and a new

session). A player-run newspaper (complete with reports, editors, newsrooms,
bulletin boards, and, of course, newspapers) reports the activities of the
players, including the player-run police department and organization that
often conflicts with one of the player-run mafias. These run-ins often lead
to player lawyers representing both sides in our realistic courtroom design
with a concealed jury system.

With new professions being enhanced for player-run role-playing all the
time, 'the-night.com' is constantly improving itself. Currently featuring a 
real-time camera/film/theatre system, cars, houses, offices, postal system,
phones, casino, three towns (two habitable), television system, auction
system, player-run bars, airplanes, trains, musical instruments, accent
system, identity-concealing masks, access to staff assistance, and more!

Coming soon: player created (filmed, written, edited by and starring) films,
medical system (player-run hospital), and more!

'the-night.com' now supports the Wizard Front End client for those who
wish to use it. Access information can be found at www.the-night.com.

WWW         : http://www.iowa-mug.net
Description :

  Prodigy first went online under the name Parody in 1989
on the MirrorWorld/IOWA system in the UK. The game was
rewritten to be more flexible in 1990 and become Prodigy,
and ran until early 1993.

The setting is the mythical land of Wesarg, and draws
mostly from European mythology, with a dose of Pagan and
proto-Christian symbology.

Players may choose to be a Warrior, Mage, Rogue or Priest,
with this choice placing certain restrictions on their
combat and magical abilities, with some spells reserved
for certain classes. Various skills are also available to
all players.

Prodigy is all-original, written from scratch in StarLite,
a language that was written specifically for Prodigy. The
game is old, and offered up more as those who are curious
about how games used to look...

  The world of Castle D'Image is a world in which intrigue
and romance, adventure and magick are commonplace. It is a
land of possibilities, where almost anything an and does
happen. For reference purposes, it can best be described
as falling roughly into a late medieval - early renaissance
timeframe. It is /not/ set on an historical earth,
or even an alternate history earth. The universe of CDI is
not the universe of earth, thus historical arguments will
not necessarily be given credence.

Applications are required for characters who are nonhuman,
magical, and/or of noble birth. All other characters can be
created and played immediately. The MUSH boasts 2-3 long
term, MUSHwide TPs per year, usually running 1-2 RL months
in length, with other player-run plots and day to day RP
occuring in between.

tolerance with a mix of magic and lower technology than

passes between Senalia and New Xestia.

Mud         : Escape to Arador
Code Base   : [Smaug]
Telnet      : escape.dune.net 5150
WWW         : None
Description :

** Mud is NOT open for Player Testing Yet, we will make an
announcement when it's open ** Still hiring builders **

In the days of deep knowledge, Imlir, the eldest of all wizards,
unlocked the secret of the ley lines and created the first gate,
connecting one center of learning to the other by which all
could travel a great distance in a short time.  The Country of 
Arador prospered greatly, both in wealth and in knowledge, and 
became the great center where all nations gathered under a common 
bond.

When attacked from all sides by horrific invaders, Arador faced the 
difficult decision of whether to use the Imlir Gates in ways they 
weren't intended: to evacuate the populace of the country to 
safety.  The decision was made, and evacuation commenced. The gates 
themselves fell under the attack, and the magic of the Imlir gates 
surged in waves, and followed the ley lines to the other gates which 
responded likewise.  Imlir and the others struggled to control it, 
but the power increased exponentially, until a sudden clap of 
thunder sounded and a great flash, later reported seen by all towns 
and villages, burst forth.  Then darkness.

The records from the invaders indicated the lands of Arador vanished 
that night, and nothing could be found of it anywhere.  The land had 
changed, as if great portions had been scooped from their spots.  
The people of Arador would never know this.

How long the darkness lasted, none knew.  When it subsided, Imlir 
and many of the great mages were dead or had vanished, consumed by 
the great magics.  But that was not all which had changed.  The 
night sky showed vastly different stars, the climate had changed and 
later even the very geography was discovered altered.  Arador had 
been transported to a different place altogether, each town and 
village were separated and all the Imlir gates were destroyed.  Even 
the great centers of learning were not spared, for vast portions of 
knowledge were gone, even portions of the towns and villages were 
missing, as if they had never been.

Join us and Escape to Arador!

which enabled time travel to finally be accomplished.  With
this ability to travel backwards and forward in time it
allowed anyone and everyone the luxury of knowing what the
future would bring and what the past was.  However, this
luxury turned into the final breakdown of all societies.

With the multitude of people jumping through time and space
to undo wrongs of the past, and find out secrets of the
future, the past and the future became intertwined, confused,
and unstable.  From this abuse of physics the Nexus was
formed.  The Nexus was a terrible distortion in the fabric of
the space time continuum with infinite portals that lead to
every point in space and time.

Time travel was outlawed in the year 2099, but the Nexus
remains.  Here in the Third Millennium you will find what
remains today after the first 50 years of the new world.  The
question of race and class has been eliminated.  All men
and women are created equal.  We as individuals determine who
we are and what we do.

Mud         : Shattered World
Code Base   : [LP] http://swlpc.sourceforge.net
Telnet      : shattered.org 23 [218.214.18.63]
WWW         : http://www.shattered.org
Description :

  Fourteen (14) years of active development. Administered by
professional software developers and published authors. This
mud has a complex, detailed and sprawling world. This is a
player-centric mud supported by innovative and interesting
economic, legal and ecological systems.  Players run guilds,
players operate stores, players set prices, and players
build structures throughout the world.

  That said, it is a challenging mud. It's tough at the
bottom as a newbie because this mud has unique and complicated
game play; established players won't just roll over and give
up their turf (or cash!).  Its also tough at the top with
Lords and Guild Leaders responsible for administrative and
legal decisions which maybe unpopular with lesser players.
This encourages an active and participative society.
If you take the time and effort to learn the mud you'll
find it unique and engrossing. Many of our 'hard core'
players have been active for over five years.

  There are many ways to 'play'; it's not a killfest, we
strongly encourage role players and a responsible community.
But it's also a tough simulation; so the traditional
'warrior' adventurer will find plenty to fulfill them.
You'll find 9 innovative races, 11 guilds, 32 quests, like
you've never seen before.  Tough adventuring, big fantasy
world, friends and foes.  Take the time to know Shattered
World and you'll be richly rewarded!

Description :

into the shape of a star to disguise its true nature. It was given to Azerax
anonymously for his 50th birthday. Azerax, thinking he finally earned some
long awaited recognition, proudly wore the cursed artifact. His first
teleport spell thereafter, brought him to a remote island, from which he
could find no escape.

 Years passed by, as Azerax tried to figure out why he was unable to leave
the isle. He managed to discern the true nature of the talisman; no magic of
his, directly or indirectly, would allow him to leave. Perhaps it was this,
or the penetrating loneliness that led him to create the first enchanted
animal. Azerax used his special enchantment to change other animals: lions,
tigers, bears, turtles, insects, and whatever other animal he could find.
The only animals that were not changed were the animals that were to be
raised for food (cows, chickens, etc). One hundred and six species were
transformed in all. A thriving city was formed- made up of intelligent
animals. Azerax taught them all he could about civilization, acting as their
king.

 The boundary law has been revoked - allowing the animals to explore a
world they never had the conscious to know. That is where you come in, Brave
Adventurer. Go out and explore the world, have spectacular journeys,
complete dangerous quests, seek your fame and fortune, and secure the ideals
of the only place you ever knew - The Jungle.

200 original areas to explore and MANY original cities located on three
enormous, completely original continents. Players work together to
progress up to level 50, through 8 races and 4 base classes that branch
off into 12 finishing classes, having a choice to become an immortal and
help run the mud, or begin to work on honor ranks.  There are ten honor
ranks and they provide long-term playability for the serious player taking
up to one year to reach the final rank of Emperor.
 
 Imperial has excellent newbie areas and an extensive help-file system for
new players, while helpful immortals and ranked players take new players
under their wing.  Imperial has a meta system to improve your characters
statistics and an auction system to find just the right gear for him or
her.
 
 Dragons are often seen in the air above the capital city of Kial-Qwyn.
Sometimes these are the famous Emperors and Empresses returning from a
hard campaign, but sometimes it might be a marauding dragon from the near
by dragon's lairs. If danger, fame, fortune might be your calling then
come and join us.  Become part of the history that is Imperial.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : A Dark Portal's New World
Code Base   : [Rom] Recoded for your roleplaying comfort
Telnet      : nonsecure.org 7005 [66.207.98.67]
WWW         : http://adarkportal.com
Description :

 A total revamping of A Dark Portal, first created in 1998, this MUD is
designed for your roleplaying comfort. We offer scores of trades, from
armour-smithing to mining to tailoring to fishing, as well as more standard
magic-, thievery- and combat-based pursuits. Most anything your character
would do for a living is available; what is not already hard-coded will be
along in the future, and what's there now is listed <a
href=http://adarkportal.com/nwchanges2.html>here</a>.

 The world is all-original, grouped into seven huge regions corresponding
to the seven well-developed playable races. (More are to come.) On the
website, you'll find detailed material on the land, as well as numerous
stories and enough information to give you a good feel for this unique and
fascinating realm! Check it out, as it describes more than this listing ever
could.

 At this time, ADP's NW is in the earliest stages of testing, and is still
actively recruiting builders. If you're interested in getting in on the
ground floor of a MUD that has plenty of room to grow but has been around
long enough that you know it's not going anywhere, come on by!

Mud         : GalaxyMUD
Code Base   : [Unknown] GalaxyMUD built on SocketMUD telnet server
Telnet      : americanairport.us 3000 [69.56.206.82]
WWW         : None
Description :

 GalaxyMUD is purely a space simulation. All bodies (stars,
planets, etc..) do not have hard-coded paths - movement is
based off laws of gravitation, F=Ma, and realistic collision
equations. Players can create spacecraft / planets / stars
and see how they react with the rest of the galaxy.
Electromagnetic "waves" have also been added to the simulation.
Although still in the testing phase, these "waves" travel at
the speed of light and can a) be blocked by a body (light),
b) bounce off from a body (RADAR), or c) be absorbed into a
body (energy weapon).

Currently the simulation is in a bare-bones state. It will take
some knowledge of orbital mechanics to create properly orbiting
spacecraft.

It is hoped that this simulation can someday be expanded to a
playable science fiction game. There are additional features
planned for the MUD, but at this point, the MUD is purely
research / testing orientated.

Code Base   : [CoffeeMud] 4.x
Telnet      : thegodslie.com 5555 [68.37.26.12]
WWW         : http://www.TheGodsLie.com/
Description :

  The Gods Lie has been under development for just over a year now.
New code changes go in once or twice a month.  One and a half coders
work continuously to bring you nifty features.  Our Head builder is
a literary major and loves hand crafting lovingly detailed areas.  
Her lateset area, a bedoin camp, was researched extensively before the
first room was mapped out.  We now feature over 1,000 original rooms.

The stock, separated from the original areas, is utilized to test out
various features of the codebase.  This is still where most of us hang
out and play with the new toys.  Some of our latest features include:

-  7 base classes, 38 subclasses, 6 player races, and over 1200 spells,
prayers, songs, skills, and abilities.
- The ability to abbreviate commands, mobs, items, names, or abilities.
- Descriptive alignment based combat system with race-based natural
weapons, ranged weapons and spells, and mounted combat.
- Contageons and diseases.  Catch a cold when naked, poison ivy in the
forest, or become a were-creature from that bite.
- Lieges and Vassals
- Area conquest, allowing you to subjugate the villagers and write your
own laws of the land.
- Full clan, guild, fellowship, and union support, including politics,
alliances, and automated membership management. 
- One of our favorite classes, the Artisan.  Gain experience by using
your crafting skills.  As you improve, so does the quality of your 
work and the availability of items.

For further details and a great experience, come visit us at 
www.TheGodsLie.com. Drop us a note on our forums or just telnet in to
TheGodsLie.com port 5555.

We've all been there. We've all seen it. Every town and city has
it's own flavor, it's own quirks. But step back from that and what
do you see? The same supermarkets, fast food places,industrial
sections and neighborhoods. We've all been here. We live in and
visit these places.
 
We know these places.

these places are all the more terrifying for their familiarity
when the fear strikes. Like the dark whispers you heard from your
closet as a child, the sounds of fear and of madness are all the
more sharp and piercing when they fall from the lips of those
we know.

We live in this place. It's not removed, it's not distant, 
it's not exotic. It's home. And the terrors and monsters
and nightmares are here with us.

currently set up for core rules and Vampire the Requiem. We

Mud         : ElderainMUD
Code Base   : [Dawn]
Telnet      : elderainmud.com 4000 [24.145.135.166]
WWW         : http:///www.elderainmud.com
Description :

================================================================

Elderain MUD is an RP enforced mud that just opened on March 1st
(2005). Were running all original areas and the mud is based in 
the world of Elderain, a custom campaign setting created by my 
co-owner Mike.

Some of our features include:

> Perm Death - If a player is killed by another player the 
loser will be dead forever.  We decided to go with this 
method to ensure fresh role-play.
> Introduction System - Players will only know other players 
by their short description unless they're introduced to that 
player.
>  DM Points - Players are awarded this points for excellent 
role-play and may use them for restring, personal restore, 
minor magical item and so on.  The possibilities are endless.
>  Immortal Driven Quests - Immortals are able to create 
quests on their own.  There are quests almost everyday!  
We also have automated quests.
>  Carriages/Ships - Can carry players from one city to the next
if they choose not to walk across the vast wilderness.
>  Political System - Players can be lords of cities, guards in 
towns, member of the city council, etc.

The entire concept behind Elderain MUD is that the player runs 
the show.
The immortals are only here to assist in behind the scenes 
issues and will not interfere with the role-play in any way.

You can view our campaign at:  http://campaign.elderainmud.com

Check us out; we know you won't be disappointed!

-Eyr the King of the Gods, Lord of Wisdom.

================================================================

Mud         : The Game
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Heavily modified
Telnet      : herb.servegame.com 4000 [68.84.233.63]
WWW         : http://herb.servegame.com
Description :

  The general principal behind The Game is that you are a regular
person, logging into a MUD. The MUD's storyline is everyone has been 
living on this island as long as anyone can remember, except the old 
storyteller. The island is controlled by pirates, and has been cut 
off from the mainland for well over a hundred years. Many people 
believe the mainland to be a myth, since no one else can ever recall 
anyone going there. Many have left in search of the mainland, but 
none have returned. There are stories of a hooded figure that would 
take travellers to the mainland in exchange for souls, but none have 
dared trust this. Several small castles lie abandoned on the island, 
waiting for a new lord to arrive.

We offer 3 forms of PK areas: Lawful(no pk), Neutral(pk but no eq 
loss), and Chaotic(risk chance of loosing eq). We also offer several 
in game games, such as fishing and attacking a castle for gold or 
prestige and other things to do besides killing mobs for xp, and we 
are adding more each day.

We are very liberal in how we want our game played. Role-play is 
wonderful, but not required. The gods will only be taking part in 
disciplinary action when some one is being a real dick. We like the
idea of people being themselves and not being punished for it. We 
are now open for player testing to help work out any final bugs 
before we open for real. When we open for real, the world will be 
much bigger than it is now. Enjoy and thanks for the help!

test.

 Bangor was the choice of starting locations back in Version 1.0 of the world and has now
stuck, however it has now expanded further beyond to London which offers a full London
Underground for players to navigate (and get lost in) and visit various attractions.

 From the cinema in Bangor, players may visit a number of films, including Star Wars,
Aliens and Batman and interact with all the main characters, seeing the film through to its
conclussion in order to leave the area.

 Other areas start off in modern day and then lead off on a tangent, for instance, enter a
medievil book in the University Library which leads into an area with the gods from norse,
greek, aztec, and more, religions. Or visit a wargaming store in Brighton to lead into a
Battletech area.

 In the current version (4.1) we have created a totally new and unique leveling system
spanning 500 levels, involving not just experience points and meta, but objects, mobs,
secret rooms, gold and much more.

 We look foreward to seeing you soon and hopefully we can all build this once great mud
back to its former glory.

 Elves are elves, dwarves are dwarves, and neither are human.
They don't like each other much, either.

We're building a world where you can RP being one of them, or
be a draconian, orc, troll, or gnome.

While the races are constantly in conflict, combat is rare
(attacking NPCs is usually fatal, for example). The world is
designed as a playground for RPers, not hack & slash.

You'll be expected to RP the races as we've designed them, not
as you found them in some book, but we will be lenient when
what we do differs from the norm. In most cases you can have 
input into their final form, as there's lots of development 
left to do.

Open for playtesting. No fear of pwipes - we use text pfiles
and fix them rather than delete them.

Mud         : Magical Shopping Arcade: Oozora
Code Base   : [LP] Custom LIB, slightly customized driver
Telnet      : mud.msaoozora.com 2223 [69.154.42.29]
WWW         : http://www.msaoozora.com
Description :

Welcome to MSA:Oozora! Where we try to tailor to EVERYONE's desires.
We strive for customization and a wide variety of concepts, while
trying to maintain a simple-to-use system. MSA is suitable for all
ages, featuring unique methods of censorship that allows pretty much
anything to go on, without destroying young children.

Customization? We've got that!
  - An intricate job system, based around Final Fantasy X-2 that also
    allows coders to create unique jobs.
  - Privacy rooms and togglable censor filters to appeal to all ages
  - A real world with dimensional portals, the real world containing
    plots and quests for players to go through, and the other worlds
    being based solely around collection and destruction. The player
    can go between the two concepts freely.
  - A random encounter battle system that allows different monsters
    to appear in the same places, based on circumstances
  - Choice between Active Time Battle (Commands happen automatically)
    or Charge Time Battle (Take your time to decide the best course)
  - Mini-games to pass the time when bored
  - Party system that allows you to party with any combination of up
    to 4 other players, NPCs or pets, with a unique exp system that
    allows any level variance without unbalancing the game.
  - MXP and Pueblo enhanced, not required, but heavily recommended.

While the MUD is still in development, some of these features are
not available to all players and only playtesters, builders, or
coders, just depending on what phase of testing they are in. We are
currently hiring playtesters or builders. (People are allowed to
play but are subject to pwipes at anytime, without compensation
Coders will be hired upon succesful completion of several conditions,
such as building requirements, willingness to learn, ability to
follow instructions and more.

Mud         : Xaos
Code Base   : [Merc] 8 years of code morphing
Telnet      : xaos-mud.org 5000
WWW         : http://www.xaos-mud.org
Description :

Xaos is a gigantic frame work that eagarly caters to the creative 
player.  Featuring an overly active coder and builder staff it 
accomodates basically any desired location for the fantasy RPGer.  
We have a loyal playerbase who work as a community within the OOC 
means, socially a very helpful mud.  Dozens of races, dozens of 
subclasses and hundreds of locations to visit.  The majority of a 
character's life span is spent within thier hero levels, where 
you've mastered your class's skills and now seek to attain grander 
goals of anything you can dream up to attempt.

Xaos is currently very item-centric, with most of the valuable 
objects coming from random generators its all but impossible to see 
two people wearing the same stuff.

The mud is unfortunately not friendly for new mudders and without a 
friend who's already played Xaos a new comer to muds and even Xaos 
will most likely be lost.  The basic rules by which everything 
works have however been geared to avoid giving the veterans 
unmatchable advantages and there is no way to essentially cripple 
your character by making an uneducated decision about how you 
progress.

Player input is highly valued, a prime example is the heavy usage 
of the idea spool, where any player is capable of commenting and 
adding to the creative process of how the mud expands or is 
modified.

Xaos is and probably always will be perpetually in BETA.
Xaos has never had nor ever will have a pwipe.
Xaos is Xaos.  Come play in the mud. ;)

  The world of Enity is a strange place. Many realms exist here,
and each is governed by a powerful god or goddess. There is also
a forsaken realm with no god at all, which most simply consider
the 'Rogue' realm.

  The world of Enity is a pre-indusrial society, and many
strange and magical beasts make their home here. The realms with
gods are infused with magic and power, so there is no need for
machines. Weapons are prevalent, but very different from realm to
realm, and may be more common in some places than others. The
possibility of machinery exists only in the rogue realm, where
magic is limited. However, their technology is not very advanced.

  [When you play at Enity, there are hundreds of choices you can
make about your characters. The only limit is your imagination.
We have very few strict rules, and once you have established your
first character, you will be allowed to create others. We are
very open-minded, and want you to have a good time. We are mostly
an original theme, with influences from Black & White, the novel
American Gods, Egyptian and Greek society, and the novel
Hyperion, to name a few. You need not know anything about these
influences to enjoy and understand this game.]

Mud         : The Lands of Light and Darkness
Code Base   : [Smaug] LLD codebase--SMAUG modified beyond all possibility of recognition
Telnet      : LightAndDarkness.wolfpaw.net 3000 [204.209.44.6]
WWW         : http://LightAndDarkness.wolfpaw.net
Description :

     Welcome to the Lands of Light and Darkness. Seven months ago, 
an adventure began that will never end. People have fought, explored, 
discovered quests, lived the life of a powerful hero or a quiet 
craftsperson. They have found paths to new cities and new lands; they
have found new skills, spells, and crafts, and the future holds much more.

Some choose the Light. They have an easier path of it. Those lands are 
stable, and ruled by law. Some choose the Darkness. They choose a harsh 
home, where the only laws are made by those around them. 

We expected the Light to have the roleplay, and the Darkness to be 
hack and slash, and PvP. The Darkness has surprised us with its 
roleplay, and the degree that players help one another, but still, each 
land has a feel of its own. If one does not suit you, the other may.

Fighting is, as always, a sure way to advance. But, there are a multitude
of other ways. Buy a ship, large or small, and sail to far-off lands. Find
a gemstone, carve it, and set it into jewelry. Learn embroidery, the craft
that has daunted many a proud warrior. Study many other crafts; you'll
learn from them. Heal the injured. Sit in town square and gab. 

Don't arrive expecting to find familiar gameplay. The chances are
high that you'll have to revise your expectations. You'll find other
people ready and eager to help you, though, and there's plenty of 
room for your name in the history books! 

We've created a unique blend of fantasy and realism here. Come 
join the adventure of a lifetime and make a place for yourself 
to call home.

Mud         : Animud
Code Base   : [Rom] Heavily Modified
Telnet      : animud.net 6666 [160.79.195.26]
WWW         : http://www.animud.net
Description :

Animud is an anime themed roleplaying based world. We have a medium
sized world of mostly original content. Most of our areas and world
are based on various anime. We are always expanding it and looking for
builders. We offer anime based races that are well themed for
creating your dream character. Everything is balanced and we
guarantee you will love our quest system. Animud offers an open
clan(guild) system where players create their own clans, with
extended ranks and clan hall options. Equipment is level restricted
within 50 levels, keeping low level players from abusing high level
equipment, while still providing freedom of eq choice. We are a 200
level mud, our races are; Human, Elf, Dwarf, Saiyan, Third(android),
Juraian, and Skeleton. We have the following classes: Mage, Cleric,
Thief, Warrior and Vampire.

We do allow and encourage playerkilling within the roleplay model.
This is not to say we are a PK mud, we simply believe that roleplay is
more fun and lasting with the danger of death involved. Staff resides
over everything and we are very strict about removing griefers from
this system.

New players are welcome and our help system is specifically designed
to cater to the skill level of the player. We hope to see you!

Mud         : Holy Mission - Remains from the Past
Code Base   : [LP] HerpModifications
Telnet      : wildsau.enemy.org 2001 [193.170.194.34]
WWW         : http://
Description :

Shattered by a war between creators of the highest ranks and the
following tyrannie of those who'd won turned the once living place
into a cold and desolated void.

Back in 93 when the 'linzer' admins led by patience moved on to
create a new world based upon a updated mudlib, holy mission was
given to a couple of Archwizards who choosed to stay. In those
days, the world was highly populated and easily reached the cap of
60 simultaneous players. Packed with many guilds, some of them
hidden and very restricted, quests, legendary monsters and a broad
community from all walks of life and nations made this game fun to
play.

But that was not to be meant for long. One amongs the ranks of the
creators, he and his friends did all he could do to destroy, what
other wizards and players had created. Holy Mission fell and when
no living thing crawled over the damned world anymore, even he
went on.

Today a few fans are working on this old piece to give old players
the chance to return and remember and to give new players the
chance to see how a mud looked like back in 1991. Holy Mission is
nothing compared to modern muds like Achaea or BatMud, but its an
original with a out-of-the box village from 2.4.5 lib and
padrone's castle.

Kiri of Holy Mission - Remains from the Path

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : The Unwelcome
Code Base   : [MUSH] Rhost
Telnet      : theunwelcome.com 1520 [216.136.9.8]
WWW         : http://www.theunwelcome.com
Description :

In 2009, the population of New Jersey experienced a huge 
masquerade breach on a scale that shocked both the
supernatural and mortal population, threatening the 
stability of mortal ignorance and, in essence, the 
safety of the supernatural population on the whole.

Leading up to this event were 
equally appalling incidents that began to 
shake the foundation of the state and 
its already questionable population and governance. 
The first was the movement of three government-run 
law enforcement agencies into the private sector,funded 
and controlled by wealthy corporate executives who 
remain shrouded in mystery. The second was the 
onslaught of law suits that threatened to turn 
New Jersey's most prized natural resource, 
the Pine Barrens, into one large highway 
dotted by strip malls and
bars.

There is the aggressive stance 
New Jersey's governor has taken against the
Supreme Court when it came time to tax the casino's 
in Atlantic City, his arguments and 
protestations creating a political environment 
of active hostility.

And then there is Asbury Park, one of the six cities 
featured on our grid, where police don't 
dare go after the riots created a level of chaos 
and violence that the state would rather just 
contain than actually fix. 

The Unwelcome is not a fluffy game.  It is a 
realistically portrayed World of Darkness 
allowing Mortal, Mortal+, Vampire, Shifter, and Mage.

Mud         : Ultimate DC Universe
Code Base   : [MUX]
Telnet      : ultimatemux.com 2210
WWW         : http://www.geocities.com/ultimate_dcu/index.html
Description :

The premise behind Ultimate DC is simple and direct. We're taking the
concept presented in Marvel comics line of Ultimate books and 
applying them to the DC Comics Universe(with help from an issue of 
Wizard). The Mux exists in an updated "Year 1" situation for most 
characters(there are exceptions for a few characters detailed 
elsewhere). We intend to reinvent the DC Universe characters in the
same light Marvel reinvented theirs. Keeping the core of the 
characters intact but making them a bit more real, a bit more human,
and a bit darker and edgier in most instances.
     
This is the DC Universe with a healthy dose of the real world. While
the people of the DC Universe have dealt with heroes in the past it's
been more than 30 years since the last hero team was active and even 
then their heroes and villains were, for the most part, human or 
enhanced human(or at least were believed to be so). Now the world 
will have to contend with gods, aliens and all sorts of mystical 
badness in ways they've never dreamed of before.

Mud         : Beyond Chaos
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Modified
Telnet      : www.beyond-chaos.com 2550
WWW         : http://www.beyond-chaos.com
Description :

   This MUD is a sequal to the original Aftermath MUD.  
It started out as circleMUD, but there have been significant 
changes to the code.
   There are five races.  Each race is similar to a clan.  
Your race will determine your "home city" and your 
"religion".  There are 13 classes and there are 1500 mortal 
levels, and after completing those levels a player advances
into the 1500 immortal levels. Then there are 500 God levels,
1 God level is for immortals that advance past level 3000 and
the rest are for staff.  
    Very soon I will implement special classes (vampires, 
lycans, zombies, and spirits).  These classes will not 
replace your current class, they will be more like a virus  
that infects the character.  Pkilling is allowed, but not 
on players of your own race.  When you attack a player you 
will not recieve a pkiller tag, but your Max Hit points will 
drop 25%.
   Unfortunatly the zones are all stock.  I am currently 
looking for 1 head builder and as many builders as I can get.  
Please email me if you are interested in one of these 
positions.  Eventually there will be no stock zones left.  
The MUD will have 5 major cities, and the Race of your 
character will determine the city you are from.
   In the mean time feel free to begin playing with your 
character on this mud.

but we are always open to suggestions via our forums.
The game is based about 20 or so years after the destruction of the 
first deathstar, we are not totally accurate yet but are working on 
it. Still needing builders. Right now we have about 38 planets, 37
 starsytems, and 47 areas. Updated space system with 46 ships 
availiable all of which can be upgradeed via addin modules.
Nice cargo system and Player Owned shops also help players gather 
fundage. Cloning is availiable.. if you can find it and afford it :).

things are always changing. Force is rolled like stats at character
creation, so you never know who has got it and who dont untill they
are "sensed" by an existing forcer. Several races and classes to 
choose from. You now have choice of 2 classes, a primary and 
secondary, so basically you can have 2 skill sets plus what ever the
race roll gives you, and of course we have the RP points system that
you can redeem for skill levels and or to a specific skill.

Forget about the orcs and monsters in other games - Fed II has real
challenges for grownups!
Like day trading commodities futures and launching an IPO for your
own company.

interactive mobiles and more.
There's even an ATM machine on the far side of the Sun!

power and money. 
Things that matter in real life. Federation II is a newly rewritten
version of the original Federation with all the charm and humor of 
the original but adding new features and challenges based on our 
15 years of multiplayer game experience and players requests. 
There are new ranks, new planets, new features, new challenges, 
new things to do.

Come play Federation II for free and enjoy the excitement again.
We'll even throw in a set of starter maps of the Solar System. 

Now Announcing:

NEW VERSION OF FEDTERM ADDS LOTS OF EXTRA FEATURES

Fed Term is the new GRAPHICAL front end for Federation II.
This means players will be able to supply their own custom
avatar picture to display on their own computer as well as
all the other players while in the game. It also means pictures 
of your ship. 

And it also means AutoMapping! Really easy to use, intuitive 
automapping built in, ready to use. 

And it means, graphic stat displays for you and your spaceship.
And, a new multi-tabbed pane to display and communicate with all
the other players in the game and a special friends panel.
And many more useful and nifty features players have asked for!

The new Fed Term makes playing Federation II more than a text 
game. It's becoming an exciting synthesis of Graphic and Text!

Mud         : Darkness Beneath the Fog: London by Night
Code Base   : [AFKMud]
Telnet      : pix.isa-geek.com 7111 [pix.isa-geek.co]
WWW         : http://www.geocities.com/london_nights_wod
Description :

Darkness Beneath the Fog: Welcome to modern day London, England. But 
this new London is not the one that we know and love. Rather, this 
is a London filled with Vampires, Shapeshifters, Magic, and a labour 
government. In this London, a place beneath the world mortals see 
exists. A darker place. A world of Darkness.
The streets of London are no longer a safe place for children to 
play, for adults to stroll leisurely, for law enforcement to patrol. 
So frightening has the city become that law enforcement can't always 
be counted on to maintain the safety of London's inhabitants. Take 
head...you are on your own.

Darkness Beneath the Fog is a newly opened World of Darkness MUSH 
based off the White Wolf World of Darkness, using a combination of 
2nd and 3rd edition rules to encourage RP as well as alternative 
thinking. The game currently supports Shifters, Changeling, Kindred, 
and Mage, with some Demons thrown in for good measure. 
The Shifter sphere is accepting Garou, Bete, Corax, Ratkin, and many 
other Tribes. The Kindred sphere is open for Anarchs, Independents, 
Camarilla and Sabbat. Mage has openings for almost all the various 
mages including Verbena, VA, CoE, and Hermes (but not limited to 
those). Technocrats will be accepted in the near future. The 
Changeling sphere will be open for Seelie, Unseelie and Motley, and 
group apps are encouraged. Demons are being accepted on a case by 
case basis, and the wraith sphere will be opening once the game is 
in full swing.
London has a strong staff committed to making the RP experience an 
enjoyable one for all players involved. There are a great many 
opportunities to get involved in one of the many sphere and mush-
wide TPs constantly being planned, and staff welcomes players who 
wish to be a TP hook for a new TP.
Stop in and check us out...we'll be watching for you.

Mud         : Acadiana
Code Base   : [MOO]
Telnet      : Acadiana.acaciamoo.com 9999
WWW         : http://www.neonscrew.com/acadiana/index.htm
Description :

Acadiana is reality based MOO, hoping to advance as time progresses.
Acadiana is new character friendly and has a dedicated staff team to
assist players needs. Acadiana offers a custom character creation
process so the possibilities of two characters being alike are very
slim. Acadiana has a wide selection of character professions to choose
along with any profession you may have from working for another
character. Some of these professions include, police officers,
emergency medical technicians, fire fighters, government officials
including judges and courthouse clerks. There are three basic cities
to which a character can live, work, or play. Acadiana offers and
bases everything on realism and not only encourages role-play but
also offers other ways (built-in systems) instead of forcing role
plays. Characters, if chosen during the creation process, have the
ability to be killed by another character, and to go along with
that, acadiana has an incorperated violence setting for those that
do not wish to participate in limited or no violence. The staff at
Acadiana are friendly and will accept and comments, concerns, or
suggestions about we the MOO lacks or what would like to be seen.
Please stop by and enjoy the game.

1930's with a twist. With magic dwindling quickly, The magical 
creatures of the world got together and decided that something 
needed to be done. They secured a safe area and this is the world of 
Tradonagh. They have a huge library as there is not much to explore

that the inhabitants do not become bored. Building is the prime 
function of this mud, so player killing is kept to a minimum, as 
builders will be wanting to test mobs and not worry about being 
hunted. All ages are welcome to play here and you do not have to 
want to learn to build to play here.

Mud         : Forgotten Skies
Code Base   : [Rom]
Telnet      : fskies.muddomain.com 9000
WWW         : http://fskies.muddomain.com
Description :

Based on a fantasy world that incorporates the mythos of 
varying cultures; ranging from the arcane mages and mystical 
druids of the west to the pious monks and crafty ninjas of 
the east. Equipment and areas are based entirely on the unique 
flavor of these major (or perhaps just plainly popular)
 cultures. Our world begins in the west, roughly that of 
Mid-Western Europe, as we continue to form a world filled 
with sights and sounds, occasional caravans bringing rare 
items will visit major cities bringing rumors, and tales of 
adventures as a taste of what is to come. When a unique region 
is opened to the players, so will the chance to create a 
new character based on a class exclusive to that territory be 
given. As knowledge of the unknown world is revealed the 
known world continues to change and evolve. Epic struggles of 
power, fame, and greed rage on in a land filled with myth, 
legend, and intrigue.

Mud         : Awakened Worlds

Description :

Awakened Worlds is a Shadowrun MUD based on a heavily customised
Circle codebase. We stay true to the Circle look and feel while
bringing the rules inline with the Shadowrun RPG system from WizKids
(Originally FASA).
All major archetypes are implemented, from Street Sams to Hermetic and
Shamanic mages, Deckers, Adepts and Riggers. With opportunities for
extensive branching of expertise due to the excellent Shadowrun skill
system.
We also feature a large world to explore and play in, over 10000
rooms, ranging from the Seattle Metroplex and Tacoma, to the rugged
wilderness of Sinsearach and are presently continuing building the
already large Portland Metroplex. All locations are extensively
detailed and ready for consumption.
Our staff are also very newbie friendly, offering help to new and
veteran players who are stuck in a jam.
The codebase is heavily evolved, becoming very true to Shadowrun 3rd
Edition in both mechanics and spirit. With the recent inclusion of an
advanced decking (read: computer hacking) and magic system, all
character types are catered for.
