Mud         : Land of Legends
Code Base   : [Smaug] SmaugFUSS 1.6 - heavily modified
Telnet      : tcdbbs.zapto.org 4000 [69.139.108.153]
WWW         : http://www.tcdbbs.zapto.org
Description :

The Land of Legends has recently been brought back to life!

After a year of development it was forced to shut down going into
hiatus for nearly six years. We've now upgraded the software and
rebuilt what we could to come back online. We're actively working
on further development and welcome all input.

The Land of Legends focuses on a medieval fantasy setting with
role-play strongly encouraged. We have guilds, orders, and clans
available along with 108 areas currently online with additional
areas currently in production. We currently offer 14 races and
11 classes to choose from, though we have several new races and
classes on the way. There have been a great many changes to code,
skills, spells, etc with even more on the way.

We have an online alias system so you don't need a mud client to 
be an effective player. We issue every new player with a very
comprehensive newbie guide. We feature a customizable prompt
system that can even include a 'bar graph' reflecting your
opponents remaining life. We have a buddy notification system
to let you know when your friends log on or off or when they
gain a level. Our help system is very well maintained and we have
a corresponding help file for ever command, skill, spell, area,
and for most other common subjects, of course, most of the help
topics are also covered in your newbie guide. We have wedding code
in place. Our whole mud color theme is customizable for each
player. We have hotboot capabilities, so game play almost never
needs to be interrupted for a reboot. We have much more in the
works as well.

Come test your mettle and see if you can attain Avatar powers today!

reading about the Avengers' press conference detailing their 
recent victory over alien invaders on another world. Imagine 
watching broadcasters on E! gossip over the activities on one 
of America's most favorite families, the Fantastic Four.

villains 
from Marvel comics to life. Our story takes place in present day,

Mud         : Shadowrun London
Code Base   : [MUSH] Unmodified TinyMUSH
Telnet      : pix.isa-geek.com 7112
WWW         : http://
Description :

Based upon a somewhat modified form of the Shadowrun system and
setting, Shadowrun London is a roleplaying MUSH with judged combat
and plots.  The emphasis is on street level RP in a setting with
bite.  Magic is downplayed (though still present) and the MUSH
is focused firmly upon cyberpunk themes.

In a dystopian world not too many years in the future, 
Britain has lapsed into isolationism and largely succumbed
to the dictatorial control of the Lord Protector of England.  
The information tendrils of the database state extend through 
the Matrix with few escaping its grip.  Anarchists who choose 
or are forced to live outside mainstream society fight the 
soldiers who try to maintain order and stifle unrest on the 
streets of south London.  Meanwhile, behind the scenes, 
ruthless corporations do anything to improve their bottom line 
and powerful Triads sell mind altering computer chips to 
the disaffected masses in the latest drug craze of the 21st 
century.

In addition to the usual Shadowrun staples of deckers, street 
samurai and the like, we support a wide range of cyberpunk 
concepts - cops, chip dealers, rockers, gangers, Triads, 
software pirates, and more besides.  Character generation is 
points based to give maximum flexibility to concepts.

The server is in the US but most of the staff and many players 
are European, consequently the mush is at its most active around 
2pm-7pm EST, though we are looking to improve our global coverage.

Mud         : Land of the Unforgiven
Code Base   : [GodWars] Dystopia, Eod, MCloud, MODIFIED
Telnet      : messiah.ath.cx 1684 [82.128.209.140]
WWW         : http://
Description :

Land of the Unforgiven is a heavily modified Dystopia Gold. 
The areas have been COMPLETELY wiped and all exp areas and 
Midgaard are from scratch. At the moment the world is fairly
small, but plenty of room for a lot of exping and PK. There
are new areas being added EVERY DAY. There are 18 classes at
the moment, with more to come, possibly including Skyblades
from MCloud and Wraiths from EoD. The statcap is 20k with 4k
added per kill, but the classes and equipment are modified
to reflect this. The average test player has taken two to
three hours to max a character, but mastery is possible in
half an hour or less with the stancetrain, spelltrain, and
weapontrain commands.

This is a breath of fresh air from every kid who thinks he
can run his own EoD, and when all end up looking the same.
Give us a try, you won't want to leave.

Raymond
Head Coder
Head Builder

Description :

BSAE is a circlemud 3.1 based mud with oasis OLC and dgscripts. 
It's been in operation about 3 years, in closed alpha development.
The theme is star wars, and the idea is to create a world that 
is as authentic and roleplayable as possible, 
as well as stunning to the imagination. 
BSAE runs on a dedicated dell poweredge 400sc, off a cable line. 
Most of the programming work thats been put in, has been to a
project we call the builder bot. This is a bot that pulls 
randomly from seed files, and creates enormous worlds for 
players to explore. The idea behind this being to leave the 
filler rooms to the bot, and let the builders do the fun stuff.
BSAE is a mud that will be a far cry from traditional 
mudding experiences. we have vision, we have talent, we have a wide 
variety of resources, and we are quite determined; 
Come check us out.

Mud         : SpyGames
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH 1.8.0 Stock
Telnet      : spygames.mudmagic.com 2007 [69.64.37.210]
WWW         : http://spygames.mudmagic.com/
Description :

In August of 1989, the overthrow and execution of Mikhail Gorbachev
by hardliners within the Politburo and military leadership of the
Soviet Union brought a sudden, and jarring end to the brief period
of detente that had been fostered by Perestroika.  Encouraged by
the events in the USSR, several other Communist nations would
subsequently crack down on efforts to democratize.  This, when
combined with the events earlier in the year in Beijing, led to a
worsening of relations between NATO and the various Communist
nations around the world to a point not seen since the early part
of the 1960s...

SpyGames is a modern day espionage themed MUSH set in an 
alternate history where the Cold War never actually ended.  
The players are assumed to be spies stationed in the 
East German border city of Waldenberg, located on the 
southern shore of the Baltic Sea, near Hamburg and Lübek.
This location makes Waldenberg a primary setting for
espionage activities of all sorts.  Most major nations
have agents in place, as does an international Criminal
and Terrorist organization, the Front Organization for 
Revenge, Crime, and Espionage (or FORCE.)  The game strives
for a feel similar to the early, less gadget oriented James 
Bond adventures, a typical John LeCarre, Ken Follet, Len 
Deighton or Tom Clancy novel, or an episode of Alias or 
Spooks/MI-5.  We emphasize investigation and intrigue 
instead of over the top action,and character interaction 
over combat.

The game is running on a stock install of PennMUSH version 
1.8.0 (the newest stable release version,) and uses a 
variation of the West End Games D6 system.  
Players can, once the game opens, choose to play

Description :

Destiny's Waltz MUSH is a crossover of the Gundam Wing AC Universe
and the Gundam Seed Destiny CE Universe. Players should be familiar
with at least one of the universes to more effectively RP characters.
Most characters are characters played in the series, although original
characters are looked at.

The Gundam Wing side is set in the year AC 196 before the events of
Endless Waltz. The Gundam Seed Destiny is set at some point early in 
the Gundam Seed Destiny universe.

Both universes are connected via a C.E. Federation developed secret 
experiment known as a Shift-Phase Gate. Through this gate, contact
between the Blue Cosmos (A radical anti-genetic engineering faction) 
and Mariemaier's Forces (A secret colony militia headed by Dekim 
Barton) have formed a secret cross-dimensional alliance.

What lies in store for the heroes of each universe? Only time will
tell.

Mud         : Veracity of Death
Code Base   : [GodWars] Midnight Realities 4.1(based off of Midnight Dreams, Rogue Edition, LoW, Merc & Diku)
Telnet      : vod.homelinux.com 9999 [66.66.49.232]
WWW         : http://
Description :

Veracity of Death is the return of the Midnight Dreams based
codebase Midnight Realities continuing where Smoo left off. The mud
includes 14 total classes, 5 of them being original ideas created by
Smoo himself(Not like dystopias which are cloned classes with
renamed skills and a few different powers). Every class is balanced
where each class is put into a small triangle where they have
strengths and weaknesses towards another class(Such as Vampire over
Demon, Demon over Wereolf, and Werewolf over Vampire which makes it
realistic). Veracity of Death includes a 2 tier system which gives
the player more to do while online. All ideas put into the mud are
going to be unique, not seen on every godwars like most today who
just copy eachother. Anybody whos played Midnight Dreams or Midnight
Realities knows its not a contest to see who can dedicate their
lives to exping. This is not a mud where the guy with no life
becomes the top player because hes on 24/7 and trains his stats far
above anyone else. I've run a handful of muds and played godwars
muds since the idea was created so I know what it takes to make a
good mud and what the players want since Ive been in their position.
Ever wonder what its like to play a mud where the immortals actually
LISTEN to your ideas and explain why the idea is bad instead of just
shooting it down. Also there is absolutely no immortal cheating
tolerated, they are instantly removed unless they have one hell of a
story. Every immortal is logged and each alt is checked frequently
to make sure they are legit. I dont even use an alt to prevent
having people making accusations :P. I am currently hiring a coder
and probably a builder to help make this mud original with new areas
n maybe a new town(midgaard is too stock).

Stop by and try the mud out, you wont be disappointed,
Immortal Staff of VOD

P.S. Thanks to Smoo for the codebase and Tenny who dedicated alot of
time fixxing small problems with the code that I didnt even notice
until recently.

exploration, for development, and for colonisation. Now, the
forces of competing nation-states are scrabbling to expand into
the galaxy, fortifying and industrialising former frontier worlds,
and searching for potential alien allies. One such system, located
near the border of the demilitarised zone between British and French
space, has been thrust into great importance, and now is host to an
impressive military presence.

But not all is well, banditry and piracy are still rife, the
development of the system barely begun, and the uneasy peace
with the French starting to break down.

As a raw recruit to the Royal Space Navy, you must pass through the
Academy, and then work your way up through the ranks by performing
missions, eventually reaching the rank of Commander.

Cryosphere is a Sci-Fi themed MUD that has been built from scratch,
with some Aber influence. We have equipment saving, stores, banks,
insurance, hospitals, wilderness, an integrated ship and docking
system, simulators that you can safely train in, an academy for new
players, an original scenario, and many unique missions.

Mud         : The Battles Within
Code Base   : [Rom] Modified
Telnet      : mudsite.com 4000 [129.21.61.199]
WWW         : http://beam.to/TBW
Description :

Ma Ti Lodoa, The fates, your fate, our fate combined. Dare you 
challenge these enemies? The fates of fire and ice, the fates of 
poison and the fate of vampires, the fate of the world.

Three kingdoms. The golden lands of Soren, blessed by light, 
protected by the ancient gods of all that is good. The shadowy realm 
of Cisero, never safe to sleep without a knife close to hand. The 
powerful republic of Kantor, lurking in the ancient forests, bowing 
their heads to no one.. Many races and classes open for choice.. 
Ogres, huge hulking beasts of great strength and constitution.
Barbarians, powerful warriors who shun magic. Draghkars, Dark 
ceatures of the night who control the magical weave as though it was 
art of them. Warlocks, an ancient spellcaster, a relic of the past. 
The Rakasta, an old race, born of the frozen realm of arbadia, these 
limber creatures are violent and well rounded in all fields. 
Clerics, holy warriors of the gods who crusade with healing magic.

The Battles Within is an ever expanding world, based on a leveling 
system in which experiance is gained by killing monsters and players,
the main point is primarily player killing. After you reach a certain
level, level fifty, you can remort, turning into a vastly superior
race and restarting at level six with your creation points set to
fifty (this normally means its alot easier to level.). After you
remort, and get to level fifty five, you can no longer gain 
experiance from mobs, and must either raid enemy  kingdoms crushing 
their leaders, or hunt down the greatest prey, to gain your levels.

Code Base   : [Rom] Heavily Modified
Telnet      : theinquisition.org 5050 [24.106.156.212]
WWW         : http://theinquisition.org
Description :




"Nothing good can ever come from a witch." 

    --Inquisitor Colwynn, right before throwing himself on the pyre
      of his mother, a mage

With the murder of the royal family, a grieving monarch sets out 
to eradicate a great evil running rampant through the kingdom of 
Lithmore, and the cause of his pain: magic. His fury and
determination would soon destroy political alliances and forge a new
empire from the ashes of his enemies. The genocide of all those who 
practice the dark arts, however, could not be completed in his day 
alone...

Centuries later, the struggle for survival still rages between all
users of magic and ever-viligant might of the Holy Order. You are 
invited to immerse yourself in the suspicion and mystery of a realm 
embroiled in a clandestine holy war, where honor and politics all
too frequently collide in the battle for the hearts of men, and
magic is real.
 
Will you join in the fight to erase the taint of sorcery from the 
realm - or will you unlock the dark secrets of the forbidden arts, 
and rise against oppression?  

----

+ The Inquisition features an original and comprehensive world with 
  a theme of innate, yet entirely playable RP conflicts.

+ A completely classless and level-less system, for immersive 
  realism and a surpassing role-play experience. 

+ Player-driven role-play supported by staff through maintnence
  of rumors, surrounding IC "framework" events, and direct
  assistance purchased by players with accumulated QP. 
  
+ The most innovative MUD combat system yet: the game parses your
  emotes, using keywords, to create a stylish and fun combat
  experience.
  
+ A fully operational RPXP system, solely rewarding of role-play
  and preventing the advancement of H&S gamer. 

+ A realistic system of learning skills that causes skills to
  advance meaningfully over time. 

+ A very secretive and uniquely coded magic system, the likes of 
  which you will find nowhere else.  

+ A responsive and skilled staff, always willing to offer help.

----

Description :

We have more than 20 base guilds for the newbie-midbie level players
to choose from and more to come as the game is being developed
further to meet the needs of the ordinary highbie with more than 
1 Billion points of experience.

The lands are filled with various types of areas for the players to 
explore and tons of quests to solve. Our main land has more than
enough space to explore and it is guaranteed to provide nearly 
everlasting excitement for players more into the exploring of the
world.

For the needs of any casual exp-maker, we offer over than 40
different races divided into four different stages of rebirth.

Character rebirths are based on total experience amount and on
each rebirth level, player unlocks access to more superior races
than ever before and gains noticiable advantage by just completing
the rebirth process.

We have background training period, during which the player is
expected to learn the basics of the game and to explore the 
surroundings.

All player magical items are saved over reboots in their inventory 
or player might want to obtain a saveable container on which they 
can store nearly infinite amounts of equipment into. Castle system
is on its way!

We are fairly new mud on the finnish scene but come check us out 
and see it for yourself. Our website is being remodelled and 
re-published soon, so you might want to click your way to our
website as well (http://www.insomniamud.org).

Haven.  Though she and ehr siblings aren't allowed to inter-

world's guardian, Sabbath Silverclaw.  It is she, that the
gods make sure the world doesn't progress too quickly like
it had ages before when humans ruled the world.

mans.  Demi-humans, such as elves, dwarves, gnomes and the

vampire are welcomed.  For more about Cat's Haven, refer to

Imagine a world. 

Big, blue, and green, with the occasional polluted brown spot.

Now zoom in. Keep zooming. Keep zooming. Whoa. Pull back a bit. 
There we go.

Imagine a small town on this planet. A small, if rather high 
tech town. 

Imagine everybody in that town living regularly. Normally. 
Happily. 

Then imagine that town being bombarded by a bunch of two inch 
tall robots.

Pretty messed up, eh?

Welcome to Sahari Town. The only town in the world to have the 
power of the Gotcha Borgs, small robots with phenomenal cosmic 
powers. The only town where the most powerful are the kids who 
command these Gotcha Borgs. 

And the only town that can stop the mighty Death Force from 
destroying the world. 

Side with the Gotcha Force, led by new kid in town, Kou, to fight 
against the Death Force, and the Galactic Emperor, for the fate 
of the world! 

Or maybe you could sign on with the Death Force, and the Galactic
Emperor. Help conquer the earth, and then destroy it! Willingly, 
or otherwise!

On the other hand, not everyone is exactly fond of Gotcha Borgs.
And the Anubis Force exist solely to see Gotcha Borgs wiped off
the face of the earth. And Sho intends to make sure of that.

Or, y’know, you could just be a civilian. Sitting. Watching.
Throwing your popcorn and drinks. Wusses.

Yup, Welcome to Sahari Town. Our last, best hope for Survival.

We are all so screwed.

Gotcha Force MUSH is Rated PG-13 by the assorted conglomerate 
of randomized MUSH ratings.

Gotcha Force is owned by Capcom. This MUSH is entirely non-profit. 

Even if you have no experience with the game in question, our 
friendly and helpful, and not at all evil staff are more than 
willing to help out. The inexperienced and new MUSHers, or just 
those new to the setting, are perfectly welcome.

Mud         : In Nomine MUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] Pennmush (Latest Version Always)
Telnet      : innominemush.com 1661
WWW         : http://www.innominemush.com
Description :

In Nomine: Symphony & Silence MUSH is here to provide an environment 
where those who like the Steve Jackson Games RPG, In Nomine, can enjoy
themselves and roleplay within the environment designed in the game.

At any time, we will be running Story Arcs to further progress the 
game in many different ways. We strive to come up with creative and
interesting plots for all to enjoy. Any players are welcome to submit
plot or Story Arc ideas for use by the MUSH.

The point to In Nomine: Symphony & Silence is player interaction to 
drive a story so that everyone can have fun. Now, this also means that
at times, players will need to give as well as receive both positive 
and negative changes to the in character world and how it affects 
them. Everything will not go your way 100% of the time -- at times 
things can go bad for your character. But during those times, 
remember, so to turns the wheels of a plot, that everyone will have 
fun. Being immersed in the plot allows everyone to drive it forward, 
good or bad.

Canon-wise, we haven't followed any of Revelations just yet, though 
there are plots planned to lead us through those events. We're picking
up in the modern day, 2004/2005, with the events of the core book 
happening just as we open. Anything from the books will more than 
likely happen.

In Nomine: Symphony & Silence is a medium to high contrast game. 
Angels are angels, demons are demons; to state it bluntly. This 
doesn't mean angels are sweet and nice, Angels should be all true to 
what is displayed of them in the In Nomine Core Book. Demons are 
likewise not always outright nasty and evil, some of them can easily 
pass for the nice guy next door, within reason.

So, while we're toward the medium to high range, we expect characters 
across the entire spectrum with more in the range stated than anything
else.

Mud         : Denied Destinies MUX
Code Base   : [MUX] MUX 2.3.3.22 #1 [2004-JUL-10]
Telnet      : ddmux.org 1885 [69.57.136.37]
WWW         : http://None yet
Description :

Imagine a world where the lines of good and evil have long since been
 blurred, where the public heroes are little more than pawns and PR
 opportunities of a secretive government, and the true heroes we've
 always known and loved are forced underground, to fight for truth,
 justice, and the American way under the mantle of vigilante... or
 sometimes worse -- as criminal.

This is not the happy world of DC comics... nor is it the dark world
 of Marvel's X-Men... this is a world that sits in a shadow somewhere
 in-between, a world of secret government agencies, super-soldier
 projects testing on mutants, public distrust of mutants, and secret
 schools devoted to training them. The mutant nation of Genosha is a
 reality. A public criminal calling himself Superman plays hero while
 avoiding capture by government agencies. The existence of magic and
 aliens is categorically denied by those in power.

More information is available on the game. If you're interested in
 playing your favorite Marvel or DC characters in a unique, mixed-
 theme world, or even introducing your own original concept, Denied
 Destinies is finally opening its doors. Heroes and villains alike
 are welcome. Established teams such as the X-Men, The Hellions, and
 The Brotherhood are seeking recruits -- or you could even create
 your own team or choose to go it alone! Prospective players are
 invited to connect now, to check us out, and to offer any questions
 they might have. Applications for new characters will be accepted as
 of January 1st, so come on over!

Rating: PG-13+

A note for MUD players: This is /not/ a MUD. IE: No EXP, No HP, No
 Mana, etc. This is a text-based, roleplaying, interactive fiction
 format. Skills, powers, stats are not predefined. We still welcome
 you to visit us, of course. Just be prepared for an experience
 unlike anything you've encountered on a MUD.

Mud         : Galaxus - Dark Space
Code Base   : [MUSH] PennMUSH version 1.8.0 patch 4 with HSpace 4.3.7
Telnet      : galaxusmush.com 4204 [24.165.124.44]
WWW         : http://galaxusmush.com:81
Description :

Long ago, space travel was common for variety of alien species.
Worm-holes were, and are, a fairly common occurrence throughout the
tides of space.  The mechanics of these worm-holes have remained a
mystery for many millennia.  The one thing that is certain about
them, they are unpredictable. The wormhole that leads to Galaxus was
discovered by a smuggler by the name of Janus.  When her vessel
entered the worm-hole, unexpectedly, she was transported to
a ‘pocket-galaxy’.   A galaxy within a galaxy.   Being terran, and a
smuggler, she had a curious mind.  She explored each planet within
the ‘Pocket-system’ and discovered that most of the planets were
habitable.  This is unusual, as most systems only have one, and more
rarely two, that are habitable.  Her crew consisted of a varitable
mix of different interstellar races.  At the time, they knew no way
of escaping the ‘Pocket’, so they set out to populate the worlds and
make this galaxy their own.

Mud         : Children of The Night
Code Base   : [GodWars] [Dystopia 1.2.7][CotN 2.5]
Telnet      : cotn.wolfpaw.net 4600 [204.209.44.23]
WWW         : http://none yet.
Description :

Hi All, 

Just a little notice..... I decided to bring back the old cotn. I 
wasnt thinking clearly when i decided to abandon my code and go to a 
new codebase, so i brought the old cotn back up after 2 or 3 weeks of 
a new codebase with some modifications made to that. 

CotN has 13 base classes, and 20 hybrids. When i started my mud with 
a stock Dystopia 1.2.7 i deleted Shapeshifter, Samurai, Monk among 
others in order to use some custom classes without having about 40 
base classes in the end. 

Cotn is under heavy construction, 3 weeks ago when i decided to 
switch to a stock mindcloud2 it had and still has some problems, but 
then i was coding it alone, and had been for about 2 months and was 
overwhelmed. Its a hard codebase to run by myself and at the time i 
more or less gave up and decided to start with something stock. But i 
decided 2 days ago that since i put 1000 hours into the old one in 5 
months it was a foolish mistake to give up on it and not put in some 
long days and get it balanced and get everything working properly. 

There are currently two other coders on cotn and things are moving at 
a pretty good pace. 

It is little after midnight, on March 31st, and at this point there 
have been 795 pfiles made by the pbase... That is since March 29th. 
The place needs work, but more gets fixed every day, and there isnt 
that much left to have the place be in good running order before i 
can start on new things. By not that much left i mean about a week or 
so of work or less and it should be pretty balanced and stable. 

A Hybrid on my mud is simply a class that has all the powers of two 
other classes. Necromancer for example, has All the powers of Undead 
Knight and Elemental. Also Necromancer has All the Modifiers of both 
classes. So that means the combined Damcap, Parry, Resistance, Dodge, 
Damage Modifiers etc of both classes. So two base classes with good 
melee would make a great melee based hybrid, but a hybrid with both 
of its corresponding base classes being poor melee classes would have 
poor melee for a hybrid. But it works itself out. (the hybrid with 
poor melee would have the all the powers of the 2 bases that made it 
good with its poor melee) In order to balance hybrids i only have to 
balance base classes, because everything hybrid related is directly 
affected by any change made to one of its base classes. 

The process of becoming a hybrid is.... First you selfclass one of 
the two classes required to become a hybrid. Then you get that base 
class to 5 status and remort into your second class. When you remort 
you lose everything from the first class. After you get your second 
class to 5 status you can then Fuse into a Hybrid. 

In the Early days of cotn, a friend wrote the fight system on my mud 
which is soly used here. Hits go to body parts, such as wrist, or 
right ear, or shin, or knee, elbow, neck etc.. in some cases there
are several body parts per Wear Location.. So 'Body' for example as  
chest, might have ribs, stomach, chest, etc And if a hit went to one 
of the body parts for the Chestplate piece of armor its damage would 
be reduced if armor was worn there, with a chance to damage that 
armor. if no armor worn there than more damage. Also some locations 
take more damage. Neck has throat for example, if you are hit there 
you would take more damage than your knee. There are rom like damage 
messages instead of the Stock Dystopia ones. 

This Notice of the old cotn being back is rapidly growing long so i 
will end here. Stop by and check the place out if you feel so 
inclined, cotn.wolfpaw.net port 4600 


HYBRIDS

Werewolf/Drow  - [Stalker]       Werewolf/Elemental- [Gaia Wolfx]

Description :

Take New York City, bright with lights and celebrities. Take teams of 
superheroes with astounding abilities who save the world 
spectacularly on a regular basis, some of whom call that famous city 
home. Would you feel lucky to be part of such a world? 

Now send the superheroes off on their missions and turn away from 
the neon and glitz. Take the city and rub it with grit. Take 
superpowered people and turn them into criminals and vigilantes 
who work the city's streets. Take a media mass who can't tell the 
difference between the two, liable to label someone a menace 
because they don't like the colour of his tights. Take everyday cops, 
agents and investigators and send them in to sort out the mess of 
crime and violence on the streets. Lace it with a thriving criminal 
underworld, corruption, blackmail, theft, murder, and people just 
trying to live their lives. Still feel lucky?

Sprinkle the result with a few stubborn individuals who just can't 
stay home at night while the city chews on itself. These heroes 
aren't trying to save the world; rather they're trying to save the 
people who live in it.

They are the Marvel Knights, and they want you to come play with 
them.

Marvel Knights MUX focuses on the NYC-based titles of the Marvel 
Knights imprint - Daredevil, the Punisher, Spider-Man, and the 
like. There are plenty of FCs available and OCs are always welcome. 
Come and check it out today!

Mud         : PoopMud
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Modified
Telnet      : 83.72.133.199 3000 [83.72.133.199]
WWW         : 
Description :

PoopMud offers a fun dynamic environment, with new places of
adventure added often. You can develop your character to a high
powered adventurer, or explore a huge world, PoopMud provides an
ideal environment for all types of mudding. Various means are
used to ensure mobiles are diverse and unique. Enviromental
changes are made possible through room progs and custom code.
 
A personal spirit helps the novice mudder learn their way around,
so being a newbie on PoopMud is not so daunting for the novice.
Immortals and Elders are available to answer questions and give
suggestions in order to help the novice mudder develop into a
fully experienced player. A togglable hints channel gives the
new player suggestions of useful information.
 
At level 50, players may choose either a secondary class or the
same class, to create either an expert or a more diverse
character. Once reaching level 50 with the secondary class,
statistics may be improved via the meta shop.
 
A functioning arena is available for controlled PK games.  There
are over 100 automatic quests, plus imm-led quests. Quest Points
earned can be used to buy Orbs and powerful scrolls and potions.
 
The Well contains 20 levels of over 6000 randomly
generated rooms and mobs. The mobs in The Well have fragments,
which can be used to gain a super race called K'ta'viir (KTV).
 
All in all, PoopMud is an enjoyable place to come forget the
frustrations of every day life. Come join us!

Mud         : Godwars Oxide

Telnet      : fram.cjb.net 2222 [207.150.165.140]
WWW         : http://
Description :

With a lot more time on my hands due to a new, less time consuming
school, and a stable, permanent shell, my mud is back up, and
to stay. This time around I have decided yo use, and stick with
the original EOD code from when I hosted the mud for Marcus
and Darrens. I've decided to go through and do a complete
revamp of the colors, format etc before adding code of my own
so it will be a while before I start adding code of my own but
the mud is fully functional and ready for players (No PWipes
for a LONG long time) Your welcome to come check it out!

Mud         : Here is Greenwood; The Muck
Code Base   : [MUCK] Protomuck V1.75
Telnet      : wavemotioncybernetics.org 14567 [66.93.212.213]
WWW         : http://www.otakuhigh.com/Greenwood/index.html
Description :

What does an egocentric scientific genius of the galaxy do when she
is bored with the same old lab tests and experiments?  Simple; she
goes out into the various realities and steals people like the alien
abductions you've read about in tabloids and brings them into a
simulated world environment in one of her sub-space labs.  She
doesn't stop there though.  To make things really interesting she
strips all her victims of their memories and replaces them with all
new ones then drops them into her simulated world environment, Here
is Greenwood.  She then assumes the role of Dean and joins the fun,
observing first hand how her changes effect the people in her
experiment.  It's something to do, right?  ^A^  ^B^

Here is Greenwood is run sort of like the 'Truman Show' except on a
grander scale.  There is only one viewer, Washuu-sama with multiple
'Stars' of the show, you.  It is a humor based enviroment that throws
many elemnents of your favorite anime high school shows together into
a melting pot of insanity.  High school will never be the same again.

Full detailed information regarding the game world and applying for a
character can be found at the Here is Greenwood Muck website.  What
are you waiting for?  Grab some pencils and paper and get moving!

Mud         : The Seven Kingdoms
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Heavily modified from CWG
Telnet      : sevenkingdoms.net 4500 [208.191.72.34]
WWW         : http://www.sevenkingdoms.net
Description :

The Seven Kingdoms...
...where summers last years and winters can last decades,
...where a sworn knight can be a traitor, and a commoner a hero,
...where the tourney grounds rumble to the sound of knights' chargers,
...where a Targaryen king sits the Iron Throne, and some strive to 
     protect him, while others plot the end of his reign,
...where the southron bow to the seven faces of god, while the 
     northern lords worship older, nameless powers,
...where far to the north criminals walk side by side with knights 
     on a seven-hundred-foot ice Wall, sworn to guard the realms 
     of men against the onset of the cold, and beyond the Wall, 
     the powers of night gather,
...where each great house struggles to gain advantage in the only 
     game, the game of thrones,
...where you play or you die.
Because the cold winds are rising, and, as the Starks say,
Winter is coming.
Seven Kingdoms is a MUD based on the Song of Ice and Fire books by
George R. R. Martin. Knowledge of the books is not required to play 
the game, but it may enhance your experience.

The MUD contains an extensive House system and organizations such 
as the Night's Watch, which are for the most part player-run. 
Roleplaying is strongly encouraged.

Most of our code is original. We have a completely custom combat 
system, which includes features not available on any other MUD. 
Our players have called us one of the most player-friendly MUDs 
in existence. 

We are currently open for player testing.

Mud         : Ensimud
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Circle 2 Modified
Telnet      : cpanel2.betterbox.net 4500
WWW         : http://
Description :

Ensimud is a bilingual ( french & english ) hack & slash mud. 
Created in early 94, it has been heavily modified from its
original code base ( Circle 2 ). 
Major additions are : AI'ed monsters, player house, chests & clan, 
treasures table to equip npcs, encounter tables to populate areas, 
custom autoquest script language, random generated quest zones, 
questlike craft system, and of course a switch to french texts.

The world is fantasy oriented, with circle 2.20 original areas and 
lots of custom zones,races,classes,spells... The mud is currently 
not very newbie friendly, but rather oriented toward high level 
characters grinding.


A rewriting of the mud is in process, orienting the game toward a 
turn by turn and tactical rpg, using an new and open source codebase.

environment, then you have found the right place.
  *Abandoned Legacy offers a Newbie-Friendly environment and
an extensive pk system. Newbie protection is enforced by the
code, to ensure that you are not killed when you first log in,
but the choice remains for you to give up newbie protection.
  *The Mud is quite stable, with an auto-recover script that
keeps the mud up and running 99.9% of the time.
  *All stock Low4 classes have been debugged, revamped and
balanced to improve the PK aspect of the mud.

be added along the way. The mastery system brings new dimensions
to the standard classes, along with various skills that have
been added in.

Paladin, Vampire, Werewolf.
  *Two new questing systems are in - find the object, or the mob.

has been implemented. All three ways are great alternatives to
standard questing.

kingdom hall.
  *Original ideas are constantly implemented.

Mud         : Shades_of_Grey
Code Base   : [MUSH]
Telnet      : shadesofgrey.wolfpaw.net 2828 [68.97.199.91]
WWW         : http://
Description :

Come and visit the town of Ketchikan in Alaska! Both rural and city
people will feel at home here, in Ketchikan with it's beautiful
mountains and nature, famous for it's salmon fishing, native heritage
culture centers, nightlife and vistas.

Shades of Grey is a World of Darkness mush set in Ketchikan,
Alaska. At this moment we are open for soft Roleplay without TPs,
until all the needed code to support all kinds of roleplay has been 
set up in a few weeks. We are a starting mush, looking for lower
level characters of mostly mortals, shifters and vampires. Other
races might be welcome but would need discussion with staff.

We are an experimental mush in that we have a cooperative system,
instead of the much more widely used competitive system. However,
despite using a cooperative system, staff will keep an active hand in
keeping the flavor and the dangers of living in the World of
Darkness a threatening and challenging place. We are going to try to
stress the roleplay side of things more than the dice-rolling side, 
to be a place open to intersphere roleplay and different 
interpretations of the WoD system, and a heavy stress on non-linear 
storylines.

If you want to know more, feel free to come take a look at
Shadesofgrey.wolfpaw.net port 2828 and feel free to ask any staff
online any questions you might have!

Mud         : HP: Illusion and Delusion
Code Base   : [MUSH]
Telnet      : chaos.caile.org 5555 [207.245.68.61]
WWW         : http://chaos.caile.org/~hp
Description :

It is the fall term of 1998. Harry and friends have graduated from
Hogwarts. Their seventh year was an exciting one as, apparently 
Dumbledore has managed to defeat Voldemort and saved the magical 
and muggle worlds from his horrible plottings.

No one knows what took place during the final showdown between these 
two.. the only thing that IS known is that Dumbledore somehow forced 
Voldemort beyond the veil.. and in the process of this happening, 
Sirius has returned to this realm.

Most are rejoicing but many realize that it's not really over. The 
prophecy was very very specific. Harry Potter would bring about the 
downfall of the Dark Lord. The end has not come.. but is merely 
delayed. And the fact that Sirius was able to come back through the 
veil only points even more directly to this.. after all if he was 
able.. what will stop Voldemort.

There are additional concerns for Harry and those close to him. While 
Sirius is back in this world, he is still in canine form and appears 
to have forgotten that he can change. No one is able to ascertain the 
cause of this, and it is hoped that time will bring back his memory 
and cause him to return to human form.

For the time being, Harry has returned to Hogwarts, accompanied by 
his four footed companion. He will be acting as assistant to 
Professor Lupin in Defence against the Dark Arts as well as helping 
Madam Hooch with Quidditch and flying lessons. Hermione is also back, 
working as assistant in Arithmancy.

Be that as it may the new school term has begun and students are
looking forward to seeing what it will bring.

Mud         : Kormar
Code Base   : [Dikumud] Heavily Modified DikuMUD throughout the years.
Telnet      : server.kormarmud.com 5001 [64.40.105.235]
WWW         : http://www.kormarmud.com/phpbb
Description :

-* Kormar mud is ran by ex-duris immortals. A small creation
that broke the ground of traditional MUDs. Kormar mud boasts
an incredible immortal staff with the passion for gaming  
Now with improved code and playability Kormar is back and 
live. Kormar Mud spawns from a list of games that stretch 
from Toril,Duris,Sojourn, and Basternae I. Now with completely 
re-written code and with a staff who listens, Kormar Mud is 
ready to rock.

-* Kormar is locked in an eternal battle between three race 
sides. The Surface Dwellers, The UnderDark Denizens, and
the mind controlling Illithids (Coming soon!)

-* Each side has it's own original fully viewable ASCII 
map in real time. You can run after your enemy on the maps, 
find new zones, climb mountains to avoid being caught, and 
even see when other NPC's are wandering the map.

-* The mud has bountiful classes from warriors to rangers 
to sorcerers to even illusionists. All with original 
spells/skills.

-* The zones are completely original and new ones are 
discovered every day. Kormar mud can boast a full 200
plus zones!

-* Kormar Mud is a FULL PvP mud. The underlying story, 
and playability revolves around PvP. This mud caters to 
PvPcentric players, but, has stunning zones for the zoner. 
A unique part of Kormar is the zone changes. IE: You could 
be in a human town during the day that just doesn't seem right, 
once night time comes, you begin to notice shrieks in the 
distance, and this is when the vampires/beasts of the night 
have come to feast.

-* Kormar Mud is for people who are looking for a challenge 
in a generally stagnant hack and slash Mudding experience. 
Don't be afraid to log in and ask the IMMs any questions.

Cheers and Happy Mudding!

Mud         : Manga Nation
Code Base   : [Rom] Heavily Modified beyond 2.4b
Telnet      : 24.129.191.118 6969 [24.129.191.118]
WWW         : http://None at the moment
Description :

Manga Nation is derived from the ROM style of muds with a
theme mostly based on Anime/Manga (Japanese animation) with
some various other forms of fantasy theme mixed in as per
requests from the history of player input.

The race AND class systems are set up in trees of "evolutions".
Each tree has an unknown number of branches, as we like there
to be some suprise and mystery involved with the vast evolution
system.

With over 50 races, over 70 classes, and over 2000 skills and
spells, we are still a growing community.  Additions and
editing are performed on a daily basis, and player feedback
is highly encouraged and rewarded.  About 95% of
player-submitted ideas are implemented, so the growth and
success of the MUD is largely in thanks to you, the player.

If you have any questions, complaints, suggestions, or ideas,
please, let us know, player feedback is what builds our world
and keeps it living.

Before the hosting problems this past year, we were averaging
up to 60 players at any given time in a day.  I know a few of
have been missing "home" here and haven't been able to find the
IP, so here ya go.

For you older players, welcome back, things have only been
getting better.  To you new players out there, check us out,
there are things here that haven't been tried or accomplished
at other places, we've made wonderful coding breakthroughs.
Oh, and the population is friendly and helpful, so you'll make
friends fast.

Mud         : The Legends of Ragnarok
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Heavely Modified
Telnet      : lor.ca 4000 [24.215.99.68]
WWW         : http://lor.ca
Description :

Enter the Legends of Ragnarok. You find yourself in another world enthralled
in a world of true fantasy. Many adventures await as you complete quests,
battle your enemies and gain experience to become a master of your trade.

You begin your journey in Udgard as a member of one of the four guilds of
the town. Depending on your play-style and intended usage of your character,
you may choose from being a warrior, cleric, thief, or a magic user. In
these guilds you learn the tools of your trade from weapon usage to spells.
Your guild is also where you practice your abilities, however there is no
such stat as hit points as some of you are used to. Instead, Ragnarok bases
your hit points on the constitution of your character and your character's
racial modifier.

There are four races to choose from and depending on the race that you've
picked, your hit points are modified accordingly. Your race also determines
what percentage of an stat you can practice, which includes some races being
able to practice more than one hundred per cent of a stat. Be cautious
though, when spending these points you get only get a limited amount of
ability points which are spread out over your first fifty levels. Dont waste
them!
You may also leave the guild you are in and enter one of the other guilds in
Udgaard. Upon reaching level one hundred you may leave your base guilds and
enter one of the five more specialized final guilds. These include Sorcerer,
Necromancer, Assassin, Druids of Rohan, and Knights of the Rose. The
administration behind Ragnarok has used their experience as players to
provide you with an extensive world that you may easily become immersed in.
Some of you may recognize some of the areas but many have been added to
enhance your playing experience.

Don't miss your chance to be part of something new as Legends of Ragnarok
evolves. Sit through the newbie tour, keep up on the news, read the boards,
and register on the web site. You'll be glad you did.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : The Empire of the Blue Lotus
Code Base   : [Rom] Rom Based
Telnet      : empire.kyndig.com 4204 [216.40.243.218]
WWW         : http://www.lotusempire.com
Description :

<i>Upon the death of Emperor Kishoku, the Lotus Empire was
plunged into civil war as samurai loyal to his daughter
and those loyal to a distant male imperial cousin clashed
on the field of battle.  The war ended with many thousands 
dead and the girl's partisans triumphant.  Since her
accession as empress, the roads have been dangerous and 
trade disrupted by the peril.  The people shocked by the 
war have flocked to the pacifist Laharti faith, which grows 
in official influence though it has not yet supplanted the
native Kamutsu religion.  Knights loyal to the empress' 
rival have been banished into exile, and their households 
scattered, while performers and merchants alike find life 
difficult as little money changes hands in these hard times.</i>

The Empire of the Blue Lotus takes place in a world setting 
roughly based on historical Asia, covering a variety of 
cultures and eras along with fantasy elements gathered 
together to form our world, which is its own.

The MUD is an RPI (role-play intense) MUD, classless and 
leveless.  All interaction through in character means is 
expected to remain in character.  However, out of 
character channels and means of communication are available 
as well for general chatting.  

We are currently in an alpha testing state, with 
role-play supported and rewarded automatically by the code, 
but many other features still in development.  We boast a 
wholly static MUD with dynamic descriptions for all mobs, 
objects, and rooms, as well as emoted combat code.

the diptheria epidemic), the Alaskan realm is the place to find sled
dogs, mushers, wolf packs, lush forests, flappers, questionable
taverns, and plenty of snow. Also featured here are the characters
from the movie Balto, which you can apply for and role-play yourself.

New York - Set in modern-day times, New York is just as you
would expect it - covered in smog, swarming with people and cars,
and filled with the filthiest of creatures, human and animal alike.
Cats and dogs are often found warring over territories and survival,
beggars and thieves are found on every corner, and even the zoo's
lions seem to be at each other's throats. Yet something about the
city keeps bringing in more tourists by the dozen - like moths
being drawn to a streetlight.

unlimitted amount.  Successfully completing the challenge opens 
whole new range of possibilities to advance your character far 
beyond the limits of lower legends.  But only few reach this 
status.  In the near future our remort engine will be complete, 
which will offer new possibilities!

Forever Midnight is a roleplaying mud currently being built, based on
a modified Dawn 1.69r codebase.  It has a unique fantasy/sci-fi theme
revolving around the storyline of three separate worlds - Earth,
Midnight Station, and Mars - which once coexisted, but were seperated
after a disaster.

The mud is in the process of being built.  However, it will feature a
unique and original world, with a focus on roleplaying.  There are no
stock areas on the mud currently, except for the Mud School and the
OOC area, and new areas are being built.

Your gameplay will change drastically depending on which of the three
races you choose - the Gaians, who have rediscovered latent 'magical'
powers after the disaster, but still live in a medieval style world;
the Noxians, who have mastered the arts of computer hacking and
technical prowess; and the Martians, founders of an almost utopian
society, with access to high-tech weaponry and skills.

Roleplaying will be highly encouraged on Forever Midnight, with
seperate 'government' systems in place for all three of the
civilizations.  The mud will also be newbie-friendly, with a large,
custom built mud-school.

The mud is currently open if you want to take a tour, and there are
plenty of resources on our homepage at forevermidnight.futurenext.org.
Stop by and see what we are all about!

and hundreds of new Earths were terraformed and colonized. 
The Central Planets formed the Alliance and decided all the 
planets had to join under their rule.


 There was some disagreement on that point.

 After the war, many of the Independents who had fought and lost
drifted to the edges of the system far from Alliance control. 
Out here, people struggle to get by with the most basic technologies. 
A ship would bring you work. A gun would help you keep it. A 
captain's goal was simple: Find a crew, find a job. Keep flying."

  When Firefly first aired in 2002, Joss Whedon painted gritty, 
realistic world based in the  26th century - a rich, colourful 
and diverse civilization five hundred years in the future. With the 
intriguing genre of 'space western' tied to its name, it brings up 
combined images of spaceships and horses, high technology and the 
old frontier, corrupt government and gunfights. Overall, it's about 
people ... their freedom and survival. Today, this world provides 
us with a unique opportunity for roleplay. It provides us with 
FireflyMUX.

  The game picks up where the television series left off after 
fourteen episodes; from hereon out, everything is non-canon, with 
a strong backbone of that canon flavour we know and love. 
FireflyMUX is a realistic roleplay reflection of the Firefly 
theme as created by the one and only Joss Whedon; as such, we strive
to fit into his vision as best we can. Of course, there's plenty 
of room for originality – it's a big universe!

- We're now open for beta-testing after a long time of 
preparation. Although in preliminary stages, we're fullly 
functional and absolutely open for applications and roleplay, 
so come visit us!

Mud         : Eon of Darkness
Code Base   : [Rom] Bare Traces Remaining
Telnet      : eod.genesismuds.com 7200
WWW         : http://
Description :

First things First this mud IS not complete. I've dedicated 
hours into the codebase so far, but i haven't had the 
nessecary builders to complete it. 

Eon of Darkness is NOT an adult oriented mud. We welcome 
players of ALL ages, as well as welcome players who want 
to be able to mud without feeling intimidated by other 
players harrassment/cussing. (And we WILL enforce the 
language rules over public channels). This mud is also 
intended for players who want to be able to play when THEY 
have time. If you leave for a little while, so be it, just 
don't leave if your in a position of power (example: 
president). When you come back you'll still be able to 
maintain your combatative ability.

Anyways, Eon of Darkness is a Hack and Slash clone. Our 
skills are ALL based off Skill level not skill percent. 
This means that the higher your level the higher the 
effect, not the higher the chance for the skill to actually 
work.... Also combat is speed based, and armor actually 
reduces damage instead of just lowering the chance to be 
hit. Our combat system also utilizes a resist system of 7 
types of magic. 

Our class system contains:
Fighters: Barbarian, Monk, Paladin, Assassin
Magic:    Druid, Mage, Necromancer

As the mud evolves i will slowly implement a politics
system. This means that players can elect a president 
to rule their Nation... the president can then declare 
war, peace, alliances, etc on other nations. 
(Essentially its a complicated Clan system). The bonus 
to this system is, each nation will contain its own 
Capitol city, as well as mobs to guard it, attack other 
cities, police crimes etc...

Our movement system is based off of an ascii map. If you 
don't like mapping... :(, sorry guys. But I'm trying to 
make this a hack and slash mud.

Mud         : World of Vale
Code Base   : [Circlemud] EmpireMUD
Telnet      : mud.moocowpenguin.com 10900
WWW         : http://www.moocowpenguin.com/wov
Description :

 World of Vale is an EmpireMUD run by players who've 
experienced several different versions of the as it's 
been hosted in the past. The code foundation is the 
product of Gideon X's unfinished project.  We thank
Gideon X for his permission to use his code and host 
a version of his MUD.

The theme of EmpireMUD takes place in the Dark Ages 
and revolves aroundthe players' efforts to construct 
an empire by physically building an array of 
structures from storage buildings to castles and also
populating their empires with other players.  The 
MUD's environment is also based on Role-Play, more 
specifically the rules of White-Wolf RPGs.  Experience 
is awarded to players who RP their characters expertly 
and thus are able to advance their characters.  For 
those of you who are familiar with W-W RPGs we invite 
you to join the MUD, as well as other players who are 
interested in EmpireMUD.

(By Atticus, player.)

Mud         : Magical Destiny: The College Years
Code Base   : [MUX]
Telnet      : portent.genesismuds.com 3365 [216.136.9.8]
WWW         : http://
Description :

It has been three years since Sailor Moon decided it would be the 
best idea to remove the presence of the Senshi and their powerful,
world shaping, influence over the people of Earth. She did this in 
a last ditch effort to avoid nine hundred years of sleep in a 
frozen world. She longed to live her life in the here and now. 
In the blink of an eye, the world was forever changed. The Senshi
ripped from the memories of the world as a whole. But in their 
place the few remaining Magical Girls, still fought.
         Sakura Kinomoto had sealed and changed all the Clow Cards
into Sakura Cards. She was their true mistress now. She thought at
last she would have peace. She thought perhaps she would be allowed
to be normal. She was wrong. She was readying to leave for college
and the presence came to her. Dark and sickly. She decided at that
moment, to pack her cards, she knew she would need them.
        These are just two of the three series we offer at Magical
Destiny: The College Years. Sailor Moon, Card Captor Sakura, and
Tokyo Mew Mew (Mew Mew Power: US) have been aged and deaged to fit
 in to a year one ortwo college setting. We are an Anime Only type
game which is designed for Mature RPers. We use a slightly
modified BESM 2nd edition game system with a fully online character
generation system. We have a small grid designed to allow players
to always find RP in and around the college setting.
        The most unique feature of our game however, is the 
community. We are a very friendly bunch who enjoy having fun and 
want to have fun. We are mature adults and we seek to bring a great
 game with a mature Anime Game. We expect everyone to be mature.
        Right now we are starting to take claims on FCs for our
initial soft opening. Come by and talk to us, we'll help you find
something that suits you.

WWW         : http://www.tempestseason.com
Description :

After the fall of the great Empire four of the great
remaining nations worked diligently together to rebuild their
global ties after their bonds were ravaged by war. They settled
on a common bond, a trade city by the name of Tralisia,
located on the middle-continent of Ama’rane. With the 
establishment of Tralisia the four nations unified into a great 
coalition and seized economic and military control of the 
world. Unfortunately for the New Empire they underestimated 
the will of the people that would seek refuge in Tralisia, and 
the desire they have to become their own nation. 

	Come and join us as we seek to explore the unknown 
world of Ama’rane and the further reaches of Eihydia in this 24
hour a day, real-time, fantasy-based MUD. Whether you search
for the greatest treasures, create the most infamous guild of
Thieves, or simply own your own shop—A Tempest Season
offers a little something for everyone; but don’t just take my
word for it, come and check us out today!

	It is recommended that you visit our website for more 
information about playing A Tempest Season: www.tempestseason.com
The following are some of many options offered in our game: 
an entirely original world (NO STOCK!), specialized class/race 
skills, both a skill and character level system, a NON AUTOMATED
combat system, an original storyline, a side-quest system, a
fresh magic system with a cornucopia of spells, fully
customizable characters, a soon to-be customizable Front End,
and above all: a friendly, supportive, and dedicated staff and
community!

Mud         : Whispers of Times Lost
Code Base   : [Dawn] Heavily modified DOT 1.69r
Telnet      : 24.99.2.107 3000 [24.99.2.107]
WWW         : http://www.wotl.org
Description :

Whispers of Times Lost is home to many players. The immortal staff is
extremely attentive and interactive. Games such as trivia and mortal
tag are frequently played to allow for more communication and play
between the mortals and immortals. The immortals have a wide range of
skills and constantly work to improve the realm and enhance roleplay.
 
The world is largely original. and new areas are constantly being
worked on. We have everything from an extensive desert with pyramids
to an underwater area with mermaids. There are several racial
hometowns such as the Dwarven Kingdom, Menzoberrananzan (drow), and
Galioldor (elves), and more. There are a few specialized areas such
as Stupid World where players can blow off steam and grab a few
Smurfberries or go speak to the King of Florin!
 
There are nine classes with skills and spells for each of those
classes. Players can choose to be anything from a mage that can
cast a rain of fire upon their enemy or a druid who uses the
specially created skill of herbalism to make poultices.
 
We have a wide variety of races and a select group of remort
only races. Some of the races include thrikreen, elf, drow,
faerie, feylar, vampire, werewolf and others. Remort only races
angel, lich, golem, dragon, and demon.
 
Roleplay is required, and player-killing is limited. You must have
supporting roleplay to kill another player! However, you may decide to
not participate in player-killing and roleplay your character
accordingly. Roleplay possibilites are endless here at WOTL. You can
own a shop and sell wares, be a vampire hunter, be a playwrite, and
more.

Mud         : Act of Rebellion
Code Base   : [SWR] Modified SWR1
Telnet      : aor.wolfpaw.net 2200 [204.209.44.3]
WWW         : http://
Description :

AoR is a modified Star Wars Reality MUD with plenty of fresh
adventures.  Awaiting you are all new areas such as Yavin, Hoth,
Kashyyyk, Nar Shaada, Byss, Tatooine, and Korriban.  For those of you
new to MUDding or new to SWRs, there might be no better place to 
start!  Our newbie area, called the Social Adjustment Facility,
introduces the new player to all basic aspects of the game.  The Imms 
are very newbie friendly as well!
 
We are very interested in a good role-playing environment.  Not only 
do we enforce RP, but we provide coded features that assist in RP.
Don't you hate it when important mobs act like they have never seen
you before?  Not on AoR!  On AoR these important mobs will remember
you! 

We also believe in code and MUD stability.  No score crashes or the
like on AoR.  A simple cheat detection system is installed.  Also,
the MUD is protected from crashes by a system that catches it and
safely reboots the MUD whilst saving data.
 
So if you want a fresh start on a STABLE, familar SWR that would love 
to have your business, please consider Act of Rebellion!

P.S. We are definitely open to hiring new staff, ESPECIALLY talented, 
RP focused builders!

Mud         : The Laboratory
Code Base   : [MUX] TinyMUX
Telnet      : labmush.tekmunkey.com 6969 [64.146.79.226]
WWW         : http://
Description :

You are in a laboratory in the midst of Nevada, where unknown
experiments take place. Rumours from the nearest cities tell of vulgar
experiments involving sexual depravity, such as civilised people have
never dreamed of.

The lab itself is self funding, a free flow of information is provided
to its sister research centres, and is founded on land now deemed as
international. Here, the laws are made by the senior administration of
the laboratory, and summary execution is also permitted.  The main
premise of the lab is to advance the human understanding of life, and
has military backup when required, courtesy of Area 51, to which the
labs staff are the only civilian organisation allowed access. As such,
humans, and often aliens, are quite common in equal measure, though
some 'aliens' are merely genetically modified human life-forms.

One common element of this lab, is that, although the place is
guarded, anyone is free to step up to the building and enter, though
from eye-witness reports, nothing, and no-one EVER comes out, not
even in a box. This is because, in an effort to protect both the
general populace, and to prevent information leaks, any escapee is
promptly killed on sight, by one of the many automated weapons
systems, hidden around the grounds.

technology.

T-Mush (TM) is ran by a close group of friends.

The Mush was originally deigned as a code Haven
for newbies and masters. The Grid is deigned into
a living environment, complete with a mapping system.
As a player, you have the choice of evolving
yourself in a small RP session with friends, chatting
with admin and other users, or developing and testing
your code. Periodically, the mush will host a small
discussion/class ranging from coding tips, coding
practices, admining, or a whole range of topics. Your
options are endless.

installed for all you Trekies.. and Star war fans. The 
pace system contains many planets, ships, and bases...
and more to come.

For all you newbies, The mush is always looking to help
newbies in general.. or coding. The player base is always
willing to 'help' you with those mind boggling problem...
and if we can't.. we can always provide resources for you
to look into.

Give us a try. I realize we are small, but all good things

Mud         : The Third Tribulation
Code Base   : [Rom] Highly modified
Telnet      : inphinity.servuhome.net 1228 [66.194.75.163]
WWW         : http://www.servuhome.net/~glock/index.html
Description :

The Third Tribulation is a roleplay-enforced fantasy MUD based in a
completely original world.  Featuring a rich 'good versus evil' 
storyline, characters have the opportunity to shape history by
participating in grander conflicts or, if they so choose, live their
own lives with little regard for the events unfolding around them.

Features of The Third Tribulation include:

- A roleplay-enforced environment.
- A highly polished world and codebase with mature administration.
- Seven classes and nine races tentatively planned.
- A unique twist on the traditional ROM class system, resulting in
  variety between characters of the same class without being
  excessively complicated.
- Absolutely no stock ROM areas, skills, or spells.
- Balanced game mechanics for RP-related player killing.

Presently, The Third Tribulation is in the middle of alpha
development, and we are looking for builders willing to help us out.
Even if you have little or no experience using OLC, we are more than
willing to teach; however, because the MUD is aimed towards
roleplayers, maturity and a firm grasp of the English language are a
must in order to sculpt quality areas that will foster roleplay.  If
you are interested, please stop by and ask about building or visit
our website for more information.

Mud         : Divine Providence
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Modified
Telnet      : slayn.net 8888 [209.172.37.19]
WWW         : http://
Description :

Divine Providence is a very new MUD but already very far coding 
wise.  And for those of you that want to read the background story..
here's a rough draft:

   The beginning was a time of upheaval.  The world was a chaotic
void filled only by the forces of the universe that ran unchecked by
the divine powers.  The gods grew tired of their turbulent reality
and sought a way to bring order to the world.  And so the elemental
stones were forged from the powers of nothingness.  Each devoured
the powers of its element and kept them locked away.  But the world
was now darkness and the gods sought something more to fill the
void, so they drew forth the stones to create a new world.
   The power of the stones gave birth to a world of balance; a heart
of fire and a cooling essence of water, the expanse of sky and the
solid earth, a burning light and the chill of shadows.  The gods
rejoiced, for there was at last peace.  But the gods were not happy,
for the world was empty.  They created the races of the world and
spread them across the world, but the world remained still.  Rivers
remained still and calm, and the wind failed to blow, for there was
nothing to guide them.  So the gods delved into the mixed essence of
the world and bound the elemental stones to it.  At once the world
began to move, set into motion by the magical powers of the universe.
   The creatures of the world began to thrive and created towns and
then cities.  Gatherings of people gave rise to culture.  The gods
watched the creation of music and art with pride and happiness, and
saw that this new world was good.  So they bestowed magic upon the
world as a gift for being so perfect.
   But this gift came with knowledge, the wisdom of the true nature
of the worlds and a power that even the gods could barely keep in
check.  A legend was born in this time: A mortal who controlled the
stones would control the earth, and rival the gods themselves.  The
righteous citizens of the world erected temples to protect the
stones and countless wars were fought for control over these shrines.
   It was during the last of these wars that Debaqual, the great
necromancer, used his dark magic and threachery to set the peoples
of the world against each other.  In the following turmoil he stole
the six elemental stones and performed a legendary rite to achieve
immortality.  Debaqual's ascendance was cut short as the gods
themselves reappeared to strike down the new god.  And then the Old
Times ended.
   The Time of Chaos began.
   For Debaqual's ritual was completed even as the gods struck the
fatal blow, but the world was torn asunder by the very forces that
had created it.  The powers of the universe lashed out at the gods
and they faded from sight.  And as the Great Necromancer lay dying,
his half divine wisdom brought the truth to his mind.
   The legend had been incomplete.  The sages of the past had lied
to protect the world from a new, terrible god.  For there was one
last stone, that of the power of Nature, and it protected the one
last sanctuary to civilized life in the now chaotic world: Kikora,
also known as the Divine Providence. 
   But now that the truth is known, will the world remain in chaos? 
Will balance be restored?  Or will a new deity emerge from the chaos
to claim the world as their own?
   And the spirit of Debaqual wanders the world, tortured in unlife
as it seeks to finish its quest.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Andramidos
Code Base   : [Circlemud] Heavily Modified CircleMud 3.1
Telnet      : andramidos.genesismuds.com 3030
WWW         : http://andramidos.genesismuds.com
Description :

   Andramidos is the tale of a Creator who made the world of
Andramidos to teach his two sons the power they contained.  In time
they grew jealous of each other, splitting the world in two.  
   Expanding their powers they empowered mere mortals with immortal
powers to aid in thier cause.  In the great climax of the War of
Brothers, each brother was slain by the other.  
   Saddend by his loss, the Creator abandoned Andramidos.  Foraken, 
the immortals of Andramidos vied for power and the war continues.  
   Now, centuries later, the war still raging, a group of people have 
branched off the two sides.  Headed by Majesta, God of Knowledge, 
Magic and Wisdom, they seek to maintain a balance, and end the 
bloodshed, while the forces of good and evil continue to clash in a 
war that has continued since the dawning of time.  
   The time has now come for you to go and shape history.  Join a 
side.  End the war.  Win the war.  Change the world, make the world 
of Andramidos what you will!


   Andramidos is currently in an Alpha Stage.  We are looking for
builders to expand the world.  Codebase is constantly getting updated 
and user wants are welcome and have a good possibility of getting 
added.  With over 250 spells planned we welcome any new ideas.
   Builders who would like a lot of room to build what you want are 
encouraged to contact the Majesta at the admin email address.  Novice 
or experienced.
   Players are welcome to create a character, run around and test 
things and post ideas on the board and help shape this mud to what 
the people want.

Mud         : Primal Fear I
Code Base   : [GodWars]
Telnet      : lix.mudmagic.com 5000
WWW         : http://primalfear.mudmagic.com
Description :

Primal Fear is a Godwars/Dystopia v1.2 type MUD. We offer
a mostly original world created by our awesome build team.
The game is based on PVP and PKing in order to gain power
from your god.

Currently we are revamping certain areas to give it that
special touch, but weekly and sometimes daily new 
additions are made, including but not limited to:
New Towns/Areas, Quests, Items and Monsters/Mobs.

A very large scale class/race revamping has been in the works for 
quite some time, and is nearing the end. We are planning on 
implimenting an (cross)evolution type class advancement to see 
how it works, but for now there are 22 classes available, 
with 24 total (The other 2 are being tweaked and recoded from 
scratch to ensure player fairness). Mostly all classes have 
been recoded to ensure player fairness, along with making 
what used to be useless class powers, into powers that work.

Along with the class system, the Tier system is still in place.
Which means with every player kill you get, you get stronger.

Primal Fear is not for the weak hearted though, it is
definately R if not NC-17 rated material. If you are easily
offended then this MUD is not for you. If you hate when
you die or are killed by another player and complain about it,
this MUD is not for you. 

If you enjoy running around with a bunch of people with like minds
who don't have a problem expressing themselves, enjoy the 
senseless slaughter of npcs along with those of your PCs,
and enjoy gaining power and thus respect doing so,
then this MUD definately IS for YOU.

Mud         : Orfal's WRT54G MUD
Code Base   : [Rom] WRT-54G Embedded Linux MUD
Telnet      : orfal.game-host.org 4000 [orfal.game-host]
WWW         : http://orfal.game-host.org
Description :

I invite you to this 'proof of concept' MUD : Orfal's WRT54G MUD.

Address : orfal.game-host.org:4000
MUD-type: ROM (2.4)
Purpose : proof of concept

The reason for this MUD's existance is two-fold: 
test the possibility to run a full-blown MUD on cheap 
( < 100$) hardware with minimal powerconsumption and nominal speed.
Enhance the MUD and eventually release detailed instructions 
for any person to do this on his own (Linux-based) router.

Hardware on which the MUD is running : Linksys WRT-54G router 32Mb RAM
You read it right: this MUD runs on a Linksys router running Linux 2.4
(Sveasoft kernel), 32 Mb of RAM and a 200 Mhz MIPS-processor
- no harddrive.

The whole ROM MUD is therefore backed up regularly to remote storage.
In case the router is rebooted, the MUD is restored within 15 minutes
(backed up ever 30 minutes).

The MUD itself is very basic, and I hope you will give it a try
so I can see the real-world implications of running an embedded Linux
MUD :)

Description :

The Kanto Region, six years after Satoshi and his friends began their
journey. The entire region has been devastated by a 
massive brainwashing attack transmitted through all radio 
devices. Rocket Dan's shadow slowly began to slip across the
continent and take root, and Kanto began to become the heart 
of darkness. Returning to his home town to find all of the 
buildings razed to the ground and all of the inhabitants drained 
of their cognitive skills, Satoshi was distraught. He ran from 
city to city, forming a rag-tag band of Pokemon trainers that 
had survived the brainwashing, and fought furiously to delay 
the advances of Rocket Dan. Sadly, the resistance force was 
forced to fall back. The Kanto region is preparing for what 
could be the final battle. Johto and Hoenn are still free lands, 
but no one knows how long they will stay that way.

The storyline and technical details of Pocket Monsters: Dark 
Horizons adhere mostly to the Pokemon anime and games. We're 
presently running on PennMUSH version 1.8.0p4. We have an 
SSL-enabled port on 9010, and the MUSH is Pueblo-enhanced.

the positions of TP staff, helping to finish describing the 
grid and helpstaff. As of this time, however, we are also 
opening up for those interested in playing at Pocket Monsters:
Dark Horizons to login, take a look around as a guest and to

our opening TP.

Mud         : Aelfengard
Code Base   : [Custom]
Telnet      : aelfengard.com 23 [166.102.242.146]
WWW         : http://aelfengard.com
Description :

                 WE'RE STILL UNDER HEAVY DEVELOPMENT,
               SO THE GAME ISN'T REALLY 'PLAYABLE' YET!

But we're looking for Java coders and we welcome playtesters, or
anyone else who would like to come hang out and chat and help
contribute to our development.

Aelfengard is a fantasy RPG, offering the feel of a text-based MUD
combined with a rich custom client interface.

Some of our unique features:

* Anonymity system. Players don't have a registered name in the game
at all. You are who you introduce yourself as.

* Players never leave the world. When you log off, you go to sleep.
This means you're liable to run across real people in their inn
rooms, druids sleeping protected in their groves, wizards sleeping
under a protection spell in the wilderness, etc.

* Zero theft. If you earn equipment, you keep it, unless you want to
give it away.

* Artwork for every room adds ambience.

* Players can pick and choose facial parts to make a unique face for
their character. Millions of combinations are possible.

* Players can help build the world. A flexible room ownership system
allows for cities, houses, clan halls, and other areas to expand and
adapt without assistance from a builder or admin.

* Rich heads-up display provides a great user interface while keeping
screen scroll to a minimum.

Mud         : Zeldafront RPG Stone
Code Base   : [Unknown]
Telnet      :  
WWW         : http://www.zeldafront.com/
Description :

Zeldafront RPG Stone: Live the Legend!
An online RPG made by-fans-for-fans and it's coming on the 1st
of May!

You can find the website (where you will be playing as well) at
http://www.zeldafront.com/!

If you wish to contact us, send an e-mail to atake@zeldafront.com.

Development took a long time, and a total of 7 staff members have
worked on it for a whole year. We have adjusted some things in
the original story, to make it suitable for a perfect MMORPG!

We used the atmosphere and world of Zelda, and adjusted it so
everyone can play in it. This time, there won’t be just one or
two storylines, there will be hundreds! And you can influence them
all as a player!It all takes place in Hyrule, the Hyrule that
starred in Ocarina of Time.

This MMORPG isn’t just a normal game, it’s text-based.
Meaning you get all the freedom you can get, and you can have your
own character, in it’s own quest for it’s own goal. You write
what you (=your character) does.

Everything is interactive, since you decide what you do and what
happens. Of course there are some rules,to make sure things
won’t get out of hand.

Players will have many things to do, such as just becoming a
great warrior, or living in Kakariko Village as a carpenter. Or you
could try to find a girlfriend and spend romantic evenings watching
the stars above Lake Hylia, or...
well, just think of somethingyourself!

The regular and special Events are great fun for the players,
and they can –sometimes- even earn a special item or other rewards.
In this game you don’t just play to become strong, and there is
no final ending. It’s about living your character’s life, and
reaching your goal.

We hope to attract many Zelda fans from all around the globe,
and offer them the ultimate Zelda experience.

Zeldafront RPG Stone: Live the Legend!
    * Fast server, quick connection
    * Shops with all of the items you had in Ocarina of Time.
    * Simple-to-use – easy-to-understand RP System.
    * Meet other players and start your epic adventures together!
    * Almost total freedom in what you do with your character.
    * Assistance is available 24/7!
    * Free!
Release date: 01-05-2005 24:00 (GMT+1)
