Mud         : DeryniMUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] pennmush 1.8.0
Telnet      : deryni.genesismuds.com 1120 [deryni.korongil]
WWW         : None
Description :

DeryniMUSH seeks to explore the themes of the
Deryni Universe as put forth by Katherine Kurtz in
her most excellent series, The Deryni Chronicles.
The Eleven Kingdoms,where the story unfolds, is very similar
to our own Europe of the Middle Ages, and troubled by many
of the same issues. But the overall conflict is between 
Human and Deryni.

Deryni can do magick but Humans cannot.

The Deryni Race has been nearly decimated in Gwynedd. Gone
are all their once great centers of learning, their
religious orders that taught Healers and Scholars. After
two hundred years of persecution and near genocide, they
have diminished as a people, their once awesome powers
no longer used for the benefit of mankind, but merely for
survival.
DeryniMUSH is open to the public but still in development.
We're seeking staff of all kinds. If you are familiar with
our theme or like Medieval role-play, or know your way
around MUSHing, please contact Camber on the MUSH.

Mud         : Shattered World North
Code Base   : [Unknown] SWLPC
Telnet      : shatnorth.kicks-ass.org 2666 [68.9.106.117]
WWW         : http://
Description :

This is a
player-centric mud supported by innovative and interesting
economic, legal and ecological systems.  Players run guilds,
players operate stores, players set prices, and players
build structures throughout the world.

  That said, it is a challenging mud. It's tough at the
bottom as a newbie because this mud has unique and complicated
game play; established players won't just roll over and give
up their turf (or cash!).  Its also tough at the top with
Lords and Guild Leaders responsible for administrative and
legal decisions which maybe unpopular with lesser players.
This encourages an active and participative society.
If you take the time and effort to learn the mud you'll
find it unique and engrossing. Many of our 'hard core'
players have been active for over five years.

  There are many ways to 'play'; it's not a killfest, we
strongly encourage role players and a responsible community.
But it's also a tough simulation; so the traditional
'warrior' adventurer will find plenty to fulfill them.
You'll find 9 innovative races, 11 guilds, 32 quests, like
you've never seen before.  Tough adventuring, big fantasy
world, friends and foes.  Take the time to know Shattered
World and you'll be richly rewarded!

Mud         : The Live-Action Roleplaying Module
Code Base   : [Unknown] Proto Database with Customized Programming
Telnet      : ninetails.animaltracks.net 3232 [204.212.105.214]
WWW         : http://www.geocities.com/live_rp/
Description :

After a year of work, this MUD-MUCK hybrid is alive!

The Live-Action Roleplaying Module (TLARM) is a relaxed place.
After you create a main account with us, you can either hang 
out with the gang OOCly, or you can play in other people's 
tabletop and LARP games by converting your characters to 
our system. You can also request space to create your own 
games through our module. We encourage World of Darkness 
games, but Dungeons & Dragons, Cyberpunk, and even original 
universes are welcome. We allow all themes, from General 
to Adult-Oriented (locks available at your request). 
TLARM's features include: 

-Out-of-character area for relaxation and chatting 
-Dice-roll command (supports modifiers) 
-Simple MUCK-like commands such as say, pose, find, spoof, 
 and page 
-Capability to create your own rooms and areas 
-Everything is live, entered commands are instantaneous 
-Friendly and personable atmosphere!

Mud         : Origin MUCK
Code Base   : [MUCK] Muck2.2fb5.68
Telnet      : origin.servegame.org 4454 [24.236.198.84]
WWW         : http://www.demuredemon.com
Description :

The world of Origin MUCK has an original, multi-faceted theme. The 
game is centered on 'the Realm', the name that mankind has given 
their worldly kingdom.

In the game, there is very little in the way of technology. The 
societies in the game are medieval in nature; the world is augmented
by magic, however, which is referred to as either 'Thaumaturgy' or 
'Sorcery' depending upon which country a character is from.

The Realm has enjoyed a relative state of peace for nearly two 
millenia after the fall of an evil king and the black Enemy of the 
south; however, changes are beginning to take place in the world, and
rumors are spreading of a growing power of darkness. The grip of fear
is quickly beginning to spread across the people of the land, and 
even to its neighbors, the titans. The word has journeyed across the 
southern borders that an army of eidolon has reformed, and a deadly 
silence has settled upon the gray plains.

Will you choose to be a member of the Legion, the strong and able 
defenders of the Realm who have chosen to serve the Magnates, the 
upholders of the Realm's law and peace? A simple citizen of the Realm?
Or perhaps a titan, one of the old and ancient friends of mankind, the
builders of Esh Nerago and the sturdiest of all races?

Or will you take your place among the ranks of the Eidolon, the 
lore-wise and secretive servants of the great Corrupter?

Hallowgate. Within its walls, humans, giants, litorians, sibeccai and
all of the other races of the world mix and intermingle, placed
between the boundless sea and the endless desert.

to explore, and fantastic new lands.

history and canon of the game. Players will be allowed and encouraged
to help shape the form of the game as it proceeds from Beta to its
public opening (tentatively scheduled for Spring, 2006). Players who
join now will be given the first shots at applying for our many open
staff positions.

Mud         : Portalis: The Fourth Age
Code Base   : [Rom] (under heavy construction)
Telnet      : ubermud.com 5000
WWW         : http://
Description :

Portalis is a new MUD I have been working on for sometime. The
Codebase is Quickmud, which is constantly being modified to fit our
goal mechanics. Currently however, all of the changes have been purely
code related, and we are in need of builders to flesh out a detailed
world that fits our massive storyline and theme.

We currently offer: 7 Races, and 8 classes. Old Skills and Spells have
been removed and are being replaced by new ones. The Magic system is
undergoing a full rewrite, offering each magic class their own unique
casting system. Combat is also being modified to do away with the
standard auto-combat, and support is being added to allow for leveling
through roleplay.

I am currently looking for Builders, Coders, or anyone that would just
like to find a way to help out. Our OLC is being rewroked as well, to
provide more powerful creation tools for the staff. We are not ready
for and active playerbase, as we are still in our development stages,
but we dont mind visitors :)

Brief Theme Info:
Portalis, or the World of Portals, was formed by the ancient gods to
serve as a focal point for the labyrynth of realms they created. The
gods are now long dead to the inhabitants of the universe, mortals are
left to navigate the great nexus and defend themselves from the
horrors of the demonic realms on their own. Great arches stand open to
allow passage to many of the more well known worlds, while others can
only be reached by a magi who knows when and where to call a portal.
However, these passages are open to the darker forces as well, and
they use them to try and wedge their way into dominance of Portalis,
and control of its portals. Do you have what it takes to exists here?

-Imp Zippo

Description :

Set 500 years after the Founding of Valdemar, political
 and social tensions are rife in Valdemar and the 
surrounding countries. Currently, the Herald-Heir of 
Valdemar and his Companion 
struggle to carry out diplomatic missions to 
annex the land around Lake Evindim, while the 
inhabitants of the Pelagirs and points south 
and west watch warily. What will happen? Will 
Valdemar survive for long without allies? What of 
the rumors of the wierd people and things in the 
Pelagirs Forest? And will the annexations be successful 
or will they fall through? Welcome to Herald Visions 
MOO, a collective role-playing game whose theme 
is based off of the Heralds of Valdemar book 
series by Mercedes Lackey. We can't allow characters 
on the game to be characters from the books, but other
 than that, you can RP almost anything you can dream 
up! From gryphons to Companions to Heralds to Bards, 
from Guild members to Royalty to farmers and 
merchants, it's all here for you at Herald Visions
 MOO. Mercades Lackey owns the intellectual 
property and copyright rights to the Heralds 
of Valdemar -- this is her world, we're just 
playing in it! We're also not making *any* 
money from this, it's non-profit and just for 
fun. Please note this game is still under 
construction, and we're small, but growing! 
Come be a part of Herald Visions MOO!

Mud         : SanateMUD
Code Base   : [Unknown]
Telnet      : digitalmouse.dyndns.org 6005
WWW         : http://worlds.darkfox.info/
Description :

<i>    ‘Wow, Rod, it’s amazing!’ Sana’tes said.
    ‘Yes, quite excellent!’ The Lord Him praised.
    ‘What are you gonna call it?’ Sana’tes asked.
    ‘That was the second piece of exciting news. It’ll be called 
Sana’tè.’ Rod explained. Sana’tes nearly fainted, but Rod was there 
to catch her just-in-time.
</i>
Sana'te is a new MUD currently under active construction. It is 
based on the BYOND system. Players are first shown to a newbie area, 
until they are accepted into the main game if they can demonstrate a 
good roleplaying ability, so the environment is not disturbed.
The game is strongly community based, with skill bonuses for working
as a team with people. Towns are virtually entirely player-built - 
you want a house? Have someone build it. A shop? Call a carpenter 
to put some cupboards in for stock items.
Sana'te is also entirely free. It was made to be enjoyed by all. So 
enjoy!

completely redone.

start our own. We will be running Galatic Chaos the way we thought it
should be run as players.

join.

The main focus of Galatic Chaos is roleplaying. Our goal is to create 
an environment which promotes in character activity. Roleplaying will
be heavily moderated and rewarded.

Start playing now and have the oppurtunity to join powerful clans, 
have force powers, and be among the strongest players in the game.

Mud         : EdenMUSH
Code Base   : [MUSH] Pennmush-1.7.7p33
Telnet      : shipon.afraid.org 2062
WWW         : http://
Description :

The world of EdenMUSH is a world in which technology and magic
co-exist, sometimes in peacefull collaboration and at other times in
violent opposition. Eden is a place of mystery, romance and adventure.
Where even the land on which you walk holds far greater secrets than
you could ever imagine. A well read member of present day society may
recognize in Eden elements of a late medieval, early renaissance and
even victorian earth, but Eden is none of these. The airborne island
of Eden is a world within itself, in a time within itself.

EdenMUSH is an originaly themed mush with elements from innumerable
sources, including popular liturature, films, television and video
games. Even so Eden is not any of these places and the chance of
seeing someone out of these sources is unlikely... all likenesses to
any people or events as they say, are unintentional. At EdenMUSH we
hope to offer the players an interesting and exciting roleplaying
environment, while still leaving room for expansion and growth based
upon the ideas of the player's themselves. And while we encourage our
players to roleplay we don't enforce it, we instead aim for a friendly
and fun place where you can socialize with the other players.

Come and join us, won't you?

Telnet      : grimsyn.xidus.net 2187 [64.124.185.72]
WWW         : http://www.grimsyn.com
Description :

- Fight pirates at the edges of the 'zone'. Run guns under
the well-armed nose of the Fleet. Duck through the sewers of
the megacorp worlds, and sneer at the most dangerous fringers.
The Grimsyn Sector. You might get rich, you might get famous.
You might never leave.
- Grimsyn Encounter is set in the shatterzone Universe, focusing
on a string of planets at the distant fringes of the known galaxy.
These worlds are set against the back-drop of the 'shatterzone',
a massive mainly unexplored space anomaly that has eluded
definitive explanation for centuries, and has spurred a hundred
religions and given birth to countless doctrines of faith and
scientific method. The date starts roughly in the year 2576 AD,
during a time when humanity itself is threatened by its own
misguided ambition.
- Grimsyn Encounter is a detailed setting, developed to advance
the scope of science-fiction/fantasy and bring one of the most
action-packed graphic space adventure RPGs to life. Here you will
witness new hopes, unsolved mysteries, epic conquests, and heroic
deeds. These are the tales of your characters-- of their triumphs
and of their defeats.

Mud         : Crimson Dawn
Code Base   : [MUX]
Telnet      : dawn.lithorien.net 1820 [68.234.78.35]
WWW         : http://
Description :

   Anitaverse is very similar to world of darkness, for those of you
who have ever played WoD, believe it or not. Yes, the books trickle 
off into what has been described as 'soft porn' well, that doesn't 
mean that our games have to do the same. In Anitaverse, vampires, 
werewolves, and various other were-things exist and humans know about
them! There can be, if players are imaginitative, even more suspense 
and 'horror' in Anitaverse than in WoD because you WON'T GET KILLED if
you tease that crazy human who's terrified of vampires with what 
you are! Tease us, torment us, just dont kill us! ;) It's all 
good.

   And hey, maybe even if you do kill us it's good too (though it 
is illegal)! I, as the Goddess am going to work -very- hard to keep
this game active with tps and other things to keep players involved.
I understand people have and form relationships and want to be alone 
at times. But I do not want to see people always staying locked away 
in private. Come out, roleplay! Have some fun! :) Also, just because
you're a vampire or a shifter or a mortal+ does -not- mean that 
automatically people -know- what you are. No. You either tell them,
or they have powers themselves and can sense it. Some supers or, on
as they're called in Anitaverse 'preturnaturals' can even hide what
they are from others, even of their own kind.

    I'll have more information up in-game, soon. So come on by and 
visit us! We would love to see you. And we are accepting builders 
and coders at this time, as well. We are -not- using SGP so are in
the process of coding everything from scratch, including our own
chargen. We do have a stat/sheet system, but it is -very- simple 
and it is -not- something we concentrate on. It is for fun, and 
to help divvy out who's who and what's what more easily. It 
should be a -fun- thing. On CD, we focus on -ROLEPLAY- not 
-ROLLPLAY-. Please don't be scared away by the fact that we 
have a sheet system. It is -very- simple and takes very 
little time to set on yourself, 5-10 minutes tops if you need 
help on figuring things out. We will have news files to aid 
you.

     So, please come check us out! We are waiting to accept 
you into our arms... Darkness is falling... the time grows 
near... won't you come ... show no fear.

                                 Crimson Dawn
                                           ~Medusa

to do the bidding of their conquerers. Much to the dismay of the
Icers, it seemed their new pets were weak, pathetic and thus not
worthy of servitude. Planet Earth was deemed a waste of resources
and ordered to be destroyed once the Dragonballs had been collected.
The Icers found something more precious in return without having to
put effort into searching, the Blackstar Dragonballs. With the
Earthlings being worthless the Dragoballs were used to restore their
most manipulatable and efficient servants of all time.  The Saiyan
race.
 
The small group of Humans that were not destroyed by the vicious
onslaught of their conquerers managed to board ships off of the
planet before the core imploded . Without a home and their moral
damaged the Humans fled deep into space to find a hiding place. In
return finding a planet where they made their new home and started
over. This planet was slightlysmaller then the original Earth but
the creatures and atmosphere were quite alike, it was named Earth II.
 
Time gradually passed with the Icerian Armada dominating planets at
the expense of their servants. They were lured into a false sense of
security thinking their brutes will never attempt another uprising.
To their surprise the Saiyan race did indeed stand up against the
Icers with formidable force, the result was victory for the warrior
race. Hundred of years had passed since the Saiyans were declared
free but the Universe was never restored to a peaceful place, the
taint of evil seemed to continiously grow and spread. Earth II grew
over time into a well known Port-of-call for all varieties of races,
forcing their economic status to grow and flourish.

                -----------------------------------------------

Mud         : Project Bob
Code Base   : [Rom] More than heavily modified.
Telnet      : projectbob.game-host.org 4000 [24.17.168.19]
WWW         : http://huntbh.home.comcast.net/bob
Description :

This Project has been under heavy development for 4 years.
While it is fully playable, we are also continuing with Beta
testing. The mud is generally very stable with regular code
additions. There are already dozens of interesting features 
that provide lasting gameplay. This is the mud for anyone 
who loves computer role playing games.

* Vast random equipment system based loosely on Diablo.
* Research and crafting help narrow down item searches.
* Diverse skill groups allow for deep class customization
  while effective classes can be chosen for simplicity.
* Numerous event and quest options for a fresher experience.
* Strong emphasis on player enjoyment and conveniences. 
* Territorial clan control system.
* Free grouping system for players of all levels to team up.
* Deep combat stat system where players may succeed through
  specialization or balance.
* Perk advancement system offers nearly endless development
  beyond a player's mastered skills and max level. Upgrade 
  abilities, boost talents, raise important stats and more.
* Newbie friendly Admin staff and game information. There is
  much to learn, but everything is geared towards helping.
* NPC trading system for passive item acquisition.
* Random exploration events provide alternate leveling methods.
* Many other smaller features add to the variety and fun of 
  regular game play. 

The majority of the codebase has been revamped or replaced 
resulting in over three times the original program size. A
more fantasy-based theme is under consideration, but you
will find countless ways to adventure and actually play
your character in our ever-growing world. Some will even
have the opportunity to help us shape it.

Mud         : ElkanduMUD
Code Base   : [ResortMUD] Modified, and eventually will be unrecognizable as smaug
Telnet      : omega.sector001.org 4000
WWW         : http://
Description :

Those with a fear of change, stay away. You have been warned.
Welcome to the second brainchild of a positively great coder,
Keolah Kedaire. Her first mud died because it became so far from
normal that we could no longer attract new players. This time, we 
hope to keep things more... humane. But this is not your normal mud.
Currently in the early stages, this mud already has began
differentiating itself from your boring stock smaugs. It has quad-
classing, and choosing a good combo of our homebrew classes is vital
to your success. The mud's biggest shortcoming at the moment lies in
its areas, which are mostly stock but it's only been running a few
weeks and we are currently building new areas. So, if you're bored
and looking for a change of pace, and a mud loaded with people that
love nothing more than to have fun, welcome to ElkanduMUD (working
title).

Mud         : Codebase Project
Code Base   : [Custom] Testing Framework
Telnet      : codebase.game-host.org 5000
WWW         : http://codebase.game-host.org:8080
Description :

Okay, right now, there is not much of a MUD that anyone (including
myself) could speak of. I can tell you right now, there is 
absolutely no game-play value in the MUD, and if you're looking 
for a playable MUD then I don't suggest this one. :) Of course,
that doesn't mean you're not welcome, by all means, visit, 
connect, and have a yarn if either myself or Angela is around.

Basically, the codebase is currently in the first, initial, stages 
of creation... which is the server framework. And the reason why 
I am posting this is so that people who are interested can at 
least try the server if they wish.

I'm also interested in talking to people who have ideas... on 
what should or shouldn't go into a codebase. The code is in its 
infancy, and it is not at the point where it would be 
extraordinarily difficult to put things on the To Do or To 
Don't list. 

What do you like about MUDs? What do you hate? Tell me!

Like I said, there's no game to speak of right now, but you're 
welcome to visit and help guide the developement of a new MUD. :)

Email me if you have ideas or had issues with the server...

Hello All,

For those of you who remember The Lords Arena, I welcome
you for those of you who don't I pity you.  Anyway, this 
mud will be a tribute mud to The Lords Arena, which is a 
very high standard to live up to indeed.  I hope that 
any player who enjoyed playing The Lords Arena will stop 
in and at least give creative suggestions though all 
suggestions are welcome from new or old players.

I spent quite a bit of time at The Lords Arena while it 
was up and though there were many players older than 
myself I was quite old.  But that matters not, what i am
attempting to do is bring back a stable mud to meet the 
requirements of what The Lords Arena once was.  My main 
goal at the moment is to create a stable dystopia themed 
mud that is similar to what existed when The Lords Arena 
was shut down.  This however may be an endless task as I 
do not have access to their base; I am using a new 
dystopia 1.2 base.

My first and main concern will be stability and enhancing
existing features and playability after that is 
accomplished I will likely move on to adding new features 
classes and functionality.

Thanks to all who read this,

Kelly G. Stevens - 
a.k.a. Dojen, Ceban, Shokra, Tyrgon, Luna, Sush

optic!

the circle codebase, called rasputin, which uses the open gaming
license, and is based off of the D-20 ruleset. We are basing our

play.

class, as will be fades, greymen, swordmasters, and wolfbrothers. Most
advancement will come through experience point gain, but will also be
a reward for good roleplaying. This is also an unrestricted pk mud,

Mud         : Age Of Tyranny
Code Base   : [Circlemud] highly modified
Telnet      : ageoftyranny.com 4545 [144.202.242.142]
WWW         : http://www.ageoftyranny.com
Description :

	Age Of Tyranny (AoT) is a new MUD based on the CircleMUD3.1
platform. We have rewritten the entire skill/spell system 
as well as altered the combat system so that battles involve 
a tad more skill then just attacking something and waiting to 
see if it dies. We are a classless mud with expertise based 
skill and spell system. You assign points (earned by leveling) 
into one of many different areas of expertise and can then 
learn skills and spells based on  your level of knowledge 
in that certain area of expertise (ie: Diablo II). 
We are also working on the ability to have Player controlled 
cities with an advanced economic system. 

	The MUD itself is based on custom world called 
Ultima Terra (Latin translated means the last land). Players 
start in a city called Kel-Moraine which is off the coast of 
Damaar. Kel-Moraine is under attack from several rival 
cities including Astoria and its Tyrant ruler. All zones will 
be custom made and will include extensive triggers to ensure 
that each zone has a true

Mud         : Apocalyptic Gate
Code Base   : [GodWars] GW Deluxe
Telnet      : planetmud.net 4401
WWW         : http://
Description :

It was a time of peace and joyful endings for decades. 
Wars were unheard of in this realm until a strange man 
by the name of Yerte summoned a strange gate. He called 
this gate the Apocalyptic Gate.. The citizens gathered 
around the strange gate for days until one day it opened. 
As it opened a large demon exited the gate decapitating 
them one by one. The citizens cried for help as the fiend 
devoured them, but in the distance a howls could be heard. 
From out of nowhere a pack of black and white furred beasts 
came to assist the citizens. As they grew close more demons 
poured out of the gate. It was that time, the war had finally 
arrived. Awaken all creatures of the realm and take your side, 
but their can only be one champion.

Apocalyptic Gate offers:

Classes: Mage, Demon, Werewolf, Angel, Monk, 
Ninja, Fae, and Vampire.

Hybrids: Nephandi, Skindancer, Lich, Abomination, 
Black Spiral Dancer, Baali, Hakken, Baiken, 
Starlit Cherub, Celestial Assassin, Celestial Howler, 
Defyler, Majestic Shadow, and Sohei.

*Classes in the works: Drow, Highlander, Kote, Dragons
*Hybrids in the works: Lloth, Sennin, and Elementalist
*Random Bonus EXP and QP system installed
*Removed clans to add kingdoms later

Currently we are still in the building process and are far 
from opening considering the classes, hybrids, helpfiles, 
and areas that need to be  created. You may drop in to chat 
or if you are a builder possibly aid in the construction 
of the Apocalyptic Gate.

-Apocalyptic Gate Staff
